quotes.text: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
quotes.author: Ashley Smith

quotes.text: A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases it will never pass into nothingness.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.text: Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: A beauty is a woman you notice a charmer is one who notices you.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.text: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Flowers... are a proud assertion that a ray of beauty outvalues all the utilities of the world.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: She got her looks from her father. He's a plastic surgeon.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: Beauty and folly are old companions.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Rare is the union of beauty and purity.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.text: Personal beauty is a greater recommendation than any letter of reference.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Beauty is unbearable, drives us to despair, offering us for a minute the glimpse of an eternity that we should like to stretch out over the whole of time.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: The world's biggest power is the youth and beauty of a woman.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: Beauty awakens the soul to act.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.text: A witty woman is a treasure a witty beauty is a power.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.text: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: Beauty is a manifestation of secret natural laws, which otherwise would have been hidden from us forever.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Beauty is all very well at first sight but who ever looks at it when it has been in the house three days?
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Beauty has a lot to do with character.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.text: There is no definition of beauty, but when you can see someone's spirit coming through, something unexplainable, that's beautiful to me.

quotes.text: For me the greatest beauty always lies in the greatest clarity.
quotes.author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quotes.text: Since love grows within you, so beauty grows. For love is the beauty of the soul.

quotes.text: I define nothing. Not beauty, not patriotism. I take each thing as it is, without prior rules about what it should be.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: Beauty is worse than wine, it intoxicates both the holder and beholder.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.text: I do not have much patience with a thing of beauty that must be explained to be understood. If it does need additional interpretation by someone other than the creator, then I question whether it has fulfilled its purpose.

quotes.text: I don't think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: Beauty is not caused. It is.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.text: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: Beauty is everywhere a welcome guest.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Bisset

quotes.text: Beauty, n: the power by which a woman charms a lover and terrifies a husband.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: Dear God! how beauty varies in nature and art. In a woman the flesh must be like marble in a statue the marble must be like flesh.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Beauty doesn't need ornaments. Softness can't bear the weight of ornaments.
quotes.author: Munshi Premchand

quotes.text: Beauty is in the heart of the beholder.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.text: Let us live for the beauty of our own reality.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.text: Every year of my life I grow more convinced that it is wisest and best to fix our attention on the beautiful and the good, and dwell as little as possible on the evil and the false.
quotes.author: Richard Cecil

quotes.text: Never lose an opportunity of seeing anything beautiful, for beauty is God's handwriting.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.text: Beauty is the promise of happiness.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.text: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures that we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.text: Imagination disposes of everything it creates beauty, justice, and happiness, which are everything in this world.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: A women's greatest asset is her beauty.
quotes.author: Alex Comfort

quotes.text: Beauty is indeed a good gift of God but that the good may not think it a great good, God dispenses it even to the wicked.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.text: Beauty is power a smile is its sword.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.text: Beauty itself is but the sensible image of the Infinite.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: If you look closely at a tree you'll notice it's knots and dead branches, just like our bodies. What we learn is that beauty and imperfection go together wonderfully.
quotes.author: Matthew Fox

quotes.text: Beauty is ever to the lonely mind a shadow fleeting she is never plain. She is a visitor who leaves behind the gift of grief, the souvenir of pain.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.text: Beauty is only temporary, but your mind lasts you a lifetime.
quotes.author: Alicia Machado

quotes.text: Beauty is a fragile gift.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: Beauty saves. Beauty heals. Beauty motivates. Beauty unites. Beauty returns us to our origins, and here lies the ultimate act of saving, of healing, of overcoming dualism.
quotes.author: Matthew Fox

quotes.text: In every man's heart there is a secret nerve that answers to the vibrations of beauty.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.text: Love built on beauty, soon as beauty, dies.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.text: I don't need plastic in my body to validate me as a woman.
quotes.author: Courtney Love

quotes.text: I gave my beauty and my youth to men. I am going to give my wisdom and experience to animals.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.text: The problem with beauty is that it's like being born rich and getting poorer.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.text: In youth and beauty, wisdom is but rare!
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.text: Heat cannot be separated from fire, or beauty from The Eternal.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.text: Having inner beauty is something you develop on your own, and I like to think I have that.
quotes.author: Cindy Margolis

quotes.text: Beauty is less important than quality.
quotes.author: Eugene Ormandy

quotes.text: There is a kind of beauty in imperfection.
quotes.author: Conrad Hall

quotes.text: When virtue and modesty enlighten her charms, the lustre of a beautiful woman is brighter than the stars of heaven, and the influence of her power it is in vain to resist.
quotes.author: Akhenaton

quotes.text: Beauty is variable, ugliness is constant.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.text: 'Handsome' means many things to many people. If people consider me handsome, I feel flattered - and have my parents to thank for it. Realistically, it doesn't hurt to be good-looking, especially in this business.
quotes.author: Richard Chamberlain

quotes.text: My mother always called me an ugly weed, so I never was aware of anything until I was older. Plain girls should have someone telling them they are beautiful. Sometimes this works miracles.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.text: Zest is the secret of all beauty. There is no beauty that is attractive without zest.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.text: Beauty is our weapon against nature by it we make objects, giving them limit, symmetry, proportion. Beauty halts and freezes the melting flux of nature.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: Beauty is whatever gives joy.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.text: There is no personal achievement in being born beautiful.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.text: The love of beauty in its multiple forms is the noblest gift of the human cerebrum.
quotes.author: Alexis Carrel

quotes.text: Beauty is the first present nature gives to women and the first it takes away.
quotes.author: Fay Weldon

quotes.text: Some guys say beauty is only skin deep. But when you walk into a party, you don't see somebody's brain. The initial contact has to be the sniffing.
quotes.author: James Caan

quotes.text: We are learning, too, that the love of beauty is one of Nature's greatest healers.
quotes.author: Ellsworth Huntington

quotes.text: I sincerely feel that beauty largely comes from within.
quotes.author: Christy Turlington

quotes.text: There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness.
quotes.author: Maria Mitchell

quotes.text: Even in the centuries which appear to us to be the most monstrous and foolish, the immortal appetite for beauty has always found satisfaction.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: You can only perceive real beauty in a person as they get older.
quotes.author: Anouk Aimee

quotes.text: Inner beauty should be the most important part of improving one's self.
quotes.author: Priscilla Presley

quotes.text: What beauty is, I know not, though it adheres to many things.
quotes.author: Albrecht Durer

quotes.text: Though beauty gives you a weird sense of entitlement, it's rather frightening and threatening to have others ascribe such importance to something you know you're just renting for a while.
quotes.author: Candice Bergen

quotes.text: Things are beautiful if you love them.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.text: The real sin against life is to abuse and destroy beauty, even one's own even more, one's own, for that has been put in our care and we are responsible for its well-being.
quotes.author: Katherine Anne Porter

quotes.text: Real beauty knocks you a little bit off kilter.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.text: Integrity reveals beauty.
quotes.author: Thomas Leonard

quotes.text: If you get simple beauty and naught else, you get about the best thing God invents.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.text: Goodness is beauty in the best estate.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.text: Our hearts were drunk with a beauty Our eyes could never see.
quotes.author: George William Russell

quotes.text: Like charity, I believe glamour should begin at home.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.text: How goodness heightens beauty!
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.text: Because beauty isn't enough, there must be something more.
quotes.author: Eva Herzigova

quotes.text: Taking joy in living is a woman's best cosmetic.
quotes.author: Rosalind Russell

quotes.text: Without realizing it, the individual composes his life according to the laws of beauty even in times of greatest distress.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.text: I can't live without my beauty products. I love to be in my bathroom with my candles lit, morning, noon and night. I like taking hot baths and hot showers, using my body scrubs and lotions.
quotes.author: Traci Bingham

quotes.text: Beauty is one of the rare things which does not lead to doubt of God.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.text: I'd like to grow up and be beautiful. I know it doesn't matter, but it doesn't hurt.
quotes.author: Kirsten Dunst

quotes.text: My dad had this philosophy that if you tell children they're beautiful and wonderful then they believe it, and they will be. So I never thought I was unattractive. But I was never one of the girls at school who had lots of boyfriends.
quotes.author: Emily Mortimer

quotes.text: O human beauty, what a dream art thou, that we should cast our life and hopes away on thee!
quotes.author: Barry Cornwall

quotes.text: When everything else physical and mental seems to diminish, the appreciation of beauty is on the increase.
quotes.author: Bernard Berenson

quotes.text: I was not a good-lookin' girl. I was extremely skinny. I wasn't pretty. I wasn't cool.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.text: Beauty is only skin deep.
quotes.author: Thomas Overbury

quotes.text: You can't really say what is beautiful about a place, but the image of the place will remain vividly with you.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.text: The plainer the dress, the greater luster does beauty appear.
quotes.author: Edward F. Halifax

quotes.text: Real beauty is to be true to oneself. That's what makes me feel good.
quotes.author: Laetitia Casta

quotes.text: It's sad when girls think they don't have anything going on except being pretty.
quotes.author: Keri Russell

quotes.text: There is hope and a kind of beauty in there somewhere, if you look for it.
quotes.author: H. R. Giger

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mode but the true beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul. It is the caring that she lovingly gives the passion that she shows. The beauty of a woman grows with the passing years.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Our task must be to free ourselves by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature and its beauty.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: When I admire the wonders of a sunset or the beauty of the moon, my soul expands in the worship of the creator.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: The beauty of a woman is not in the clothes she wears, the figure that she carries or the way she combs her hair.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Wisdom I know is social. She seeks her fellows. But Beauty is jealous, and illy bears the presence of a rival.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Beauty of whatever kind, in its supreme development, invariably excites the sensitive soul to tears.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: There is something terribly morbid in the modern sympathy with pain. One should sympathise with the colour, the beauty, the joy of life. The less said about life's sores the better.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Love is the beauty of the soul.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.text: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.text: Beauty without expression is boring.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Beauty without grace is the hook without the bait.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: We find delight in the beauty and happiness of children that makes the heart too big for the body.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: It is cruel, you know, that music should be so beautiful. It has the beauty of loneliness of pain: of strength and freedom. The beauty of disappointment and never-satisfied love. The cruel beauty of nature and everlasting beauty of monotony.
quotes.author: Benjamin Britten

quotes.text: Everybody needs beauty as well as bread, places to play in and pray in, where nature may heal and give strength to body and soul.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: Beauty is an outward gift, which is seldom despised, except by those to whom it has been refused.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: As we grow old, the beauty steals inward.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.
quotes.author: Jean Ingelow

quotes.text: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: Beauty and femininity are ageless and can't be contrived, and glamour, although the manufacturers won't like this, cannot be manufactured. Not real glamour it's based on femininity.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: When I am working on a problem, I never think about beauty but when I have finished, if the solution is not beautiful, I know it is wrong.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.text: Beauty is a short-lived tyranny.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Beauty is the bait which with delight allures man to enlarge his kind.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: The perception of beauty is a moral test.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: For every moment of triumph, for every instance of beauty, many souls must be trampled.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: Alas! how little does the memory of these human inhabitants enhance the beauty of the landscape!
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Poetry is the rhythmical creation of beauty in words.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Only on paper has humanity yet achieved glory, beauty, truth, knowledge, virtue, and abiding love.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Beauty is a short-lived tyranny.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: 'Beauty is truth, truth beauty,' - that is all ye know on earth, and all ye need to know.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.text: It is not sufficient to see and to know the beauty of a work. We must feel and be affected by it.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Beauty is mysterious as well as terrible. God and devil are fighting there, and the battlefield is the heart of man.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.text: Enlightened leadership is spiritual if we understand spirituality not as some kind of religious dogma or ideology but as the domain of awareness where we experience values like truth, goodness, beauty, love and compassion, and also intuition, creativity, insight and focused attention.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.text: Anything in any way beautiful derives its beauty from itself and asks nothing beyond itself. Praise is no part of it, for nothing is made worse or better by praise.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.text: I would define, in brief, the poetry of words as the rhythmical creation of Beauty.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: I am a thing of beauty.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: The beauty, the poetry of the fear in their eyes. I didn't mind going to jail for, what, five, six hours? It was absolutely worth it.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.text: Character contributes to beauty. It fortifies a woman as her youth fades. A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude, and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Bisset

quotes.text: Far away there in the sunshine are my highest aspirations. I may not reach them, but I can look up and see their beauty, believe in them, and try to follow where they lead.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.text: It is not so much for its beauty that the forest makes a claim upon men's hearts, as for that subtle something, that quality of air that emanation from old trees, that so wonderfully changes and renews a weary spirit.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: By plucking her petals, you do not gather the beauty of the flower.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: Beauty is the greatest seducer of man.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: I think permitting the game to become too physical takes away a little bit of the beauty.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself. Fashion is not just beauty, it's about good attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.text: A lot of us grow up and we grow out of the literal interpretation that we get when we're children, but we bear the scars all our life. Whether they're scars of beauty or scars of ugliness, it's pretty much in the eye of the beholder.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: If truth is beauty, how come no one has their hair done in the library?
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.text: Everyone has their own insecurities, regardless of how you look or how people perceive you, but sometimes people give their insecurities too much power. Defining beauty is simply a matter of opinion. For me, real beauty has very little to do with the structure of someone's face or body.
quotes.author: Devon Aoki

quotes.text: Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.text: It was one of those evenings when men feel that truth, goodness and beauty are one. In the morning, when they commit their discovery to paper, when others read it written there, it looks wholly ridiculous.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: It's not beauty but fine qualities, my girl, that keep a husband.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.text: What would be ugly in a garden constitutes beauty in a mountain.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Do you know the difference between a beautiful woman and a charming one? A beauty is a woman you notice, a charmer is one who notices you.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.text: Art is not the application of a canon of beauty but what the instinct and the brain can conceive beyond any canon. When we love a woman we don't start measuring her limbs.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: I'm just glad I was able to return to some of that innocence and beauty I had as a child when I started my own family, and my children brought me back some of that spirit.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.text: Great perils have this beauty, that they bring to light the fraternity of strangers.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: The books that help you most are those which make you think that most. The hardest way of learning is that of easy reading but a great book that comes from a great thinker is a ship of thought, deep freighted with truth and beauty.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.text: The ideal and the beautiful are identical the ideal corresponds to the idea, and beauty to form hence idea and substance are cognate.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Whatever you may look like, marry a man your own age - as your beauty fades, so will his eyesight.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.text: What a man does for pay is of little significance. What he is, as a sensitive instrument responsive to the world's beauty, is everything!
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.text: Celibacy is not just a matter of not having sex. It is a way of admiring a person for their humanity, maybe even for their beauty.
quotes.author: Timothy Radcliffe

quotes.text: The beauty is that through disappointment you can gain clarity, and with clarity comes conviction and true originality.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.text: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: Secrecy is the element of all goodness even virtue, even beauty is mysterious.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.text: Art can never exist without naked beauty displayed.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: Exuberance is beauty.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: It's a good thing that beauty is only skin deep, or I'd be rotten to the core.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.text: Sexiness wears thin after a while and beauty fades, but to be married to a man who makes you laugh every day, ah, now that's a real treat.
quotes.author: Joanne Woodward

quotes.text: Photography records the gamut of feelings written on the human face, the beauty of the earth and skies that man has inherited, and the wealth and confusion man has created. It is a major force in explaining man to man.
quotes.author: Edward Steichen

quotes.text: Most sets of values would give rise to universes that, although they might be very beautiful, would contain no one able to wonder at that beauty.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: There are no better cosmetics than a severe temperance and purity, modesty and humility, a gracious temper and calmness of spirit and there is no true beauty without the signatures of these graces in the very countenance.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.text: Beauty is an ecstasy it is as simple as hunger. There is really nothing to be said about it. It is like the perfume of a rose: you can smell it and that is all.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.text: I can barely conceive of a type of beauty in which there is no Melancholy.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: That which you create in beauty and goodness and truth lives on for all time to come. Don't spend your life accumulating material objects that will only turn to dust and ashes.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: A person however learned and qualified in his life's work in whom gratitude is absent, is devoid of that beauty of character which makes personality fragrant.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.text: Facts which at first seem improbable will, even on scant explanation, drop the cloak which has hidden them and stand forth in naked and simple beauty.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.text: Beauty in distress is much the most affecting beauty.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.text: The beauty of independence, departure, actions that rely on themselves.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: Beauty makes idiots sad and wise men merry.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.text: Look up, laugh loud, talk big, keep the color in your cheek and the fire in your eye, adorn your person, maintain your health, your beauty and your animal spirits.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.text: Should you shield the canyons from the windstorms you would never see the true beauty of their carvings.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.text: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: When I say that human beings are just gene machines, one shouldn't put too much emphasis on the word 'just.' There is a very great deal of complication, and indeed beauty in being a gene machine.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.text: It is the addition of strangeness to beauty that constitutes the romantic character in art.
quotes.author: Walter Hagen

quotes.text: Beauty may be skin deep, but ugly goes clear to the bone.
quotes.author: Redd Foxx

quotes.text: Beauty is in the eye of the beer holder.
quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

quotes.text: Teach us that wealth is not elegance, that profusion is not magnificence, that splendor is not beauty.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.text: I also became close to nature, and am now able to appreciate the beauty with which this world is endowed.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.text: In marriage do thou be wise: prefer the person before money, virtue before beauty, the mind before the body then thou hast a wife, a friend, a companion, a second self.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.text: That's one of the nice things. I mean, part of the beauty of me is that I'm very rich. So if I need $600 million, I can put $600 million myself. That's a huge advantage. I must tell you, that's a huge advantage over the other candidates.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: At fifteen, beauty and talent do not exist there can only be promise of the coming woman.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: Children, dear and loving children, can alone console a woman for the loss of her beauty.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: If in my youth I had realized that the sustaining splendour of beauty of with which I was in love would one day flood back into my heart, there to ignite a flame that would torture me without end, how gladly would I have put out the light in my eyes.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.text: A day spent without the sight or sound of beauty, the contemplation of mystery, or the search of truth or perfection is a poverty-stricken day and a succession of such days is fatal to human life.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.text: At some point in life the world's beauty becomes enough. You don't need to photograph, paint or even remember it. It is enough.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.text: Light, God's eldest daughter, is a principal beauty in a building.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.text: Beauty is about perception, not about make-up. I think the beginning of all beauty is knowing and liking oneself. You can't put on make-up, or dress yourself, or do you hair with any sort of fun or joy if you're doing it from a position of correction.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.text: That's why I began doing makeup in the first place: I was hoping that through helping people see the beauty in themselves, I could try and find it in me.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.text: Beauty is only skin deep. I think what's really important is finding a balance of mind, body and spirit.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.text: When I tried to play something and screwed up, I'd hear some other note that would come into play. Then I started trying different things to find the beauty in it.
quotes.author: Dimebag Darrell

quotes.text: The most common error made in matters of appearance is the belief that one should disdain the superficial and let the true beauty of one's soul shine through. If there are places on your body where this is a possibility, you are not attractive - you are leaking.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.text: The terrifying and edible beauty of Art Nouveau architecture.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.text: O, thou art fairer than the evening air clad in the beauty of a thousand stars.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.text: Through loyalty to the past, our mind refuses to realize that tomorrow's joy is possible only if today's makes way for it that each wave owes the beauty of its line only to the withdrawal of the preceding one.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.text: There is no excellent beauty that hath not some strangeness in the proportion.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Although beauty may be in the eye of the beholder, the feeling of being beautiful exists solely in the mind of the beheld.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.text: Beauty, to me, is about being comfortable in your own skin. That, or a kick-ass red lipstick.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.text: The human mind is capable of excitement without the application of gross and violent stimulants and he must have a very faint perception of its beauty and dignity who does not know this.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.text: Beauty deprived of its proper foils and adjuncts ceases to be enjoyed as beauty, just as light deprived of all shadows ceases to be enjoyed as light.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within - strength, courage, dignity.
quotes.author: Ruby Dee

quotes.text: Beauty for some provides escape, who gain a happiness in eyeing the gorgeous buttocks of the ape or Autumn sunsets exquisitely dying.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.text: To give pain is the tyranny to make happy, the true empire of beauty.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: The beauty of the world, which is so soon to perish, has two edges, one of laughter, one of anguish, cutting the heart asunder.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: Every beauty which is seen here by persons of perception resembles more than anything else that celestial source from which we all are come.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.text: Beauty always promises, but never gives anything.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.text: To look almost pretty is an acquisition of higher delight to a girl who has been looking plain for the first fifteen years of her life than a beauty from her cradle can ever receive.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.text: Poets say science takes away from the beauty of the stars - mere globs of gas atoms. I, too, can see the stars on a desert night, and feel them. But do I see less or more?
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.text: We especially need imagination in science. It is not all mathematics, nor all logic, but it is somewhat beauty and poetry.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.text: The architect should strive continually to simplify the ensemble of the rooms should then be carefully considered that comfort and utility may go hand in hand with beauty.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.text: It is art that makes life, makes interest, makes importance... and I know of no substitute whatever for the force and beauty of its process.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.text: It is dangerous for mortal beauty, or terrestrial virtue, to be examined by too strong a light. The torch of Truth shows much that we cannot, and all that we would not, see.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.text: Poetry is something to make us wiser and better, by continually revealing those types of beauty and truth, which God has set in all men's souls.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.text: I don't like people who have never fallen or stumbled. Their virtue is lifeless and it isn't of much value. Life hasn't revealed its beauty to them.
quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

quotes.text: Taught from infancy that beauty is woman's sceptre, the mind shapes itself to the body, and roaming round its gilt cage, only seeks to adorn its prison.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.text: I tell myself that God gave my children many gifts - spirit, beauty, intelligence, the capacity to make friends and to inspire respect. There was only one gift he held back - length of life.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.text: Humanism was not wrong in thinking that truth, beauty, liberty, and equality are of infinite value, but in thinking that man can get them for himself without grace.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.text: Don't get me wrong, I admire elegance and have an appreciation of the finer things in life. But to me, beauty lies in simplicity.
quotes.author: Mark Hyman

quotes.text: Beauty is the disinterested one, without which the ancient world refused to understand itself, a word which both imperceptibly and yet unmistakably has bid farewell to our new world, a world of interests, leaving it to its own avarice and sadness.
quotes.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quotes.text: Courtesy is a silver lining around the dark clouds of civilization it is the best part of refinement and in many ways, an art of heroic beauty in the vast gallery of man's cruelty and baseness.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.text: An artist is an artist only because of his exquisite sense of beauty, a sense which shows him intoxicating pleasures, but which at the same time implies and contains an equally exquisite sense of all deformities and all disproportion.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: San Francisco is a mad city - inhabited for the most part by perfectly insane people whose women are of a remarkable beauty.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.text: Beauty is also submitted to the taste of time, so a beautiful woman from the Belle Epoch is not exactly the perfect beauty of today, so beauty is something that changes with time.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.text: A whopping 89 percent of buyers start their home search online. How your house looks online is the modern equivalent of 'curb appeal.' Rent a wide-angle lens and good lighting, get rid of your clutter and post at least eight great photos to win the beauty contest.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.text: Sex and beauty are inseparable, like life and consciousness. And the intelligence which goes with sex and beauty, and arises out of sex and beauty, is intuition.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.text: There's a beauty to wisdom and experience that cannot be faked. It's impossible to be mature without having lived.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.text: Praise or blame has but a momentary effect on the man whose love of beauty in the abstract makes him a severe critic on his own works.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.text: Youth is happy because it has the ability to see beauty. Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.text: It would be difficult for me not to conclude that the most perfect type of masculine beauty is Satan, as portrayed by Milton.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: I am little concerned with beauty or perfection. I don't care for the great centuries. All I care about is life, struggle, intensity.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.text: Nonsense and beauty have close connections.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.text: Beauty ought to look a little surprised: it is the emotion that best suits her face. The beauty who does not look surprised, who accepts her position as her due - she reminds us too much of a prima donna.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.text: If we do not permit the earth to produce beauty and joy, it will in the end not produce food, either.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.text: I don't want to be perfect, but I do want to be a role model. My mom always tells me that imperfections equal beauty. All of us are imperfect.
quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

quotes.text: To me, teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one. You become selfless.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.text: I decided that if I could paint that flower in a huge scale, you could not ignore its beauty.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.text: What the imagination seizes as beauty must be truth.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.text: With a great poet the sense of Beauty overcomes every other consideration, or rather obliterates all consideration.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.text: In chess one cannot control everything. Sometimes a game takes an unexpected turn, in which beauty begins to emerge. Both players are always instrumental in this.
quotes.author: Vladimir Kramnik

quotes.text: No spring nor summer beauty hath such grace as I have seen in one autumnal face.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.text: I believe that children are our future. Teach them well and let them lead the way. Show them all the beauty they possess inside.
quotes.author: Whitney Houston

quotes.text: The lover knows much more about absolute good and universal beauty than any logician or theologian, unless the latter, too, be lovers in disguise.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.text: It is well known that Beauty does not look with a good grace on the timid advances of Humour.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.text: There is certainly no absolute standard of beauty. That precisely is what makes its pursuit so interesting.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.text: There is great beauty in going through life without anxiety or fear. Half our fears are baseless, and the other half discreditable.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.text: Grace in women has more effect than beauty.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.text: Old hands soil, it seems, whatever they caress, but they too have their beauty when they are joined in prayer. Young hands were made for caresses and the sheathing of love. It is a pity to make them join too soon.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.text: There is nothing that makes its way more directly into the soul than beauty.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.text: Competence, like truth, beauty, and contact lenses, is in the eye of the beholder.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.text: People say I'm extravagant because I want to be surrounded by beauty. But tell me, who wants to be surrounded by garbage?
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.text: I always say you can never be extravagant with beauty. Beauty is God made real. Beauty is life.
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.text: Grace is in garments, in movements, in manners beauty in the nude, and in forms. This is true of bodies but when we speak of feelings, beauty is in their spirituality, and grace in their moderation.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.text: I think everybody can agree that you can hear a certain song and it will put you in a certain mood, and that's just the beauty of music and I am so inspired by that.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.text: Paris is one of the most beautiful places in all the world. Unfortunately, I was so homesick I couldn't appreciate its beauty.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.text: The human soul needs actual beauty more than bread.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.text: For the man sound of body and serene of mind there is no such thing as bad weather every day has its beauty, and storms which whip the blood do but make it pulse more vigorously.
quotes.author: George Gissing

quotes.text: Who would not give up wit for power and beauty?
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.text: Enhance and intensify one's vision of that synthesis of truth and beauty which is the highest and deepest reality.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: The beautiful seems right by force of beauty, and the feeble wrong because of weakness.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: What is man's ultimate direction in life? It is to look for love, truth, virtue, and beauty.
quotes.author: Shinichi Suzuki

quotes.text: Beauty is desired in order that it may be befouled not for its own sake, but for the joy brought by the certainty of profaning it.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.text: The moment you cheat for the sake of beauty, you know you're an artist.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.text: A thing is right when it tends to preserve the integrity, stability and beauty of the biotic community. It is wrong when it tends otherwise.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.text: A bad manner spoils everything, even reason and justice a good one supplies everything, gilds a No, sweetens a truth, and adds a touch of beauty to old age itself.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.text: Beauty is the lover's gift.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.text: There is in true beauty, as in courage, something which narrow souls cannot dare to admire.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.text: A woman can be very beautiful and an ideal model and she will photograph incredibly well, but she'll appear in film and it won't work. What works is some fusion of physical beauty with some mental field or whatever you call it. I don't know.
quotes.author: Oliver Stone

quotes.text: The ideal beauty is a fugitive which is never found.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.text: Wisdom is the abstract of the past, but beauty is the promise of the future.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.text: Our scientific age demands that we provide definitions, measurements, and statistics in order to be taken seriously. Yet most of the important things in life cannot be precisely defined or measured. Can we define or measure love, beauty, friendship, or decency, for example?
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.text: No matter what a woman's appearance may be, it will be used to undermine what she is saying and taken to individualize - as her personal problem - observations she makes about the beauty myth in society.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.text: Vampires have always held a very seductive kind of lore and have always been some variety of attractive, whether it's attractiveness that's born of just the physical attributes that they have - this kind of ethereal beauty or translucent pallor - or whether it is more to do with the way they carry themselves.
quotes.author: Colin Farrell

quotes.text: If you don't die of thirst, there are blessings in the desert. You can be pulled into limitlessness, which we all yearn for, or you can do the beauty of minutiae, the scrimshaw of tiny and precise. The sky is your ocean, and the crystal silence will uplift you like great gospel music, or Neil Young.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: For what the horse does under compulsion, as Simon also observes, is done without understanding and there is no beauty in it either, any more than if one should whip and spur a dancer.
quotes.author: Xenophon

quotes.text: I might have some character traits that some might see as innocence or naive. That's because I discovered peace and happiness in my soul. And with this knowledge, I also see the beauty of human life.
quotes.author: Tobey Maguire

quotes.text: After all, it is the divinity within that makes the divinity without and I have been more fascinated by a woman of talent and intelligence, though deficient in personal charms, than I have been by the most regular beauty.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.text: Do not try to push your way through to the front ranks of your profession do not run after distinctions and rewards but do your utmost to find an entry into the world of beauty.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.text: All cities are mad: but the madness is gallant. All cities are beautiful: but the beauty is grim.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.text: Whether you come from heaven or hell, what does it matter, O Beauty!
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: People think that if you look fairly reasonable, you can't possibly act, and as I only care about acting, I think beauty can be a great handicap.
quotes.author: Vivien Leigh

quotes.text: Romance and novel paint beauty in colors more charming than nature, and describe a happiness that humans never taste. How deceptive and destructive are those pictures of consummate bliss!
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.text: Always think of what is useful and not what is beautiful. Beauty will come of its own accord.
quotes.author: Nikolai Gogol

quotes.text: Beauty, like ice, our footing does betray Who can tread sure on the smooth, slippery way: Pleased with the surface, we glide swiftly on, And see the dangers that we cannot shun.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.text: Filipinos want beauty. I have to look beautiful so that the poor Filipinos will have a star to look at from their slums.
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.text: I have been overcome by the beauty and richness of our life together, those early mornings setting out, those evenings gleaming with rivers and lakes below us, still holding the last light.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.text: I was always reading those beauty magazines and wanting to become this unattainable thing.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.text: I love Rauschenberg. I love that he created a turning point in visual history, that he redefined the idea of beauty, that he combined painting, sculpture, photography, and everyday life with such gall, and that he was interested in, as he put it, 'the ability to conceive failure as progress.'
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: Abstraction brings the world into more complex, variable relations it can extract beauty, alternative topographies, ugliness, and intense actualities from seeming nothingness.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: In such ugly times, the only true protest is beauty.
quotes.author: Phil Ochs

quotes.text: During the 80s and 90s, we all became consumed with ourselves. In the 21st century, we've come back to simpler times. People are struggling economically and this has forced them to scale back the material aspects of their lives and realise the beauty of finding the simple joy in being with the people we love.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.text: Beauty attracts us men but if, like an armed magnet it is pointed, beside, with gold and silver, it attracts with tenfold power.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.text: So much has been said and sung of beautiful young girls, why doesn't somebody wake up to the beauty of old women.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.text: In LA, where I live, it's all about perfectionism. Beauty is now defined by your bones sticking out of your decolletage. For that to be the standard is really perilous for women.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.text: Beauty is now defined by your bones sticking out of your decolletage. For that to be the standard is really perilous for women.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.text: Beauty will be convulsive or will not be at all.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.text: The pleasure we derive from the representation of the present is due, not only to the beauty it can be clothed in, but also to its essential quality of being the present.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: This is the beauty of the Qur'an: it asks you to reflect and reason, and not to worship the sun or moon but the One who has created everything. The Qur'an asks man to reflect upon the sun and moon and God's creation in general.
quotes.author: Cat Stevens

quotes.text: Poetry lifts the veil from the hidden beauty of the world, and makes familiar objects be as if they were not familiar.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.text: Obscenity, which is ever blasphemy against the divine beauty in life, is a monster for which the corruption of society forever brings forth new food, which it devours in secret.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.text: Everybody know, I don't do no promoting. I don't ever have to promote nothing, that's the beauty of Lil Wayne.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.text: Whenever, at a party, I have been in the mood to study fools, I have always looked for a great beauty: they always gather round her like flies around a fruit stall.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.text: The first show I ever did, singing and dancing, was 'Beauty and the Beast.' I was playing Gaston. Gaston has red tights, knee high boots, and it's very physical. I had headaches every day for two months.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.text: A bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.text: Beauty and brains, pleasure and usability - they should go hand in hand.
quotes.author: Donald Norman

quotes.text: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.text: The key to education is the experience of beauty.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.text: Blues and soul and jazz music has so much pain, so much beauty of raw emotion and passion.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.text: Today I see beauty everywhere I go, in every face I see, in every single soul.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.text: Aging has a wonderful beauty and we should have respect for that.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.text: There are as many kinds of beauty as there are habitual ways of seeking happiness.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: The study of beauty is a duel in which the artist cries with terror before being defeated.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: Beauty is the sole ambition, the exclusive goal of Taste.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: Swift speedy time, feathered with flying hours, Dissolves the beauty of the fairest brow.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.text: Beauty is that which is simultaneously attractive and sublime.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.text: I slept and dreamt that life was beauty I woke and found that life was duty.
quotes.author: George Byron

quotes.text: It's not some great work of beauty and love to be a rock-and-roll singer.
quotes.author: Robert Plant

quotes.text: The absence of flaw in beauty is itself a flaw.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.text: The true beauty of music is that it connects people. It carries a message, and we, the musicians, are the messengers.
quotes.author: Roy Ayers

quotes.text: Walk on a rainbow trail walk on a trail of song, and all about you will be beauty. There is a way out of every dark mist, over a rainbow trail.
quotes.author: Robert Motherwell

quotes.text: I have always known what I wanted, and that was beauty... in every form.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.text: Liturgy is like a strong tree whose beauty is derived from the continuous renewal of its leaves, but whose strength comes from the old trunk, with solid roots in the ground.
quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

quotes.text: Beauty is merciless. You do not look at it, it looks at you and does not forgive.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.text: People often say that 'beauty is in the eye of the beholder,' and I say that the most liberating thing about beauty is realizing that you are the beholder. This empowers us to find beauty in places where others have not dared to look, including inside ourselves.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.text: Beauty opened all the doors it got me things I didn't even know I wanted, and things I certainly didn't deserve.
quotes.author: Janice Dickinson

quotes.text: Soon I realized that if beauty equalled forgiveness, I was never going to be forgiven.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.text: By its very nature the beautiful is isolated from everything else. From beauty no road leads to reality.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.text: For all of nature's wonder and beauty, it is also hostile and unpredictable.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.text: Beauty, whether moral or natural, is felt, more properly than perceived.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.text: Accuracy is, in every case, advantageous to beauty, and just reasoning to delicate sentiment. In vain would we exalt the one by depreciating the other.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.text: Filipinos don't wallow in what is miserable and ugly. They recycle the bad into things of beauty.
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.text: Depression opens the door to beauty of some kind.
quotes.author: James Hillman

quotes.text: Somehow a bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.text: Beauty is not something you can count on. Usually, when people say you are beautiful, it is when there is a harmony between the inside and the outside.
quotes.author: Emmanuelle Beart

quotes.text: Pay attention to the beauty surrounding you.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: I'm not ugly, but my beauty is a total creation.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.text: The beauty one can find in art is one of the pitifully few real and lasting products of human endeavor.
quotes.author: Paul Getty

quotes.text: Only when inspired to go beyond consciousness by some extraordinary insight does beauty manifest unexpectedly.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.text: I think exercise tests us in so many ways, our skills, our hearts, our ability to bounce back after setbacks. This is the inner beauty of sports and competition, and it can serve us all well as adult athletes.
quotes.author: Peggy Fleming

quotes.text: Ugliness is in a way superior to beauty because it lasts.
quotes.author: Serge Gainsbourg

quotes.text: I've never had any illusions about being a lead actor in films, because lead actors have to be of a certain kind. Apart from the beauty of looks and figure, which I cannot claim to have, there's just a particular kind of ordinary-Joe quality that a film star needs to have.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.text: Let me tell you something - being thought of as a beautiful woman has spared me nothing in life. No heartache, no trouble. Love has been difficult. Beauty is essentially meaningless and it is always transitory.
quotes.author: Halle Berry

quotes.text: Beauty when unadorned is adorned the most.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.text: The 1990s, after the reign of terror of academic vandalism, will be a decade of restoration: restoration of meaning, value, beauty, pleasure, and emotion to art and restoration of art to its audience.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: I believe that history has shape, order, and meaning that exceptional men, as much as economic forces, produce change and that passe abstractions like beauty, nobility, and greatness have a shifting but continuing validity.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: Younger women have no problem in reconciling beauty with ambitions as a professional woman.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: It seems like the chaos of this world is accelerating, but so is the beauty in the consciousness of more and more people.
quotes.author: Anthony Kiedis

quotes.text: I'm tired of all this nonsense about beauty being skin deep. That's deep enough. What do you want, an adorable pancreas?
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.text: Sometimes the beauty is easy. Sometimes you don't have to try at all. Sometimes you can hear the wind blow in a handshake. Sometimes there's poetry written right on the bathroom wall.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.text: A horse is a thing of beauty... none will tire of looking at him as long as he displays himself in his splendor.
quotes.author: Xenophon

quotes.text: I wasn't afraid of getting old, because I was never a great beauty.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.text: Beauty is but the sensible image of the Infinite. Like truth and justice it lives within us like virtue and the moral law it is a companion of the soul.
quotes.author: George Bancroft

quotes.text: What matters poverty? What matters anything to him who is enamoured of our art? Does he not carry in himself every joy and every beauty?
quotes.author: Sarah Bernhardt

quotes.text: The pain passes, but the beauty remains.
quotes.author: Auguste Renoir

quotes.text: I always find beauty in things that are odd and imperfect - they are much more interesting.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.text: There is no racial or ethnic involvement in Thanksgiving, and people who may be very distant from the Christian system can see the beauty and the positive spirit that comes from the holiday.
quotes.author: John Clayton

quotes.text: But the gravest difficulty, and perhaps the most important, in poetry meant solely for recitation, is the difficulty of achieving verbal beauty, or rather of making verbal beauty tell.
quotes.author: Lascelles Abercrombie

quotes.text: You fall into my arms. You are the good gift of destruction's path, When life sickens more than disease. And boldness is the root of beauty. Which draws us together.
quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

quotes.text: Beyond the beauty, the sex, the titillation, the surface, there is a human being. And that has to emerge.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.text: Most women are dissatisfied with their appearance - it's the stuff that fuels the beauty and fashion industries.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.text: When I look at the majority of my own songs they really came from my own sense of personal confusion or need to express some pain or beauty - they were coming from a universal and personal place.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.text: I mean, no one asks beauty secrets of me, or 'What size do you wear?' or 'Who's your couturier?' They ask me about really deep things and I love that.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.text: Beauty is grace and confidence. I've learned to accept and appreciate what nature gave me.
quotes.author: Lindsay Lohan

quotes.text: I would rather be adorned by beauty of character than jewels. Jewels are the gift of fortune, while character comes from within.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.text: The truth, the absolute truth, is that the chief beauty for the theatre consists in fine bodily proportions.
quotes.author: Sarah Bernhardt

quotes.text: The human face is the organic seat of beauty. It is the register of value in development, a record of Experience, whose legitimate office is to perfect the life, a legible language to those who will study it, of the majestic mistress, the soul.
quotes.author: Eliza Farnham

quotes.text: It seems to me that the natural world is the greatest source of excitement the greatest source of visual beauty the greatest source of intellectual interest. It is the greatest source of so much in life that makes life worth living.
quotes.author: David Attenborough

quotes.text: Beauty is only skin deep, but it's a valuable asset if you're poor or haven't any sense.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.text: There is little premium in poetry in a world that thinks of Pound and Whitman as a weight and a sampler, not an Ezra, a Walt, a thing of beauty, a joy forever.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.text: Death is the mother of Beauty hence from her, alone, shall come fulfillment to our dreams and our desires.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.text: The fame that goes with wealth and beauty is fleeting and fragile intellectual superiority is a possession glorious and eternal.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.text: I didn't appreciate the young woman that I was, or my young beauty, because I was so obsessed with the fact that I felt fat. It's never good to add to anybody else's suffering. It's an important topic to really get the gravity and the importance of - dealing with dignity.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.text: A lot of punk rock is not going to be in the mainstream. It's below the radar. The beauty of it is that you're not supposed to always know. It's subterranean.
quotes.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quotes.text: It's such a diversion to be constantly thinking of better ways I can teach people math that my hunger is for that really, for new ways of translating the beauty of it.
quotes.author: Danica McKellar

quotes.text: My beauty secret is absolutely no sun.
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.text: Standards of beauty are arbitrary. Body shame exists only to the extent that our physiques don't match our own beliefs about how we should look.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.text: Because, if one is writing novels today, concentrating on the beauty of the prose is right up there with concentrating on your semi-colons, for wasted effort.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: As soon as beauty is sought not from religion and love, but for pleasure, it degrades the seeker.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.text: Beauty is an outward gift which is seldom despised, except by those to whom it has been refused.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.text: Beauty is often worse than wine intoxicating both the holder and beholder.
quotes.author: John Zimmerman

quotes.text: All the freaky people make the beauty of the world.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.text: I like to embrace natural beauty. I try to get at least 8 hours of sleep, drinking a lot of water and exercising.
quotes.author: Tia Mowry

quotes.text: I find beauty in the grotesque, like most artists.
quotes.author: Alexander McQueen

quotes.text: The past itself, as historical change continues to accelerate, has become the most surreal of subjects - making it possible... to see a new beauty in what is vanishing.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.text: It is shallow people who think beauty is frivolous or excessive. If you are bringing beauty and god, you are enriching the country. Rice feeds the body, books feed the mind, beauty feeds the soul. It is one thing I can really be proud of and stand tall in the world.
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.text: The only rich person is a person who is rich in spirit. I have no money deposit. I have only beauty deposit.
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.text: Jordan has a strange, haunting beauty and a sense of timelessness. Dotted with the ruins of empires once great, it is the last resort of yesterday in the world of tomorrow. I love every inch of it.
quotes.author: King Hussein I

quotes.text: I am a great lover of art, in many forms: paintings, objets, textiles. I don't have the talent for painting, but I have a very good sense of colour, a love of visual beauty.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Bisset

quotes.text: Beauty is nature's brag, and must be shown in courts, at feasts, and high solemnities, where most may wonder at the workmanship.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.text: I pretty much borrow my entire beauty regime from my mom.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.text: Ads featuring real women and real beauty are such a necessary component to offset the potentially dangerous programming out there for little girls.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.text: The beauty of 'spacing' children many years apart lies in the fact that parents have time to learn the mistakes that were made with the older ones - which permits them to make exactly the opposite mistakes with the younger ones.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.text: Strength of character may be learned at work, but beauty of character is learned at home.
quotes.author: Henry Drummond

quotes.text: I am still a victim of chess. It has all the beauty of art - and much more. It cannot be commercialized. Chess is much purer than art in its social position.
quotes.author: Marcel Duchamp

quotes.text: I do not know which to prefer, The beauty of inflections, Or the beauty of innuendoes, The blackbird whistling, Or just after.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.text: Beauty and the devil are the same thing.
quotes.author: Robert Mapplethorpe

quotes.text: You can take no credit for beauty at sixteen. But if you are beautiful at sixty, it will be your soul's own doing.
quotes.author: Marie Stopes

quotes.text: Often, the roles I'm offered in England are melancholic women who are filled with regret for the past, regret for their fading beauty.
quotes.author: Kristin Scott Thomas

quotes.text: I am not fighting for success, just to get more beauty out of myself and share it with more people.
quotes.author: Ben Okri

quotes.text: Lila can't be a model until she's at least 21. She is already a mini-me - it is scary. She already has her own beauty kit.
quotes.author: Kate Moss

quotes.text: I would warn you that I do not attribute to nature either beauty or deformity, order or confusion. Only in relation to our imagination can things be called beautiful or ugly, well-ordered or confused.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.text: I'm really proud of myself because I've pared my beauty regimen down to a cream blush and berry-tinted lip balm, which has saved me so much time.
quotes.author: Katherine Heigl

quotes.text: Wealth, beauty, and fame are transient. When those are gone, little is left except the need to be useful.
quotes.author: Gene Tierney

quotes.text: Italian men do appreciate beautiful women. They're not afraid of the beauty, which is nice.
quotes.author: Eva Herzigova

quotes.text: I want, of course, peace, grace, and beauty. How do you do that? You work for it.
quotes.author: Studs Terkel

quotes.text: Bracketing has turned all my experiences, remembered and present, into a gallery of miracles where I wander around dazzled by the beauty of events I cannot explain.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.text: Design is not making beauty, beauty emerges from selection, affinities, integration, love.
quotes.author: Louis Kahn

quotes.text: Beauty is a relation, and the apprehension of it a comparison.
quotes.author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quotes.text: We come in many different shapes and sizes, and we need to support each other and our differences. Our beauty is in our differences.
quotes.author: Carre Otis

quotes.text: Her beauty didn't do her any good and she couldn't use it in any positive way or manipulative way. I just hope that people will look and see and believe in that hope of love, that hope of freedom, even if it was just for a limited time.
quotes.author: Diane Kruger

quotes.text: My everyday beauty routine is always rushed and pretty simple.
quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

quotes.text: Well, I've never looked upon myself as being a beauty, per se.
quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

quotes.text: After a decade this glum, we deserved a shot of 'Glee,' a show that restored our faith in the power of song, the beauty of dance, and the magic of 'spirit fingers' to chase our cares and woes into somebody else's backyard.
quotes.author: James Wolcott

quotes.text: Do not confuse beauty with beautiful. Beautiful is a human judgment. Beauty is All. The difference is everything.
quotes.author: Matthew Fox

quotes.text: Beauty is composed of an eternal, invariable element whose quantity is extremely difficult to determine, and a relative element which might be, either by turns or all at once, period, fashion, moral, passion.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Godard

quotes.text: Fashion fosters cliches of beauty, but I want to tear them apart.
quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

quotes.text: When you are balanced and when you listen and attend to the needs of your body, mind, and spirit, your natural beauty comes out.
quotes.author: Christy Turlington

quotes.text: In art economy is always beauty.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.text: Through Kurt I saw the beauty of minimalism and the importance of music that's stripped down.
quotes.author: Dave Grohl

quotes.text: I trust in nature for the stable laws of beauty and utility. Spring shall plant and autumn garner to the end of time.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.text: I don't get anything for free. I pay for all my beauty treatments.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.text: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together.
quotes.author: Petrarch

quotes.text: I didn't have any confidence in my beauty when I was young. I felt like a character actress, and I still do.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.text: I really admire a woman for her intelligence, her personality. Beauty is not enough.
quotes.author: Roberto Cavalli

quotes.text: I write for no other purpose than to add to the beauty that now belongs to me. I write a book for no other reason than to add three or four hundred acres to my magnificent estate.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.text: They saw me, those reckless seekers of beauty, and in a night I was famous.
quotes.author: Lillie Langtry

quotes.text: Beauty is not just physical.
quotes.author: Halle Berry

quotes.text: Beauty and fullness of tone can be achieved by having the whole orchestra play with high clarinets and a carefully selected number of piccolos.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.text: I think the beauty of working with young people is they remind you of the spirit of acting and it's just a big play.
quotes.author: Eric Bana

quotes.text: I am obsessed with beauty. I want everything to be perfect, and of course it isn't. And that's a tough place to be because you're never satisfied.
quotes.author: Robert Mapplethorpe

quotes.text: The beautiful seems right by force of beauty and the feeble wrong because of weakness.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.text: I would like to say to people, open your eyes and find beauty where you normally don't expect it.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Gaultier

quotes.text: Art is the unceasing effort to compete with the beauty of flowers - and never succeeding.
quotes.author: Gian Carlo Menotti

quotes.text: Thankfully, beauty is easier to remove than apply, and a swipe of demaquillage in the right direction and you are you once again.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.text: Just because you are blind and unable to see my beauty doesn't mean it does not exist.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.text: Order is the shape upon which beauty depends.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.text: For the mind disturbed, the still beauty of dawn is nature's finest balm.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.text: Women are so unforgiving of themselves. We don't recognize our own beauty because we're too busy comparing ourselves to other people.
quotes.author: Kelly Osbourne

quotes.text: But every great scripture, whether Hebrew, Indian, Persian, or Chinese, apart from its religious value will be found to have some rare and special beauty of its own and in this respect the original Bible stands very high as a monument of sublime poetry and of artistic prose.
quotes.author: Lafcadio Hearn

quotes.text: Part of the beauty of Judaism, and surely this is so for other faiths also, is that it gently restores control over time. Three times a day we stop what we are doing and turn to God in prayer. We recover perspective. We inhale a deep breath of eternity.
quotes.author: Jonathan Sacks

quotes.text: I've actually spent a lot of time researching beauty products, how they are produced and how they are sold.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.text: For I must tell you that we artists cannot tread the path of Beauty without Eros keeping company with us and appointing himself as our guide.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.text: Solitude gives birth to the original in us, to beauty unfamiliar and perilous - to poetry. But also, it gives birth to the opposite: to the perverse, the illicit, the absurd.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.text: What is sacred among one people may be ridiculous in another and what is despised or rejected by one cultural group, may in a different environment become the cornerstone for a great edifice of strange grandeur and beauty.
quotes.author: Hu Shih

quotes.text: Art is beauty, the perpetual invention of detail, the choice of words, the exquisite care of execution.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.text: I'm not one of those women who thinks beauty is a curse.
quotes.author: Diane Kruger

quotes.text: A lot of directors idealize their leading ladies or turn them into these objects of sexuality and beauty.
quotes.author: Diane Kruger

quotes.text: I like the idea of accessibility, coming from a lower-middle-class background myself, I feel like beauty and products should be accessible to all women over the world.
quotes.author: Diane Kruger

quotes.text: Beauty in art is often nothing but ugliness subdued.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.text: What saddens me is the corruption of youth and beauty, and the loss of soul, which is only replaced by money.
quotes.author: Lisa Bonet

quotes.text: When I think of art I think of beauty. Beauty is the mystery of life. It is not in the eye it is in the mind. In our minds there is awareness of perfection.
quotes.author: Agnes Martin

quotes.text: The very definition of 'beauty' is outside.
quotes.author: Adam Carolla

quotes.text: I always loved aesthetics. Not particularly fashion, but an idea of beauty.
quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

quotes.text: Now, I'm not saying I'm fashionable, but there are sociological interests that matter to me, things that are theoretical, political, intellectual and also concerned with vanity and beauty that we all think about but that I try to mix up and translate into fashion.
quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

quotes.text: What sort of sap doesn't know by now that picture-perfect beauty is all done with smoke and mirrors anyway?
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: Shame, like beauty, is often in the eye of the beholder.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: The truth of the matter is, beauty is a specific thing, rare and fleeting. Some of us have it in our teens, 20s and 30s and then lose it most of us have it not at all. And that's perfectly okay. But lying to yourself that you have it when you don't seems to me simple-minded at best and psychotic at worst.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: What I find most upsetting about this new all-consuming beauty culture is that the obsession with good looks, and how you can supposedly attain them, is almost entirely female-driven.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: Surely being a Professional Beauty - let alone an ageing one - is one of the most insecure and doomed careers imaginable.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: I've always thought of beauty therapy, 'alternative' treatments and the like as the female equivalent of brothels - for essentially self-deceiving people who feel a bit hollow and have to pay to be touched.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: These women whose antics we smirk at good-naturedly in the pap-traps put themselves out there at least partly on their beauty they are in showbiz, and showing what they've got is part of their business as much as it is for male show-ponies from the Chippendales to George Clooney.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: Natural beauty takes at least two hours in front of a mirror.
quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

quotes.text: It is not the beauty of a building you should look at its the construction of the foundation that will stand the test of time.
quotes.author: David Allan Coe

quotes.text: One of the things that people don't realize is that that natural beauty, those recreational forests, they have an economic development impact for the state as well.
quotes.author: Ed Rendell

quotes.text: Endeavour to be faithful, and if there is any beauty in your thought, your style will be beautiful if there is any real emotion to express, the expression will be moving.
quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

quotes.text: Black beauty - he's a dark horse.
quotes.author: Tim Vine

quotes.text: I shall give you hunger, and pain, and sleepless nights. Also beauty, and satisfactions known to few, and glimpses of the heavenly life. None of these you shall have continually, and of their coming and going you shall not be foretold.
quotes.author: Howard Lindsay

quotes.text: People don't associate red hair, pale skin, and freckles with beauty.
quotes.author: Shirley Manson

quotes.text: I still believe that capitalism is too harsh and I believe that, even within that, there is a lot of satisfaction and beauty if you happen to be one of the lucky ones, although that doesn't eradicate the reality of the suffering. It's all true at once, kind of humming and sublime.
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.text: Physical beauty is such a strange thing.
quotes.author: Jock Sturges

quotes.text: I was kind of a jock in school. Beauty wasn't something I spent a lot of time on.
