quotes.text: In places where this beauty has already disappeared, we will reconstruct it.
quotes.author: Fritz Todt

quotes.text: The awesomeness of God is that even in the works of the Beach Boys, Beatles, etc., the beauty of the music is a mere reflection of what God does everyday. He creates music of all kinds and moods.
quotes.author: John Foster

quotes.text: It is conventional to call 'monster' any blending of dissonant elements. I call 'monster' every original inexhaustible beauty.
quotes.author: Alfred Jarry

quotes.text: As long as I love Beauty I am young.
quotes.author: W. H. Davies

quotes.text: When I first thought of the idea for 'Sweet Valley High,' I loved the idea of high school as microcosm of the real world. And what I really liked was how it moved things on from 'Sleeping Beauty'-esque romance novels where the girl had to wait for the hero. This would be girl-driven, very different, I decided - and indeed it is.
quotes.author: Francine Pascal

quotes.text: Though there might not be any easy answers to the problem of poverty, its most compelling scribes do not resign themselves to representation solely for the sake of those age-old verities of truth and beauty.
quotes.author: Leslie Jamison

quotes.text: Far from creating a new formalism, what these can yield is something far transcending surface values since they not only embody form as beauty, but also form in which intuitions or ideas or conjectures have taken visible substance.
quotes.author: Max Bill

quotes.text: Beauty: the adjustment of all parts proportionately so that one cannot add or subtract or change without impairing the harmony of the whole.
quotes.author: Leon Battista Alberti

quotes.text: Time takes the ugliness and horror out of death and turns it into beauty.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.text: I'm not out here to win a beauty contest.
quotes.author: Kirk Gibson

quotes.text: I think Whitman more than any other poet possessed the gift of revealing to others the beauty of everything around us, the beauty of nature, the beauty of human beings.
quotes.author: Ella R. Bloor

quotes.text: I'm not trying to stump anybody... it's the beauty of the language that I'm interested in.
quotes.author: Buddy Holly

quotes.text: Suddenly life has new meaning to me, there's beauty up above and things we never take notice of, you wake up suddenly you're in love.
quotes.author: Billy Ocean

quotes.text: Beauty is altogether in the eye of the beholder.
quotes.author: Lew Wallace

quotes.text: Perfect health, like perfect beauty, is a rare thing and so, it seems, is perfect disease.
quotes.author: Peter Latham

quotes.text: The beauty of having short hair is that I actually can wash and style it at home!
quotes.author: Meagan Good

quotes.text: The cottage garden most for use designed, Yet not of beauty destitute.
quotes.author: Charlotte Smith

quotes.text: You will also allow me to thank the Academy for inviting me to lecture in Stockholm, for its hospitality, and for the opportunity afforded me for admiring the charm of your people and the beauty of your country.
quotes.author: Guglielmo Marconi

quotes.text: It's harder, but we're still finding oil in Oklahoma today. The bar has been raised on startup companies, but it can still be done. Every regulation and every rule limits you, but, yes, it can still be done. That's the beauty of living in a free country and having the freedom to have an idea and become an entrepreneur.
quotes.author: Harold Hamm

quotes.text: Great designers seldom make great advertising men, because they get overcome by the beauty of the picture - and forget that merchandise must be sold.
quotes.author: James Randolph Adams

quotes.text: The beauty of the past belongs to the past.
quotes.author: Margaret Bourke-White

quotes.text: It is important to fund young researchers who want to do curiosity-driven research. Curiosity-driven research is a part of life. Some people are curious. They want to learn more about nature and society should help that. It's like art: you can learn more and bring more beauty.
quotes.author: Serge Haroche

quotes.text: I have no right to beauty. I had been condemned to masculine ugliness.
quotes.author: Renee Vivien

quotes.text: Search for beauty without features, something deeper than any signs.
quotes.author: Francesca da Rimini

quotes.text: I have several computer companies. One of them I have a program for wide-format printing. I have a beauty program. So I have several different programs that I own for printing.
quotes.author: Jerry Mathers

quotes.text: There are elements of intrinsic beauty in the simplification of a house built on the log cabin idea.
quotes.author: Gustav Stickley

quotes.text: First, there is the bare beauty of the logs themselves with their long lines and firm curves. Then there is the open charm felt of the structural features which are not hidden under plaster and ornament, but are clearly revealed, a charm felt in Japanese architecture.
quotes.author: Gustav Stickley

quotes.text: There is an abiding beauty which may be appreciated by those who will see things as they are and who will ask for no reward except to see.
quotes.author: Vera Brittain

quotes.text: I think love and beauty are what life is all about.
quotes.author: John Derek

quotes.text: Beauty is the first test: there is no permanent place in the world for ugly mathematics.
quotes.author: Godfrey Harold Hardy

quotes.text: For the greater beauty of the instrument, the balls representing the planets are to be of considerable bigness but so contrived, that they may be taken off at pleasure, and others, much smaller, and fitter for some purposes, put in their places.
quotes.author: David Rittenhouse

quotes.text: Literature boils with the madcap careers of writers brought to the edge by the demands of living on their nerves, wringing out their memories and their nightmares to extract meaning, truth, beauty.
quotes.author: Herbert Gold

quotes.text: I have a book out called 'The Beauty Equation' and it discusses how off track we have gone in considering beauty.
quotes.author: Nigel Barker

quotes.text: Jazz is a very democratic musical form. It comes out of a communal experience. We take our respective instruments and collectively create a thing of beauty.
quotes.author: Max Roach

quotes.text: But I fear, my lot being cast in Scotland, that beauty would not be content.
quotes.author: Anne Boyd

quotes.text: For most people, we often marvel at the beauty of a sunrise or the magnificence of a full moon, but it is impossible to fathom the magnitude of the universe that surrounds us.
quotes.author: Richard H. Baker

quotes.text: Hath the spirit of all beauty Kissed you in the path of duty?
quotes.author: Anna Katharine Green

quotes.text: There are two kinds of artists in this world those that work because the spirit is in them, and they cannot be silent if they would, and those that speak from a conscientious desire to make apparent to others the beauty that has awakened their own admiration.
quotes.author: Anna Katharine Green

quotes.text: We Orientals find beauty not only in the thing itself but in the pattern of the shadows, the light and darkness which that thing provides.
quotes.author: Junichiro Tanizaki

quotes.text: Mathematics are the result of mysterious powers which no one understands, and which the unconscious recognition of beauty must play an important part. Out of an infinity of designs a mathematician chooses one pattern for beauty's sake and pulls it down to earth.
quotes.author: Marston Morse

quotes.text: A small house must depend on its grouping with other houses for its beauty, and for the preservation of light air and the maximum of surrounding open space.
quotes.author: Clarence Stein

quotes.text: Personality is more important than beauty, but imagination is more important than both of them.
quotes.author: Laurette Taylor

quotes.text: You can take no credit for beauty at sixteen. But if you are beautiful at sixty, it will be your own soul's doing.
quotes.author: Marie Carmichael Stopes

quotes.text: And queenly is the state she keeps, In beauty's lofty trust secure.
quotes.author: William Allen Butler

quotes.text: If beauty isn't genius it usually signals at least a high level of animal cunning.
quotes.author: Peter York

quotes.text: I don't know what the secret to longevity as an actress is. It's more than talent and beauty. Maybe it's the audience seeing itself in you.
quotes.author: Joan Blondell

quotes.text: The beauty of women was the first expression of my photography.
quotes.author: Alberto Korda

quotes.text: What I want to give in the theatre is beauty, that's what I want to give.
quotes.author: Dame Edith Evans

quotes.text: I want the Arabic Granada, that which is art, which is all that seems to me beauty and emotion.
quotes.author: Isaac Albeniz

quotes.text: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.

quotes.text: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.

quotes.text: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.

quotes.text: The best road to progress is freedom's road.

quotes.text: Living well is the best revenge.

quotes.text: The worst men often give the best advice.

quotes.text: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.

And that is as it should be, because Death is very likely the single best invention of Life. It is Life's change agent. It clears out the old to make way for the new.

quotes.text: When the best leader's work is done the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'

quotes.text: The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?

quotes.text: Why don't you start believing that no matter what you have or haven't done, that your best days are still out in front of you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.

quotes.text: The best weapon against an enemy is another enemy.

quotes.text: You are capable of more than you know. Choose a goal that seems right for you and strive to be the best, however hard the path. Aim high. Behave honorably. Prepare to be alone at times, and to endure failure. Persist! The world needs all you can give.

quotes.text: Hunger is the best pickle.

quotes.text: The ideal man bears the accidents of life with dignity and grace, making the best of circumstances.

quotes.text: That government is best which governs least.

quotes.text: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.

quotes.text: Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.

quotes.text: The fox has many tricks. The hedgehog has but one. But that is the best of all.

quotes.text: Our best thoughts come from others.

quotes.text: It is best to rise from life as from a banquet, neither thirsty nor drunken.

quotes.text: The best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.

quotes.text: The best effort of a fine person is felt after we have left their presence.

quotes.text: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.

quotes.text: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.

quotes.text: The best cure for insomnia is to get a lot of sleep.

quotes.text: To know yet to think that one does not know is best Not to know yet to think that one knows will lead to difficulty.

quotes.text: We have an obligation and a responsibility to be investing in our students and our schools. We must make sure that people who have the grades, the desire and the will, but not the money, can still get the best education possible.

quotes.text: There is one rule for the industrialist and that is: Make the best quality of goods possible at the lowest cost possible, paying the highest wages possible.

quotes.text: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.

quotes.text: The best evaluation I can make of a player is to look in his eyes and see how scared they are.

quotes.text: I want to be perceived as a guy who played his best in all facets, not just scoring. A guy who loved challenges.

quotes.text: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.

quotes.text: One of the best things that ever happened to me is that I'm a woman. That is the way all females should feel.

quotes.text: A woman knows by intuition, or instinct, what is best for herself.

quotes.text: Good humor is a tonic for mind and body. It is the best antidote for anxiety and depression. It is a business asset. It attracts and keeps friends. It lightens human burdens. It is the direct route to serenity and contentment.

quotes.text: He who laughs best today, will also laughs last.

quotes.text: Treat your kid like a darling for the first five years. For the next five years, scold them. By the time they turn sixteen, treat them like a friend. Your grown up children are your best friends.

quotes.text: But what we can do, as flawed as we are, is still see God in other people, and do our best to help them find their own grace. That's what I strive to do, that's what I pray to do every day.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: You're not going to say anything about me that I'm not going to say about myself. There's so many things that I think about myself if someone really wanted to get at me, they could say this and this and this. So I'm going to say it before they can. It's the best policy for me.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.text: My husband and I are best of friends first and foremost. We fight like cats and dogs, but never stay mad for long. I was lucky to find him, he is in every way, my soulmate.
quotes.author: Carnie Wilson

quotes.text: In the last analysis, even the best man is evil: in the last analysis, even the best woman is bad.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: The best author will be the one who is ashamed to become a writer.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: After all manner of professors have done their best for us, the place we are to get knowledge is in books. The true university of these days is a collection of books.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
quotes.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quotes.text: Read the best books first, or you may not have a chance to read them at all.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Honestly, I'd love to be remembered as one of the best to ever pick up a mic, but if I'm doing my part to lessen some racial tension I feel good about what I'm doing.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.text: The best executive is one who has sense enough to pick good people to do what he wants done, and self-restraint enough to keep from meddling with them while they do it.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: As you become more clear about who you really are, you'll be better able to decide what is best for you - the first time around.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: The best place to find God is in a garden. You can dig for him there.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: The best things and best people rise out of their separateness I'm against a homogenized society because I want the cream to rise.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty. All other pacts of love or fear derive from it and are modeled upon it.
quotes.author: Haniel Long

quotes.text: I've always taught that a poor economy is the best opportunity for salespeople because the naysayers and grumblers have already given up, leaving more territory, more opportunities to be successful than in a good economy when virtually all salespeople are out there, giving it their best.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: I did not wish to take a cabin passage, but rather to go before the mast and on the deck of the world, for there I could best see the moonlight amid the mountains. I do not wish to go below now.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: I am afraid we must make the world honest before we can honestly say to our children that honesty is the best policy.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: The language of excitement is at best picturesque merely. You must be calm before you can utter oracles.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Best way to get rid of kitchen odors: Eat out.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.text: It is best to avoid the beginnings of evil.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: I didn't see it then, but it turned out that getting fired from Apple was the best thing that could have ever happened to me. The heaviness of being successful was replaced by the lightness of being a beginner again, less sure about everything. It freed me to enter one of the most creative periods of my life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Nothing goes by luck in composition. It allows of no tricks. The best you can write will be the best you are.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: One way or another, we all have to find what best fosters the flowering of our humanity in this contemporary life, and dedicate ourselves to that.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: The man with the best job in the country is the vice-president. All he has to do is get up every morning and say, 'How is the president?'
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: I am just absolutely convinced that the best formula for giving us peace and preserving the American way of life is freedom, limited government, and minding our own business overseas.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.text: You are a product of your environment. So choose the environment that will best develop you toward your objective. Analyze your life in terms of its environment. Are the things around you helping you toward success - or are they holding you back?
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.text: Experience taught me a few things. One is to listen to your gut, no matter how good something sounds on paper. The second is that you're generally better off sticking with what you know. And the third is that sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: I always believe that to be the best, you have to smell like the best, dress like the best, act like the best. When you throw your trash in the garbage can, it has to be better than anybody else who ever threw trash in the garbage can.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.text: I think it's brought the world a lot closer together, and will continue to do that. There are downsides to everything there are unintended consequences to everything. The most corrosive piece of technology that I've ever seen is called television - but then, again, television, at its best, is magnificent.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Do the best you can, and don't take life too serious.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Remember, always give your best. Never get discouraged. Never be petty. Always remember, others may hate you. But those who hate you don't win unless you hate them. And then you destroy yourself.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: The pursuit, even of the best things, ought to be calm and tranquil.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Life is about not knowing, having to change, taking the moment and making the best of it, without knowing what's going to happen next.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.text: The worst thing that happens to you may be the best thing for you if you don't let it get the best of you.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: The best way to hold a man is in your arms.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: Society in every state is a blessing, but government, even in its best stage, is but a necessary evil in its worst state an intolerable one.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.text: It is difficult to make our material condition better by the best law, but it is easy enough to ruin it by bad laws.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Our goal is to make the best devices in the world, not to be the biggest.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: If you're doing your best, you won't have any time to worry about failure.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: Civilization had too many rules for me, so I did my best to rewrite them.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.text: A failure is not always a mistake, it may simply be the best one can do under the circumstances. The real mistake is to stop trying.
quotes.author: B. F. Skinner

quotes.text: To help yourself, you must be yourself. Be the best that you can be. When you make a mistake, learn from it, pick yourself up and move on.
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.text: We think the Mac will sell zillions, but we didn't build the Mac for anybody else. We built it for ourselves. We were the group of people who were going to judge whether it was great or not. We weren't going to go out and do market research. We just wanted to build the best thing we could build.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: If you believe in what you are doing, then let nothing hold you up in your work. Much of the best work of the world has been done against seeming impossibilities. The thing is to get the work done.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: I know my country has not perfected itself. At times, we've struggled to keep the promise of liberty and equality for all of our people. We've made our share of mistakes, and there are times when our actions around the world have not lived up to our best intentions.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: So let's not use a stylus. We're going to use the best pointing device in the world. We're going to use a pointing device that we're all born with - born with ten of them. We're going to use our fingers. We're going to touch this with our fingers. And we have invented a new technology called multi-touch, which is phenomenal. It works like magic.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: We hire people who want to make the best things in the world.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Dad needs to show an incredible amount of respect and humor and friendship toward his mate so the kids understand their parents are sexy, they're fun, they do things together, they're best friends. Kids learn by example. If I respect Mom, they're going to respect Mom.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.text: Don't lower your expectations to meet your performance. Raise your level of performance to meet your expectations. Expect the best of yourself, and then do what is necessary to make it a reality.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: A national political campaign is better than the best circus ever heard of, with a mass baptism and a couple of hangings thrown in.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: The best liar is he who makes the smallest amount of lying go the longest way.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: My philosophy is that not only are you responsible for your life, but doing the best at this moment puts you I the best place for the next moment.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: An educated person is one who has learned that information almost always turns out to be at best incomplete and very often false, misleading, fictitious, mendacious - just dead wrong.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.text: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.text: In fact, the best thing we could do on taxes for all Americans is to simplify the individual tax code. This will be a tough job, but members of both parties have expressed an interest in doing this, and I am prepared to join them.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Look your best - who said love is blind?
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: Success in its highest and noblest form calls for peace of mind and enjoyment and happiness which come only to the man who has found the work that he likes best.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: I just think it is important that you realize , that you're the best in the world. Whether you are a Democrat or Republican or whether you're libertarian or whatever, you are the best. And we should not ever forget that. And when somebody does not do the job, we got to let them go.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.text: The best way out of a difficulty is through it.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: We can choose a future where we export more products and outsource fewer jobs. After a decade that was defined by what we bought and borrowed, we're getting back to basics, and doing what America has always done best: We're making things again.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: My aim is to put down on paper what I see and what I feel in the best and simplest way.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: Excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: There's a victory, and defeat the first and best of victories, the lowest and worst of defeats which each man gains or sustains at the hands not of another, but of himself.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.text: In the practical art of war, the best thing of all is to take the enemy's country whole and intact to shatter and destroy it is not so good.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: Cynical realism is the intelligent man's best excuse for doing nothing in an intolerable situation.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: When a place gets crowded enough to require ID's, social collapse is not far away. It is time to go elsewhere. The best thing about space travel is that it made it possible to go elsewhere.

quotes.text: For a long time now I have tried simply to write the best I can. Sometimes I have good luck and write better than I can.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: God is not on the side of the big battalions, but on the side of those who shoot best.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Never argue at the dinner table, for the one who is not hungry always gets the best of the argument.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: It has always been my belief that a man should do his best, regardless of how much he receives for his services, or the number of people he may be serving or the class of people served.

quotes.text: I was raised to believe that excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism. And that's how I operate my life.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Compromise is the best and cheapest lawyer.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: Your purpose is to make your audience see what you saw, hear what you heard, feel what you felt. Relevant detail, couched in concrete, colorful language, is the best way to recreate the incident as it happened and to picture it for the audience.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: The best way to sell yourself to others is first to sell the others to yourself.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: A large income is the best recipe for happiness I ever heard of.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.text: One thing is sure. We have to do something. We have to do the best we know how at the moment... If it doesn't turn out right, we can modify it as we go along.

quotes.text: The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four Americans is suffering from some form of mental illness. Think of your three best friends. If they're okay, then it's you.

quotes.text: That is what we are supposed to do when we are at our best - make it all up - but make it up so truly that later it will happen that way.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: The best is the enemy of the good.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Marilyn Monroe wasn't even her real name, Charles Manson isn't his real name, and now, I'm taking that to be my real name. But what's real? You can't find the truth, you just pick the lie you like the best.

quotes.text: The optimist thinks this is the best of all possible worlds. The pessimist fears it is true.
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.text: The best activities for your health are pumping and humping.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: In this world you've just got to hope for the best and prepare for the worst and take whatever God sends.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.text: The best government is a benevolent tyranny tempered by an occasional assassination.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Everyone enjoys doing the kind of work for which he is best suited.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: In a completely rational society, the best of us would be teachers and the rest of us would have to settle for something else.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.text: All significant truths are private truths. As they become public they cease to become truths they become facts, or at best, part of the public character or at worst, catchwords.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: The best way to be boring is to leave nothing out.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: We would all like to vote for the best man but he is never a candidate.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.text: Our best successes often come after our greatest disappointments.

quotes.text: And while the law of competition may be sometimes hard for the individual, it is best for the race, because it ensures the survival of the fittest in every department.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.text: Don't let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it. The time will pass anyway we might just as well put that passing time to the best possible use.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.text: Do right. Do your best. Treat others as you want to be treated.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: Among the natural rights of the colonists are these: First a right to life, secondly to liberty, and thirdly to property together with the right to defend them in the best manner they can.
quotes.author: Samuel Adams

quotes.text: The best government is that which teaches us to govern ourselves.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Just do the best you can. No one can do more than that.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: The death of my father is probably the biggest thing that I ever faced. Daddy and I were best friends.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: The genius of the United States is not best or most in its executives or legislatures, nor in its ambassadors or authors or colleges, or churches, or parlors, nor even in its newspapers or inventors, but always most in the common people.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: The best scientist is open to experience and begins with romance - the idea that anything is possible.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: Our worldly successes cannot be guaranteed, but our ability to achieve spiritual success is entirely up to us, thanks to the grace of God. The best advice I know is to give is to give those worldly things your best but never your all - reserve the ultimate hope for the only one who can grant it.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.text: Which government is the best? The one that teaches us to govern ourselves.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: About astrology and palmistry: they are good because they make people vivid and full of possibilities. They are communism at its best. Everybody has a birthday and almost everybody has a palm.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.text: Luck marches with those who give their very best.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: I find that the best way to do things is to constantly move forward and to never doubt anything and keep moving forward, if you make a mistake say you made a mistake.
quotes.author: John Frusciante

quotes.text: In art the best is good enough.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: One cannot develop taste from what is of average quality but only from the very best.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: The only way to get the best of an argument is to avoid it.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: Best of all is it to preserve everything in a pure, still heart, and let there be for every pulse a thanksgiving, and for every breath a song.
quotes.author: Konrad von Gesner

quotes.text: You teach best what you most need to learn.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: It is always the best policy to speak the truth, unless, of course, you are an exceptionally good liar.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.text: To refrain from imitation is the best revenge.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.
quotes.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

quotes.text: The best lack all conviction, while the worst are full of passionate intensity.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: There is an infinite difference between a little wrong and just right, between fairly good and the best, between mediocrity and superiority.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.text: I just want to do what I do best, and that's fight. I love it.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: No one can really honestly be the very best, no one.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Some of my best leading men have been dogs and horses.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.text: You must accept that you might fail then, if you do your best and still don't win, at least you can be satisfied that you've tried. If you don't accept failure as a possibility, you don't set high goals, you don't branch out, you don't try - you don't take the risk.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.text: You always want to quit while you are ahead. You don't want to be like a fighter who stays too long in the ring until you're not performing at your best.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.text: To be successful in real estate, you must always and consistently put your clients' best interests first. When you do, your personal needs will be realized beyond your greatest expectations.
quotes.author: Anthony Hitt

quotes.text: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: The 1st period is won by the best technician. The 2nd period is won by the kid in the best shape. The 3rd period is won by the kid with the biggest heart.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.text: There's a lot of great movies that have won the Academy Award, and a lot of great movies that haven't. You just do the best you can.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.text: I believe the best service to the child is the service closest to the child, and children who are victims of neglect, abuse, or abandonment must not also be victims of bureaucracy. They deserve our devoted attention, not our divided attention.
quotes.author: Kenny Guinn

quotes.text: The trite saying that honesty is the best policy has met with the just criticism that honesty is not policy. The real honest man is honest from conviction of what is right, not from policy.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.text: We must stop thinking of the individual and start thinking about what is best for society.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: If you felt that excitement when you voted for Barack Obama, shouldn't you feel that way now that he's President Obama? You know there's something wrong with the kind of job he's done as president when the best feeling you had was the day you voted for him.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: The best thinking has been done in solitude. The worst has been done in turmoil.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: To study the abnormal is the best way of understanding the normal.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: A well regulated militia, composed of the body of the people, trained in arms, is the best most natural defense of a free country.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.text: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Massachusetts children cannot only lead the nation in test scores, they can be competitive with the best in the world. And the gap in achievement among races can virtually disappear.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: I want you to remember when our White House reflected the best of who we are, not the worst of what Europe has become.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: The strength and power and goodness of America has always been based on the strength and power and goodness of our communities, our families, our faiths. That is the bedrock of what makes America, America. In our best days, we can feel the vibrancy of America's communities, large and small.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: I have long since come to believe that people never mean half of what they say, and that it is best to disregard their talk and judge only their actions.
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.text: Nearly all the best things that came to me in life have been unexpected, unplanned by me.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.text: The best way to destroy the capitalist system is to debauch the currency.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.text: Achievement is not always success, while reputed failure often is. It is honest endeavor, persistent effort to do the best possible under any and all circumstances.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.text: Baseball was, is and always will be to me the best game in the world.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: The things we know best are the things we haven't been taught.
quotes.author: Luc de Clapiers

quotes.text: Surround yourself with good people. Whether they're the best or not, people are capable of learning if they've got good hearts and they're good souls.
quotes.author: Kid Rock

quotes.text: Always Do Your Best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.text: Cheerfulness is the best promoter of health and is as friendly to the mind as to the body.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.text: The best weapon of a dictatorship is secrecy, but the best weapon of a democracy should be the weapon of openness.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.text: I think what makes our marriage work amid all the glare is that my husband is my best friend. He inspires everything in my life and enables me to do the best that I can. I want to hang out with him more than anyone.
quotes.author: Faith Hill

quotes.text: Now I see the secret of making the best person: it is to grow in the open air and to eat and sleep with the earth.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: Laughter is not a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is the best ending for one.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: What we call wisdom is the result of all the wisdom of past ages. Our best institutions are like young trees growing upon the roots of the old trunks that have crumbled away.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: The best way of removing negativity is to laugh and be joyous.
quotes.author: David Icke

quotes.text: Every year of my life I grow more convinced that it is wisest and best to fix our attention on the beautiful and the good, and dwell as little as possible on the evil and the false.
quotes.author: Richard Cecil

quotes.text: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.text: I owe my success to having listened respectfully to the very best advice, and then going away and doing the exact opposite.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: With my wife I don't get no respect. I made a toast on her birthday to 'the best woman a man ever had.' The waiter joined me.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: The best and safest thing is to keep a balance in your life, acknowledge the great powers around us and in us. If you can do that, and live that way, you are really a wise man.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.text: The Lord gets his best soldiers out of the highlands of affliction.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: The best argument I know for an immortal life is the existence of a man who deserves one.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Set up another case bartender! The best thing for a case of nerves is a case of Scotch.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: Toleration is the best religion.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.text: Stubborn and ardent clinging to one's opinion is the best proof of stupidity.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.text: The best books... are those that tell you what you know already.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: Genius always gives its best at first prudence, at last.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.text: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.
quotes.author: Al Lopez

quotes.text: That best portion of a man's life, his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.text: I lead no party I follow no leader. I have given the best part of my life to careful study of Islam, its law and polity, its culture, its history and its literature.
quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.text: I don't want to do business with those who don't make a profit, because they can't give the best service.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: No man who worships education has got the best out of education... Without a gentle contempt for education no man's education is complete.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: Use what talents you possess the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.text: A woman's best protection is a little money of her own.

quotes.text: People who lean on logic and philosophy and rational exposition end by starving the best part of the mind.

quotes.text: The most basic question is not what is best, but who shall decide what is best.

quotes.text: I don't know why, it's the same reason why you like some music and you don't like others. There's something about it that you like. Ultimately I don't find it's in my best interests to try and analyze it, since it's fundamentally emotional.

quotes.text: I am not a perfect servant. I am a public servant doing my best against the odds. As I develop and serve, be patient. God is not finished with me yet.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.text: Of all the home remedies, a good wife is best.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.text: Everywhere I go, I'm asked if I think the universities stifle writers. My opinion is that they don't stifle enough of them. There's many a best seller that could have been prevented by a good teacher.

quotes.text: These things bring you to reality as to how fragile you are at the same moment you are doing something that nobody else is able to do. The same moment that you are seen as the best, the fastest and somebody that cannot be touched, you are enormously fragile.
quotes.author: Ayrton Senna

quotes.text: I was never one to patiently pick up broken fragments and glue them together again and tell myself that the mended whole was as good as new. What is broken is broken - and I'd rather remember it as it was at its best than mend it and see the broken places as long as I lived.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.text: Goals provide the energy source that powers our lives. One of the best ways we can get the most from the energy we have is to focus it. That is what goals can do for us concentrate our energy.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: The deferring of anger is the best antidote to anger.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.text: Man, being reasonable, must get drunk the best of life is but intoxication.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: I have always thought the actions of men the best interpreters of their thoughts.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.text: I think every girl needs to love herself, regardless of anything. Like if you're having a bad day, if you don't like your hair, if you don't have the best family situation, whatever, you have to love yourself and you can't do anything until you love yourself first.

quotes.text: Being a teenager is an amazing time and a hard time. It's when you make your best friends - I have girls who will never leave my heart and I still talk to. You get the best and the worst as a teen. You have the best friendships and the worst heartbreaks.

quotes.text: Faith in oneself is the best and safest course.

quotes.text: Let us put theology out of religion. Theology has always sent the worst to heaven, the best to hell.

quotes.text: Now I know that Wal-Mart's policies do not reflect the best way of doing business and the values that I think are important in America.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: I am someone who hopes for the best and prepares for the worst.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: Sculpture is the best comment that a painter can make on painting.

quotes.text: I think music is the greatest art form that exists, and I think people listen to music for different reasons, and it serves different purposes. Some of it is background music, and some of it is things that might affect a person's day, if not their life, or change an attitude. The best songs are the ones that make you feel something.

quotes.text: The best way to know God is to love many things.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.text: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.text: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.

quotes.text: I am neither frustrated nor planning anything other than being the best Secretary of State I could be.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: There is no doubt that America remains the premier political, economic, military power in the world, and I both expect and count on it remaining so, because I think that's certainly in our best interest but also the best interests of the world.

quotes.text: The best morale exist when you never hear the word mentioned. When you hear a lot of talk about it, it's usually lousy.

quotes.text: I may be as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.

quotes.text: But I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things.

quotes.text: Prescription: A physician's guess at what will best prolong the situation with least harm to the patient.

quotes.text: Part of the reason for the ugliness of adults, in a child's eyes, is that the child is usually looking upwards, and few faces are at their best when seen from below.

quotes.text: There is only one thing for us to do, and that is to do our level best right where we are every day of our lives To use our best judgment, and then to trust the rest to that Power which holds the forces of the universe in his hands.

quotes.text: Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.

quotes.text: Employees make the best dates. You don't have to pick them up and they're always tax-deductible.

quotes.text: Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.

quotes.text: I have found that being honest is the best technique I can use. Right up front, tell people what you're trying to accomplish and what you're willing to sacrifice to accomplish it.

quotes.text: No man really knows about other human beings. The best he can do is to suppose that they are like himself.

quotes.text: I have found it advisable not to give too much heed to what people say when I am trying to accomplish something of consequence. Invariably they proclaim it can't be done. I deem that the very best time to make the effort.

quotes.text: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.

quotes.text: The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.

quotes.text: A boy's story is the best that is ever told.

quotes.text: Being forced to work, and forced to do your best, will breed in you temperance and self-control, diligence and strength of will, cheerfulness and content, and a hundred virtues which the idle will never know.

quotes.text: The best way to obtain truth and wisdom is not to ask from books, but to go to God in prayer, and obtain divine teaching.

quotes.text: Here's what I tell anybody and this is what I believe. The greatest gift we have is the gift of life. We understand that. That comes from our Creator. We're given a body. Now you may not like it, but you can maximize that body the best it can be maximized.

quotes.text: Being a blockhead is sometimes the best security against being cheated by a man of wit.

quotes.text: It is not in the nature of politics that the best men should be elected. The best men do not want to govern their fellowmen.

quotes.text: No man fails who does his best.

quotes.text: The size of your accomplishments, the quality of your achievement, will depend very largely on how big a man you see in yourself, what sort of image you get of your possible self, yourself at your best.

quotes.text: Fit no stereotypes. Don't chase the latest management fads. The situation dictates which approach best accomplishes the team's mission.

It's truly inspiring because I think all of us are engaged in that every day.

quotes.text: In the misfortunes of our best friends we always find something not altogether displeasing to us.

Let's just keep trying. Let's not give up.

Whatever it takes to live, do it!

quotes.text: Silence is true wisdom's best reply.

quotes.text: Education is the leading of human souls to what is best, and making what is best out of them.

quotes.text: Choose your companions from the best Who draws a bucket with the rest soon topples down the hill.

quotes.text: Also, if you want to reach people, theatre is not always the best way to do it.

quotes.text: Let me recommend the best medicine in the world: a long journey, at a mild season, through a pleasant country, in easy stages.

quotes.text: In writing and politicking, it's best not to think about it, just do it.

quotes.text: The best luck of all is the luck you make for yourself.

quotes.text: Employees are a company's greatest asset - they're your competitive advantage. You want to attract and retain the best provide them with encouragement, stimulus, and make them feel that they are an integral part of the company's mission.

quotes.text: I have made the choices that work best for me. I know I cannot please everyone, and that's fine.

quotes.text: Science is simply common sense at its best, that is, rigidly accurate in observation, and merciless to fallacy in logic.

quotes.text: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.

quotes.text: Youth is the best time to be rich, and the best time to be poor.

quotes.text: The best way in the world to deceive believers is to cloak a message in religious language and declare that it conveys some new insight from God.

quotes.text: An excuse becomes an obstacle in your journey to success when it is made in place of your best effort or when it is used as the object of the blame.

quotes.text: There are people and nations, Mother, that I would like to say to you by name. I entrust them to you in silence, I entrust them to you in the way that you know best.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.text: I love my wife and I know she loves me. We're best friends. We're just lucky to have found each other. It takes a lot of work but I just feel very blessed that I found the right person. It's a very fortunate situation and not everyone has that.

quotes.text: Falling in love is the best way to kill your heart because then it's not yours anymore. It's laid in a coffin, waiting to be cremated.

quotes.text: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.

quotes.text: As you know from school, it's when you have not prepared for the test that you have the fear of failing. And if you have prepared, even if you fail, you've done your best.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.text: Land really is the best art.

quotes.text: How long most people would look at the best book before they would give the price of a large turbot for it?

quotes.text: Nearly all the powerful people of this age are unbelievers, the best of them in doubt and misery, the most in plodding hesitation, doing as well as they can, what practical work lies at hand.

quotes.text: The art which we may call generally art of the wayside, as opposed to that which is the business of men's lives, is, in the best sense of the word, Grotesque.

quotes.text: The best defense against usurpatory government is an assertive citizenry.
quotes.author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quotes.text: As a mom, I know it is my responsibility, and no one else's, to raise my kids. But we have to ask ourselves, what does it mean when so many parents are finding their best efforts undermined by an avalanche of advertisements aimed at our kids.

quotes.text: We do not look in our great cities for our best morality.

quotes.text: A man's best fortune, or his worst, is his wife.

quotes.text: When love is at its best, one loves so much that he cannot forget.

quotes.text: It is with trifles, and when he is off guard, that a man best reveals his character.

quotes.text: She's always there for me when I need her She's my best friend she's just my everything.
quotes.author: Ashley Olsen

quotes.text: The best way to give advice to your children is to find out what they want and then advise them to do it.

quotes.text: Priests are not men of the world it is not intended that they should be and a University training is the one best adapted to prevent their becoming so.

quotes.text: This Halloween, the most popular mask is the Arnold Schwarzenegger mask. And the best part? With a mouth full of candy you will sound just like him.

quotes.text: You don't despair about something like the Middle East, you just do the best you can.

quotes.text: The best vision is insight.

quotes.text: Friends are the best to turn to when you're having a rough day.

quotes.text: I paint self-portraits because I am so often alone, because I am the person I know best.

quotes.text: There is a wisdom in this beyond the rules of physic: a man's own observation what he finds good of and what he finds hurt of is the best physic to preserve health.

quotes.text: Virtue is like a rich stone, best plain set.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Some people have such a talent for making the best of a bad situation that they go around creating bad situations so they can make the best of them.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.text: My best moment? I have a lot of good moments but the one I prefer is when I kicked the hooligan.
quotes.author: Eric Cantona

quotes.text: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.text: There is so much good in the worst of us, and so much bad in the best of us, that it ill behaves any of us to find fault with the rest of us.
quotes.author: James Truslow Adams

quotes.text: The best revenge is to live on and prove yourself.
quotes.author: Eddie Vedder

quotes.text: We all like to forgive, and love best not those who offend us least, nor who have done most for us, but those who make it most easy for us to forgive them.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: He has spent his life best who has enjoyed it most. God will take care that we do not enjoy it any more than is good for us.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: I've given it my all. I've done my best. Now, I'm ready with my family to begin the next phase of our lives.
quotes.author: Richard M. Daley

quotes.text: Man finds it hard to get what he wants, because he does not want the best God finds it hard to give, because He would give the best, and man will not take it.
quotes.author: George MacDonald

quotes.text: Meditation is all about the pursuit of nothingness. It's like the ultimate rest. It's better than the best sleep you've ever had. It's a quieting of the mind. It sharpens everything, especially your appreciation of your surroundings. It keeps life fresh.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.text: I don't believe the most successful people are the ones who got the best grades, got into the best schools, or made the most money.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.text: Your best friend and worst enemy are both in this room right now. It's not your neighbor right or left - and it's not God or the devil - it's you.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.text: Men at most differ as Heaven and Earth, but women, worst and best, as Heaven and Hell.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.text: And it is still true, no matter how old you are, when you go out into the world it is best to hold hands and stick together.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.text: I'm human, I'm not perfect. I make mistakes all the time, but I guess my job is to keep those mistakes to myself, which I'm already fine doing and just try to be the best I can be for those kids.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.text: Maria is the best reason to come home.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: Philosophy begins in wonder. And, at the end, when philosophic thought has done its best, the wonder remains.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.text: There is no end of craving. Hence contentment alone is the best way to happiness. Therefore, acquire contentment.
quotes.author: Sivananda

quotes.text: The large majority of the Negroes who have put on the finishing touches of our best colleges are all but worthless in the development of their people.
quotes.author: Carter G. Woodson

quotes.text: The best thing is to look natural, but it takes makeup to look natural.
quotes.author: Calvin Klein

quotes.text: Humor is one of the best ingredients of survival.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.text: In less enlightened times, the best way to impress women was to own a hot car. But women wised up and realized it was better to buy their own hot cars so they wouldn't have to ride around with jerks.

quotes.text: One man's ways may be as good as another's, but we all like our own best.

quotes.text: The best way to lose weight is to close your mouth - something very difficult for a politician. Or watch your food - just watch it, don't eat it.

quotes.text: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.

quotes.text: No matter the nationality, no matter the religion, no matter the ethnic background, America brings out the best in people.

quotes.text: Words empty as the wind are best left unsaid.

quotes.text: It is our moral obligation to give every child the very best education possible.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: Success has a simple formula: do your best, and people may like it.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.text: Loving a child doesn't mean giving in to all his whims to love him is to bring out the best in him, to teach him to love what is difficult.

quotes.text: To all the positions, I just bring the determination to win. Me being an unselfish player, I think that can carry on to my teammates. When you have one of the best players on the court being unselfish, I think that transfers to the other players.

quotes.text: Expect the best, Prepare for the worst.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quotes.text: The union movement has been the best middle class job creating program that America has ever had, and it doesn't cost the government a dime.

quotes.text: The best subjects are always people, who never fail to amaze me by their unpredictability.
quotes.author: Ronnie James Dio

quotes.text: Having lots of siblings is like having built-in best friends.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.text: The best things in life are silly.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.text: Thinking well to be wise: planning well, wiser: doing well wisest and best of all.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.text: Perhaps it sounds ridiculous, but the best thing that young filmmakers should do is to get hold of a camera and some film and make a movie of any kind at all.
quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.text: Courtesy is a silver lining around the dark clouds of civilization it is the best part of refinement and in many ways, an art of heroic beauty in the vast gallery of man's cruelty and baseness.

quotes.text: I marvel at the resilience of the Jewish people. Their best characteristic is their desire to remember. No other people has such an obsession with memory.

quotes.text: Every day, people settle for less than they deserve. They are only partially living or at best living a partial life. Every human being has the potential for greatness.

quotes.text: Throughout my life I have always been amazed that people couldn't listen to other people, that they couldn't hear their best intent, that there seemed to be an enormous need to demonize.

quotes.text: Ideas are elusive, slippery things. Best to keep a pad of paper and a pencil at your bedside, so you can stab them during the night before they get away.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.text: Though bachelors be the strongest stakes, married men are the best binders, in the hedge of the commonwealth.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.text: He is the best sailor who can steer within fewest points of the wind, and exact a motive power out of the greatest obstacles.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.text: The education of women is the best way to save the environment.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.text: Pride is still aiming at the best houses: Men would be angels, angels would be gods. Aspiring to be gods, if angels fell aspiring to be angels men rebel.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.text: Woman's at best a contradiction still.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.text: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.text: Being a mother is the best thing that ever happened to me. Before you have your first baby you are a girl and then you become a mother. There is no transition into being a woman you literally become a mum and being a mum means you always love someone else more than yourself and it is an unexplainable situation.
quotes.author: Brigitte Nielsen

quotes.text: God's gifts put man's best dreams to shame.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.text: I did the best I could, and in some arenas, my best was not good enough. I've made some bad choices.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.text: Those men get along best with women who can get along best without them.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: In our so-called democracy we are accustomed to give the majority what they want rather than educate them to understand what is best for them.
quotes.author: Carter G. Woodson

quotes.text: It is our best work that God wants, not the dregs of our exhaustion. I think he must prefer quality to quantity.
quotes.author: George MacDonald

quotes.text: I was blessed with certain gifts and talents and God gave them to me to be the best person I can be and to have a positive impact on other people.
quotes.author: Bryan Clay

quotes.text: Music is the best way for me to say I love you.
quotes.author: Mireille Mathieu

quotes.text: The time that people aren't expecting what's going to happen, I find that's the best time to really cause the damage that needs to be done.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.text: You and I are stuck with the necessity of taking the worst of two evils or none at all. So-I'm taking the immature Democrat as the best of the two. Nixon is impossible.

quotes.text: I just always expect the best because I'm a competitor and if I'm competing, then obviously I'm trying to be better in everything.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.text: Our most intimate friend is not he to whom we show the worst, but the best of our nature.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.text: A Boss in Heaven is the best excuse for a boss on earth, therefore If God did exist, he would have to be abolished.
quotes.author: Mikhail Bakunin

quotes.text: Party-spirit at best is but the madness of many for the gain of a few.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.text: My dad was my best friend and greatest role model. He was an amazing dad, coach, mentor, soldier, husband and friend.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.text: Yet, it is true, poetry is delicious the best prose is that which is most full of poetry.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: The ultimate victory in competition is derived from the inner satisfaction of knowing that you have done your best and that you have gotten the most out of what you had to give.
quotes.author: Howard Cosell

quotes.text: Power will intoxicate the best hearts, as wine the strongest heads. No man is wise enough, nor good enough to be trusted with unlimited power.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.text: Beauty ought to look a little surprised: it is the emotion that best suits her face. The beauty who does not look surprised, who accepts her position as her due - she reminds us too much of a prima donna.

quotes.text: There are many little ways to enlarge your child's world. Love of books is the best of all.
quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.text: When you look good, you feel good. Confidence with what you're wearing is very important. If you feel good, you will always perform your best without worrying about anything.

quotes.text: Like anything else that happens on its own, the act of writing is beyond currency. Money is great stuff to have, but when it comes to the act of creation, the best thing is not to think of money too much. It constipates the whole process.

quotes.text: When I heard the royal family wanted to have me perform in celebration of Prince William's marriage, I knew I had to give them a little something. 'Wet' is the perfect anthem for Prince William or any playa to get the club smokin'.

quotes.text: I don't think there's anything they can say about me that I haven't said about myself already. And I would be an absolute total liar, and my fans would not respect me, if I said that my life and my marriage are perfect. But we absolutely love each other we have fun together - it's great.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.text: On the one hand, the idea of marriage and the sort of traditional family life repulses me. But on the other hand, I long for it, you know what I mean? I'm constantly in conflict with things. And it is because of my past and my upbringing and the journey that I've been on.
quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

quotes.text: A man's love, till it has been chastened and fastened by the feeling of duty which marriage brings with it, is instigated mainly by the difficulty of pursuit.

quotes.text: People try much less hard to make a marriage work than they used to fifty years ago. Divorce is easier.
quotes.author: Mary Wesley

quotes.text: The death of anti-gay hate speech is no doubt being hastened by the head-spinning speed with which gays as a group - to say nothing of gay marriage - are becoming an unremarkable and even quite traditional parts of American life.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.text: Marriage is a lot of things - a source of love, security, the joy of children, but it's also an interpersonal battlefield, and it's not hard to see why: Take two disparate people, toss them together in often-confined quarters, add the stresses of money and kids - now lather, rinse, repeat for the rest of your natural life. What could go wrong?
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.text: Marriage is a religious and state issue.
quotes.author: Jim DeMint

quotes.text: I've had two terrific relationships, but both ended in marriage.
quotes.author: Jane Seymour

quotes.text: I adore the theater and I am a painter. I think the two are made for a marriage of love. I will give all my soul to prove this once more.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.text: Our marriage is between us. If we decide to continue being together or not, it's our business.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.text: There's already a marriage clock, a career clock, a biological clock. Sometimes being a woman feels like standing in the lobby of a hotel, looking at the dials depicting every time zone in the world behind the front desk - except they all apply to you, and all at once.

quotes.text: I would absolutely, definitely never sell my wedding pictures to a magazine. I'd like it to be a special day, not a photo shoot. And once you've done that, your marriage becomes everybody else's business.

quotes.text: Cross-cultural marriage is difficult, especially when one person has to live in another country. But I thought there was a very good chance of it working because people grow together if they have a common passion.

quotes.text: Marriage is like paying an endless visit in your worst clothes.
quotes.author: J. B. Priestley

quotes.text: I love the institution of marriage, and I love my marriage.

quotes.text: I think that sense of humor is important in marriage. A sense of humor gets people through marriage.
quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

quotes.text: Marriage is hard work, period.
quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

quotes.text: My grandparents got married at a very young age, and a lot of what I think about marriage is based on their relationship. I watched them over the years and saw how they dealt with everything together, as a team.
quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

quotes.text: My grandparents got married at a very young age, and a lot of what I think about marriage is based on their relationship.
quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

quotes.text: You know, my friends, with what a brave carouse I made a Second Marriage in my house favored old barren reason from my bed, and took the daughter of the vine to spouse.

quotes.text: Most Americans don't care about gay marriage.
quotes.author: Dan Savage

quotes.text: I believe in traditional marriage.

quotes.text: Well, marriage is a very important part of our culture and our society. If we want to have a hopeful and decent society, we ought to aim for the ideal.

quotes.text: A marriage is no amusement but a solemn act, and generally a sad one.

quotes.text: No Congress ever has seen fit to amend the Constitution to address any issue related to marriage. No Constitutional Amendment was needed to ban polygamy or bigamy, nor was a Constitutional Amendment needed to set a uniform age of majority to ban child marriages.

quotes.text: I was born to be married. I just feel comfortable there. I love the idea of being partnered for ever. I love my girlfriend, we've been best friends since I was 18. There's not a thing we haven't been through except for marriage... We've had talks about what we would name our kids since we were in our 20s.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.text: I would say that the surest measure of a man's or a woman's maturity is the harmony, style, joy, and dignity he creates in his marriage, and the pleasure and inspiration he provides for his spouse.

quotes.text: Marriage hasn't been my thing. But gay people, knock yourselves out!

quotes.text: The way that same-sex marriage should reach the federal level is that it absolutely should be decided by the Supreme Court as quickly as possible. It's a 14th Amendment issue. There's no argument about it.

quotes.text: In December 1998, I considered myself an expert on love. I was almost a year into a relationship, one that had grown more slowly than I had wished, but once it flowered it was much more stimulating than any marriage or relationship I had known.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.text: I am very old-fashioned about marriage. It is for life and I mean it. I always knew that when I met the right girl, the life I had before - being single, in a band, girls everywhere - would be over.

quotes.text: Brands mature over time, like a marriage. The bond you feel with your spouse is different than when you first met each other. Excitement and discovery are replaced by comfort and depth.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: I don't have this fantasy about marriage anymore. Everyone says it takes hard work. Well, it kind of does - and I'm much more pragmatic about romance than I used to be.

quotes.text: The rule with marriage is the less you talk about it the better, as far as I can tell.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.text: While 45 of the 50 States have either a State constitutional amendment or a statute that preserves the current definition of marriage, left-wing activist judges and officials at the local levels have struck down State laws protecting marriage.

quotes.text: And that is why marriage and family law has emphasized the importance of marriage as the foundation of family, addressing the needs of children in the most positive way.
quotes.author: John Boehner

quotes.text: When David Arquette and I got engaged we started therapy together. I'd heard that the first year of marriage is the hardest, so we decided to work through all that stuff early.

quotes.text: Is marriage for ever? I think you get married with the intention that it will be, but who knows?

quotes.text: It's so easy to grow apart marriage takes work.

quotes.text: Marriage is an institution, and you must be fully committed to it.
quotes.author: Gene Simmons

quotes.text: I don't know if I'm built for marriage.
quotes.author: Jamie Foxx

quotes.text: Sometimes divorce is better than marriage.
quotes.author: Sumner Redstone

quotes.text: I'm an advocate for gay marriage. I have more gay friends than Carter has pills.
quotes.author: Patti Stanger

quotes.text: On both 'The Bachelor' and 'The Bachelorette,' it seems like proposing marriage is equivalent to saying, 'Let's date.' Everyone knows those aren't the same things.
quotes.author: Patti Stanger

quotes.text: The marriage didn't work out but the separation is great.
quotes.author: Liz Smith

quotes.text: Traditional marriage is what should be sanctioned.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.text: Coming to terms with the fact that my marriage was a failure was devastating and very difficult.
quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

quotes.text: It's all kind of a big illusion: the white picket fence and the perfect marriage and the kids. Check that box off, check that box off, and move forward.
