quotes.text: I have a lot of respect for marriage.
quotes.author: Dominic Monaghan

quotes.text: This marriage is no one's business but our own.
quotes.author: Bobby Darin

quotes.text: In marriage, compromise nurtures the relationship.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.text: I was gone so much in my first marriage. I love the moments when I engage with my youngest daughter now. It's not my thing to sit on the ground and play tea party, but I'll do it because it's a moment that will stick with me forever.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.text: I believe in the institution of marriage. Of course being a Mormon, we believe in eternity rather than just till death do us part. If you really try hard, if you make it work, it's blissful. But I also know a marriage that isn't working can be painful.
quotes.author: Donny Osmond

quotes.text: The truth is you can have a great marriage, but there are still no guarantees.
quotes.author: Demi Moore

quotes.text: Well you know, I think a lot of us in marriage know that you play different roles at different times. And Mitt can get very intense, and I can have the ability to kind of talk him off the rails sometimes and say, 'Hey let's look at what is really important and let's do that now.'
quotes.author: Ann Romney

quotes.text: In marriage, it's always that give and take and rebalancing that we have to do in how we can help each other. But, I have been known at times by my sons, that is the name that they call me-the Mitt stabilizer.
quotes.author: Ann Romney

quotes.text: God invented concubinage, satan marriage.
quotes.author: Francis Picabia

quotes.text: You know, there were major problems in my marriage.
quotes.author: Hulk Hogan

quotes.text: I believe wholeheartedly in marriage. I don't exclusively mean a marriage with a legal contract, but any relationship that constitutes a marriage because of the quality of their relationship.
quotes.author: Helen Reddy

quotes.text: I think that two people who decide to live together in a marriage situation, they have an obligation to make the marriage work for them.
quotes.author: Helen Reddy

quotes.text: Studies have consistently shown that financial hardship is the biggest obstacle to heterosexual marriage, yet the Republican leadership has done precious little to help address the financial hardship faced by American families.
quotes.author: Kendrick Meek

quotes.text: For me it's also - the music is equally as important. I mean I think as somebody who writes music, there just has to sort of be the marriage between both.
quotes.author: Katey Sagal

quotes.text: We'll sort of get over the marriage first and then maybe look at the kids. But obviously we want a family so we'll have to start thinking about that.
quotes.author: Prince William

quotes.text: Marriage is a coming together for better or for worse, hopefully enduring, and intimate to the degree of being sacred.
quotes.author: William O. Douglas

quotes.text: But I will agree that I think that things happen with people in relationships, that you might have been able to enjoy Morocco, say, if you weren't getting out of a bad marriage. You know what I mean?
quotes.author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quotes.text: I don't think young men or women should feel pressured into marriage. You shouldn't marry anyone, in my opinion, who you have to try hard for.
quotes.author: Rachael Ray

quotes.text: I've always been wary of marriage.
quotes.author: Cynthia Nixon

quotes.text: During the periods in my marriage when I chose to stay home with my kids rather than work as an attorney, it caused me no end of anxiety. Despite the fact that I knew I was contributing to our family by caring for our children, I still felt that my worth was less because I wasn't earning.
quotes.author: Ayelet Waldman

quotes.text: My kids have moved more in their twenties, you know, than my parents have moved in nearly 40-something years of marriage before they died. So there's a part of me that laments what we have lost, and that is a sense of community.
quotes.author: Mike Huckabee

quotes.text: I am much more open to plural marriage than I was before, and I now support it in certain situations. I do believe it is right for some people. But our example in America today is gross abuse - I can't support it in fundamentalist compounds.
quotes.author: Ginnifer Goodwin

quotes.text: Provincial governments in Canada have terminated the positions of marriage commissioners who have, for personal religious convictions, not performed same sex marriages. It has happened in Saskatchewan.
quotes.author: Stockwell Day

quotes.text: Bishop Frederick Henry of Calgary is facing at least two official objections to his public statements along with expensive hearings before the Alberta Human Rights Commission for expressing his biblical views on same sex marriage.
quotes.author: Stockwell Day

quotes.text: Our national media refuses to report that even the Supreme Court did not say marriage was a human right in all cases nor did it say that the heterosexual definition violated anyone's right or that the heterosexual definition of marriage was unconstitutional.
quotes.author: Stockwell Day

quotes.text: Marriage commissioners who choose not to marry homosexuals are being fired. A Knights of Columbus chapter in British Columbia is in court because it chooses not allow a lesbian group to use its facility for marriage ceremonies. The list goes on.
quotes.author: Stockwell Day

quotes.text: My parents did not have a perfect marriage. It was pretty good, but it was not perfect. My marriage is not perfect. My wife is, but I happen to be imperfect. However, that does not discount the fact that the definition of marriage must be defended and protected.
quotes.author: Stockwell Day

quotes.text: I have to be asked, I guess, but I love the idea of marriage. I think it's beautiful. I'm such a romantic, and I always have been.
quotes.author: Portia de Rossi

quotes.text: Marriage, in life, is like a duel in the midst of a battle.
quotes.author: Edmond About

quotes.text: There are many things that keep me from getting married. But there will be a time when marriage makes sense to me.
quotes.author: Adam Levine

quotes.text: I think marriage is ghastly.
quotes.author: Rupert Everett

quotes.text: I love the idea of marriage. I definitely want marriage and little Kellans running around.
quotes.author: Kellan Lutz

quotes.text: I don't know what my version of a relationship or marriage is yet, because the typical model seems a little broken to me.
quotes.author: Michelle Williams

quotes.text: In 1977 we played America and Europe three times, and Japan - my marriage suffered as a result. My then wife took the kids to Canada to be near her parents.
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.text: I'd love to have First Lady Michelle Obama over and ask, 'How do you make your marriage work?' I think the president is sexy as all get-out, but he has got to get on her nerves some kind of way. He's this wonderful, powerful man, but she sees him leaving his socks on the floor.
quotes.author: Sherri Shepherd

quotes.text: Well, my view before was a Western view, and I certainly understand marriage equality and civil rights, equal rights for all, but having visited developing nations and some of the poorest nations in the world, I realize how deep it goes and how much work really needs to be done to create equality for all.
quotes.author: Jason Mraz

quotes.text: And in a marriage you can't TRY and be married. You're married or you're not married... as far as I'm concerned.
quotes.author: Ringo Starr

quotes.text: Success is hard in general for most women. We now have such busy lives, and we're told we can do everything - you know, we can have the relationship and the marriage and the kids and the career.
quotes.author: Cat Deeley

quotes.text: There were times after my marriage ended where, you know, I really felt like I was at the bottom of a mountain, there was a great big, fog up there, and I'm never going to cross to the other side.
quotes.author: Lynn Redgrave

quotes.text: I don't want marriage. You know why? Because I did that. I did it for 32 years.
quotes.author: Lynn Redgrave

quotes.text: Marriage is the mother of the world. It preserves kingdoms, and fills cities and churches, and heaven itself.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.text: I support gay marriage. I support gay marriage because I believe Conservatives support the institutions of commitment.
quotes.author: George Osborne

quotes.text: The value of marriage is not that adults produce children but that children produce adults.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.text: It is statistically proven that the strongest institution that guarantees procreation and continuity of the generations is marriage between one man and one woman. We don't want genocide. We don't want to destroy the sacred institution of marriage.
quotes.author: Alveda King

quotes.text: People need jobs, people need happy and successful lives there should be marriage between one man and one woman, there should the value of person from conception until natural death.
quotes.author: Alveda King

quotes.text: I'm always told that what I say is controversial. Why is it controversial? Because I speak from a tradition that has now fallen out of favor with the dominant media in this country. And so when I say things like marriage should be between one man and one woman, I'm called a bigot.
quotes.author: Rick Santorum

quotes.text: Marriage can be expensive, and if I lose millions then it'll be the best millions I've spent.
quotes.author: Seth Rogen

quotes.text: I don't do marriage. I think it's incredibly naff. And I don't like vulgar displays of ostentation.
quotes.author: Jenny Eclair

quotes.text: The biggest problem in my life is trying to be the kind of man that I want to be, the father that I want to be, and how to process the failure of my marriage.
quotes.author: Ethan Hawke

quotes.text: The secret of a good marriage is forgiving your partner for marrying you in the first place.
quotes.author: Sacha Guitry

quotes.text: Marriage to Fernando offered shelter and security, but the shackle was the price I'd pay.

quotes.text: I think that's one of the most difficult things in any marriage - in order to build anything, you must be together. You can't build anything over the telephone.
quotes.author: Julie London

quotes.text: When I got political that blew our marriage out of the water. I was not the same person and I admit that.
quotes.author: Michael Moriarty

quotes.text: I worked with John, but I had enough sense to walk just a little ways behind him. I could have made more records, but I wanted to have a marriage.
quotes.author: June Carter Cash

quotes.text: But the fact that same-sex marriage is still an issue is insane. Thinking love knows a sex is ridiculous.
quotes.author: Garret Dillahunt

quotes.text: Legislation to create a new 10 percent tax bracket, reduce the marriage penalty, cut the tax rate on dividends and capital gains, and increase the child tax credit have been essential elements in this economic expansion.
quotes.author: Roger Wicker

quotes.text: I only gave out my opinion that same sex marriage is against the law of God.
quotes.author: Manny Pacquiao

quotes.text: I highly suggest marriage to all my friends who are dating.
quotes.author: Jerry O'Connell

quotes.text: I grew up in a Hindu household but went to a Roman Catholic school. I grew up with a mother who said, 'I'll arrange a marriage for you at 18,' but she also said that we could achieve anything we put our minds to an encourage us to dream of becoming prime minister or president.
quotes.author: Indra Nooyi

quotes.text: You can't have a happy family if you don't have a happy marriage.
quotes.author: Jeremy Sisto

quotes.text: There's not a lot of room anymore for what I call 'made-up' drama. The drama comes from real places now - marriage takes work and focus, the kid stuff takes patience and commitment. And if you don't grow as people and as a couple, within all of that, then you've got some real drama.
quotes.author: Jeremy Sisto

quotes.text: It's the best marriage of songs and production. But I have to say, I have an affinity for Bossanova.
quotes.author: Joey Santiago

quotes.text: New Orleans, more than many places I know, actually tangibly lives its culture. It's not just a residual of life it's a part of life. Music is at every major milestone of our life: birth, marriage, death. It's our culture.
quotes.author: Wendell Pierce

quotes.text: Let me be clear. I support the definition of marriage as a union between a man and a woman.
quotes.author: Ben Nelson

quotes.text: I was glad to hear of that determination as I detest the practice of cousins marrying or any marriage between persons in which there can be traced the most distant relationship. I go for the improvement instead of the deterioration of our race.
quotes.author: Ezra Cornell

quotes.text: Marriage is all about knowing the ins and outs and the intimate details, and your wife is supposed to be the person you know best. But my brother and I think alike, know everything about one another, and when we get together, we block everything else out. Nothing exists in our world except for us.
quotes.author: Jon Heder

quotes.text: Marriage is wild. I thought it was this perfect land of happiness and joy. Wrong! After you say you do, you don't for a long time.
quotes.author: John Leguizamo

quotes.text: I'm certain that most couples expect to find intimacy in marriage, but it somehow eludes them.
quotes.author: James Dobson

quotes.text: I think there is a generation gap. I personally look forward to, as our generation becomes the leaders, you are gonna see a change, and I think hopefully gay marriage will be a part of that country.
quotes.author: Vanessa Kerry

quotes.text: Many women cut back what had to be done at home by redefining what the house, the marriage and, sometimes, what the child needs. One woman described a fairly common pattern: I do my half. I do half of his half, and the rest doesn't get done.
quotes.author: Arlie Russell Hochschild

quotes.text: Obviously, the anti-ERA people are tickled about my ordeal because it proves that the ERA breaks up families. When they point out that feminism is a dangerous thing, I just say marriage is pretty precarious too.
quotes.author: Sonia Johnson

quotes.text: In response to our fast-food culture, a 'slow food' movement appeared. Out of hurried parenthood, a move toward slow parenting could be growing. With vital government supports for state-of-the-art public child care and paid parental leave, maybe we would be ready to try slow love and marriage.
quotes.author: Arlie Russell Hochschild

quotes.text: Traditional marriage between a man and a woman has been a cornerstone of our society for generations. If we are going to change that, it ought to be done by the will of the people.
quotes.author: Steve Chabot

quotes.text: I don't particularly think marriage is a sane thing.
quotes.author: Sean Young

quotes.text: I'm receiving 300 to 500 letters every week from people telling me that God used my stories to save their marriage or to introduce them to Christ or to heal a relationship that had been broken.
quotes.author: Karen Kingsbury

quotes.text: Marriage, like death, is a debt we owe to nature.
quotes.author: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.text: But I don't think that it's a form of family that I would be comfortable in. I've found a way to this character and this family, but I still believe that a marriage is between two people and not seven or three.
quotes.author: Jeanne Tripplehorn

quotes.text: The thing is, when I had my first success it did coincide with the end of my first marriage, and because I went on to have a very, very unhappy two years, I don't think I equate career success with personal happiness.
quotes.author: Rob Brydon

quotes.text: When you're suddenly pregnant and no one is standing by your side, even if you're in your 30s, it's a hard conversation. I'm a traditional girl, and I believe in marriage, and I just always thought that's the way I'd be doing this.
quotes.author: Bridget Moynahan

quotes.text: And my marriage was perfect when I wasn't famous.
quotes.author: Damon Wayans

quotes.text: I think that sense of humor is important in marriage. A sense of humor gets people through marriage.
quotes.author: Connie Britton

quotes.text: The fact is, I am in my third marriage and I do not believe in divorce. But I was half the problem, I guarantee you. More than half the problem. I couldn't negotiate with the other women.
quotes.author: James Brolin

quotes.text: Only after I faced the unhappiness of my first marriage did I start on the path of personal growth.
quotes.author: Judith Wright

quotes.text: I hope gay marriage will be legal in every state.
quotes.author: Mark Consuelos

quotes.text: The activists will not stop in trying to impose their extreme views on the rest of us, and they have now plotted out a state-by-state strategy to increase the number of judicial decisions redefining marriage without the voice of the people being heard.
quotes.author: Jim Bunning

quotes.text: The very idea of marriage is basic to recognition as equals in our society any status short of that is inferior, unjust, and unconstitutional.
quotes.author: Ted Olson

quotes.text: The United States Supreme Court has repeatedly held that marriage is one of the most fundamental rights that we have as Americans under our Constitution.
quotes.author: Ted Olson

quotes.text: Each experience I go through - marriage, my public life, my personal life - I'm learning as I go.
quotes.author: Jason Sudeikis

quotes.text: Gay marriage won't be more of an issue 25 years from now than interracial marriage is today.
quotes.author: Jared Polis

quotes.text: I've done an informal, anecdotal survey about marriage, and I've found no evidence that it brings happiness.
quotes.author: Mary McCormack

quotes.text: My father and mother were second cousins, though they did not meet till shortly before their marriage.
quotes.author: Patrick White

quotes.text: There's something about marriage that is not as intensely romantic or interesting as a couple's first meeting.
quotes.author: John Sandford

quotes.text: I finally got a chance to talk to my daughter from my previous marriage. I just got married May 3 to my beautiful wife, but we don't see each other much.
quotes.author: Peter Criss

quotes.text: Civil marriage, like all civil rights provided by the government, must be provided equally to all Americans.
quotes.author: Benjamin Todd Jealous

quotes.text: Marriage and the creation of families has been an integral part of our society since its creation it should not be defined without the kind of involvement by the people which a constitutional process would require.
quotes.author: Robert Foster Bennett

quotes.text: We are confident that the Supreme Court will soon see the direction that this country is headed and enshrine marriage as a constitutional right for all.
quotes.author: Benjamin Todd Jealous

quotes.text: Marriage, even the best marriages are tough.
quotes.author: Jayne Meadows

quotes.text: I lost my second marriage because of drinking, and I loved the woman very much. But I thought I needed booze to write. I'm glad I was disabused.
quotes.author: Barry Hannah

quotes.text: People used to say my son looked like a Mexican Biggie. And when he was first born, memories of Biggie... you know, we didn't always have the greatest days. For at least half the length of our marriage we were separated, so everyday was definitely not a good day.
quotes.author: Faith Evans

quotes.text: I guess you kind of got to realize that once you in a marriage, whatever it is, you gotta deal with it. Not necessarily that you got to accept it, but you have to deal with it and try your best to make it work for you, for the both of you.
quotes.author: Faith Evans

quotes.text: The reason for not getting married was that I just didn't have a partner to get married to. Climbing mountains was more attractive to me than marriage, or other fun things like that.
quotes.author: Tamae Watanabe

quotes.text: My father was on the faculty in the Chemistry Department of Harvard University my mother had one year of graduate work in physics before her marriage.
quotes.author: Kenneth G. Wilson

quotes.text: I got married at 22 and remained in an abusive marriage for 10 years. I made up my mind that that was never going to happen to me again. I made a brave step to walk out in a society when you didn't walk out of an abusive marriage. It was mental and physical abuse.
quotes.author: Joyce Banda

quotes.text: Everything in life is a lesson and I have learned from each marriage. Yes, I've made mistakes but every experience is a learning curve.
quotes.author: Patsy Kensit

quotes.text: If we did not look to marriage as the principal source of happiness, fewer marriages would end in tears.
quotes.author: Anthony Storr

quotes.text: I left my marriage knowing I'd have to work. I have.
quotes.author: Sarah Ferguson

quotes.text: Religious institutions should have religious freedom on this issue. No church or minister should ever have to conduct a marriage that is inconsistent with their religious beliefs. But I think as a civil institution, this issue's time has come and we need to move forward.
quotes.author: Kay Hagan

quotes.text: Our black president can't say that he's for gay marriage. That is upsetting to me.
quotes.author: Mario Cantone

quotes.text: Marriage has been defined by every legislature that has ever sat in the United States from every State, now 50 States, the same way, but now we have unelected judges altering and changing that fundamental institution.
quotes.author: Jeff Sessions

quotes.text: There's lots of problem solving in any marriage, but when you have this collective goal that is a human being, it's an inspiring rally point.
quotes.author: Ty Burrell

quotes.text: To say I drank my way into marriage isn't much of an exaggeration, and it's none at all to say I drank my way out of it.
quotes.author: Lawrence Block

quotes.text: Marriage: love, honor, and negotiate.
quotes.author: Joe Moore

quotes.text: I've learned this is a very long marriage doing a television show. I like the people that I work with to be people I enjoy, so you want to cast people who are as excited and enthusiastic as you are.
quotes.author: Shonda Rhimes

quotes.text: I am a firm believer in marriage. In the future I will be married.
quotes.author: Elisabetta Canalis

quotes.text: Marriage is one of the most sacred human institutions. I asked our Senators, as many South Dakotans have done, to protect marriage as a union between a man and a woman.
quotes.author: Mike Rounds

quotes.text: Other than marriage, she doesn't control me and I don't control her.
quotes.author: Gavyn Davies

quotes.text: My wife disagrees with 100 percent of what I say. That's the same marriage I have.
quotes.author: Curtis Sliwa

quotes.text: I'm not feeling very well - I need a doctor immediately. Ring the nearest golf course.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: A hospital bed is a parked taxi with the meter running.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: They certainly give very strange names to diseases.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Getting out of the hospital is a lot like resigning from a book club. You're not out of it until the computer says you're out of it.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: Medicine is my lawful wife and literature my mistress when I get tired of one, I spend the night with the other.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.text: When I was born I was so ugly the doctor slapped my mother.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.text: Doctors are just the same as lawyers the only difference is that lawyers merely rob you, whereas doctors rob you and kill you too.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.text: The doctor sees all the weakness of mankind the lawyer all the wickedness, the theologian all the stupidity.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: Doctors will have more lives to answer for in the next world than even we generals.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: All sorts of computer errors are now turning up. You'd be surprised to know the number of doctors who claim they are treating pregnant men.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: Illness is the doctor to whom we pay most heed to kindness, to knowledge, we make promise only pain we obey.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.text: Three-quarters of the sicknesses of intelligent people come from their intelligence. They need at least a doctor who can understand this sickness.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.text: A physician's physiology has much the same relation to his power of healing as a cleric's divinity has to his power of influencing conduct.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: You may not be able to read a doctor's handwriting and prescription, but you'll notice his bills are neatly typewritten.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.text: Modern medicine is a negation of health. It isn't organized to serve human health, but only itself, as an institution. It makes more people sick than it heals.
quotes.author: Ivan Illich

quotes.text: Whenever a doctor cannot do good, he must be kept from doing harm.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.text: The best doctor is the one you run to and can't find.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.text: I was going to have cosmetic surgery until I noticed that the doctor's office was full of portraits by Picasso.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.text: As a medical doctor, it is my duty to evaluate the situation with as much data as I can gather and as much expertise as I have and as much experience as I have to determine whether or not the wish of the patient is medically justified.
quotes.author: Jack Kevorkian

quotes.text: Time is generally the best doctor.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: My doctor gave me six months to live, but when I couldn't pay the bill he gave me six months more.
quotes.author: Walter Matthau

quotes.text: When I told my doctor I couldn't afford an operation, he offered to touch-up my X-rays.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: The great secret of doctors, known only to their wives, but still hidden from the public, is that most things get better by themselves most things, in fact, are better in the morning.
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.text: Medicine sometimes snatches away health, sometimes gives it.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: I was always shocked when I went to the doctor's office and they did my X-ray and didn't find that I had eight more ribs than I should have or that my blood was the color green.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.text: In the name of Hypocrites, doctors have invented the most exquisite form of torture ever known to man: survival.
quotes.author: Edward Everett Hale

quotes.text: The doctors x-rayed my head and found nothing.
quotes.author: Dizzy Dean

quotes.text: I'm 86 and my doctor used to tell me to slow down - at least he did until he dropped dead.
quotes.author: Cesar Romero

quotes.text: Some people think that doctors and nurses can put scrambled eggs back in the shell.
quotes.author: Cass Canfield

quotes.text: You can die of the cure before you die of the illness.
quotes.author: Michael Landon

quotes.text: People are so afraid of authority figures and doctors are authority figures.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.text: The physician's highest calling, his only calling, is to make sick people healthy - to heal, as it is termed.
quotes.author: Samuel Hahnemann

quotes.text: It is reasonable to expect the doctor to recognize that science may not have all the answers to problems of health and healing.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.text: Growing up, my dolls were doctors and on secret missions. I had Barbie Goes Rambo.
quotes.author: Zoe Saldana

quotes.text: When a man goes through six years training to be a doctor he will never be the same. He knows too much.
quotes.author: Enid Bagnold

quotes.text: Flying back from New York, the flight attendant said 'God, I wished you were here yesterday, we had a stroke on the plane. I said, if I have a stroke on a plane, I hope the pretend doctor isn't the one on the plane. I want a real doctor.
quotes.author: Anthony Edwards

quotes.text: America has the best doctors, the best nurses, the best hospitals, the best medical technology, the best medical breakthrough medicines in the world. There is absolutely no reason we should not have in this country the best health care in the world.
quotes.author: Bill Frist

quotes.text: I went to the doctor and he said I had acute appendicitis, and I said compared to who?
quotes.author: Jay London

quotes.text: I'm strongly for a patient Bill of Rights. Decisions ought to be made by doctors, not accountants.
quotes.author: Charles Schumer

quotes.text: I'm by no means condemning prescription medicine for mental health. I've seen it save a lot of people's lives.
quotes.author: Zach Braff

quotes.text: Mammograms are really sort of a gift. You can either catch something early or count your lucky stars because nothing was discovered. Either way, you're ahead of the game.
quotes.author: Charlotte Ross

quotes.text: If you look at the human condition today, not everyone is well fed, has access to good medical care, or the physical basics that provide for a healthy and a happy life.
quotes.author: Ralph Merkle

quotes.text: Passion, you see, can be destroyed by a doctor. It cannot be created.
quotes.author: Peter Shaffer

quotes.text: In the sick room, ten cents' worth of human understanding equals ten dollars' worth of medical science.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.text: Medical liability reform is not a Republican or Democrat issue or even a doctor versus lawyer issue. It is a patient issue.
quotes.author: John Ensign

quotes.text: The art of medicine was to be properly learned only from its practice and its exercise.
quotes.author: Thomas Sydenham

quotes.text: A pregnant woman facing the most dire circumstances must be able to count on her doctor to do what is medically necessary to protect her from serious physical harm.
quotes.author: Barbara Mikulski

quotes.text: I got the bill for my surgery. Now I know what those doctors were wearing masks for.
quotes.author: James H. Boren

quotes.text: Honestly, being a doctor could make you more close minded than regular people.
quotes.author: Alex Chiu

quotes.text: As a physician, I know many doctors want to utilize new technology, but they find the cost prohibitive.
quotes.author: Nathan Deal

quotes.text: I regret to this day that I never went to college. I feel I should have been a doctor.
quotes.author: Ty Cobb

quotes.text: One has a greater sense of degradation after an interview with a doctor than from any human experience.
quotes.author: Alice James

quotes.text: Doctors coin money when they do procedures but family medicine doesn't have any procedures.
quotes.author: David Jones

quotes.text: If you want total security, go to prison. There you're fed, clothed, given medical care and so on. The only thing lacking... is freedom.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: The Christian's Bible is a drug store. Its contents remain the same, but the medical practice changes.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: You know, if I listened to Michael Dukakis long enough, I would be convinced we're in an economic downturn and people are homeless and going without food and medical attention and that we've got to do something about the unemployed.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: These technologies can make life easier, can let us touch people we might not otherwise. You may have a child with a birth defect and be able to get in touch with other parents and support groups, get medical information, the latest experimental drugs. These things can profoundly influence life. I'm not downplaying that.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: We can't get to the $4 trillion in savings that we need by just cutting the 12 percent of the budget that pays for things like medical research and education funding and food inspectors and the weather service. And we can't just do it by making seniors pay more for Medicare.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: I had the privilege of practicing medicine in the early '60s, before we had any government. It worked rather well, and there was nobody on the street suffering with no medical care.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.text: If you're so pro-life, do me a favour: don't lock arms and block medical clinics. If you're so pro-life, lock arms and block cemeteries.
quotes.author: Bill Hicks

quotes.text: Whenever the people are for gay marriage or medical marijuana or assisted suicide, suddenly the 'will of the people' goes out the window.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.text: The rich man's dog gets more in the way of vaccination, medicine and medical care than do the workers upon whom the rich man's wealth is built.
quotes.author: Samora Machel

quotes.text: Vaccination is the medical sacrament corresponding to baptism. Whether it is or is not more efficacious I do not know.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: Folks, the most insidious part of this whole health care scheme is that all of these vast medical expenditures will become nothing more than government budget items. We individuals will no longer exist. The relationship between a government and citizen will change forever.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.text: Completeness? Happiness? These words don't come close to describing my emotions. There truly is nothing I can say to capture what motherhood means to me, particularly given my medical history.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.text: A Harvard Medical School study has determined that rectal thermometers are still the best way to tell a baby's temperature. Plus, it really teaches the baby who's boss.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.text: I went to medical school because I wanted to ask the big questions. Do we have a soul? Does God exist? What happens after death?
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.text: No one should have to choose between medicine and other necessities. No one should have to use the emergency room every time a child gets sick. And no one should have to live in constant fear that a medical problem will become a financial crisis.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.text: Medical science has proven time and again that when the resources are provided, great progress in the treatment, cure, and prevention of disease can occur.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.text: It seems sensible to me that we should look to the medical profession, that over the centuries has helped us to live longer and healthier lives, to help us die peacefully among our loved ones in our own home without a long stay in God's waiting room.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: I believe it should be possible for someone stricken with a serious and ultimately fatal illness to choose to die peacefully with medical help, rather than suffer.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: Finish last in your league and they call you idiot. Finish last in medical school and they call you doctor.
quotes.author: Abe Lemons

quotes.text: A retired teacher paid $62,000 towards her pension and nothing, yes nothing, for full family medical, dental and vision coverage over her entire career. What will we pay her? $1.4 million in pension benefits and another $215,000 in health care benefit premiums over her lifetime.
quotes.author: Chris Christie

quotes.text: The medical literature tells us that the most effective ways to reduce the risk of heart disease, cancer, stroke, diabetes, Alzheimer's, and many more problems are through healthy diet and exercise. Our bodies have evolved to move, yet we now use the energy in oil instead of muscles to do our work.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.text: Against the State, against the Church, against the silence of the medical profession, against the whole machinery of dead institutions of the past, the woman of today arises.
quotes.author: Margaret Sanger

quotes.text: Stay out of the sun, because it is the worst thing in terms of aging. I'm very medical. I come from a medical family.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.text: What's important at the grocery store is just as important in engines or medical systems. If the customer isn't satisfied, if the stuff is getting stale, if the shelf isn't right, or if the offerings aren't right, it's the same thing. You manage it like a small organization. You don't get hung up on zeros.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.text: Information on how to heal autism and how to possibly delay vaccines or prevent autism shouldn't come from me. It should come from the medical establishment.
quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.text: I have been recently diagnosed with Sjogren's Syndrome, an autoimmune disease which is an ongoing medical condition that affects my energy level and causes fatigue and joint pain.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.text: Civil and political rights are critical, but not often the real problem for the destitute sick. My patients in Haiti can now vote but they can't get medical care or clean water.
quotes.author: Paul Farmer

quotes.text: I know we can't always know what medical surprises may happen during childbirth. But my hope is to go fully natural - no epidural, no interventions. Wish me luck.
quotes.author: Danica McKellar

quotes.text: But I contend that if we're providing total medical coverage for every man, woman, and child in Iraq, shouldn't we at least be doing the same thing for every man, woman, and child in the United States?
quotes.author: Tony Campolo

quotes.text: Money has transformed every watchdog, every independent authority. Medical doctors are increasingly gulled by the lobbying of pharmaceutical salesmen.
quotes.author: Thomas Frank

quotes.text: Liberal that I am, I support health-care reform on its merits alone. My liberal blood boils, for example, when I read that half of the personal bankruptcies in this country are brought on, in part, by medical expenses.
quotes.author: Thomas Frank

quotes.text: My dad's a doctor, and when I was 8, I went to one of his medical conferences where they were demonstrating laser surgery on a chicken. I was so mad that a chicken had to die, I never ate meat again.
quotes.author: Natalie Portman

quotes.text: I first wanted to be a psychiatrist. I decided against that in medical school when I discovered that psychiatrists didn't, in reality, do what they did on TV.
quotes.author: Benjamin Carson

quotes.text: Over the years my mother's steadfast faith in God has inspired me, particularly when I had to perform extremely difficult surgical procedures or when I found myself faced with my own medical scare.
quotes.author: Benjamin Carson

quotes.text: I think first and foremost everybody should understand that Canadians are strongly committed to the system of universal health insurance, to the principle that your ability to pay does not determine your access to critical medical service.
quotes.author: Stephen Harper

quotes.text: The best way to reduce the cost of medical care is to reduce the illness.
quotes.author: Arlen Specter

quotes.text: If we can reduce the cost and improve the quality of medical technology through advances in nanotechnology, we can more widely address the medical conditions that are prevalent and reduce the level of human suffering.
quotes.author: Ralph Merkle

quotes.text: My parents and grandparents have always been engaged in teaching or the medical profession or the priesthood, so I've sort of grown up with a sense of complicity in the lives of other people, so there's no virtue in that it's the way one is raised.
quotes.author: Colin Firth

quotes.text: Medical knowledge and technical savvy are biodegradable. The sort of medicine that was practiced in Boston or New York or Atlanta fifty years ago would be as strange to a medical student or intern today as the ceremonial dance of a !Kung San tribe would seem to a rock festival audience in Hackensack.
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.text: The dilemma of modern medicine, and the underlying central flaw in medical education and, most of all, in the training of interns, is the irresistible drive to do something, anything. It is expected by patients and too often agreed to by their doctors, in the face of ignorance.
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.text: It worries me about our unwillingness to really address reforms and modernization in Medicare. This thing was designed 37 years ago. It has not evolved to keep pace with current medical technology.
quotes.author: John Sununu

quotes.text: Mind you, I've always been a very off-message type of fat broad one who gladly admits she reached the size she is now solely through lack of discipline and love of pleasure, and who rather despises people (except those with proven medical conditions) who pretend that it is generally otherwise.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.text: One goes through school, college, medical school and one's internship learning little or nothing about goodness but a good deal about success.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.text: There have been some medical schools in which somewhere along the assembly line, a faculty member has informed the students, not so much by what he said but by what he did, that there is an intimate relation between curing and caring.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.text: It is clear that the pharmaceutical industry is not, by any stretch of the imagination, doing enough to ensure that the poor have access to adequate medical care.
quotes.author: Paul Farmer

And those traits we detest, sharpness, greed, acquisitiveness, meanness, egotism and self-interest, are the traits of success. And while men admire the quality of the first they love the produce of the second.

quotes.text: It is not until you become a mother that your judgment slowly turns to compassion and understanding.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: I ask people why they have deer heads on their walls. They always say because it's such a beautiful animal. There you go. I think my mother is attractive, but I have photographs of her.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.text: I am sure that if the mothers of various nations could meet, there would be no more wars.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.text: When you are a mother, you are never really alone in your thoughts. A mother always has to think twice, once for herself and once for her child.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.text: Yes, Mother. I can see you are flawed. You have not hidden it. That is your greatest gift to me.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.text: Sweater, n.: garment worn by child when its mother is feeling chilly.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: Who in their infinite wisdom decreed that Little League uniforms be white? Certainly not a mother.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: My mother taught me about the power of inspiration and courage, and she did it with a strength and a passion that I wish could be bottled.
quotes.author: Carly Fiorina

quotes.text: My mother taught me to treat a lady respectfully.
quotes.author: Chris Brown

quotes.text: I've been through it all, baby, I'm mother courage.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.text: Being a mother is hard and it wasn't a subject I ever studied.
quotes.author: Ruby Wax

quotes.text: It is only in the act of nursing that a woman realizes her motherhood in visible and tangible fashion it is a joy of every moment.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: I'm a Mommy's Girl - the strongest influence in my young life was my mom.
quotes.author: Susie Bright

quotes.text: When you have a good mother and no father, God kind of sits in. It's not enough, but it helps.
quotes.author: Dick Gregory

quotes.text: Mothers always find ways to fit in the work - but then when you're working, you feel that you should be spending time with your children and then when you're with your children, you're thinking about working.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.text: How simple a thing it seems to me that to know ourselves as we are, we must know our mothers names.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.text: Every man must define his identity against his mother. If he does not, he just falls back into her and is swallowed up.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: My mother used to tell me man gives the award, God gives the reward. I don't need another plaque.
quotes.author: Denzel Washington

quotes.text: Motherhood is priced Of God, at price no man may dare To lessen or misunderstand.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quotes.text: The fastest way to break the cycle of perfectionism and become a fearless mother is to give up the idea of doing it perfectly - indeed to embrace uncertainty and imperfection.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.text: Throughout my life, my mom has been the person that I've always looked up to.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.text: When motherhood becomes the fruit of a deep yearning, not the result of ignorance or accident, its children will become the foundation of a new race.
quotes.author: Margaret Sanger

quotes.text: Completeness? Happiness? These words don't come close to describing my emotions. There truly is nothing I can say to capture what motherhood means to me, particularly given my medical history.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.text: Motherhood has a very humanizing effect. Everything gets reduced to essentials.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.text: What do girls do who haven't any mothers to help them through their troubles?
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.text: Only mothers can think of the future - because they give birth to it in their children.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.text: Take motherhood: nobody ever thought of putting it on a moral pedestal until some brash feminists pointed out, about a century ago, that the pay is lousy and the career ladder nonexistent.
quotes.author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quotes.text: I was a brownie for a day. My mom made me stop. She didn't want me to conform.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.text: Mothers are the necessity of invention.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: Where there is a mother in the home, matters go well.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.text: I was raised by a single mother who made a way for me. She used to scrub floors as a domestic worker, put a cleaning rag in her pocketbook and ride the subways in Brooklyn so I would have food on the table. But she taught me as I walked her to the subway that life is about not where you start, but where you're going. That's family values.
quotes.author: Al Sharpton

quotes.text: My mom always said that there would be haters. Not everyone can love ya.
quotes.author: Joel Madden

quotes.text: I may be the only mother in America who knows exactly what their child is up to all the time.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.text: The Vatican is against surrogate mothers. Good thing they didn't have that rule when Jesus was born.
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.text: Just as a mother finds pleasure in taking her little child on her lap, there to feed and caress him, in like manner our loving God shows His fondness for His beloved souls who have given themselves entirely to Him and have placed all their hope in His goodness.
quotes.author: Alphonsus Liguori

quotes.text: It's the moms of this nation - single, married, widowed - who really hold this country together. We're the mothers, we're the wives, we're the grandmothers, we're the big sisters, we're the little sisters, we're the daughters. You know it's true, don't you? You're the ones who always have to do a little more.
quotes.author: Ann Romney

quotes.text: If there were no schools to take the children away from home part of the time, the insane asylums would be filled with mothers.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.text: I sing seriously to my mom on the phone. To put her to sleep, I have to sing 'Maria' from West Side Story. When I hear her snoring, I hang up.
quotes.author: Adam Sandler

quotes.text: My mother was a personal friend of God's. They had ongoing conversations.
quotes.author: Della Reese

quotes.text: I am no mother, and I won't be one.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.text: Of all the roles I've played, none has been as fulfilling as being a mother.
quotes.author: Annette Funicello

quotes.text: Mothers don't let your daughters grow up to be models unless you're present.
quotes.author: Janice Dickinson

quotes.text: I owe much to mother. She had an expert's understanding, but also approached art emotionally.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.text: A woman must combine the role of mother, wife and politician.
quotes.author: Emma Bonino

quotes.text: I wish my mother had left me something about how she felt growing up. I wish my grandmother had done the same. I wanted my girls to know me.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.text: My mother taught me that we all have the power to achieve our dreams. What I lacked was the courage.
quotes.author: Clay Aiken

quotes.text: I basically became a cheerleader because I had a very strict mom. That was my way of being a bad girl.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.text: There are only two things a child will share willingly communicable diseases and its mother's age.
quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

quotes.text: Motherhood is the strangest thing, it can be like being one's own Trojan horse.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.text: Mommy smoked but she didn't want us to. She saw smoke coming out of the barn one time, so we got whipped.
quotes.author: Loretta Lynn

quotes.text: I loved raising my kids. I loved the process, the dirt of it, the tears of it, the frustration of it, Christmas, Easter, birthdays, growth charts, pediatrician appointments. I loved all of it.
quotes.author: Jane Elliot

quotes.text: I think while all mothers deal with feelings of guilt, working mothers are plagued by guilt on steroids!
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.text: What is free time? I'm a single mother. My free moments are filled with loving my little girl.
quotes.author: Roma Downey

quotes.text: I am truly my mother's son.
quotes.author: David Geffen

quotes.text: My sisters and mom raised me to respect women and open doors for them.
quotes.author: Milo Ventimiglia

quotes.text: My mother gets all mad at me if I stay in a hotel. I'm 31-years-old, and I don't want to sleep on a sleeping bag down in the basement. It's humiliating.
quotes.author: Ben Affleck

quotes.text: I wanted to escape so badly. But of course I knew I couldn't just give up and leave school. It was only when I heard my mom's voice that I came out of my hiding place.
quotes.author: Zhang Ziyi

quotes.text: Mother is far too clever to understand anything she does not like.
quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

quotes.text: Everyone checks out my mom. My mom's hot.
quotes.author: Ashley Scott

quotes.text: I want to be a cool mom.
quotes.author: Tori Spelling

quotes.text: Why do grandparents and grandchildren get along so well? The mother.
quotes.author: Claudette Colbert

quotes.text: I want to be more successful as a mother than I am in show business.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.text: My mother worked in factories, worked as a domestic, worked in a restaurant, always had a second job.
quotes.author: Ed Bradley

quotes.text: I guess I was a mom so late in life, my daughter was the greatest thing since sliced bread.
quotes.author: Candice Bergen

quotes.text: Always it gave me a pang that my children had no lawful claim to a name.
quotes.author: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quotes.text: I think my mother is my biggest influence. There are so many things I hate about her but at the same time I'm thankful for her. All I know is that when I'm a parent I want to be just like my mom. I can talk to my mom more than any of my friends could talk to their parents.
quotes.author: Nikki Reed

quotes.text: I'm so happy and thankful I made it a point be a stay-at-home mom.
quotes.author: Candace Cameron Bure

quotes.text: I'd lose my mind if I heard my kid call the nanny Mommy.
quotes.author: Toni Braxton

quotes.text: My mother told me on several different occasions that she was livin' her dream vicariously through me. She once said that I was getting' to do all the things that she would have wanted to have done.
quotes.author: Buck Owens

quotes.text: My parents, especially my mother, were no influence on me whatsoever.
quotes.author: Andy Partridge

quotes.text: Motherhood is at its best when the tender chords of sympathy have been touched.
quotes.author: Paul Harris

quotes.text: Morality and its victim, the mother - what a terrible picture! Is there indeed anything more terrible, more criminal, than our glorified sacred function of motherhood?
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.text: The man in our society is the breadwinner the woman has enough to do as the homemaker, wife and mother.
quotes.author: Dorothy Fields

quotes.text: I stand fearlessly for small dogs, the American Flag, motherhood and the Bible. That's why people love me.
quotes.author: Art Linkletter

quotes.text: My mother thinks I could have even run a larger company.
quotes.author: Christie Hefner

quotes.text: My mom taught us the Serenity Prayer at a young age.
quotes.author: Toby Keith

quotes.text: What motivated me? My mother. My mother was an immigrant woman, a peasant woman, struggled all her life, worked in the garment center.
quotes.author: Al Lewis

quotes.text: The woman is uniformly sacrificed to the wife and mother.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.text: I'm sure that my mom would have been happy with any path I chose.
quotes.author: Joely Fisher

quotes.text: I auditioned on my own. I tried to make a mark for myself without anybody's help, not even Mom's.
quotes.author: Kate Hudson

quotes.text: Giving birth was easier than having a tattoo.
quotes.author: Nicole Appleton

quotes.text: If my mom reads that I'm grammatically incorrect I'll have hell to pay.
quotes.author: Larisa Oleynik

quotes.text: If you ever become a mother, can I have one of the puppies?
quotes.author: Charles Pierce

quotes.text: I'd go to, like, six different schools in one year. We were on welfare, and my mom never ever worked.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.text: We need somebody who's got the heart, the empathy, to recognize what it's like to be a young teenage mom, the empathy to understand what it's like to be poor or African-American or gay or disabled or old - and that's the criterion by which I'll be selecting my judges.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Dad needs to show an incredible amount of respect and humor and friendship toward his mate so the kids understand their parents are sexy, they're fun, they do things together, they're best friends. Kids learn by example. If I respect Mom, they're going to respect Mom.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.text: Mom and Dad were married 64 years. And if you wondered what their secret was, you could have asked the local florist - because every day Dad gave Mom a rose, which he put on her bedside table. That's how she found out what happened on the day my father died - she went looking for him because that morning, there was no rose.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: My mom and dad gave their kids the greatest gift of all - the gift of unconditional love. They cared deeply about who we would be, and much less about what we would do.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: A guy is a lump like a doughnut. So, first you gotta get rid of all the stuff his mom did to him. And then you gotta get rid of all that macho crap that they pick up from beer commercials. And then there's my personal favorite, the male ego.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.text: When my mom ran for the Senate, my dad was there for her every step of the way. I can still hear her saying in her beautiful voice, 'Why should women have any less say than men, about the great decisions facing our nation?'
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: Being a Hot Mom means being respected as a mom and a woman. And, the key to being a Hot Mom is having a sense of humor about yourself and all the crazy situations that arise.
quotes.author: Jami Gertz

quotes.text: I believe this with all my heart: The greatest coach of all time in my eyes is my mom. She's instilled in me a toughness and a perseverance and just a never-quit mentality, and I thank her every day for providing me, for what she sacrificed her life for.
quotes.author: Scott Brooks

quotes.text: My mom was such a strong character. I don't want to say she was like a man, but she was tough.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.text: My mom and I have always been really close. She's always been the friend that was always there. There were times when, in middle school and junior high, I didn't have a lot of friends. But my mom was always my friend. Always.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: For everything I do, I think about a 6-year-old girl and her mom that I saw at my concert last night. I think about what those two individuals would think if I were at a club last night. I never want to be arrested, and I never want to get a DUI, those are my moral values.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: It was my 16th birthday - my mom and dad gave me my Goya classical guitar that day. I sat down, wrote this song, and I just knew that that was the only thing I could ever really do - write songs and sing them to people.
quotes.author: Stevie Nicks

quotes.text: As a mom, I know it is my responsibility, and no one else's, to raise my kids. But we have to ask ourselves, what does it mean when so many parents are finding their best efforts undermined by an avalanche of advertisements aimed at our kids.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: One of the greatest titles in the world is parent, and one of the biggest blessings in the world is to have parents to call mom and dad.
quotes.author: Jim DeMint

quotes.text: I love those hockey moms. You know what they say the difference between a hockey mom and a pit bull is? Lipstick.
quotes.author: Sarah Palin

quotes.text: For me, already being part of a single parent household and knowing it was just me and my mom, you'd would wake up times and hope that the next day you'd be able to be alongside your mother because she was out trying to make sure that I was taken care of. But all I cared about was her being home.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: Don't let people disrespect you. My mom says don't open the door to the devil. Surround yourself with positive people.
quotes.author: Cuba Gooding, Jr.

quotes.text: Having a child makes you realize the importance of life - narcissism goes out the window. Heaven on earth is looking at my little boy. The minute he was born, I knew if I never did anything other than being a mom, I'd be fine.
quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.text: My mom and I had the same vision, and we want the same things. We would always make a goal list every year.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.text: I don't want to be perfect, but I do want to be a role model. My mom always tells me that imperfections equal beauty. All of us are imperfect.
quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

quotes.text: When you are getting ready to become a mom, being in love with someone just isn't enough. You need to think about whether he would be a good parent and raise your children with similar beliefs.
quotes.author: Cindy Crawford

quotes.text: My sisters and my mom, those people help me get through every single day.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.text: I told my mom, 'I'm not buying another magazine until I can get past this thought of looking like the girl on the cover'. She said, "Miley, you are the girl on the cover,' and I was, like, 'I know, but I don't feel like that girl every day.' You can't always feel perfect.
quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

quotes.text: When love is gone, there's always justice. And when justice is gone, there's always force. And when force is gone, there's always Mom. Hi, Mom!
quotes.author: Laurie Anderson

quotes.text: I love my mom. My mom loves me. We don't have an easy relationship. I don't think we ever will, but I'd rather have a complicated, misunderstood relationship than have no relationship at all.
quotes.author: Tori Spelling

quotes.text: My mom never taught me to be waiting for some prince on a white horse to swipe me off my feet.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.text: I always wanted what Mom and Dad had.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.text: My dad is still Christian Scientist. My mom's not, and I'm not. But I believe in God, and that there's a higher power and an intelligence that's bigger than us and that we can rely on. It's not just us, thinking we are the ones in control of everything. That idea gives me support.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.text: My mom took me to see Carnal Knowledge and The Wild Bunch and all these kind of movies when I was a kid.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.text: People think I have courage. The courage in my family are my wife Pam, my three daughters, here, Nicole, Jamie, LeeAnn, my mom, who's right here too.
quotes.author: Jim Valvano

quotes.text: When I was 5, some financial things happened, and I moved seven times in a year. We moved from apartment to apartment, sometimes living with friends. My mom would always say, 'Don't get comfortable, because we may not be here long.'
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: I can only hope to be 10 percent of the mom mine was to me. She encouraged me to be confident and enjoy life. That's what I want for my son.
quotes.author: Charlize Theron

quotes.text: You know, I don't think any mother aims to be a single mom. I didn't wish for that, but it happened.
quotes.author: Charlize Theron

quotes.text: My mom decorated with lots of antiques. I never liked it when I was a little girl - I wanted to live in a modern house. But now I love it.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.text: Looking back, I think I was always musical. My dad was very musical, and I think my mom was musical.
quotes.author: Paul McCartney

quotes.text: It wasn't so long ago that I was a working mom myself. And I know that sometimes, much as we all hate to admit it, it's just easier to park the kids in front of the TV for a few hours, so we can pay the bills or do the laundry or just have some peace and quiet for a change.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: The person who has inspired me my whole life is my Mom, because she taught me commitment. She sacrificed.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.text: My mom is always telling me it takes a long time to get to the top, but a short time to get to the bottom.
quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

quotes.text: My mom and I are very close.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: My mom is the backbone not just of my family but of many families.
quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

quotes.text: I could get away with not taking care of myself as a bachelorette but as a mom I can't.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.text: Mom was 50 when my Dad died. She got on a bus every weekday for years, and rode 40 miles each morning to Madison. She earned a new degree and learned new skills to start her small business. It wasn't just a new livelihood. It was a new life.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.text: And to this day, my Mom is my role model.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.text: A Romney-Ryan administration will protect and strengthen Medicare, for my Mom's generation, for my generation, and for my kids and yours.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.text: What makes me happy is just curling up in with my mom in her bed and watching a marathon of 'CSI' and 'Grey's Anatomy' episodes with pints of ice cream.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: I started cooking when I was about 10. I have memories like when I was 6 or 7 with my mom, and when I was 12 I started getting real serious about cooking.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.text: Studies show that children best flourish when one mom and one dad are there to raise them.
quotes.author: John Boehner

quotes.text: I know I'm talented, but I wasn't put here to sing. I was put here to be a wife and a mom and look after my family. I love what I do, but it's not where it begins and ends.
quotes.author: Amy Winehouse

quotes.text: My mom was tough.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.text: When I was really young, my mom enrolled me in dance classes.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.text: I think my love of journalizing my life comes from my mom.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.text: My mom wasn't a movie star.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.text: I became a mom at 37 and having a child has been an emancipation for me.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.text: My inspiration was my mom. She's a great cook, and she still cooks, and we still banter back and forth about cooking. Growing up in a mostly Portuguese community, food was important and the family table was extremely important. At a very young age I understood that.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.text: My parents were working class folks. My dad was a bartender for most of his life, my mom was a maid and a cashier and a stock clerk at WalMart. We were not people of financial means in terms of significant financial means. I always told them, 'I didn't always have what I wanted. I always had what I needed.' My parents always provided that.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.text: My dad was a bartender. My mom was a cashier, a maid and a stock clerk at K-Mart. They never made it big. They were never rich. And yet they were successful. Because just a few decades removed from hopelessness, they made possible for us all the things that had been impossible for them.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.text: My mom and I have always been very close. She is my best friend. She had to make a lot of sacrifices early on in my life to make sure I got to do what I wanted to do.
quotes.author: Norah Jones

quotes.text: My mom brought me up to believe that my talent is a gift and a blessing.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.text: Thankfully, I have my mom and a small group of close friends who are there for me 24/7 and whom I can trust and depend on.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.text: I remember watching the Grammys and looking at the performances and crying to my mom, saying how much I wanted to be there.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.text: I always wanted to be a mom.
quotes.author: Heidi Klum

quotes.text: When I was younger, I had a perm, and it was really big. My mom was a hairdresser, so even my dad had a perm! I looked like a poodle, but it was cool at the time.
quotes.author: Heidi Klum

quotes.text: I'm a lioness. I have four cubs. I'm a mom. I want to take care of my kids and protect them.
quotes.author: Heidi Klum

quotes.text: My mom is at my house every day, and she nags me about everything, especially hygiene.
quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

quotes.text: I remember driving to North Carolina when I was a little girl in a snowstorm to get down to my mom's family in the Carolinas. There were chains on the car - it was the late sixties - and we were just singing in the car. Christmas carols.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.text: When I was little, my mom tells me, I used to say things like, 'Mom do you hear the string section? Do you hear the string section?' And she would look at me and say, 'No honey, I don't know what you're talking about.'
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.text: Being the only man in the household with my mom definitely helped me grow up fast.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: If I could get any animal it would be a dolphin. I want one so bad. Me and my mom went swimming with dolphins and I was like, 'How do we get one of those?' and she was like, 'You can't get a dolphin. What are you gonna do, like, put it in your pool?'
quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

quotes.text: I'm not a religious person. My mom was of Jewish blood and my dad was Protestant.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.text: My dad believes in God, I think. I'm not sure if my mom does. I don't.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.text: Fortunately, when you're a mom, the responsibility of caring for your child can keep you going.
quotes.author: Shania Twain

quotes.text: My mom has made it possible for me to be who I am. Our family is everything. Her greatest skill was encouraging me to find my own person and own independence.
quotes.author: Charlize Theron

quotes.text: I forgive my mom for being a psycho and my dad for being a loser.
quotes.author: Nikki Sixx

quotes.text: It is a sad commentary of our times when our young must seek advice and counsel from 'Dear Abby' instead of going to Mom and Dad.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.text: I hear my friends and my mom tell me I'm special, but honestly, I still don't get it.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: My mom and I have always been there for each other. We had some tough times, but she was always there for me.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: I don't want to have kids for like 10 years. I still have a lot to do. I don't even know if I could handle a dog right now. I'm so not ready. Someday I'll be a mom but not until I'm in my 30s.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.text: As a mom I know that raising children is the hardest job there is.
quotes.author: Hilary Rosen

quotes.text: I consider my mom and all my sisters my friends.
quotes.author: Alexa Vega

quotes.text: The best situation is being a single parent. The best part about is that you get time off, too, because the kids are with their mom, so it's the best of both worlds. There's a lot to be said for it.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.text: My mom, Irmelin, taught me the value of life. Her own life was saved by my grandmother during World War II.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.text: I'm going to let people know that it's cool to have a child and be young and still be a good mom. It's really tough, but I'm doing it.
quotes.author: Brandy Norwood

quotes.text: My mom, God rest her soul - she liked nicknames. In the womb she named me Skip. There was another black guy in Piedmont, W.Va., and his name was Skip. They called him Big Skip, and I was Little Skip.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Gates

quotes.text: I feel like a good mom. I'm a strong woman now... Don't look down on me. Pray for me because I'm trying.
quotes.author: Fantasia Barrino

quotes.text: And the greatest lesson that mom ever taught me though was this one. She told me there would be times in your life when you have to choose between being loved and being respected. Now she said to always pick being respected.
quotes.author: Chris Christie

quotes.text: Being a mom has made me so tired. And so happy.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.text: My father wasn't really involved and my mom is the light in my life.
quotes.author: Marion Jones

quotes.text: The real estate agent had to go door-to-door in the apartment building we wanted to rent, asking if it was OK for this interracial family - my mom is white and I was a 1-year-old half-African kid - to live in the apartment building.
quotes.author: Tom Morello

quotes.text: My dad never blew anything up, but he probably had friends who did. He and my mom have always preached that the pen is mightier than a Molotov cocktail.
quotes.author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quotes.text: I grabbed my mom and I went to the couch and I said, 'Mom I want to ask Jesus to come into my heart.' And I got on my knee and I asked Jesus to come into my heart, forgive me of my sins, and make me a child of God.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.text: My mom used to make everything. She had a great garden and composted and made everything from scratch - peanut butter, bread, jelly, everything. I don't know how she did it because all those things take time and love and labour. I only do half the stuff she does - but there's still time.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.text: I'm a mom, so I have to be comfortable. Jeans are a staple - I have way too many in my closet! It's warm in Florida, so I wear jeans and a tank top every day. I love my True Religions, my Rich and Skinny, and Citizens of Humanity. But I also love getting dressed up!
quotes.author: Candace Cameron Bure

quotes.text: Mom spent the time that she was supposed to be a kid actully raising children, her younger brother and younger sister. She was tough as nails and did not suffer fools at all. And the truth was she could not afford to. She spoke the truth, bluntly, directly, and without much varnish. I am her son.
quotes.author: Chris Christie

quotes.text: I didn't understand that I could sing until I was like 11 or 12. My mom heard me singing around the house and she said, What are you doing? You really can sing! So then I started going to school and singing to the girls.
quotes.author: Chris Brown

quotes.text: My mom being a psychotherapist, I've been brought up with that whole psychoanalytical terrain.
quotes.author: Helena Bonham Carter

quotes.text: I think the real heroic teachers are the ones who work with kids, like my mom and my sister do.
quotes.author: David Duchovny

quotes.text: I probably have an earlier curfew than anyone. My mom wants to keep me really safe and my dad's not overly protective, but he's a dad no matter what.
quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

quotes.text: People always accuse me of being motivational in a way, like it was a bad thing, but that's just how I was raised. My mom raised me in a positive environment, with lots of love in my heart, and that reflects in my music.
quotes.author: Lenny Kravitz

quotes.text: My mom used to say that I became a fighter and a scrapper and a tough guy to protect who I am at my core.
quotes.author: Vin Diesel

quotes.text: My mom knows when something is real and something is not.
quotes.author: Christina Ricci

quotes.text: I've never had a very closely connected family. My parents split up when I was young and I was living with my mom for a little while, then I was kind of just on my own really young. It wasn't some kind of global tragedy, it was just never really a very close-knit family. So there was support in the sense that they didn't stand in my way.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.text: I just go about my life. I'm a mom, I drive an SUV, I go to the grocery store every day. I'm definitely not a celebrity. I always say that I'm a celebrity-adjacent.
quotes.author: Diablo Cody

quotes.text: Fact: The new '90210' is cooler than the old '90210.' It's the lithe, streamlined Skipper to the elder series' venerable Barbie. Gone are the traditional parents - they've been replaced by a hipster mom n' pop who get busted necking in the car.
quotes.author: Diablo Cody

quotes.text: I make a lot of mistakes, too, and I'm constantly re-evaluating how I'm doing things and trying to be better every day, whether it's as a mom or taking care of myself.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.text: Most children - I know I did when I was a kid - fantasize another set of parents. Or fantasize no parents. They don't tell their real parents about that - you don't want to tell Mom and Dad. Kids lead a very private life. And I was a typical child, I think. I was a liar.
quotes.author: Maurice Sendak

quotes.text: Most children - I know I did when I was a kid - fantasize another set of parents. Or fantasize no parents. They don't tell their real parents about that - you don't want to tell Mom and Dad.
quotes.author: Maurice Sendak

quotes.text: My mom and I were super tight. I think she really wanted me to be an artist, you know? She used to like to tell people she wanted to be Beethoven's mother. That was her thing. She wanted to be the mother of this person.
quotes.author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quotes.text: My dad and mom believed that you do what you have to do in private and don't make a big deal out of it. Just try to help people as much as you can.
quotes.author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quotes.text: My relationship with my mom is really the single most profound relationship that I've ever had in my life.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.text: My parents are wonderful, and I'm really lucky - but my mom has always been almost exclusively a right-brained person. She goes completely on her feelings of things, on her intuition, and so she instilled that in my brothers and I.
quotes.author: Brandon Boyd

quotes.text: My dad is a Deadhead, my mom's a Jewish-American princess from Jersey.
quotes.author: Adam Lambert

quotes.text: Never play cards with a man called Doc. Never eat at a place called Mom's. Never sleep with a woman whose troubles are worse than your own.
quotes.author: Nelson Algren

quotes.text: My Mom said she learned how to swim when someone took her out in the lake and threw her off the boat. I said, 'Mom, they weren't trying to teach you how to swim.'
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.text: My mom was a waitress, and my dad was a plumber who worked for the City of San Clemente fixing mains breaks, so not too glamorous.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.text: I like to work. The self-esteem and satisfaction that I get from working makes me a better person, which makes me a better mom. I feel lucky because I have the luxury of working only one or two days a week.
quotes.author: Cindy Crawford

quotes.text: I don't drink, and I don't smoke. It's a personal preference. My mom has never drunk or smoked. I look up to my mom.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.text: I pretty much borrow my entire beauty regime from my mom.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.text: I know my mom said as early as she can remember letting me watch TV, my one treat a week when I was like 6 was to stay up and watch 'Saturday Night Live.'
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.text: I want to be as healthy as I can because I'm a mom now.
quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

quotes.text: I have so much respect for my mom and all the women across the world.
quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

quotes.text: I guess now that I think back, I used to play priest and be a funny priest. I don't know, I grew up in such a Catholic family that I kind of liked to test the boundaries a little bit and I think I had fun watching my mom laugh.
quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.text: When I was a little girl, rocking my little dolls, I remember thinking I would be the world's best mom, and so far I've done it.
quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.text: When I was in nursery school, the teachers asked me, y'know, 'What does your dad do for a living?' So I said 'He helps women get pregnant!' They called my mom and they were like, 'What exactly does your husband do?'
quotes.author: Natalie Portman

quotes.text: Like a lot of you, I grew up in a family on the ragged edges of the middle class. My daddy sold carpeting and ended up as a maintenance man. After he had a heart attack, my mom worked the phones at Sears so we could hang on to our house.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.text: I could do without 'cool' publications calling me 'mom jazz.' But I laughed all the way to the bank, baby.
quotes.author: Norah Jones
