quotes.text: My mom just didn't put a very high premium on me being like really famous or really wealthy or anything.
quotes.author: Martha Plimpton

quotes.text: It's not common for a woman on television, especially if she's the mom of the family, to be funny. She's usually a straight man or foil.
quotes.author: Martha Plimpton

quotes.text: My mom and I used to listen to records, read, and take train rides across the country in the summer. It was a very chill life. She didn't expose me to anything that was ahead of my development, but she expected me to adjust to her world - she did not expect to adjust to mine.
quotes.author: Martha Plimpton

quotes.text: Isn't it so weird the day you wake up and you're just going with the flow? And you just suddenly are a mom.
quotes.author: Katherine Heigl

quotes.text: I'm a sappy mom now. I didn't think I would be. I thought I'd be a cool mom who keeps everything in perspective.
quotes.author: Katherine Heigl

quotes.text: I was always a drama queen. I remember playing in the kitchen, trying to get my mom to think I was dead and call the police. When she didn't, I would cry. I was always theatrical. I don't think any of my relatives are surprised.
quotes.author: Amy Lee

quotes.text: My mom knows pretty well how I see her.
quotes.author: Lena Dunham

quotes.text: I'm ridiculous in my oversharing my mom and sister are very open but a little more judicious than me... and my father is a decidedly private person.
quotes.author: Lena Dunham

quotes.text: God blessed me with two unbelievable parents, and I am just like both of them. I have the smile and charisma of my mother and the big heart of my mom, because she wants to save the world and help the world, so I am just like her.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.text: My mom was always saying: 'Be whatever you want to be, but stick with it. Don't waver. Don't change who you are for anybody.'
quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

quotes.text: My mom always says I cut my teeth on the church pew.
quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

quotes.text: My mom said the only reason men are alive is for lawn care and vehicle maintenance.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.text: Well, my mom is single and we've both been single at the same time over the last ten years, so I really related to the bond between my character and Diane's.
quotes.author: Amanda Peet

quotes.text: I always knew I wanted kids, but when my mom passed away I was like, 'I want a bunch of kids. I want three kids or four kids, and I want to have that relationship again.' I can't bring my mom back, but I can have children.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.text: Not to be weird, but I still have an ongoing relationship with my mom, even though she passed away, and I've been surprised at how much I've been able to convey to her. Now I sound like a total weirdo, but that's true.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.text: My mom loved rock 'n roll. My father hated it. We couldn't play it when he was around.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.text: I made some truly awful movies. 'Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot' was the worst. If you ever want someone to confess to murder just make him or her sit through that film. They will confess to anything after 15 minutes.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.text: I used to say, 'Man, I think I'd be a really good dad. I'll be a great provider. I'm funny I'll go on trips with them - I'll do all sorts of stuff.' But the momming? I'm not made for that. I have a really good mom I know what she put into it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.text: Washington has got to, across the board, lower taxes for small businesses so that our mom and pops can reinvest and hire people, so that our businesses can thrive.
quotes.author: Sarah Palin

quotes.text: I'm really happy to be a mom, and I'm proud of the phase I'm in.
quotes.author: Liz Phair

quotes.text: Mom ran the house, so we grew up Portuguese.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.text: My food is Louisiana, New Orleans-based, well-seasoned, rustic. I think it's pretty unique because of my background being influenced by my mom, Portuguese and French Canadian. There's a lot going on there.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.text: My family, you know, are all still, you know, very close. We're all still very close. Mom and Daddy are still alive. So, what more can you ask for? Your kids are healthy.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.text: I know how to do anything, I'm a mom.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.text: Being a singer is all about me. About ego. Being a mom is all about being selfless - two different worlds.
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

quotes.text: My mom used to say that Greek Easter was later because then you get stuff cheaper.
quotes.author: Amy Sedaris

quotes.text: As far as I'm concerned, there's no job more important on the planet than being a mom.
quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg

quotes.text: I didn't come from a trailer park. I grew up middle class and my dad had money and my mom made my lunch. I got a car when I was sixteen. I'm proud of that.
quotes.author: Kid Rock

quotes.text: I did find some time to go to a record store and check out 'Headstrong' actually in the racks. It was pretty cool I never thought I'd see my own CD sitting there with everyone else's. I made my Mom take lots of pics!
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.text: Once in high school, I completely over plucked my left eyebrow all the way up to where you're not supposed to. I had no idea what I was doing and it looked terrible! My mom was like 'What did you do to yourself?' I was so embarrassed.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.text: The 'believe' tattoo is because my mom always told me to believe.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.text: My mom is very confident and she was always a role model of mine.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.text: My mom put me and my sisters in the water to feel comfortable, to have water safety.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.text: Even in high school, I'd tell my mom I was sick of swimming and wanted to try to play golf. She wasn't too happy. She'd say, 'Think about this.' And I'd always end up getting back in the pool.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.text: My humanitarian work evolved from being with my family. My mom, my dad, they really set a great example for giving back. My mom was a nurse, my dad was a school teacher. But my mom did a lot of things for geriatrics and elderly people. She would do home visits for free.
quotes.author: Cat Cora

quotes.text: Growing up, my ideals were Barbra Streisand, Cher, and my mom.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.text: My mom insisted on multigrain bread and never allowed soda in the house.
quotes.author: Vin Diesel

quotes.text: I was always at peace because of the way my mom treated me.
quotes.author: Martina Hingis

quotes.text: Come Christmas Eve, we usually go to my mom and dad's. Everybody brings one gift and then we play that game when we all steal it from each other. Some are really cool, others are useful and some are a bit out there.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.text: Depending on what day of the week it is and what time of the month it is, I'm a good friend or not a good friend. I'm more or less a good mom or not a good mom, more or less a good mate or not a good mate. That's just life, whether or not you're public.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.text: My mom's discipline worked out perfectly. I wouldn't change a thing.
quotes.author: will.i.am

quotes.text: My mom's never been married. I've never even seen my mom kiss a dude.
quotes.author: will.i.am

quotes.text: If you would ask my mom what books I liked growing up, I liked Dr. Seuss.
quotes.author: will.i.am

quotes.text: I was born and raised in East Los Angeles by a single mom who had three biological kids and adopted four more. I never met my dad.
quotes.author: will.i.am

quotes.text: When I got into junior high school, that's when my mom let me dress how I wanted to dress. Up to that point I wore suits to school all the time.
quotes.author: will.i.am

quotes.text: I remember when I was 11, I told my mom, 'One day I'm going to buy you a house.' And she said, 'Boy, don't you be making promises you can't keep.' I was like: 'No, Ma, it's not a promise. I'm going to buy you a house one day.'
quotes.author: will.i.am

quotes.text: These days it's cool to be ethnic and to be different, but when I was a kid, it was not cool - at all. My friends would come over and my mom would make crepes with eggs, stuffed with mozzarella cheese, tomatoes and spinach. And they'd be like, 'What is this?'
quotes.author: Giada De Laurentiis

quotes.text: Every time I think I have something under control, it changes and I don't have it under control. I think it takes several years to get there. Jade is 19 months old, so right now I'm on alert all the time. And as a mom I think you're constantly worrying about things.
quotes.author: Giada De Laurentiis

quotes.text: Mom and Pop were just a couple of kids when they got married. He was eighteen, she was sixteen and I was three.
quotes.author: Billie Holiday

quotes.text: I must admit, even though I'm the product of two Jewish parents, I think the Irish temper got in there somewhere, so I'm going to check Mom's genealogy.
quotes.author: Harvey Weinstein

quotes.text: I didn't know my Dad - he moved out early. And my mom's politics were kind of hardscrabble. She didn't think about Democrats or Republicans. She thought about who made sense. I've been both in my life.
quotes.author: Dennis Miller

quotes.text: With my new venture, Club Mom, we want to empower moms to feel their value and also build their collective power to make their lives better and easier. We want to bring them together as a community to share experiences and information.
quotes.author: Andrew Shue

quotes.text: Because sorry to say, women run the house. They run the family. They hold things up. I mean, it's like you don't ever see your mom get sick because she handles everything. And it's kind of amazing I think to show people just how strong women are.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.text: I'm lucky that my real-life Mom has both a great sense of humor about herself and an amazing ability to slip into complete denial if the subject matter gets a little too close to home.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.text: I'm more straightforward, and I speak up more than I did before. When I was younger, I wouldn't speak up as much, but now that I'm a mom, things have changed.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.text: My mom is going to kill me for talking about sleeping with people. But I don't want to put myself in the position where I'm in a monogamous relationship right now. I'm not dating just one person. 'Sex and the City' changed everything for me because those girls would sleep with so many people.
quotes.author: Lindsay Lohan

quotes.text: President Obama's fight for rural America is personal. He was raised by a single mom and grandparents from Kansas. He hails from a farming state, Illinois.
quotes.author: Tom Vilsack

quotes.text: I don't have anything against my mom, but my family has no emotional connection to each other.
quotes.author: Adam Carolla

quotes.text: My mom was on welfare and the occasional food stamp, but I have never participated in any of those governmental programs, even the ones that kind of work like education, scholarships and whatever, and I managed to do just fine.
quotes.author: Adam Carolla

quotes.text: I love being a single mom. But it's definitely different when you're dating.
quotes.author: Brooke Burns

quotes.text: Yes, I always remember my dad's, mom's and my grandma's perfumes.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.text: Financial hardships were rough on us, even though Mom had a good job at G.M.
quotes.author: Ryan White

quotes.text: It was always a fantasy of mine growing up - my favorite program was always 'Little House on the Prairie' - so I always wanted to wear those looks. When I was a child, I wouldn't let my mom put me in anything but calico dresses and now... whaddaya know, every day I'm in a calico dress, basically, so it's kind of funny.
quotes.author: Chloe Sevigny

quotes.text: You do need parental guidance and I was in a great position with both my mum and dad. They split when I was a baby but even though I stayed with my mom they were both very much involved in my upbringing.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.text: My mom always says, 'If you don't believe in something, you'll lose yourself completely.'
quotes.author: Hilary Duff

quotes.text: I was thinking that when I have children, that I should always dress as a character for them, so they think their mom is Alice in Wonderland or Cinderella.
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

quotes.text: It's superfun being a mom, but it's hard too.
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

quotes.text: Being a mom is hard, I think a lot of working moms feel that way.
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

quotes.text: My mom always said I was the peacemaker in the family. My older brother, Eric, was the leader, the creative one. I was just his puppet.
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

quotes.text: I was thinking that when I have children, that I should always dress as a character for them, so they think their mom is Alice in Wonderland or Cinderella. It would be totally messed up!
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

quotes.text: My mom and dad met at Anaheim High School. After they got married, all they wanted to do was have four children, and they did.
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

quotes.text: I wish I had an extra day with my mom sometimes. Or another hour in the day with my family, husband and children.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.text: The golden child may be the oldest one, unless it's the youngest. It may be the toughest one, unless it's the most sensitive. It's not even necessary that Mom and Dad have the same favorite - and typically they don't.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.text: In Hollywood, you play a mom, and the next thing you know, you're on 'The Golden Girls.' They age you so fast.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Union

quotes.text: In Hollywood, you play a mom and instantly, you've got osteoporosis.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Union

quotes.text: My mom is painfully sweet she's from Nebraska.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Union

quotes.text: My mom was a diabetic. Her sister was a diabetic, so I was already a candidate.
quotes.author: Angie Stone

quotes.text: When my dad divorced my mom it was kind of like him leaving me also.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.text: After my mom died, there was so much written about her fashion and her style and all that, and I felt that one of the most important parts of her was missing, her real intellectual curiosity.
quotes.author: Caroline Kennedy

quotes.text: No matter how good you are, at some point your kids are gonna have to create their own independence and think that Mom and Dad aren't cool, just to establish themselves. That's what adolescence is about. They're gonna go through that no matter what.
quotes.author: Eddie Vedder

quotes.text: I was always okay with the fact that I was taller and bigger than everybody else growing up. My mom, my dad, and my friends always told me I was beautiful.
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: When I turned 18, my mom, my nana and I all went and had tattoos of our favorite Bible verses put on the inside of our wrists. Mine is 1st Timothy, 4:12.
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.text: When I was 7, I came up with the idea of 'charm socks.' My mom would take me to buy bags of plastic charms, we would sew them on frilly white socks, and I sold them at school.
quotes.author: Sara Blakely

quotes.text: My Mom always cooked healthy. Greek food lends itself to cooking healthy.
quotes.author: Cat Cora

quotes.text: From the moment this baby came into our home, those two dogs have never been more in love. It's the most beautiful thing I've ever witnessed. People keep saying, 'Oh, you're a single mom.' I'm like, 'Actually, I'm not. I've got two boys helping.'
quotes.author: Charlize Theron

quotes.text: So far I'm not surprised by anything about being a mom. It's all pretty great - but that's what I expected.
quotes.author: Charlize Theron

quotes.text: I was worried about my mom more than I was worried about the president. And then I was worried about the president, and then I was worried about myself.
quotes.author: Monica Lewinsky

quotes.text: Aretha Franklin was a teenage mom, a musician who came from an incredibly Christian background, but there was a lot of love, which is really inspiring in a feminist way.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.text: When I moved out of my mom's house at 18 I was almost as sad to leave her sewing machine behind as anything else.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.text: I was given baby doll toys myself, and they proved a stark reminder that my life was expected to revolve around childbearing - just as my mom's had before me, and her mom's had before her.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.text: We all seek approval, and our mother's seal is usually the most important. The nitty gritty is that we have to accept ourselves, even if it is just to be ready for the next cut-down. Mom's blessing or not.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.text: I was brought up by a single mom in a poor town in Arkansas and while some aspects of small-town life were really positive - like the fact that everyone there is really sweet and hospitable - there is also this close-minded mentality, and that naturally made me want to rebel.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.text: My mother told me Homer Ditto was not my father. Nope. Mom had had a fling with some other guy who was my dad. Some dude who didn't stick around too long who Mom was happy to get rid of. She chose Homer, and Homer chose me, so he lent me his name even though I didn't have his blood.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.text: If my Dad doesn't like you, you will know. My Mom is just too innocent to ever lie. She doesn't even cuss.
quotes.author: Channing Tatum

quotes.text: I have a chaperone everywhere I go - my mom.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.text: Something my mom taught me when I was little is that everything happens for a reason.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.text: There is nothing I love more than my role as a mom.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hudson

quotes.text: I look up to my mom. She's a beautiful woman.
quotes.author: Leighton Meester

quotes.text: My mom, she wasn't like a baseball mother who knew everything about the game. She just wanted me to be happy with what I was doing.
quotes.author: David Ortiz

quotes.text: I feel like I've lived quite a sheltered life, like my mom and dad were quite protective of me.
quotes.author: Leona Lewis

quotes.text: I bought a house for my mom, I bought a house for my dad, I bought a house for my sister.
quotes.author: Trey Parker

quotes.text: There is nothing worse that a thirteen-year-old boy. You're embarrassed by your parents, and you're trying to find your independance because, deep inside, you are so dependent on your mom.
quotes.author: Ben Affleck

quotes.text: A friend of my mom's was a casting director so, really as kind of a lark, I had a couple of acting jobs that had just enough exposure to give me the option to continue if I wanted to. I followed through with it.
quotes.author: Ben Affleck

quotes.text: I'm a religious person. I remember my mom told me: 'Vengeance belongs to God. It's up to him to wreak vengeance.' It's hard for me to get to that point, but that's the work of God.
quotes.author: Rodney King

quotes.text: Sunscreen is my number 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 tip. I'm a fanatic, partially because I live in L.A. and have fair skin and freckles, and partially because of my kids. My mom always made me wear sunscreen and I'm trying to be that mom for them.
quotes.author: Alison Sweeney

quotes.text: I've actually suffered from allergies my entire life. My mom had allergies, so I was aware of what an issue they can be. Many people allow their allergies to affect their lives. As a mom with two kids and two jobs, I just can't let allergies slow me down. It's a day to day thing that can really be remedied by finding the right medication.
quotes.author: Alison Sweeney

quotes.text: My mom was paranoid about my safety.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.text: Mom was a smoker. My grandfather was a smoker. My aunts were smokers. My uncles were smokers. I don't know any smokers now, not even my mom.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.text: My mom drives me crazy sometimes, but I have a good relationship with her.
quotes.author: Seth Rogen

quotes.text: My mom enlisted in the U.S. Navy in World War II, and my parents actually bought our home thanks to the loan she got through the GI Bill.
quotes.author: Thomas Friedman

quotes.text: My dad is like a cactus - introverted and tough. I'm a people person, like my mom, but I got my competitiveness from my dad. He came to this country from Belarus with nothing and built a real business. He's my hero for giving me that need to run a business and for having enormous confidence in me.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: People who build family businesses are not classically trained. They have to deal with an enormous amount of politics. You think corporate politics are tough? Go work for your dad or your mom.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: It's about getting the kids up and fed, getting one to school, getting the other down for a nap, going to the grocery store, picking one up from school, getting the other one down for another nap, cooking dinner... I live my life at these two extremes. I'm either a full-time stay-at-home mom or a full-time actress.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.text: I remember, my mom didn't have any help, so if she needed to be somewhere after school, we'd just go down to the neighbors' and she'd give us a snack and make sure we did our homework. There weren't any latchkey kids.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.text: My mom has always said that the one thing she wishes she had done differently is have a job. She felt like the single-mindedness made her a little nuts sometimes, and she could have used an outlet for herself when we were little.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.text: My mom grew up in poverty in Oklahoma - like Dust Bowl, nine people in one room kind of place - and the way she got out of poverty was through education. My dad grew up without a dad, with very little and he also made his way out through education.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.text: My mom was really vigorous about making sure that we saw things and that we questioned things. Education was so important to both of my parents.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.text: I've always wanted to be a mom at 23, 24ish, ever since I was a little girl. I'm right on schedule.
quotes.author: Brandy Norwood

quotes.text: It's her first grandchild, so she's really, really, really excited. I guess my mom is a little more stressed out than me.
quotes.author: Brandy Norwood

quotes.text: Mom would kill me if I showed my navel.
quotes.author: Brandy Norwood

quotes.text: My hat was pulled down and this girl said 'Are you really him?' I whispered 'Yeah, I'm really him.' She screamed, 'Mom! Dad! It's Heath Ledger!
quotes.author: Josh Hartnett

quotes.text: In all honesty, at that time, I never saw myself as an author... I was just a Mom in a state of panic, trying to enter a short story contest to win the prize money in order to keep the lights on in my home.
quotes.author: Leslie Banks

quotes.text: When I was a kid I didn't feel like I fit in because - this is really silly and I probably shouldn't say it, but, I didn't think anything was funny. So I used to go home and literally cry to my mom and my step-dad at the time and I didn't think anything was funny. I couldn't laugh.
quotes.author: Courteney Cox

quotes.text: I really want to adopt a child... I want to be called 'Mom.' It really is the most beautiful word in the English language.
quotes.author: Patti Stanger

quotes.text: I wanted to be a 150% entrepreneur and a 150% mom, and I found that I was having a very hard time doing both. I was about 75% and 75% - still better than 100%, but not what I was accustomed to at work.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.text: Every single thing I learned about marketing and building my business, I learned from my mom, and she had never been in the workforce. She just had great practical sense.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.text: My guess is my brother would call his mom and his dad pretty regularly, a lot more than I probably did.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.text: When I was 15, I worked at a dry cleaner because I wanted Abercrombie & Fitch jeans. My mom told me I could have $20 jeans, not $70 jeans, unless I was willing to work for them. So I did!
quotes.author: Ashley Greene

quotes.text: Growing up my whole life, my mom was telling me how incredible and special I was and that I was going to change the world. I think it's important for girls to know that they can change the world, that they do have an impact.
quotes.author: Ashley Greene

quotes.text: I remember getting this scrapbook that this girl made, that I actually gave to my mom to hold onto because she has a 'Twilight' shrine in their house in Florida. It was just this scrapbook of me, starting with 'Twilight,' and the whole progression of me and my career throughout that, and other stuff that I had done in between.
quotes.author: Ashley Greene

quotes.text: My mom lived by herself with two kids. Sacrifice was the name of the game at our house.
quotes.author: Victor Cruz

quotes.text: My mom and dad just loved the fact that I fooled around. They just embraced it. They'd always kind of enjoy it, and they liked it when I made them laugh.
quotes.author: Dominic Monaghan

quotes.text: Imagine my surprise when, after a lifetime of teaching me to keep personal things to myself, Mom insisted my drawings were the start of a comic strip for millions of people to enjoy.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.text: Mothers send strips to daughters to make a point. Daughters smack strips down on the breakfast table to make a point. My own mom sometimes cuts a strip out and sends it to me to make sure I understand her.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.text: The relationship between Cathy and Mom in the strip is the one relationship drawn from real life that I have proudly never even tried to disguise.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.text: My mom, she is the most unbelievable mom that you could ever have in your entire life and she's always with me on everything. The most I've ever been away from her is two days. I love her more than anybody could ever know.
quotes.author: Dakota Fanning

quotes.text: I want to be a loving mom.
quotes.author: Tori Spelling

quotes.text: I want to be a mom who listens.
quotes.author: Tori Spelling

quotes.text: I am proud of my kids, but I also want to make my mom proud of me. I'm still a momma's girl at the heart of the situation.
quotes.author: Tori Spelling

quotes.text: Sometimes I do envision just being a stay at home mom but not working isn't an option for me currently.
quotes.author: Tori Spelling

quotes.text: There are days when I struggle with wanting to be a full-time, stay-at-home mom, and feeling guilty about that because I work.
quotes.author: Tori Spelling

quotes.text: I got my first tattoo when I was 16 years old and I went with my mom to get it done - she has a bunch too so we're tattoo buddies now.
quotes.author: Josh Hutcherson

quotes.text: I think because I became a mom later in life, everything in life means more.
quotes.author: Mariska Hargitay

quotes.text: My mom was sarcastic about men. She would tell me Adam was the rough draft and Eve was the final product. She was a feminist minister, an earth mom who wore a bra only on Sundays.
quotes.author: Daphne Zuniga

quotes.text: I'm a soccer mom. I'm T-ball, soccer, karate, homework, keeping them on their schedules. I love being the snack mom, when I get to bring the cut oranges. I have one of those coolers with wheels. I'm at every game, every practice, sitting on my blanket. I love it.
quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

quotes.text: Many of my books come from what if questions that I can't answer, things that I'm worried about as either a woman, a wife, a mom, an American.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.text: My dad sold encyclopedias and my mom worked in a factory office.
quotes.author: Mike Myers

quotes.text: My mom was a single mom, and she had enough on her plate. I knew when I was doing something I wasn't supposed to, and I tried to keep her from finding out about it. I did a pretty good job of that.
quotes.author: Jason Aldean

quotes.text: I'm a better mother if I'm also doing my work. Some women find a lot more satisfaction from doing the hardest job, which is being a mom. But I like my day job, so I juggle a lot.
quotes.author: Katey Sagal

quotes.text: My mom was a teacher - I have the greatest respect for the profession - we need great teachers - not poor or mediocre ones.
quotes.author: Condoleezza Rice

quotes.text: Being a mom makes me feel whole and like I understand the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Rebecca Romijn

quotes.text: There is nothing better than being a parent. It is the most challenging job one could ever ask for. I love being a mom and I love being a friend to my children as well.
quotes.author: Marlee Matlin

quotes.text: My friends and I would get up early and take our horses through the national forest. My mom was very free. It was always 'Out of the house!' There was no watching television on weekends.
quotes.author: Anna Torv

quotes.text: I grew up with just my mom. She and I were like best friends. She's a very independent woman and I admire that about her. In my life, I've tried to be like that. To be okay with being on my own and being independent.
quotes.author: Emma Roberts

quotes.text: You don't realize how hard it is to live on your own. But there's no mom to do your laundry, and make you dinner and to do things for you, and you don't think about little things like buying paper towels and salt.
quotes.author: Emma Roberts

quotes.text: I work too much to be an appropriate parent. I feel like a bad mom to my dog some days because I'm just not here enough. I just feel like I would do a bad job if I took the time to literally give birth to a kid right now and try and juggle everything I'm doing.
quotes.author: Rachael Ray

quotes.text: I live in, literally, the same home when I was swiping my first bank card and wondering if I'd have to put back the Charmin. We still don't have a dishwasher. My mom has done all these gardens so now my house looks like the garden shack in the middle of Versailles.
quotes.author: Rachael Ray

quotes.text: My mom, who's been in the restaurant business for 40 years, is the number-one influence in my life. But I look up to a lot of people in the industry. Tops on my list is Mario Batali. My mom and Mario taught me the same lesson: Food is love.
quotes.author: Rachael Ray

quotes.text: Good food and a warm kitchen are what makes a house a home. I always tried to make my home like my mother's, because Mom was magnificent at stretching a buck when it came to decorating and food. Like a true Italian, she valued beautification in every area of her life, and I try to do the same.
quotes.author: Rachael Ray

quotes.text: I came from a broken home, so my mom was a major influence in my life.
quotes.author: Julius Erving

quotes.text: I lived with my mom in a really small apartment. My bedroom was like in the living room. That's why I still love to sleep on couches now.
quotes.author: Alicia Keys

quotes.text: My mom is definitely my rock.
quotes.author: Alicia Keys

quotes.text: My mom always said, 'Don't date a guy who thinks he's prettier than you.'
quotes.author: Alicia Keys

quotes.text: My mom was an actress in the local Seattle theater doing experimental plays.
quotes.author: Rainn Wilson

quotes.text: Everything I am is because of my mom.
quotes.author: Sarah Michelle Gellar

quotes.text: In a school where everyone is famous or rich or whatever, you have a culture, 'What does your dad do?' 'What does your mom do?'
quotes.author: Cynthia Nixon

quotes.text: We've all seen the mom who devotes all her time and attention to her child and is so hungry for adult interaction that as soon as she's around another adult, she's not paying attention anymore.
quotes.author: Cynthia Nixon

quotes.text: My nickname for my mom was 'The Compass.'
quotes.author: Dane Cook

quotes.text: Well, you know, I was raised by a 1970s feminist. My mom had a consciousness-raising group. I used to sit at the top of the stairs and listen to them.
quotes.author: Ayelet Waldman

quotes.text: Grades were important in our house. I was reading by two. My mom would sit there and read with me, read with me, read with me. It was wonderful.
quotes.author: Fergie

quotes.text: When I was growing up, my mother was always a friend to my siblings and me (in addition to being all the other things a mom is), and I was always grateful for that because I knew she was someone I could talk to and joke with, and argue with and that nothing would ever harm that friendship.
quotes.author: Marlo Thomas

quotes.text: Dinner 'conversation' at the Cohens' meant my sister, mom, and I relaying in brutal detail the day's events in a state of amplified hysteria, while my father listened to his own smooth jazz station in his head.
quotes.author: Andy Cohen

quotes.text: If you go from a structure where you have the support and that partner and that construction of a family and that's broken apart, I think that's probably a lot harder than always being a single mom and having the father being a support in another area.
quotes.author: Bridget Moynahan

quotes.text: Ever since I was a little kid, I've felt comfortable in a suit. It all started when my mom bought me a three-piece Pierre Cardin suit. I wore that thing everywhere. Eventually I realized I was going to be the kid who got beat up in school, but I kept wearing it.
quotes.author: Paul Feig

quotes.text: I was blessed, because I come from a family where they knock you down before you float away. I have a lot of brothers who just make sure we have our feet on the ground, and my mom is a rock star. She is an amazing mother.
quotes.author: Kellan Lutz

quotes.text: I spend my afternoons painting and working on my Open Hearts jewelry line for Kay Jewelers. I designed an image of a heart that isn't completely closed. My mom always told me to live with an open heart - when life gets tough, you should go out and help someone else.
quotes.author: Jane Seymour

quotes.text: What does good in bed mean to me? When I'm sick and I stay home from school propped up with lots of pillows watching TV and my mom brings me soup - that's good in bed.
quotes.author: Brooke Shields

quotes.text: My mom passed away a day before high school started, and her dream was for me to be a full rock and roll guy, and play drums in a band.
quotes.author: Travis Barker

quotes.text: My mom listened to the Beatles and Elvis, a lot of different types of music.
quotes.author: Travis Barker

quotes.text: My mom died when I was 16. I had a rough childhood, you know what I mean, but it made me strong.
quotes.author: Travis Barker

quotes.text: My mom was scared of the old Times Square so I was never allowed to go. Now I'm scared of the new Times Square, so I still never go.
quotes.author: Padma Lakshmi

quotes.text: I'm an immigrant kid who came to America from India when I was very young and grew up in New York City with a single mom and really was influenced by all of those immigrant cultures bumping up against each other.
quotes.author: Padma Lakshmi

quotes.text: I never Tweet about my daughter. Never. I just want to be respectful of her privacy. My job as a mom is to know when to open my mouth and when not to.
quotes.author: Padma Lakshmi

quotes.text: I think I'm a really hands-on mom.
quotes.author: Brooke Burke

quotes.text: When I was a new mom, I used to think that life was going to be balanced, and I strived for that. But life is crazy!
quotes.author: Brooke Burke

quotes.text: My mom was a ventriloquist and she always was throwing her voice. For ten years I thought the dog was telling me to kill my father.
quotes.author: Wendy Liebman

quotes.text: Wigs have always been a part of my life and have become a staple accessory in my closet. I can remember being a little girl and hearing all the commotion in my house from my mom, aunts and grandmother when picking out their wigs for the day. It was such a good time for them and part of their everyday beauty routine.
quotes.author: Sherri Shepherd

quotes.text: My mom passed away at 41 from diabetes. And I'm 42, thank you. I didn't want to do that to my son. So any time I was at the gym, that thing that helped me do that last squat was my son calling some other woman mommy. And that would just give me that extra oomph to do that last squat. I want to be around for him.
quotes.author: Sherri Shepherd

quotes.text: I don't spend a lot of time online. My mother's really good at picking out if she sees a really great review, and she'll forward it to me. She's like my little Internet filter. It's always nice to see something going up if I want to find something on Nathan Fillion, I do know where to look, but I've got a nice little delivery system in my mom.
quotes.author: Nathan Fillion

quotes.text: I listened to the radio, so I was influenced by everyone from Michael Jackson to Milli Vanilli. But thankfully my dad had a collection of Cat Stevens albums while my mom was listening to jazz.
quotes.author: Jason Mraz

quotes.text: I like to write and draw and paint, and my mom's an artist, so I think I get caught up in thinking, 'I'm afraid it's gonna be bad,' and it's hard for me to start sometimes.
quotes.author: Kristen Wiig

quotes.text: We never had a bathtub. Mom would bathe me in the wooden or tin washtub in the kitchen, or in a big lard can.
quotes.author: Ethel Waters

quotes.text: Mom was the greatest influence of my childhood. She wanted to save me from the vice, lust, and drinking that was all about me.
quotes.author: Ethel Waters

quotes.text: Mom never quit on me. My only regret is that she didn't live long enough to share some of the money and comforts my work in show business has brought me.
quotes.author: Ethel Waters

quotes.text: In her whole life Mom never earned more than five or six dollars a week. Being without a husband, it was hard for her to find any place at all for us to live.
quotes.author: Ethel Waters

quotes.text: That's the hardest thing about being a mom. You want to be cool, and you want them to like you all the time, but you can't always have that. You're gonna have times where you have to say no, and you won't be the most popular person in the house.
quotes.author: Martina McBride

quotes.text: My mom used to have a lot of European cinema playing in the house, so I'd catch bits and pieces of films.
quotes.author: Mia Wasikowska

quotes.text: Being a mom's so empowering and incredible. I'm one of those people who believes that life brings things to you at a certain time for a certain reason, and if you just go with it, that's where the best moments come from.
quotes.author: Ashlee Simpson

quotes.text: I think my mom put it best. She said, 'Little girls soften their daddy's hearts.'
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.text: I love my mom and dad.
quotes.author: Taylor Momsen

quotes.text: Postpartum depression is a very real and very serious problem for many mothers. It can happen to a first time mom or a veteran mother. It can occur a few days... or a few months after childbirth.
quotes.author: Richard J. Codey

quotes.text: My mom didn't let me play video games growing up, so now I do. Gaming gives me a chance to just let go, blow somebody up and fight somebody from another dimension. It's all escapism.
quotes.author: Wayne Brady

quotes.text: This is the place where anybody - like an African American kid raised by a single mom - can be president.
quotes.author: Jennifer M. Granholm

quotes.text: You can be good at technology and like fashion and art. You can be good at technology and be a jock. You can be good at technology and be a mom. You can do it your way, on your terms.
quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

quotes.text: I slept with my mom until I was 16 years old.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hudson

quotes.text: If I could be a third of the woman that my mom is and have a third of the strength that she has, then I will have done good by this life.
quotes.author: Brittany Murphy

quotes.text: It's always been my mom and I against the world.
quotes.author: Brittany Murphy

quotes.text: I always wanted to be a young mom, but generations of women have worked so hard so we can have a career and wait to have children. So I say carpe diem - take advantage of that.
quotes.author: Brittany Murphy

quotes.text: Home is where my mom is.
quotes.author: Brittany Murphy

quotes.text: A company that pays attention to the family unit is a successful company. We don't isolate the family. We don't make rides that say, 'Hey mom, dad, you go sit on the bench.'
quotes.author: Michael Eisner

quotes.text: I grew up in Marcy Projects in Brooklyn, and my mom and pop had an extensive record collection, so Michael Jackson and Stevie Wonder and all of those sounds and souls of Motown filled the house.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.text: He was doing - Ray was designing the clothes for my mom's show from California. And one of the first appearances I ever made on television was on my mother's show and Ray and Bob did the clothes for that. It has been a long time.
quotes.author: Liza Minnelli

quotes.text: Sinatra was just one of Mom's friends.
quotes.author: Lorna Luft

quotes.text: My mom is not trying to live vicariously through me.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.text: I was almost 8 years old when I was watching a kid on a TV commercial, and I told my mom that I wanted to do the same thing. She said that I would need to get an agent and that she would research it.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.text: I'd say that if you had a strained relationship with your mom, for whatever reason, the best thing to do is be open with each other, talk it over, try and work it out somehow as opposed to just putting a wall up and pushing them away.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.text: My mom's a social worker, and my dad works in non-profit organisations.
quotes.author: Seth Rogen

quotes.text: For now I'm just enjoying being a mom. I don't want to be more famous and more rich. I want to be a good mom.
quotes.author: Jewel

quotes.text: My mom was truly an iconic figure, a great journalist and a pioneering woman who died at 54 of cancer without ever having revealed to viewers that she was ill.
quotes.author: David Frum

quotes.text: My mom didn't want me to go to college. She didn't want me to read - when I read, I may as well have been holding a pineapple.
quotes.author: Lynda Barry

quotes.text: My beloved Mom and Pop always rated tops with each other, and that's the way it will always be.
quotes.author: Ethel Merman

quotes.text: Mom claimed that I could carry a tune at 2 or 3 years of age. Maybe she was a little prejudiced.
quotes.author: Ethel Merman

quotes.text: Mom and Pop were proud of my popularity, but from their point of view, show business was no way to make a living.
quotes.author: Ethel Merman

quotes.text: My mom was a professional. My dad and mom met each other in a movie called 'New Faces of 1937.' My mom went under the name Thelma Leeds, and she did a few movies, and she was really a great singer, and when she married my dad and started to have a family, she sang at parties.
quotes.author: Albert Brooks

quotes.text: I had a non-existent knowledge of Queen Victoria's early years. Like everyone else, I thought of her as an old lady dressed in black. My mom had told me about her, though, that she had a very loving relationship with Albert, that they had lots of kids, and that he died young.
quotes.author: Emily Blunt

quotes.text: I'm so proud to represent the people of South Florida. I was so honored when President Obama asked me to serve as chair of the Democratic Party. But there's one job I'm even more proud of, and that's being a mom to my three kids, Rebecca, Jake and Shelby.
quotes.author: Debbie Wasserman Schultz

quotes.text: I have great faith that Heaven's there and I'll see my brothers and my mom and dad when I get there.
quotes.author: Ernie Harwell

quotes.text: My mom was amazing. She believed in me and we were best friends.
quotes.author: Carmen Electra

quotes.text: My mom was a seamstress, and I wish I'd learned to sew because I'm obsessed with 'Project Runway!'
quotes.author: Carmen Electra

quotes.text: If I have any talent at all it's from God, and my mom, who was on Capitol Records also.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.text: My mom and dad got divorced when I was very young, and growing up in a family where the head of the household wasn't a man made a big difference.
quotes.author: Dave Mustaine

quotes.text: I want to be a fun mom. Not a gasping for air mom.
quotes.author: Mariska Hargitay

quotes.text: Every kid needs to say, 'I want what my mom and dad have.'
quotes.author: Josh McDowell

quotes.text: I could never have pictured myself writing a book when I was 25 years old. My mom was an English teacher but I wasn't that way growing up.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.text: My mom obviously had a problem.
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.text: It's been very hard, after being mostly a mom, to develop an adult life of my own. And not being married anymore, I have to come up with challenges.
quotes.author: Danielle Steel

quotes.text: I grew up painting and playing piano so when I was a little kid I thought I was going to be an artist or a painter but my mom had me taking piano lessons for about 10-12 years as a young kid.
quotes.author: Mike Shinoda

quotes.text: I've never had siblings, I didn't grow up in a big family it was just me and my single mom. And hectic family dysfunction was actually something that I craved.
quotes.author: Emmy Rossum

quotes.text: I grew up in a predominantly Caucasian neighborhood, but my mom is Filipino-Spanish and my dad is Irish.
quotes.author: Shay Mitchell

quotes.text: I look at my father. He is one of my heroes. He is such an incredible, classy man. He was such a great father and such a great husband in so many ways, and we lived through some pretty tough times losing my mom. When I see all that he did, I think, 'Wow, that's a really wonderful man.'
quotes.author: Emmanuelle Chriqui

quotes.text: AIDS can destroy a family if you let it, but luckily for my sister and me, Mom taught us to keep going. Don't give up, be proud of who you are, and never feel sorry for yourself.
quotes.author: Ryan White

quotes.text: My parents are wonderful, and I'm really lucky - but my mom has always been almost exclusively a right-brained person.
quotes.author: Brandon Boyd

quotes.text: Also, my mom and family are very important to me and I know that this is not expected.
quotes.author: Christina Milian

quotes.text: I shoplifted. I was about five years old, and I took a candy from a store. We paid for three of them, but I took four, and I went home and cried. My mom took me back, and I paid for the missing piece.
quotes.author: Carrie-Anne Moss

quotes.text: I had to take my makeup off at work every night. I wasn't allowed to do it at home because my mom said that when your work day is done, you're done with work.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.text: When you think of couponing, you picture a mom cutting coupons out of the back of the newspaper.
quotes.author: Andrew Mason

quotes.text: I'm a military kid, both parents in the military - Mom did 12 years, Dad did 21, served in two wars. So discipline is something that was huge.
quotes.author: Robert Griffin III

quotes.text: It's fun to play mom. Last I knew I was playing a 17-year-old who graduated.
quotes.author: Selma Blair

quotes.text: I always say I am a realist, and my mom says, 'No, you just have anxiety.'
quotes.author: Jessica Chastain

quotes.text: I wanted to perform well for my mom and dad, because in high school, I didn't have a job. My brothers, they worked at Pizza Hut or places like that, but sports, that was my way of giving back.
quotes.author: Junior Seau

quotes.text: All of us kids ended up 'doing Mom.' There are four of us who've tried show business. Five if you insist on counting my sister the nun, who does liturgical dance.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.text: I was class mom at the preschool one year and I was pretty much asked not to do that again!
quotes.author: Julie Bowen

quotes.text: It was my mom and I against the world. We lived in New York in this bohemian lifestyle where an extended group of artists and photographers were like my aunts and uncles.
quotes.author: Brooke Shields

quotes.text: My parents divorced when I was young but I was brought up in two really loving households. I didn't have a contentious relationship with my mom or dad.
quotes.author: Matt Damon

quotes.text: Country was about character. Country's changed because of monsters like Clear Channel who bought up all the stations and sliced them up into formats. Our demographic is now the soccer mom.
quotes.author: Gary Allan

quotes.text: I have lots of records, quite a collection, actually, that I stole from my mom. I have the original 'Thriller' album and I have a really great 'Elton John's Greatest Hits,' and I also have a N.E.R.D. album. Records sound more original. They have more edge.
quotes.author: Elisha Cuthbert

quotes.text: My mom and dad worked very hard to give me the best chance in - not just in golf but in life. You know, I was an only child, you know, my dad worked three jobs at one stage. My mom worked night shifts in a factory.
quotes.author: Rory McIlroy

quotes.text: Dad and mom would have preferred that I be a doctor, a lawyer, a scientist, or a great humanitarian.
quotes.author: Levon Helm

quotes.text: I think a good mom is an awake mom. At least for me, I've always been a kinder, better person awake than sleep-deprived!
quotes.author: Lisa Loeb

quotes.text: My mom was a great cook and great baker all her life.
quotes.author: Mandy Patinkin

quotes.text: No, my mom kind of led me toward acting. She wanted to be an actress when she was younger. That made me interested in it when I was a kid, because she and I are very close.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.text: For many women, going back to work a few months after having a baby is overwhelming and unmanageable. As strange as it may seem, things get even more difficult for a working mom after the second and third baby arrive. By that time, the romance of being a modern 'superwoman' wears off and reality sets in.
quotes.author: Mika Brzezinski

quotes.text: One of my most sentimental items is my grandmother's engagement ring that my mom gave me a few years ago. It's a Victorian-style setting that's closed in the back, so it doesn't sparkle the way diamonds do now. I wear it as a pendant.
quotes.author: Georgina Chapman

quotes.text: Once you're a mom, always a mom. It's like riding a bike, you never forget.
quotes.author: Taraji P. Henson

quotes.text: My mom was always really healthy and cautious about her diet, so I'm not a big sugar guy.
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.text: My mom's hot. I mean she's old, but my mom's out of control.
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.text: We busted a lot of family secrets with this. But to make a long story short, my parents relationship was built heavily on security issues for my Mom, and when my Dad couldn't provide security, the relationship unraveled.
quotes.author: Kenny Loggins

quotes.text: My mom took me to a Dolly Parton concert when I was 3.
quotes.author: Kat Dennings

quotes.text: One time my mom tried to ground me, but that lasted 15 minutes.
quotes.author: Bam Margera

quotes.text: OK, so my parents were married in 1955 and my mom knew my dad was gay and my dad knew he was gay and so I was, like, 'Why in the heck did you get married?' Like, what was going on? What was that time? It's like this crazy paradox that my whole life is based on, or my family's based on. So I spent a lot of time trying to understand '55.
quotes.author: Mike Mills

quotes.text: My daughter's name is Neesyn Dacey but everyone calls her Dacey. Her mom chose Neesyn and I chose Dacey after she was born. The mother is a good friend of mine who I was seeing a while ago. We are no longer together.
quotes.author: Bode Miller

quotes.text: My mom played the recorder. But not having electricity, we had minimal exposure to music. As I got a little older, we had Walkmans and things that were battery-powered, but it would have been nice to be growing up in the iPod era. A tape only has six songs on a side.
quotes.author: Bode Miller

quotes.text: It's so funny looking back, but my so-called overnight success actually took 15 years. I remember when I didn't have any money, and my only car was mom's Hyundai.
quotes.author: Criss Angel

quotes.text: As a small business owner for the last 15 years, when I think of what truly changed my life, it was my faith, a strong family, my mom did a really, really good job of encouraging me in very clear and discernible ways.
quotes.author: Tim Scott

quotes.text: When you're sick, nobody takes care of you like your mom.
quotes.author: Trisha Yearwood

quotes.text: We didn't have movies in this little mining town. When I was 12 my mom took me to New York and I saw Bye Bye Birdie, with people singing and dancing, and that was it.
quotes.author: Margot Kidder

quotes.text: I gave guitar lessons. I tried to join bands. My mom always said it was obvious that nothing was going to stop me.
quotes.author: Janis Ian

quotes.text: Before you're a mom you don't know what gear is going to be relevant.
quotes.author: Emily Procter

quotes.text: My mom and my dad were married 56 years, and the fact that I reconciled with my dad I think made their marriage a little bit better as well.
quotes.author: Larry Elder

quotes.text: I was embarrassed that I even wanted to become an actress because coming from L.A., with two older sisters in the business and a mom who had been a ballet dancer, it was such a cliche.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Olsen

quotes.text: From the very start of all of this, my mom has read the scripts first. And if she liked something, she let me read it. She told our agent what kinds of parts that we would want.
quotes.author: Anna Chlumsky

quotes.text: I had no idea of the size of my bank account as a teen, and I didn't care to know. That was my mom's job, I figured that I would just find out when I turned 18. If you can't trust your mom, then who can you trust?
quotes.author: Anna Chlumsky

quotes.text: My mom, she's still always there for me. Always.
quotes.author: David Ortiz

quotes.text: When I was growing up in New Jersey, my mom would regularly take my sister and I into the city to see shows. I have many fond memories of standing in the half-price ticket line in Times Square and going to matinees.
quotes.author: Trey Anastasio

quotes.text: More and more couples are having this negotiation or discussion, but I'm still amazed at the number who aren't and where the cultural norm sort of kicks in and they just assume that mom's got to be the one who stays home, not dad.
quotes.author: James Levine

quotes.text: My mom had started to go to work when I was nine or ten, so I was aware of women trying to find their own identities by working. But I was still influenced by men to such an extreme. I wanted to play their games and wanted to compete in their world and be like them.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Shue

quotes.text: My mom had this romantic notion of her children playing classical music. The idea is you learn it when you're still learning language. It's using the same part of the brain.
quotes.author: Andrew Bird

quotes.text: I burnt myself out of skating. I was ready to focus on being a mom.
quotes.author: Kristi Yamaguchi

quotes.text: I've realized how precious life is. When I was younger, I was more adventurous. I felt invincible. I was game for everything. As a mom, I don't want to get injured because then I can't take care of my kids.
quotes.author: Kristi Yamaguchi

quotes.text: I lived in small town out in the desert and my friend used to steal his mom's car in the middle of the night. He'd drive over to my house, I'd sneak out and we'd go out to the desert and just burn things down.
quotes.author: Mark Hoppus

quotes.text: My mom's gonna be the biggest star - mark my words right now!
quotes.author: Vinny Guadagnino

quotes.text: My house has always been like everyone's house. You walk in, you're a part of the family, no matter who you are, what celebrity status you are, everyone is treated the same - with love from my mom.
quotes.author: Vinny Guadagnino

quotes.text: So, I remember when I was a kid, I was waiting for my mom to come home when she was working late, and, you know, I was like, 'Oh my God, what happened to her? Is she OK? Did something happen to her getting in the car?' I was a little kid. But those are actually early onsets of anxiety.
quotes.author: Vinny Guadagnino

quotes.text: I got a family house for everybody to live in - my mom, my sisters and I. And I made sure that it has a separate apartment downstairs for myself. Family is more important than anything. We don't come from any money. So once I get them settled in, in a nice house, then I'll branch out and see if I can get something else.
quotes.author: Vinny Guadagnino

quotes.text: My mom said, 'Don't get married. You're too young. Go out there and experience what life has to offer.' And I did.
quotes.author: Emmitt Smith

quotes.text: I'm kind of lucky that we've finished shooting 'Cougar Town,' so I'm able to kind of just enjoy my pregnancy and be a stay-at-home mom and go to prenatal Pilates and do all that fun stuff that, if I were working, would be almost impossible to do.
quotes.author: Busy Philipps

quotes.text: Birdie is amazing and such an incredible child and I'm having such a great time being a mom but I still want to have a career and I still look forward to auditions and parts, and when I don't get them I'm disappointed.
quotes.author: Busy Philipps

quotes.text: I'm somebody who doesn't work with a stylist. I'll be honest with you, I'm a mom and it's just not something I want to put money toward because it's expensive to have somebody who helps dress you and I feel like I have to pay for preschool and so many things... so I don't have a stylist.
quotes.author: Busy Philipps

quotes.text: Mom always tells me to celebrate everyone's uniqueness. I like the way that sounds.
quotes.author: Hilary Duff

quotes.text: My mom taught me not to talk about money.
quotes.author: Hilary Duff

quotes.text: I love my mom. I totally look up to her, and she just doesn't let anybody take advantage of me. People might call that a stage mom.
quotes.author: Hilary Duff

quotes.text: My relationship with my mom is so amazing. We never got to have that stage that people go through, like when you're 13 and you think you're too cool for your parents. When you're embarrassed by them and stuff. We never went through that because I was constantly working and she constantly had to be there.
quotes.author: Hilary Duff

quotes.text: My mom had me when she was 16, and I was an only child, which is probably why I received a lot of love and didn't miss that my father wasn't around.
quotes.author: Brett Ratner

quotes.text: Miami Beach - that's where I grew up, in a middle-class Jewish family led by my maternal grandfather. Me, my great-grandmother - a Holocaust survivor, who was my roommate - my grandparents, my mom and her brother all shared a four-bedroom house.
quotes.author: Brett Ratner

quotes.text: We didn't have a TV in the living room and all my friends thought we were kind of weird. When they'd come over, my mom wanted to talk to them about current events.
quotes.author: Eliza Dushku

quotes.text: My mom is this liberal, feminist, Mormon powerhouse. I just love her to death.
quotes.author: Eliza Dushku

quotes.text: I was raised in Boston by three older brothers and a very strong and empowering single mom.
quotes.author: Eliza Dushku

quotes.text: My mom is like this hard-core, liberal feminist. She's a professor in Boston, and she's been teaching women's studies for 30 years and international politics.
quotes.author: Eliza Dushku

quotes.text: As a mom, I don't have much time for beauty.
quotes.author: Idina Menzel

quotes.text: My biggest project right now is trying to be a really great mom and learning how to balance family and career. I'm just trying to spend as much time with my family as I can.
quotes.author: Idina Menzel

quotes.text: I'm a mom - I'm lucky if I get to shower in the morning. Luckily, nail polish stays on my toes. I've been so bad on the upkeep, though.
quotes.author: Idina Menzel

quotes.text: I've always wanted to be a mom.
quotes.author: Holly Madison

quotes.text: I want my daughter to be proud of me and look up to me. I think early on in my pregnancy I realized that to be the mom I want to be, I had to change my life, and that's what I'm doing.
quotes.author: Holly Madison

quotes.text: My mom and dad played this music all the time when I was growing up, so to me songs by Jerry Lee and Fats Domino are the classics, they're the best songs ever.
quotes.author: Chris Isaak

quotes.text: I was brought up as an only child, and we were very close. But when I was 14, we got evicted. We came home to a padlock, and I looked up at my mom and she was crying, and there was nothing to do.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.text: I spend as much time with my kids as any mom who stays home. I only work during the hours they're at school, but there is always the sense of trying to catch up with all their stuff and not only organize my work life but also their school lives.
quotes.author: Patricia Heaton

quotes.text: My mom's the one I look up to for everything. I feel like I'm a lump of clay and she's moulding me into a woman.
quotes.author: Chloe Moretz

quotes.text: My mom has always said that if I get a big head, she'll take me out of this business as quickly as I got into it.
quotes.author: Chloe Moretz

quotes.text: I just got my phone back yesterday. My mom had it for two days. I was supposed to read a book and I really wanted to play Call Of Duty.
quotes.author: Chloe Moretz

quotes.text: My mom won't let me buy high-fashion stuff unless it's TK Maxx or a birthday occasion.
quotes.author: Chloe Moretz

quotes.text: The one thing my mom will let me get is a nice shoe sometimes.
quotes.author: Chloe Moretz

quotes.text: My mom won't let anyone treat me like a little princess.
quotes.author: Chloe Moretz

quotes.text: My brother Trevor is theatrically trained. I used to watch him when I was younger and I was in love with it. It just seemed really fun to be someone else. So I begged my mom she was hesitant, but she eventually allowed me. And it turned out well, I guess.
quotes.author: Chloe Moretz

quotes.text: My mom gives me an allowance. She keeps me pretty tight-reined.
quotes.author: Chloe Moretz

quotes.text: The problem with me is, anything that's easy I will just overdo it. Especially with clothes. But I'm 14 - my mom is super-strict about that.
quotes.author: Chloe Moretz

quotes.text: We were poor. But my mom never accepted that. She worked hard to become a residential contractor - got her master's with honors at the University of New Orleans. I used to go to every class with her. Her father was my paternal figure.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.text: I've learned that every working mom is a superwoman.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.text: I'm an actress and mom, and I probably don't have enough of an active spiritual life. And I don't know why people run around calling themselves by the names of religions when they don't actually practise them.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.text: My mother was a single mom, and most of the women I know are strong.
quotes.author: Regina King

quotes.text: I think I've become more like my mom just because of what we're both interested in, children and teaching and writing.
quotes.author: Jenna Bush

quotes.text: I had always loved to write and my mom was my editor for my school papers.
quotes.author: Jenna Bush

quotes.text: My mom's a secret Rastafarian.
quotes.author: Jenna Bush

quotes.text: I'm more like my father, personality-wise. But my mom and I get alone really well - obviously, because my mom and my dad get along so well.
quotes.author: Jenna Bush

quotes.text: I'm sure there were times when I wish I had thought, 'Gosh, that might really embarrass mom and dad,' but our parents didn't raise us to think about them. They're very selfless and they wanted us to have as normal of a college life as possible. So really, we didn't think of any repercussions.
quotes.author: Jenna Bush

quotes.text: I prefer to imagine that my wife, a few friends, and occasionally my mom are the only ones who read what I do, though I realize that this is somewhat unrealistic.
quotes.author: Chris Ware

quotes.text: When I was a kid, my mom used to run the vacuum cleaner, and the noise would bother me so much that I would run into the woods to calm down. I feel like that vacuum cleaner has been on since I moved to New York City.
quotes.author: Steve Burns

quotes.text: There's been times when I've had heartbreaking moments and I'm like, 'I can't believe you said that,' or 'I can't believe you did that'. And it hurts, it still hurts, and it'll always hurt, but I've never had somebody that I truly cared about just walk out on me, whether it was a boyfriend, or an aunt, mom or dad.
quotes.author: Shailene Woodley

quotes.text: My mom would take me to restaurants, and the first thing I'd ask for would be a pen and a napkin, and I'd sketch shoes and shoes and shoes.
quotes.author: Alexander Wang

quotes.text: My mom would put me in these preppy little suits and slick my hair to the side. I have these baby pictures of me where I'm this little preppy kid with a sweater tied around my neck.
quotes.author: Alexander Wang

quotes.text: I was a hyper kid in school and the teacher suggested to my mom she needed to do something with me.
quotes.author: Devon Sawa

quotes.text: My mother kept asking me, 'When are you going to do a gospel album?' And I've always wanted to do a gospel album. Everybody was going on about it, so mom started hounding me more.
quotes.author: Alan Jackson

quotes.text: My dad is a bank president and my mom was an accountant and they didn't think that seeking the life of a freelance writer was very practical, you see. Of course, I was just as determined to do it.
quotes.author: Kevin J. Anderson

quotes.text: I know that I'm getting the real deal with my mom. I know that she's telling it like it is. She's proud of me when I've earned it and she's disappointed in me when I've earn that. She's really my spectrum on where I am as a person.
quotes.author: Lara Flynn Boyle

quotes.text: I had such a great mom and I know that I'd never be that mom. I wouldn't want to bring a child into this world unless I could be.
quotes.author: Lara Flynn Boyle

quotes.text: My mom calls me an older soul because, growing up, she taught me stuff real early. Now I spend most of my time chasing wisdom, chasing understanding.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.text: Mom thinks I live in this dream world where everybody's Ivana Trump.
quotes.author: Kathie Lee Gifford

quotes.text: Over the years my mom has become a self-taught Biblical scholar.
quotes.author: Kathie Lee Gifford

quotes.text: My mom used to tell me: 'It's not what you weigh it's what you look like.'
quotes.author: Gina Carano

quotes.text: My mom and my father's birthday are on the same day.
quotes.author: Victor Cruz

quotes.text: My mom was dying for me to write a book, she was my biggest advocate.
quotes.author: Victor Cruz

quotes.text: Growing up, my mom was very strict about how I dressed and how I behaved, and I said to myself that I wasn't going to be like that. But now I know I'm going to be exactly like my mom. I'm going to be worse!
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.text: Sure, my childhood was unusual. All these eccentric, wild people frequented our home: rock stars, drag queens, models, bikers, freaks. But I was not this little rich girl. My mom and I lived in an apartment.
quotes.author: Liv Tyler

quotes.text: My mom's been married three times my dad has been married a lot. I didn't really see my dad that much.
quotes.author: Skeet Ulrich

quotes.text: I want to make my music and be a happy woman, a good wife, a good mom and one day hopefully have a child of my own.
quotes.author: LeAnn Rimes

quotes.text: My dad is a very quick-witted, sarcastic, dry, humorous guy, whereas my mom's very silly, and that side of the family is very musical.
quotes.author: Tim Heidecker

quotes.text: Once my mom passed away, I have nobody to answer to. It's great.
quotes.author: Jessica Hahn

quotes.text: My mom really instilled in me that I'm beautiful and I can do anything, and I echo that now with my own girls.
quotes.author: Jennie Garth

quotes.text: I love kids and children, and I love being a mom.
quotes.author: Jennie Garth

quotes.text: I was actually the one who decided to move to LA. Mom and I were driving on Sunset Boulevard during one of our trips back to see her family, and I said, 'Can we just stay?' So we did.
quotes.author: Lily Collins

quotes.text: I'm a competitive person and it is in my nature to try hard in every match I play. The only time I'm not competitive is when I'm playing against my mom.
quotes.author: Michael Chang

quotes.text: One day my dad would say, 'OK, if you want to play tennis I can help you out.' And that's how it started. And I had a goal. I wanted to beat my mom first. And my parents and my brother. And that was the ultimate goal.
quotes.author: Caroline Wozniacki

quotes.text: My mom was always the support. I can always go out to her and she'll always find the positive in things.
quotes.author: Caroline Wozniacki

quotes.text: My mom is great and I make sure that we pray together before every race. She helps me put everything in perspective and remind me of the real reason I run.
quotes.author: Allyson Felix

quotes.text: No matter what, like, I couldn't - I could break a world record, get an Olympic gold medal, and my mom would be, like, you could have done better. But you looked pretty. That's what she says all the time.
quotes.author: Ryan Lochte

quotes.text: I care so passionately about improving the quality of life for women and girls, not just here in the United States, but internationally as well. I am a single mom and I raised a daughter who is now a young adult.
quotes.author: Valerie Jarrett

quotes.text: The fact that I'm very close with my past relationships is something I pride myself on. My mom is still close to her first husband. It's nice to be able to enjoy someone in a different form.
quotes.author: Kate Bosworth

quotes.text: I have to keep reminding myself that I am their mother. Sometimes we are sitting at home and I feel like we are waiting for our mom to come home.
quotes.author: Ruby Wax

quotes.text: When I was a child, I wanted to be an actor, but I had really bad buckteeth. I didn't want to get braces, but my mom said I couldn't be an actor if I didn't get the braces. So, I got the braces.
quotes.author: James Franco

quotes.text: Our last jam session was this past Christmas. Dad played his harmonica, mom sang in English and Italian, and I played guitar. I'm so happy that we could share that musical experience for one last time.
quotes.author: Tony Visconti

quotes.text: My mom cooked pot roast with noodles and frozen vegetables. Or she'd make spaghetti or hot dogs, or heat up TV dinners. Before I started modeling at age 19, I was 5'8" and weighed 165 pounds.
quotes.author: Carol Alt

quotes.text: My father still is a lawyer, and my mom was a teacher and then later a career counselor.
quotes.author: Steve Case

quotes.text: I remember that at the beginning of the month, the kind of menus my mom and father would prepare for us would have fish, chicken. But at the end of the month - because my father would be waiting for paycheck - the refrigerator would get empty. I remember that without a lot of food left, some of the best meals happened right there.
quotes.author: Jose Andres Puerta

quotes.text: Simon is cool. You know, it's different if you ever see him around his mom. He acts totally different.
quotes.author: Ruben Studdard

quotes.text: I want to make sure I continue to make good music that my mom and everybody around me can be proud of.
quotes.author: Ruben Studdard

quotes.text: I grew up in the '80s, and there was no bigger group than New Edition in R&ampB. I broke my piggy bank so me and my mom could go to a New Edition concert together.
quotes.author: Ruben Studdard

quotes.text: I'm from Tennessee. My mom lives in Nashville. I'm born and bred country. That's all I listen to.
quotes.author: Lucy Hale

quotes.text: I've never had my brows done - I tweeze them myself. I used to watch my mom pluck her brows, that's how I learned.
quotes.author: Emmy Rossum

quotes.text: My mom is a sculptress.
quotes.author: P. J. Harvey

quotes.text: My hero is Michelle Williams, who I grew close to when we did 'Meek's Cutoff.' She's an extraordinary actor and mom.
quotes.author: Zoe Kazan

quotes.text: When I look up and see a star, I know my mom is there. She's with me all the time. It's a powerful connection.
quotes.author: Emmanuelle Chriqui

quotes.text: My mom was an aesthetician and she went to beauty school back in the '60s. I just remember watching her do her makeup all the time. She always had her nails done, makeup on - her face was ready to go when she went out. I loved it.
quotes.author: Emmanuelle Chriqui

quotes.text: I grew up in a family of Republicans. And when I was 18 and registering to vote, my mom's only instruction was 'You just go in and pull the big Republican lever.' That's my welcome to adulthood. She's like, 'No, don't even read it. Just pull the Republican lever.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.text: My mom started smoking when she was 11. She went to the hill next door to try her first cigarette. She set the entire hill on fire, but it didn't deter her.
quotes.author: Loni Anderson

quotes.text: My memory of my mom is a wine glass in one hand and a cigarette in the other. She was a runway fashion model, and she was quite a glamorous woman.
quotes.author: Loni Anderson

quotes.text: I am blessed to have Mom and Dad.
quotes.author: Kevin Eubanks

quotes.text: I was labeled a troublemaker, my mom an unfit mother, and I was not welcome anywhere.
quotes.author: Ryan White

quotes.text: I think I'd be a great mom, honestly. I don't think I'll have any problem giving them all the love in the world. Discipline will be the hard part.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.text: My mom will make me walk the dogs or take out the trash when I go home.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.text: I am a single mom and I'm the breadwinner and I have to work and I have to do these things and that's just the way it is. I don't think my son even knows any different.
quotes.author: Charisma Carpenter

quotes.text: Our parents are obviously proud, but they're still trying to get used to the fact that we're in a band. I have a feeling my mom would actually like One Direction if I wasn't in it!
quotes.author: Zayn Malik

quotes.text: My parents are both very funny but they're also relatively soft-spoken, normal human beings while I'm just a lunatic. I don't know where this loud, ballsy, hammy ridiculousness came from. I'm just glad I followed my goals and my parents did too. It's not like we even had a plan when I dragged my mom to Los Angeles.
quotes.author: Emma Stone

quotes.text: I am excited to rise today to support National Mom and Pop Business Owners Day. This celebration honors the husband and wife business owner teams whose work helps drive the economy and fuel job growth.
quotes.author: Melissa Bean

quotes.text: I'm a nice, happily married wife and mom and I live in Connecticut.
quotes.author: Christine Baranski

quotes.text: My dad was a golden gloves boxer in the Marine Corps, then a deputy sheriff. My mom worked as an office assistant.
quotes.author: Susana Martinez

quotes.text: My mom was a model. She had me at 20, so she was a young mother.
quotes.author: Michael Kors

quotes.text: My mom and dad met at UCLA when he as a captain in the Air Force and she was in her junior year.
quotes.author: Tracy Austin

quotes.text: I've always believed fitness is an entry point to help you build that happier, healthier life. When your health is strong, you're capable of taking risks. You'll feel more confident to ask for the promotion. You'll have more energy to be a better mom. You'll feel more deserving of love.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.text: My dad left when I was 3 1/2, and he left my mom and I.
quotes.author: David Cassidy

quotes.text: My mom used to take me down to the Jersey Shore when I was 7, 8, 9 years old. I can remember being down in that area - Belmar, Seaside Heights, Asbury Park and all those places that I went back and revisited.
quotes.author: David Cassidy

quotes.text: Some of the best times I've spent in Colorado have been in the backcountry with my mom and siblings, and more recently, with my own kids. That is why I'm concerned to see today's kids spending more time browsing the Internet than exploring nature.
quotes.author: Mark Udall

quotes.text: I like my name. My mom named me after a song by the 1970s group Bread. So, it's meaningful, and I like the song. It's a love song - kind of - but it's kind of depressing and dark.
quotes.author: Aubrey Plaza

quotes.text: I want to go to college to study journalism. I want to speak French fluently, to travel. My mom was a journalist and it's in my blood.
quotes.author: Mandy Moore

quotes.text: My mom loved to sing - and I'll go on record and say she was the worst singer ever. I'd get up and move away from her!
quotes.author: Kenny Rogers

quotes.text: I have many valentines. My mom and my sister and my directors. I got calls from all of them. And my friends. I respect what Valentine's Day stands for because it is about love.
quotes.author: Michelle Trachtenberg

quotes.text: I'm a full-time mom right now and a part-time actress.
quotes.author: Valerie Bertinelli

quotes.text: I was a single mom that raised two bright, beautiful, and compassionate girls.
quotes.author: Connie Stevens

quotes.text: I would go visit my mom on Sundays, and my brother was working on stuff. I'd go in there and sing a little melody, then we started working with words and the next thing you know it was just born organically without really trying.
quotes.author: Taryn Manning

quotes.text: I was born in Texas and I lived there 'till I was 8. Then I moved to the Dominican Republic with my mom, lived there for two years and forgot every word of English I knew.
quotes.author: Michelle Rodriguez

quotes.text: And what is a stage dad, or a stage mom? It's someone who's protective. That's all.
quotes.author: Nigel Lythgoe

quotes.text: My dad's half-Lebanese, my mom is full Lebanese. I'm three-quarters Lebanese. Irish-Lebanese.
