quotes.author: Tom Shadyac

quotes.text: Most young people haven't used their storytelling skills since they were 8 or 9 or 10 and wanted to persuade Mom and Dad to take them to the ball game.
quotes.author: Peter Guber

quotes.text: My mom used to tell me stories at night, read books to me - and I read 'em over and over and over again. And you know what I learned from that? I went back and looked at everything - Why do I like reading the same stories over and over and over again? What, was I some kind of nincompoop? No - the narrative gave me connection with my mom.
quotes.author: Peter Guber

quotes.text: Not that we didn't have close relationships with our parents - I'm very close to my mom - but parents didn't think anything of going off for a few weeks and leaving their kids.
quotes.author: Candice Bergen

quotes.text: Mom and Dad would stay in bed on Sunday morning, but the kids would have to go to church.
quotes.author: Lynn Johnston

quotes.text: Deep down, my mom had long suspected I was gay... Much of her anger and hurt came from her sense of betrayal that she was the last to be told.
quotes.author: Chaz Bono

quotes.text: What mom cares about most is that I'm happy, healthy and enjoying my life.
quotes.author: Chaz Bono

quotes.text: My daily schedule is quite hectic, but I have to put my health first in order to be the best mom and wife I can be.
quotes.author: Ellen Pompeo

quotes.text: I told my mom I would graduate. I owe that much to her and myself.
quotes.author: Carmelo Anthony

quotes.text: My mom can't defend herself to the world. She is such an amazing woman, with such an open heart. It's a real hard line, and I crossed it. I took everyone's life story and assumed it would be a great thing to put on screen. I was being selfish and I feel so horrible about it. I feel so guilty.
quotes.author: Nikki Reed

quotes.text: I've always been a writer because I've always been a student. My mom's a retired professor, so I come from a very academic background. I love writing, you know?
quotes.author: Kerry Washington

quotes.text: My mom always encouraged me, it was never weird. She'd look at 'Heavy Metal' and go 'Woo-hoo!'
quotes.author: Zack Snyder

quotes.text: You know, I loved math. My mom was a math teacher.
quotes.author: Joan Cusack

quotes.text: My mom sang in high school choir and so did my father.
quotes.author: Kevin Richardson

quotes.text: I also think a Hot Mom is someone who can connect with what's current in her kids' world.
quotes.author: Jami Gertz

quotes.text: Being a working mom is not easy. You have to be willing to screw up at every level.
quotes.author: Jami Gertz

quotes.text: As a mom, I always feel I have to protect them. I talk about them because they are the most important things in my life but they are private people. I won't use them for my own press.
quotes.author: Jami Gertz

quotes.text: It's hard either way, at home or on the bus, I think the hardest thing probably for me is going one second from being mom to right out on the stage and having to be that person too. It's hard to switch gears.
quotes.author: Lee Ann Womack

quotes.text: President Obama likes to talk about the Buffett Rule. Well, here's a Buffett Rule that all Americans should be able to support: mom and pop businesses should not pay a higher tax rate than Fortune 500 corporations like Warren Buffett's.
quotes.author: Rob Portman

quotes.text: But my mom was a pianist, and she taught piano out of her house. I was just so excited, being a little kid and having all these other kids come to my house twice a week. I thought it was a big party.
quotes.author: Vanessa Carlton

quotes.text: My mom would give me a piece to play, but I wouldn't do any theory because when it came time to do it I would sneak back upstairs and watch TV. So, I had these kind of nonchalant lessons for years, then it just started soaking in.
quotes.author: Vanessa Carlton

quotes.text: The real beauty of it - key to my life was playing key chords on a banjo. For somebody else it may be a golf club that mom and dad put in their hands or a baseball or ballet lessons. Real gift to give to me and put it in writing.
quotes.author: Vince Gill

quotes.text: I've changed my life in a lot of ways. I'm a mom, a wife, and a Christian. Some of the things I expressed in my early 20s aren't what I care to express right now.
quotes.author: Cheryl James

quotes.text: My mom was a '70s mom. She paved a road that no one had yet walked.
quotes.author: Melissa Leo

quotes.text: For me, just being how old I am, I know I don't want to be a single mom. I really would rather make it a two-person job. But I've also come to terms with not being a mother at all. I'm actually really good with either direction that my life can take as being a valid experience.
quotes.author: Lisa Edelstein

quotes.text: My mom didn't use face cream, like, nothing at all. She's got great skin and looks very youthful.
quotes.author: Lara Stone

quotes.text: There's a book called 'The Shack' - it had a lot to do with me coming full circle, meeting my birth mother. Awhile back, my birth mom and my adopted mom came to my show together, and it was pretty surreal.
quotes.author: Rodney Atkins

quotes.text: When you're adopted, no matter what, you've got issues with unconditional love. And you find out you're the product of the worst situation for a young girl to be in and start her life, and I'm so grateful that my birth mom made the decision she made. She came from a rough situation.
quotes.author: Rodney Atkins

quotes.text: I was a sickly baby, and after two sets of adoptive parents took me home, they returned me to the orphanage because of a serious respiratory infection. But as they say, the third time's a charm, because my mom and dad adopted me and took me into their home where I was raised in a family full of love.
quotes.author: Rodney Atkins

quotes.text: Right now, it hasn't affected my music other than the fact that I don't have time to write any of it. That's no different from when I first started and I lived at home. I would play the guitar in the afternoon and then my mom or my dad would come home and I'd have to quit.
quotes.author: Paul Westerberg

quotes.text: My mom is many times responsible for getting us all together, but we trade off at each other's houses. My brother and I are actors and are traveling a lot of our job.
quotes.author: Beau Bridges

quotes.text: I wanted to have a personal life that I fully inhabited, not because I am such a great mom, but for me.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt

quotes.text: The most important thing in my father's life? World peace. Me and my brother. My mom.
quotes.author: Sean Lennon

quotes.text: I've had Susan Sarandon play my mom, and now Lesley Ann Warren has played my mom, so if I could have Debra Winger play my mom, then I would have the trifecta of my favorite actresses playing my mother.
quotes.author: Jenna Fischer

quotes.text: We always had 'Vogue' in our house. But, when I was around 12, my Mom finally took me seriously about modeling and put a stack of magazines in front of me, then told me to study all the poses. The ones I loved the most were in 'Vogue.'
quotes.author: Chanel Iman

quotes.text: My goal is to be a household name, and when I do that, I want to help other girls become models, and maybe even launch a fashion line with my mom, like Beyonce did with her mother. My mom has such a good eye, and it's always been a dream of hers.
quotes.author: Chanel Iman

quotes.text: When you're a mom and you have three children, nothing bothers you. Trust me. Who cares what people say? I've got other things to deal with.
quotes.author: Faith Hill

quotes.text: My mom was a saint. She taught me to be terminally nice.
quotes.author: Iggy Pop

quotes.text: I was who I was in high school in accordance with the rules of conduct for a normal person, like obeying your mom and dad. Then I got out of high school and moved out of the house, and I just started, for lack of a better term, running free.
quotes.author: Iggy Pop

quotes.text: I was always a closet lover of acting. My mom was very practical. She never, ever restricted our dreams, always told us we could do or be anything. Then I said, 'Maybe I want to be an actor'. And she said, 'Maybe not that'.
quotes.author: Octavia Spencer

quotes.text: My mom is very Southern and she in real life says things like, 'If you've got it, flaunt it.'
quotes.author: Cheryl Hines

quotes.text: Well, when I was a little girl we had 17 cats once. They all lived outside, and they kept having more kittens. My mom made us put little ribbons around each kitten's neck, put them in a wagon, and go door-to-door around the neighborhood to try to give them away.
quotes.author: Cheryl Hines

quotes.text: I saw things at an early age because my mom was a theater actress. I did a play with her when I was 10 years old.
quotes.author: Sam Rockwell

quotes.text: In Fargo, they say, well, that's a job. How well do you get paid? For example, for this book I was written about in Entertainment Weekly, and it was kind of cool because my mom asked me if Entertainment Weekly was a magazine or a newspaper.
quotes.author: Chuck Klosterman

quotes.text: Mom was the one who taught me unconditional love. With Dad, I'd always felt there was something to live up to - expectations. But in the last year, we had a wonderful relationship.
quotes.author: Greg Louganis

quotes.text: Growing up with three older brothers and being the youngest and the only girl, my mom always made me tough. She's taught me over the years how to be a strong, independent woman, how to carry yourself in a positive way and anything that my brothers can do, I can do.
quotes.author: Diana Lopez

quotes.text: If I made a list of the people I admire, Mom would probably fill up half of it. She could do anything and everything.
quotes.author: Patsy Cline

quotes.text: I always had a standard of, back when I was doing the country music I always told people I would never record a song that I wouldn't sit down and sing in front of my mom and dad.
quotes.author: Ricky Skaggs

quotes.text: My mom did costumes for the Pointer Sisters.
quotes.author: Slash

quotes.text: I was born in Corpus Christi, Texas, the youngest of four girls, including my oldest sister, Lisa, who has special needs. My mom was a special education teacher, and my dad worked on the Army base. We weren't wealthy, but we were determined to succeed.
quotes.author: Eva Longoria

quotes.text: My mom was always the supplier of soccer balls, and so people were always knocking on my door, and trying to get me out so we could play.
quotes.author: Freddy Adu

quotes.text: I wanted to get us a place of our own with a little bit more space. The kitchen is just huge, because my mom... lives there, man, and she loves being in the kitchen.
quotes.author: Freddy Adu

quotes.text: I was looking to do something non-fiction because I had done a strip, 'My Mom Was a Schizophrenic.' I really enjoyed the process of doing that strip, despite its subject matter. To do it I'd had to do a lot of research and reading and I figured I'd like to do that again.
quotes.author: Chester Brown

quotes.text: My mom died when I was 8.
quotes.author: Lisa Guerrero

quotes.text: I'm proud of what I look like. I'm proud that I look like my mom.
quotes.author: Lisa Guerrero

quotes.text: You know when everyone's watching, your mom and dad, your friends in high school who thought they were better than you. You get your chance to get in the spotlight and shine.
quotes.author: Shaun Alexander

quotes.text: I finished high school, moved to Nashville for college, and set out to break into the music business. Every night when I called home with news of my experiences, my mom and dad would encourage me to keep taking those small steps.
quotes.author: Trisha Yearwood

quotes.text: My mom has a good way of engaging me in a conversation about the choices I make, listening, being objective and open-minded, and respecting those choices so long as they don't put me in danger.
quotes.author: Casey Affleck

quotes.text: To this day, my mom's unsinkable spirit is an inspiration to me. For nearly thirty years, she's worked at the Library of Congress. Everyone knows Sameha simply as 'Sami.' Along with 500 miles of shelved books, her closest friendships are cataloged in that library. They are as much the value of work to my mom as is the work itself.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.text: I can't remember a time when my mom didn't work. She has forever been on the move: a go-getter. When my brother Adel and I had a paper route as kids, my mom would get up before us at the crack of dawn to drop off the Washington Post at different corners.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.text: I have a very close relationship with my mom, and I'm able to talk to her about anything.
quotes.author: Jessica Szohr

quotes.text: Being an only child, I didn't have any other family but my mom and dad really, since the rest of my family lived quite far away from London.
quotes.author: Tom Hardy

quotes.text: My mom put me in a Pampers commercial on TV.
quotes.author: Christian Slater

quotes.text: My mom was always pretty supportive. She saw me do plays and she'd always act out the parts I did. My aunt, who played a big part in my life, was a little bit more reserved, because if they don't see you on TV every week they think you must be starving.
quotes.author: Angela Bassett

quotes.text: There are lots of different ways for women to be a mom in this culture.
quotes.author: Kate Walsh

quotes.text: My mom, she's a breast cancer survivor and because of that I had started getting mammograms once a year, starting at age 30.
quotes.author: Kate Walsh

quotes.text: My mom was at every single game I played as a kid, rain or shine.
quotes.author: Ryne Sandberg

quotes.text: Before becoming a mom, I never knew how good I had it to just spend time at a spa for a few hours. Now, those days are far and between. So when I have an hour, it's all about the mani and pedi.
quotes.author: Tia Mowry

quotes.text: There is nothing like becoming a mom to fill you with fear.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.text: Trying to be Supermom is as futile as trying to be Perfect Mom. Not going to happen.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.text: When I get a new script my mom will read them and just be aghast. I think it's hysterical.
quotes.author: Alia Shawkat

quotes.text: I would forgive my mom, but she's going to have to admit she did some things that were wrong.
quotes.author: Aaron Carter

quotes.text: My mother and my grandmother are pioneers of Mexican cuisine in this country, so I grew up in the kitchen. My mom, Zarela Martinez, was by far my biggest influence and inspiration - and toughest critic.
quotes.author: Aaron Sanchez

quotes.text: My mom bought me a white Strat, but that wasn't what I wanted, so I went to a guitar store in Cleveland and - the guy told me it was a really good deal - made an even swap for a blue Teisco Del Ray. I loved that guitar and used it a bunch.
quotes.author: Dan Auerbach

quotes.text: If I lived alone, Mom'd never sleep because she wouldn't know I was okay.
quotes.author: Scott Baio

quotes.text: I have a 16 year-old son, so I'm now a soccer mom. I stand on the sidelines and I hear the things parents are saying, so I want them to understand what it is their kids are feeling in any sports environment.
quotes.author: Brandi Chastain

quotes.text: My parents and my grandfather on my mom's side would travel the earth. They went to Australia and China, and they went to probably every soccer game I ever played.
quotes.author: Brandi Chastain

quotes.text: I don't know that I have any role models now that are fixed. Definitely my mom - she's the coolest. She's worked really hard her whole life and I just think she's got a great attitude. Moms just know so much it's so silly.
quotes.author: Larisa Oleynik

quotes.text: My mom's one of 13 siblings, and they all got six kids, and till I was 13 everybody was in Compton.
quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.text: I love playing moms. It's a lot easier than being a mom, I hear.
quotes.author: Faith Ford

quotes.text: When I was 12 I cried to my mom, because I never got my letter to Hogwarts.
quotes.author: Sara Paxton

quotes.text: My mother smokes me out. We'll get these long periods of me thinking I'm too busy to call her up or e-mail her, and she'll send me something. My mom's a real whiner. I love her to death, but she always sends me these 'woe is me' things. I think she might be Jewish. I'm not sure. She's Baptist-Jewish, which is a double whammy.
quotes.author: Ronnie Dunn

quotes.text: The rule with my mom was that the only way that I could be an actress when I was young was that I continued to go to public school and get straight A's in all my classes.
quotes.author: Sara Paxton

quotes.text: Death can't be so bad if mom went through it. It makes it easier for the child to follow.
quotes.author: Danny Aiello

quotes.text: My mom always said that if the Protestants catch a Catholic in their church, they feed them to the Jews.
quotes.author: Kate O'Brien

quotes.text: I deal with postpartum feelings by reaching out to mom friends. I became very close with some of the women in my prenatal yoga class.
quotes.author: Alyssa Milano

quotes.text: The first few weeks of being a mom were profound, not just emotionally but also, physically. All the changes you instinctually go through are miraculous.
quotes.author: Alyssa Milano

quotes.text: When I was a kid and got in trouble, I'd always say, Mom, I'm in trouble. Well, Mom, I'm in trouble.
quotes.author: Earl Campbell

quotes.text: As a busy working mom I'm always pressed for time, so a quick and easy beauty routine is key!
quotes.author: Angela Kinsey

quotes.text: My mom, the fabulous Bertie Kinsey, is an amazing seamstress. She quilts and sews and is so crafty. We call her the Southern Martha Stewart!
quotes.author: Angela Kinsey

quotes.text: I think it's a tough road if you're a stay-at-home mom, a working mom, if you have a partner, if you don't. It's the best job in the world, and the toughest job in the world all at the same time.
quotes.author: Angela Kinsey

quotes.text: My very sassy, older southern sister is very quick to point out that it's a luxury that my daughter gets to come to work with me. She does, and I have lunch with her every single day. My mom says I have 'high class problems.'
quotes.author: Angela Kinsey

quotes.text: Now that I'm a mom, I'm way more laid back. If you come into my house, don't look for a coaster. Forget it. There is not a piece of furniture in my house now that is too precious.
quotes.author: Angela Kinsey

quotes.text: I'm like any working mom.
quotes.author: Kelly Ripa

quotes.text: But to sustain a marriage for 50 years, you have to get real a little bit and find someone who is understanding and who you can grow with. My mom always says, 'Marry the man who loves you a millimeter more.'
quotes.author: Ali Larter

quotes.text: I'm talking like 10, 12 years old. Either junior brings Mom and Pop or Mom and Pop bring the kids. I'm talking young here, not a college drinking crowd.
quotes.author: George Thorogood

quotes.text: My mom, she's from Ireland, coached tennis in Nigeria when she was a missionary and turned me on to it when I was young.
quotes.author: Donal Logue

quotes.text: Becoming a mom made me more contentious about expressing my true taste.
quotes.author: Edie Brickell

quotes.text: My mom was a source of strength.She showed me by example that women, regardless of how difficult life may get, can do it all.
quotes.author: Gloria Estefan

quotes.text: My mom was definitely very strict with me.
quotes.author: Gloria Estefan

quotes.text: I dyed my hair blonde when I was 14. My mom was not happy. But I love being blonde.
quotes.author: Rita Ora

quotes.text: My mom's a Catholic, and my dad's a Jew, and they didn't want anything to do with anything.
quotes.author: Isabelle Huppert

quotes.text: Before I was a mom I used to think that parents who worried about their kids watching MTV were just clueless. Now that I'm a mom, I see what the fuss was all about!
quotes.author: Martha Quinn

quotes.text: My mom FedExes a red velvet cake she makes from scratch to me every birthday.
quotes.author: Molly Sims

quotes.text: I remember my mom dressed like Janis Joplin.
quotes.author: Bryan White

quotes.text: It was sort of just a family sport. My mom and dad were pretty keen golfers when I was young and so were my grandparents, and I just sort of tagged along with them.
quotes.author: Karrie Webb

quotes.text: I showed my mom the movie then I told her the movie got bought and that it was gonna be shown in theatres and be on video. Everyone was really psyched about it. Everyone in my little town of hounds started to call me movie star.
quotes.author: Jason Mewes

quotes.text: A Modern Mom to me is not always someone that juggles a career and family. A Modern Mom is a woman who takes care of herself on the inside and the outside.
quotes.author: Regina King

quotes.text: I learned a lot from my Mom. My favorite lesson: remember there is no such thing as a certain way to parent and to remember that you are learning along with your child - it's ok to make mistakes.
quotes.author: Regina King

quotes.text: There are days when I wonder why my mom couldn't be here to see this.
quotes.author: Maya Rudolph

quotes.text: My mom was onstage when she was pregnant with me.
quotes.author: Zosia Mamet

quotes.text: Of course, I would be depressed sometimes, and my Mom would be worried about me because I would just sleep to escape. Cause I was so scared of being a musician or artist, or whatever you want to call it.
quotes.author: Chantal Kreviazuk

quotes.text: I was into opera as a kid - I'd play 'Carmen' and sing and dance. My mom signed me up for a theater group before preschool, and I never looked back.
quotes.author: Nina Arianda

quotes.text: I begged my mom to let me start skating.
quotes.author: Debi Thomas

quotes.text: I would make my mom buy me the toy doctor kit.
quotes.author: Debi Thomas

quotes.text: I was born and raised in the high desert of Nevada in a tiny town called Searchlight. My dad was a hard rock miner. My mom took in wash. I grew up around people of strong values - even if they rarely talked about them.
quotes.author: Harry Reid

quotes.text: I remember my mom saying to me that what your friends do is one thing, but what you do could be on the front page of the paper.
quotes.author: Scott McClellan

quotes.text: I've looked at pictures that my mom has of me, from when I was four years old at the turntable. I'm there, reaching up to play the records. I feel like I was bred to do what I do. I've been into music, and listening to music and critiquing it, my whole life.
quotes.author: Dr. Dre

quotes.text: My mom has this great skiing event in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, every year for a local charity.
quotes.author: Joely Fisher

quotes.text: I suddenly had this really mad desire to have an affair with a woman. I was divorced. I was childless. I figured there's got to be one more way to really tick off my mom.
quotes.author: Carol Leifer

quotes.text: My mom is in her mid-60s and has more energy and is more youthful than any human being I know. It's pretty incredible.
quotes.author: Oliver Hudson

quotes.text: I don't think I would have been able to stick with it and been proud of who I am and be feminine out on the court. I think I would have folded to the peer pressure if I didn't have my mom to encourage me to be me and be proud of how tall I am.
quotes.author: Lisa Leslie

quotes.text: For me, being tall was very positive because I thought my mom was the most beautiful person ever.
quotes.author: Lisa Leslie

quotes.text: My mom didn't ever think I would take to acting because I was a very shy, very reserved kind of child. But obviously, something changed!
quotes.author: Abigail Breslin

quotes.text: I was watching TV at age 9 or 10, and my mom said that I came from the front room and I told her that I want to act. And she said if you want to do this at 18, then you can. It was a very simple story, yet, I do not even remember the conversation that I had with my mother. Until she reminded me of the story many years later.
quotes.author: Derek Luke

quotes.text: I've always wanted to be an actress, ever since I was a little girl. I always played the mom and I played my sister as the daughter. I wanted to be an actress on television and movies instead of just around the house.
quotes.author: Dakota Fanning

quotes.text: My dad named me Dakota and my mom came up with my first name Hannah. So it's Hannah Dakota Fanning.
quotes.author: Dakota Fanning

quotes.text: I didn't really know what I wanted to do, and then I got this call from a casting director in Los Angeles. She remembered me from something years before, and she called my mom wanting me to audition for this thing.
quotes.author: Scott Speedman

quotes.text: My mom would be leaving the house and she'd say, 'Don't you pull out all of the old dresses in the attic and put on a show again!' And the door would close, and that's exactly what I'd do. The show was calling me!
quotes.author: Michael Patrick King

quotes.text: I do believe that there are African Americans who have thick accents. My mom has a thick accent my relatives have thick accents. But sometimes you have to adjust when you go into the world of film, TV, theatre, in order to make it accessible to people.
quotes.author: Viola Davis

quotes.text: My mom once lost track of me at the zoo and when she found me I was lecturing a man about the difference between dromedary and Bactrian camels. I was about 3 1/2.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.text: Work ethic has always been stressed in my family. My dad is going to be 80 years old and he still works part time. My mom just retired a couple years ago and she's in her mid- to late 70s.
quotes.author: Jamie Moyer

quotes.text: I was home-schooled, was always very close with my mom and was very straight-laced and square. I was never the rebellious one, and I never threw hissy fits.
quotes.author: Brie Larson

quotes.text: I was 3 when I told my mom that I knew what my dharma was and that I wanted to be an actor.
quotes.author: Brie Larson

quotes.text: For a kid who's lost his mom and all the rage and grief that no one was able to talk out of me, football was a very therapeutic sport. Very.
quotes.author: Jon Hamm

quotes.text: I wanted to marry a girl just like my mom.
quotes.author: Michael Bergin

quotes.text: But the fact is, I'm not work-identified. I'm not a lawyer or a writer. I'm a mom, and I'm a woman, and that's the kind of people I want to see in books in the starring role.
quotes.author: Lisa Scottoline

quotes.text: My father left... but I tell my mom - and I told my mom this when I was a kid - I said, 'You know what, Mom? Good thing he left because you're a strong woman.'
quotes.author: J. R. Martinez

quotes.text: When I came out of my mom's womb, I had 'sitcom' stamped on my forehead.
quotes.author: Sean Hayes

quotes.text: I played with dolls until I was 15. My mother encouraged it because my older sister got married when she was 15, so Mom thought that the longer I stayed with dolls, the better.
quotes.author: Linda Evans

quotes.text: I'm probably a little more like my dad. But because of my mom, I never saw being a woman as being an impediment to being able to do something. She had her Ph.D. before I was born.
quotes.author: Mary Cheney

quotes.text: My brother Jim and I spent many wonderful summers working on dairy farms in Wisconsin owned by Mom's cousins, and as members of our local Boy Scout troop.
quotes.author: Peter Agre

quotes.text: When Queer Eye hit, the church told my mom they were praying for me. She said, God loves him too. And I support him 100 percent.
quotes.author: Jai Rodriguez

quotes.text: My mom doesn't get the whole gay thing, but she loves me.
quotes.author: Jai Rodriguez

quotes.text: I had said to some pastor that I was having thoughts, and the church turned on me. They went to my mom and said, So sorry about your son.
quotes.author: Jai Rodriguez

quotes.text: I am a mom as well as a senator!
quotes.author: Patty Murray

quotes.text: I had so many offers after 'True Blood' for things that were someone in the same vein, but nowhere near Alan Ball's vision. Or something that was over-the-top and fantastical. And I've always wanted to play the regular, working-class mom, and I've never really had the chance to do that.
quotes.author: Michelle Forbes

quotes.text: I'd never really babysat. I feel like I'm Blair, or 'Gossip Girl.' A teenager, basically - and now suddenly I'm a mom?
quotes.author: Cecily von Ziegesar

quotes.text: I always wanted to be a mom.
quotes.author: Kate Hudson

quotes.text: When my dad was badly weakened by the flu and my mom wanted to call an ambulance to take him to the emergency room, he wouldn't go unless he could shave first and change into a nice shirt and a pair of slacks.
quotes.author: Rich Lowry

quotes.text: I don't deal with death very well. My brother, John Candy, my dad, my mom, Brandon Tartikoff just a couple of weeks ago. I mean, you lose a lot of people in your life, and that's one thing I am constantly working on - pain management.
quotes.author: James Belushi

quotes.text: Every family is different. I am mom and I am dad and I'm going to do my best. You should be proud, walk through life saying I have the coolest family. I am part of a modern family.
quotes.author: Ricky Martin

quotes.text: I would borrow my mom's red Borghese lipstick and smear it on like a clown!
quotes.author: Brooke Burns

quotes.text: There was a point - when I was a kid - where I said I wanted to be like Luke Skywalker, with blond hair and blue eyes. My mom right there told me to never be ashamed of who I am.
quotes.author: Chaske Spencer

quotes.text: I got tackled once in a movie theater. I was with my mom and brother, and then suddenly I got hit from behind and sort of sprawled out on the candy counter.
quotes.author: Scott Wolf

quotes.text: For example, I loved English and history at school. I would have loved to have done a degree in either. But my Mom said I didn't have time for university.
quotes.author: Vanessa Mae

quotes.text: I've had to adapt my wardrobe to my various roles, both at the office, as a mom, and for television. When I shop for the season I look for pieces that will suit every facet of my daily life, not just one single occasion.
quotes.author: Nina Garcia

quotes.text: Married and divorced, three beautiful daughters, two in college. The other one is 16, lives with her mom. I'm 46, I've worked for the Post Office for 18 years, seven facilities in three states.
quotes.author: Arthur Godfrey

quotes.text: I naturally wanted to be saved, so when I came home I told my mom I wanted to be confirmed. That's the way I related to it, being raised an Episcopalian. I went to Dallas and got confirmed.
quotes.author: T-Bone Burnett

quotes.text: I heard the Beatles and the Stones, and Mom bought me an electric guitar. I played lead for four years and then switched to bass. One day someone suggested that I should sing, so I sheepishly stepped up to the microphone and the rest is rock history.
quotes.author: Glenn Hughes

quotes.text: I wanted to be an astronaut and wanted to go to space camp, but then I found out that I was too short to become an astronaut. My mom really made me believe that if I worked hard enough and if I really wanted to do it, I could do it.
quotes.author: Soleil Moon Frye

quotes.text: My mom always made sure I lived my life as a regular kid.
quotes.author: Soleil Moon Frye

quotes.text: I had ridiculous amounts of energy. Mom's like, you're driving me crazy - do you want to try gymnastics? From the moment I started it, I loved it and it kind of was like storybook from there.
quotes.author: Alicia Sacramone

quotes.text: My mother stopped working when she had my brother. She was a full time mom until I started getting heavily into ice skating lessons, and it got to the point where they really needed my mom to earn an income.
quotes.author: Dorothy Hamill

quotes.text: I didn't really get into golf until I was about 14. My mom and dad were taking lessons from a pro an hour and a half from our farm in Cohuna, Australia. When they got home, I'd ask my mom to explain everything they learned - drills and all.
quotes.author: Stuart Appleby

quotes.text: My mother was predominately a stay-at-home mom.
quotes.author: Andrew Rannells

quotes.text: No, like I said, my dad was never really part of the tennis. His involvement around what I did with the tennis and with my mom and my grandparents was really not a part of my life.
quotes.author: Jimmy Connors

quotes.text: I think my mom threatened to put me up for adoption a few times.
quotes.author: Ivanka Trump

quotes.text: At 3 years old, I was imitating and doing fun little commercials for the family. Then at 5, I knew, 'OK, this is something I really like.' At 8, I was crying in front of the mirror and my mom was like, 'Oh boy, here we go. We know what she's going to do.'
quotes.author: Lana Parrilla

quotes.text: I never liked apples. In fact, when I was a little girl, my mom wanted to give me apples in my lunch box and I would ask for green peppers. So bizarre... It's funny - I don't have an apple a day, but I can say that I have a few a week.
quotes.author: Lana Parrilla

quotes.text: My mom and father are extremely proud. They love it when I don't die. I've done so many movies where I've died that their first question when I book a job is, 'So, are you going to die in this?'
quotes.author: Michael Ealy

quotes.text: My mom has a tape from when I was, like, 2 years old, talking with my grandma, telling her a story that's really elaborate about werewolves and wolves.
quotes.author: Amanda Hocking

quotes.text: I couldn't wait until I grew up. I used to look at my mom's stockings and put them on with her high heels and mess with my hair.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.text: My mom grew up in Kansas, my dad in Indiana. They had boring childhoods.
quotes.author: Hunter Parrish

quotes.text: My mom was a dancer, my dad's a singer and I've always had that kind of music in my life.
quotes.author: Elvis Stojko

quotes.text: My mom died of cancer when I was really young. I'm not someone who tries to work out their own stuff with a role, but I think that happened despite my best efforts to keep myself separate from it.
quotes.author: Sarah Polley

quotes.text: My mom sent me to regular high school because she wanted me to have that experience and not say that I missed out, but I didn't like it at all. I'm more comfortable in the world that I'm in, I grew up in it so when I get around normal kids in regular high school I don't know what to do. I feel more secure in an adult environment.
quotes.author: Alexa Vega

quotes.text: We've got activists all across the country like the members of the Million Mom March organization, some of their leaders are here tonight. We're phone banking congressional offices and pursuing editorial boards.
quotes.author: Michael D. Barnes

quotes.text: My dad and mom divorced when I was around ten, and I didn't live with him after that, though he was close by and we saw each other weekly. I wasn't really aware that he was a writer I didn't start reading his writing until I was about fifteen. It occurred to me then that my dad was kind of special he's still one of my favorite writers.
quotes.author: Andre Dubus III

quotes.text: Sometimes, if you don't have kids yourself, it's assumed you won't understand or know how to play a mom, which is kind of silly if you think about it.
quotes.author: Tricia Helfer

quotes.text: I wasn't always a writer. When I went to college and majored in fine arts, I was a painter. Then I was a stay-at-home mom.
quotes.author: Janet Evanovich

quotes.text: It's always been a dream of mine to get somewhere and to have my mom and dad with me up there.
quotes.author: Haley Reinhart

quotes.text: Dad worked his entire career as an aviation technician. Mom was a legal secretary who became a teacher. We lived a simple American life.
quotes.author: Brian Sandoval

quotes.text: My mom was a Democrat and I was scared to death that she was gonna blow it. First I was going to hell with Monroe, and now to Republican hell with Nixon.
quotes.author: Tommy Rettig

quotes.text: It's impossible to put yourself first when you're a mom.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.text: My parents were both in show business. My father was an actor, my mom an actress, and both singers, dancers and actors. They met in Los Angeles doing a play together and so I grew up in a show biz family.
quotes.author: Micky Dolenz

quotes.text: My dad was a good athlete. My mom had longevity. There were some athletic genes that certainly got passed down.
quotes.author: Hale Irwin

quotes.text: Usually a family is led through the mom or the dad and their career and for the family to be led by my career, even though God has led it, could be a lot of pressure.
quotes.author: Stacie Orrico

quotes.text: I wasn't one to go out and buy a new car and stereo system and expensive clothes. My mom helped keep me grounded.
quotes.author: Christina Applegate

quotes.text: My dad's an architect and my mom owned a French bakery for twelve years.
quotes.author: Alison Lohman

quotes.text: Well, I am not really a conventional mom at all. Like, I had my kids really young. I had Danny when I was 18 or 19 and then Liam when I was 23 and Molly, I had when I was a little older.
quotes.author: Monica Potter

quotes.text: As a mom, I understand how important it is to ensure kids start their day right and always make sure my kids have a nutritious breakfast. One in five U.S. children live in homes where food is not always available, which is why I partnered with Kellogg's on their 'Share Your Breakfast' campaign, which provide breakfasts to kids in need.
quotes.author: Monica Potter

quotes.text: My mom thought I might be good for voiceover. She thought I had a cute voice, so maybe I could do a cartoon or something. And while we were looking into that, we also thought I should get into theater acting, so I tried it and the first audition I went on, I booked it. And it kind of just snowballed from there.
quotes.author: Atticus Shaffer

quotes.text: Just recently I was in Target with my mom shopping, and out of the blue, I see this father and his two daughters and he says, 'Can they get a picture with you?' And I'm thinking to myself, 'Am I the one millionth customer or something?'
quotes.author: Atticus Shaffer

quotes.text: I've always been homeschooled, so doing it on set is kind of the same thing. My mom makes it very interactive - we'll get a book on chocolate and learn how to make it, or she will buy antique items. I love military history, the mechanics and strategy of it.
quotes.author: Atticus Shaffer

quotes.text: I was two years old when my mom put me in mommy and me classes. I always had a lot of energy so it was the perfect fit!
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.text: I'm almost a full-time mom.
quotes.author: Ekaterina Gordeeva

quotes.text: My mom and my dad wanted my brother and I to have a better life, you know, better education, better jobs. It was probably harder, much, much harder, for my parents. When you're a kid, you can learn a language much more easily I learned English in less than a year.
quotes.author: Mila Kunis

quotes.text: It was definitely a part of our life. I mean, my mom had both her brothers and her fiancee in Vietnam at the same time, so it wasn't just my dad's story, it was my mom's story too. And we definitely grew up listening to the stories.
quotes.author: Vanessa Kerry

quotes.text: I'm not a figurehead for anything. I was a single mom with two kids. What else was I going to do? It was either be in a band or be a waitress.
quotes.author: Chrissie Hynde

quotes.text: I told my agents that I didn't want to go on the audition. But as that was happening I called my mom, who has been watching the show from the beginning, and my mom said, 'It's the coolest show. You have to go.'
quotes.author: Mary Lynn Rajskub

quotes.text: My mom is still yelling at me because she needs more autographed pictures.
quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

quotes.text: I'm named after a horse. My mom's best friend had a horse named Brooke, so my dad suggested 'Brooklyn' as a more formal version, and it just stuck - and now I live in Brooklyn part-time, so go figure.
quotes.author: Brooklyn Decker

quotes.text: But my mother and father were married when my mom was 20 and my dad was 24.
quotes.author: Rachael Leigh Cook

quotes.text: You know that I am living proof that the American Dream is real. Growing up, our congressman cut through government bureaucratic red tape to help my mom buy our first house. That's the kind of congressman I'll be.
quotes.author: Geoff Davis

quotes.text: When I was 11 my friend's mom made a peanut butter sandwich. I ate the sandwich and was like, 'I'm never eating anything else again.' And I still eat peanut butter every day. I would put peanut butter on a steak.
quotes.author: Aasif Mandvi

quotes.text: My mom raised us three boys by herself on welfare. It's not worse than anybody else's life.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Donovan

quotes.text: Now, if you're Al Gore, you can afford $10 a pop for squiggly-pig-tailed fluorescent light bulbs. But if you're mainstream America, two or three kids, mom and dad working outside the home, that's not a very good deal.
quotes.author: Joe Barton

quotes.text: I still feel like a kid sometimes myself so hard to believe that I'm a mom. Now I'm an adult! It only took 38 years!
quotes.author: Ana Ortiz

quotes.text: I was really lucky. My gal pal was my mom.
quotes.author: Ana Ortiz

quotes.text: In third grade, I was taking tap-dance lessons, and about six weeks before the recital I wanted to quit. My mom said, 'No, you're going to stay with it.' Well, I did it, and I was bad, too! But my parents never let their kids walk away from something because it was too hard.
quotes.author: Rebecca Lobo

quotes.text: I love to fly. I always wanted to fly. It's been one of my dreams since I was 3 years old. I remember saying to my mom, 3 years old, every day, 'I can fly!' Living on the ninth floor, it was dangerous.
quotes.author: Elena Anaya

quotes.text: In fact, my mom always told me because I was the daughter of an Army officer born overseas in Paris, France, that under the Constitution she believed that I could never run for president.
quotes.author: Karen Hughes

quotes.text: They wrapped her up like a baby burrito to show to Mom. Here were a mother and her daughter and I love them both so much. I couldn't wait for Courtney to come to the hospital so I could have all my women together.
quotes.author: Al Roker

quotes.text: My mom breastfed me for more than a year, and I can't imagine doing it any other way. It's cheap and much better for the environment, and you don't have to lug all that stuff around.
quotes.author: Emily Deschanel

quotes.text: I never thought I was a great mom. I always worked. I fell in love with my children as they got older.
quotes.author: Marla Gibbs

quotes.text: My mom just understands about stuff. We have a really good trust, and she knows I can take care of myself.
quotes.author: Balthazar Getty

quotes.text: I don't have to do a lot to my eyebrows. My mom always told me not to pluck them, which is great advice.
quotes.author: Arizona Muse

quotes.text: I remember my mom saying that after you have a baby you get really thin. So you gain all that weight and then you just lose it and keep losing it.
quotes.author: Arizona Muse

quotes.text: I feel like I'm a stay-at-home mom, which I was for the five years before this. She's absolutely been my focus. That's the choice I made. Desperate Housewives is perfect for me. I get to go back to work and still be able to take my daughter to school and pick her up.
quotes.author: Teri Hatcher

quotes.text: If you just stay away from junk, and stick with what your mom taught you, you're eating pretty healthy.
quotes.author: Sprague Grayden

quotes.text: I'm from Manchester, Mass., so it was lobster, lobster and more lobster! Also, lots of fish that we caught in the summers, clam chowder and roast beef sandwiches. But my mom was pretty healthy we had a lot of chicken and broccoli and rice as well.
quotes.author: Sprague Grayden

quotes.text: I'm not sure anyone - and I could be wrong in this - grows up thinking, I want to be a single mom.
quotes.author: Bridget Moynahan

quotes.text: I'm a mom first, a singer second.
quotes.author: Gretchen Wilson

quotes.text: Mom worked with autistic children.
quotes.author: Isabel Lucas

quotes.text: So much of our lives are defined by habit or what the guy next to us is doing, never wondering and knowing who and what we support with our actions, from the detergent Mom always used, to my favorite dish I make... A lot of my life is unexamined habit.
quotes.author: Kristin Bauer van Straten

quotes.text: My mom was so people-friendly. She was incredible. She'd go to the mall, and she'd talk to everyone. Give people a kiss on the cheek. I think if I wasn't pushed around a lot, I'd be great with people. Maybe I still can be.
quotes.author: Fred Couples

quotes.text: My mom was Sicilian, my dad was Sicilian. Mom was a great cook, but all the women were.
quotes.author: Chazz Palminteri

quotes.text: I used to do skits for my mom... and I was always entertaining as a kid.
quotes.author: Leah Remini

quotes.text: They see me as being this Super Mom on TV who also can more than handle a difficult husband, and they assume I'm going to be just full of wisdom as a mother and wife myself.
quotes.author: Patricia Richardson

quotes.text: I took piano for many years. I kicked and screamed through all of my lessons, but my mom really insisted.
quotes.author: Kristin Kreuk

quotes.text: When I was 10 years old my mom used to play Tupac while she cleaned the house.
quotes.author: Soulja Boy

quotes.text: My dad died when I was three so my mom had to raise four kids on her own, and I think there's a part of me that pulls upon having watched my mom do that our whole lives. She had to make it work.
quotes.author: Leslie Bibb

quotes.text: That's a big deal for kids, when they come into the kitchen and the teacher is drinking coffee with mom. They react differently on the next day when you say: 'Sit down and shut-up!'
quotes.author: Ed O'Neill

quotes.text: I love my mother Ali so much. I'm a momma's boy. I just have a very cool mom. It's not as though I had any say in the matter. I'm just really fortunate. She's the most kind, loving, giving woman.
quotes.author: Hayden Christensen

quotes.text: My mom had gotten a Super 8 camera to make home movies with, and my brother and me got our hands on it and ran with it.
quotes.author: Lev Yilmaz

quotes.text: No one was more important than my mom and dad. I know they are watching from a place up in heaven here today to make sure all their kids are doing good.
quotes.author: Eddie Murray

quotes.text: I really like Calvin Klein for his classic simplicity. I also think Prabal Gurung designs some great pieces that work well for me. My mom has such great style she's my biggest influence.
quotes.author: Isabelle Fuhrman

quotes.text: I never let anyone pluck, including myself, unless my mom approves. She guards my eyebrows. She's like the eyebrow police!
quotes.author: Isabelle Fuhrman

quotes.text: My grandmother had six kids - one died as an infant - and she was dirt-poor, and all her kids got an education. And my mom grew up poor. And they both worked so hard and cultivated so much of their own happiness. I wanted to have that like an amulet. Not like armor, but like a magic feather. Like Dumbo's magic feather.
quotes.author: Lucy Alibar

quotes.text: I want somebody like my mom. My mom is a very charitable woman. She's the sweetest woman in the world. I'm looking for the second sweetest woman in the world. I'm looking for honesty and a big heart.
quotes.author: Jason Derulo

quotes.text: My mom would have liked it that I patterned myself more after Jimmy Reed.
quotes.author: Jimmy Smith

quotes.text: My mom and dad - they were always there. They were always on the set. They focused on our family life. The entertainment business wasn't the end-all. They weren't out to get the next big paycheck or the next big movie. It was about 'What can we do as a family.'
quotes.author: Candace Cameron Bure

quotes.text: The military infrastructure grew me. My faith in God is important, my belief in my country is important, my relationship to my family is important, the things that Mom and Dad tell you growing up are important.
quotes.author: Tommy Franks

quotes.text: I always think about which blood drive was going on in Georgia that day when that husband or mom or school teacher rolled up their sleeve and actually gave me a second chance at life. It's the ultimate gift of life, and I'm the one who was on the other end.
quotes.author: Niki Taylor

quotes.text: I was a big fan of 'The Smurfs' growing up, even though by default - my mom used to force me to watch because she was a 'Smurfs' fan.
quotes.author: Jayma Mays

quotes.text: My mom was a big 'Smurfs' fan, so she would force me to watch every Saturday morning. I had no choice in the matter. I would jump downstairs on Saturday morning, 'Hurray, cartoons!' and she would say, 'Smurfs! That's what you're watching.'
quotes.author: Jayma Mays

quotes.text: When I was little, we lived on 8 acres and my mom had a horse. But when I was 7, my mom kicked my dad out, and then in order to feed us five kids, she got critters cheap or for free and raised them for food. We milked a cow, raised chickens, pigs and beef cattle. We heated our one-story house with wood and stayed cold all winter.
quotes.author: Bonnie Jo Campbell

quotes.text: I grew up with the classics. My mom and I would sit and watch 'Singin' in the Rain' and 'White Christmas' - those kind of movies.
quotes.author: Lucas Grabeel

quotes.text: Two weeks ago at the U.S. Amateur, my mom caddied, and that is kind of a different feeling, because she's your mom and you have to listen to her. It was really comfortable having my mom there, but it's also really relieving and comfortable to have someone that knows the course off their hat, really.
quotes.author: Lydia Ko

quotes.text: My mom is a very warm, typical sort of Jewish-mother type. And my dad has a somewhat, um, different personality.
quotes.author: Peter Orszag

quotes.text: I hope that through my work, artists will take some chances, break some rules, and make art that comes from inside of them. I would like to be remembered as a kind person, a great Mom, and a bit unruly - in a good way!
quotes.author: Angela Cartwright

quotes.text: I think there's a time to work, and everyone has to kind of adjust. And then there's a time to relax, and be the mom or take the kids on vacation when you need to wind down. So it's a matter of planning, and being able to map out your year or your week or let's start with the day. It is just being multi-tasking and being available.
quotes.author: Vanessa Williams

quotes.text: Well, my mom taught public school music for almost 40 years. And she's about 5 feet - and very mighty. And she would control her kids a lot by giving them the eye, or the stare.
quotes.author: Vanessa Williams

quotes.text: She had a hit for every syllable: 'Don't. You. Ever. Talk. To. Me. Like. That. Ever. Again.' That was the last time I ever talked back to Mom.
quotes.author: Misty May-Treanor

quotes.text: My mom's passionate and energetic and very funny and enthusiastic.
quotes.author: Eric Stonestreet

quotes.text: My whole life sort of ended when my mom died.
quotes.author: Cheryl Strayed

quotes.text: I always tell people, I'm a better swimmer because I'm a mom and a better mom because I'm swimmer.
quotes.author: Amanda Beard

quotes.text: People close to me called me 'Curry in a Hurry.' I was moving through life at 100 miles an hour trying to further my career and be a great mom and make everyone happy.
quotes.author: Ann Curry

quotes.text: I think my first big purchase was actually for my mom. She had one of those '90s TVs in her living room that's like a 10x10 brick, so I purchased her a flatscreen for her living room.
quotes.author: Dave Franco

quotes.text: I'm not sure what I want to do when I grow up, or if I'm sure I ever want to grow up. I'm sure there are people that wish I would, but you know, my mom will get over it.
quotes.author: Jerry Doyle

quotes.text: My mom had to beg the guys to let me play. I couldn't even play the drums right - Brian had to show me.
quotes.author: Dennis Wilson

quotes.text: It's quite hard to have your mom as a teacher - it's like, she's not necessarily a 'real teacher' for me. But she'd always teach me to really hear the music, and develop my ear, and to try and hear the harmonics of the piano.
quotes.author: Birdy

quotes.text: My mom's a concert pianist, so she started teaching me when I was around seven. When I was eight, I started writing my own songs, and kinda started putting piano and singing together. But I'm trained classically, which is a big influence on me, I think.
quotes.author: Birdy

quotes.text: We're definitely a hodgepodge of influences. Mine, most heavily, would be Southern rock - the Allman Brothers, Lynyrd Skynyrd and stuff like that. Hillary is more from the country side - her mom is Linda Davis, a country singer. Dave, he's a big fan of the Eagles and like that.
quotes.author: Charles Kelley

quotes.text: My mom was the picture of the blue-collar mom: Two and three and four jobs to make sure that me and my sister never needed, that was her thing.
quotes.author: Ne-Yo

quotes.text: For the first few years of my life my mom used to cut my hair so there were a lot of bowl-cut hair styles.
quotes.author: Ne-Yo

quotes.text: I probably wouldn't be singing if not for Michael Jackson. When I started singing, I didn't like my tone until my mom put me on to Michael Jackson and Stevie Wonder, so listening to the way they used their instrument helped me get more comfortable with my own.
quotes.author: Ne-Yo

quotes.text: I was serious about ballet for a long time, but my mom got me into tap and jazz and modern and hip-hop, and I was one of those over-lessoned children.
quotes.author: Greta Gerwig

quotes.text: My earliest acting memory is making up a play for my mom and dad called The Lonesome Baby. I have no idea what The Lonesome Baby was about. I just remember the title. But I'm sure it was an epic.
quotes.author: Jane Horrocks

quotes.text: I think if I could be any superhero, it'd probably be my mom... but I don't think I'd look too good in high heels, so it's not gonna happen.
quotes.author: Jason Behr

quotes.text: I am very proud of my mom and consider her the most courageous woman I know. With perseverance, sacrifice and hard work, she raised a family of Olympic athletes and gave us the tools and the spirit to succeed. That is something that my brothers and I will always be thankful for.
quotes.author: Diana Lopez

quotes.text: My mom's collard greens. No one else in the world can make them like hers. I'm not just saying that because she's my mom. She's got some Mississippi secret. I could seriously eat them every day.
quotes.author: Santigold

quotes.text: It's the best thing ever - I love being a mom. This is my only child. My career was a priority earlier in my life, but now my son is definitely the priority.
quotes.author: Stephanie Mills

quotes.text: I love every second of being a mom.
quotes.author: Lily Aldridge

quotes.text: When I can 10 or 11, my mom was the one out there catching passes for me. She was my prime receiver.
quotes.author: Joe Theismann

quotes.text: My mom was very strict when I was growing up. I could not talk to boys until I was 18. I had to study and work hard.
quotes.author: Coco Lee

quotes.text: I'm not a businessperson. I have no sense of money. My mom does everything for me. She makes all my decisions for me, and even buys my clothes. She's very protective.
quotes.author: Coco Lee

quotes.text: I'm a mom, a full-time mom when I'm not taping. I do the carpool thing, and bake the cookies, and do the homework.
quotes.author: Vanna White

quotes.text: It would be great to do another television show that was a multi-camera because the hours are so wonderful and you can be a good mom at the same time. The problem is, there aren't a lot of multi-camera shows that I personally like. My aesthetic is more geared toward single-camera shows.
quotes.author: Kaitlin Olson

quotes.text: My mom, Emilie, always taught me to think hard about marriage.
quotes.author: Alyson Hannigan

quotes.text: My mom was a photographer and whenever they needed a baby for a modelling job, she'd stick me in front of the camera. That's how it started.
quotes.author: Alyson Hannigan

quotes.text: I love Westerns and I remember as a kid climbing up on the couch and make it into a saddle and shoot guns and fall off. I would lay there after my death and my mom would tell me to eat lunch and I'd say, 'I'm still dead, Mom!' I was Method, even then.
quotes.author: Creed Bratton

quotes.text: When I was a child it was very clear what I was allowed to see and what I was not allowed to see and there was no discussion or option or negotiation. Whatever my mom said, that's what went down.
quotes.author: Yul Vazquez

quotes.text: My mom put me in dance classes when I was 5 years old.
quotes.author: Danny Pudi

quotes.text: When I see my mom in the stands, it always pushes me to succeed.
quotes.author: Ashton Eaton

quotes.text: I think it would be a lot easier if I said, 'I feel like a dude,' but I was raised by a southern mom, so I know how to put on lipstick and walk in heels and rock that look. It's exactly that juxtaposition that confuses people.
quotes.author: Saskia de Brauw

quotes.text: My mom and dad are both in stand-up comedy, so that's where I started, that's where I got everything. My roots are holding the mic.
quotes.author: Pauly Shore

quotes.text: My mom is two people to me. She's my mom number one, and then she's this lady most comedians know as being a legendary owner of a nightclub that's responsible for starting a lot of heavy careers.
quotes.author: Pauly Shore

quotes.text: When I was six years old my friend was auditioning for 'Annie,' and I decided I wanted to audition with her. My mom was worried I would fall flat on my face because I'd never opened my mouth to sing, so she sent me to vocal lessons. I did the audition and fell in love with the entire process of a show.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Emerson

quotes.text: I think of myself as a fairly attractive girl and always have, thanks to my mom. I was brought into this world thinking I was gorgeous because my mother was extremely devoted to this notion.
quotes.author: Amy Schumer

quotes.text: I remember my mom had a big collection of copies of Saturday Evening Post magazines, and that was really my introduction to those great illustrators.
quotes.author: Thomas Kincade

quotes.text: I know this is kind of corny, but we thought about renewing our vows again because I think my mom would really love it if we did that in Arkansas, where I came from.
quotes.author: Mary Steenburgen

quotes.text: I've been an atheist since I was nine years old. And my mom is really religious, so we have a strange relationship. But if my mother was right, what would be the reason that the gods could let anything bad happen in the world?
quotes.author: Tarsem Singh

quotes.text: My mom and I have always had issues.
quotes.author: Mindy McCready

quotes.text: I'm a mom first.
quotes.author: Mindy McCready

quotes.text: I'm not blaming my mom for my life because I am responsible for me, and nobody can change me or ruin me easier than I can.
quotes.author: Mindy McCready

quotes.text: My dad is a lawyer and my mom is an artist. So growing up was exactly what it sounds like - strict household but a lot of creativity. They are so psyched that I get to make music for a living. My parents rule.
quotes.author: Ty Segall

quotes.text: Well I was eight years old, and I have an older cousin who is three years older than me and she was doing acting, commercials, and modeling at the time and... to see my cousin doing that was really inspiring and I wanted to do it. So I went to my mom and I asked her if I could do it, and for the acting part of it, she made me study for a year.
quotes.author: Hailee Steinfeld

quotes.text: I'm a just a mom when I walk down the street.
quotes.author: Alice Barrett

quotes.text: Naturally, people are curious about how my real mom feels about me having a TV mom.
quotes.author: Rico Rodriguez

quotes.text: I just started watching wrestling in 2008, and I've loved it ever since. I told my mom I wanted to become a wrestler.
quotes.author: Rico Rodriguez

quotes.text: My mom taught me how to make grilled chicken, and I bake, too.
quotes.author: Rico Rodriguez

quotes.text: For as long as I've been acting, I have been very lucky to be paired with really great actresses playing my mom.
quotes.author: Rico Rodriguez

quotes.text: When I was going on auditions, it was nerve-racking. I'd always say to my mom that it would be awesome if I could get a series. When Modern Family came along, I said, 'You know what, Mom? I believe I'm going to get this role.'
quotes.author: Rico Rodriguez

quotes.text: For some students, school is the only place where they get a hot meal and a warm hug. Teachers are sometimes the only ones who tell our children they can go from an Indian reservation to the Ivy League, from the home of a struggling single mom to the White House.
quotes.author: Denise Juneau

quotes.text: I always had an interest in fashion because my mom is a celebrity fashion stylist. I grew up being on set or in showrooms.
quotes.author: Jasmine Tookes

quotes.text: My mom always taught me to be sweet and polite and cross my legs because it's what the guys like. Actually, they like a raunchy girl once in a while.
quotes.author: Tiffani Amber Thiessen

quotes.text: My original inspiration was my mom: a few years after the death of my dad, she started dating one my teachers!
quotes.author: Meg Cabot

quotes.text: If I go on dates, my mom is always with me. She's always there making sure I'm all right. Like if I go to see a movie with a boy, she'll go to dinner next door.
quotes.author: Ariel Winter

quotes.text: An agent saw one of the plays I did at ACT, but my mom was like, No, she's too young. I became so annoying that a year and a half later she just couldn't stand hearing me any more!
quotes.author: Marla Sokoloff

quotes.text: Cancer has been unfortunately in my life. My mom's best friend is kicking ass in her battle with breast cancer. Both of my grandmas had cancer. I recently lost a friend to cancer.
quotes.author: Marla Sokoloff

quotes.text: I spend so much time with my parents. My mom and I were joined at the hip for five years. There was not one moment when I wasn't with her.
quotes.author: Kay Panabaker

quotes.text: My mom still lives in Denver and some of my brothers are still in the area, so I still have strong ties there.
quotes.author: Terrell Davis

quotes.text: When I'm in the gym, I'm in the gym, and that is my focus. But when I'm not in the gym, I'm enjoying being a mom and taking care of those responsibilities .. They really do provide me with the balance that I need to be a more complete athlete.
quotes.author: Melanie Roach

quotes.text: I'm looking forward to being a mom and a wife and a business owner.
quotes.author: Melanie Roach

quotes.text: I've been a pretty selfish mom and a very unselfish athlete for about three years now and it's time to put my family first. It's probably time to move on.
quotes.author: Melanie Roach

quotes.text: My first big job was an Abercrombie &ampFitch campaign. But my mom wouldn't let me skip school for it, so I missed half of the shoot. When we got there, we realized Bruce Weber was the photographer we knew we had made a mistake!
quotes.author: Lauren Bush

quotes.text: My mom and my stepdad are both therapists.
quotes.author: Jennifer Westfeldt

quotes.text: My mom is a constant in my life in so many ways.
quotes.author: Kerri Walsh

quotes.text: My mom was diagnosed with breast cancer when I was 13 and it was something we weren't really aware of as a family.
quotes.author: Rima Fakih

quotes.text: My mom told me to do whatever I wanted to do and don't get too anxious about it.
quotes.author: David Giuntoli

quotes.text: Sometimes when my mom finds a fun article and really wants me to read it, I will. But I prefer to just kind of focus on what I want to do and not really what other people are saying, because I don't want that to affect me too much.
quotes.author: Missy Franklin

quotes.text: My mom and dad put my brother and sister through university and they were very keen for us to have an academic background just to give us a chance.
quotes.author: Rob James-Collier

quotes.text: I had really great parents who always gave me lots of opportunity for choice, but I didn't always realize how rare that was for a girl for them to say, 'You can be a mom or have a career or do both or do something we haven't thought of yet.'
quotes.author: Ally Condie

quotes.text: You eat and sleep it all day long and play on the streets until mom calls you in. My story is no different than anybody else's.
quotes.author: Adam Oates

quotes.text: When you become a mom you just learn how to function sleep deprived and you do get used to it. I came back to work when Finley was three months old and the first few months were rough. Then somehow you learn to exist on no sleep and now when he does upon occasion sleep through the night, which is like a full six hours, you're pretty sure he's suffocating. So you don't sleep anyway.
quotes.author: Holly Marie Combs

quotes.text: I think there's a danger of a being typecast as the all-American mom forever.
quotes.author: JoBeth Williams

quotes.text: My Mom is a ballet director, so I had this idea in me that classical training is the best foundation for anything you do, so I wanted to get a classical background and voice.
quotes.author: Shuler Hensley

quotes.text: Everyone in my family is an artist. Both my parents are painters and my mom's an opera singer. I was never shown any other way to process life.
quotes.author: Aleksa Palladino

quotes.text: Losing my mom at such a young age had a profound effect on my life.
quotes.author: Molly Shannon

quotes.text: I think I'm going to spend some time learning how to be a first-time mom, and then I'll go back to work.
quotes.author: Linda Cardellini

quotes.text: My dad was Jewish. My mom is not. So I was not raised anything.
quotes.author: Matt Lauer

quotes.text: Growing up I always shopped at Victoria's Secret with my mom and saw Angels like Gisele and Karolina Kurkova in the windows.
quotes.author: Lindsay Ellingson

quotes.text: When I was young, I had two older sisters, and since I was the youngest in my family, my mom took me around with her all the time. I was forever with her when she was having coffee in the middle of the afternoon with her three sisters. And they would talk about men. I absorbed a lot of that.
quotes.author: Richard LaGravenese

quotes.text: My earliest memory is seeing Michael Jackson in Melbourne with my sister when I was about ten. I still have this souvenir stick with a glove that would light up and make a peace sign in a bunch of different colors. I'm so happy my mom didn't throw that out.
quotes.author: Emilie de Ravin

quotes.text: I was born to a Nigerian dad and a Kenyan mom, and coming to the States was really academic.
quotes.author: Dayo Okeniyi

quotes.text: Oh, my mom. She's one of my biggest fans.
quotes.author: Patina Miller

quotes.text: They very seldom let me lose my cool. They made me like I was Polly Perfect, which was ridiculous so that when I bump into kids on the street they'd say 'I wish my Mom were like you.'
quotes.author: Charlotte Rae

quotes.text: I usually travel with a lot of people, like my dad, mom and sisters.
quotes.author: Booboo Stewart

quotes.text: I'm a '70s mom, and my daughter is a '90s mom. I know a lot of women my age who are real computer freaks.
quotes.author: Florence Henderson

quotes.text: My mom was a professional fitness competitor, so I go into the gym with her. I train with my dad and mother. It's embarrassing, because she's really strong.
quotes.author: Booboo Stewart

quotes.text: Part of the reason that I moved to Los Angeles is that even though my mom introduced me to all kinds of music, I really wanted to work on having my own identify, on being who I am and doing what I do, and seeing how people responded.
quotes.author: Schuyler Fisk

quotes.text: I'm extremely blessed to have the extraordinary mother that I have, and I don't mean Diana Ross, I mean the mother. My mom paved a road that didn't exist, as did Oprah.
quotes.author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quotes.text: My mom taught me to go after my dreams. I have this faith in myself that I must have gotten from her.
quotes.author: Amy Jo Johnson

quotes.text: Because of my unique experience as my mom's child, the beginning of my journey was more about me trying to figure out who I was on my own. My mom is one of the greatest moms and so supportive of all my siblings and of all of us being who we are, and not who she wanted us to be.
quotes.author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quotes.text: I've been acting my whole life. I have this huge imagination! I'm a dancer and my mom's a dance teacher, and I was always performing and entertaining people. I'd go to see live theatre or a movie, and I'd become the main character for a few days afterwards. I loved being somebody new for a temporary amount of time.
quotes.author: Natasha Calis

quotes.text: So, from a very young age, my mom tells me that I wanted to be Michael J. Fox. I didn't want to be an actor. I just wanted to be Michael J. Fox for awhile. And then, I realized that he was an actor, so I pursued that.
quotes.author: Patrick J. Adams

quotes.text: When I was seven, I asked my mom if I could be on TV, and she said if I really wanted to, I could. I got an agent and booked my first audition.
quotes.author: Natasha Calis

quotes.text: My mom came from such humble beginnings and especially my dad as well. He didn't go to university.
quotes.author: Petra Ecclestone

quotes.text: My mom moved up between Leland and Greenville when I was just a little tot.
quotes.author: Little Milton

quotes.text: Well, Mom and Dad are both actors, and I've spent a lot of time watching my mom on stage and a lot of time on set with my dad, so it was very much a part of my growing up.
quotes.author: Eleanor Tomlinson

quotes.text: I always was drawn to the performing arts. I started dancing when I was two. I sang, loved to act, and loved going to visit my mom on-set. But she wanted me to have a normal childhood, so I wasn't really allowed to pursue acting till I got older.
quotes.author: Rainey Qualley

quotes.text: My mom is a really good cook. I didn't get the cooking gene, but she cooks this really amazing dinner every Christmas, and that's always really fun.
quotes.author: Miranda Cosgrove

quotes.text: Last time I spoke to my mom she called me from a pay phone, and we didn't have the best talk. Ever since my stepdad passed away three years ago, she has been very depressed and hasn't been herself at all.
quotes.author: Eric West

quotes.text: I love getting my nails done. My mom's best friend is a manicurist. When I was little, she'd do little paintings on my nails, like flowers.
quotes.author: Miranda Cosgrove

quotes.text: We've always loved going to the movies. Our mom and dad are big movie fans. They'd take us on these movie orgys where we'd see sometimes three movies in a day.
quotes.author: Andy Wachowski

quotes.text: I've been drawing my whole life. My mom says my sister and I were drawing by age 1. Animation seems a real, natural extension of drawing as a way of telling a story visually.
quotes.author: Jennifer Yuh Nelson

quotes.text: Anyone who knows me knows my mom, Dorcina, has to sign off on any decision and that she will play a major part in any decision.
quotes.author: Nerlens Noel

quotes.text: My mom introduced me to science-fiction.
quotes.author: Logan Marshall-Green

quotes.text: Then you've got Georgetown, and I really just like everything about them. When I went down there with my mom, it really opened my eyes to what they were all about. I have to factor in what a school like that can do for me, even away from being a basketball player.
quotes.author: Nerlens Noel

quotes.text: I love what I do and I think it shows. As my kids get older, they can see me as a mom who loves working.
quotes.author: Jessica Capshaw

quotes.text: I was fortunate enough to have my kids early, so being a mom always ended up being a better gig than these other parts that came along. So I always justified not really working a lot because I had a family.
quotes.author: Heather Langenkamp

quotes.text: On my mom's side I'm Mexican, and my dad is a white dude.
quotes.author: Tyler Posey

quotes.text: When you have lost people like I lost my birth mom at a young age and you remember the whole process of losing her, you want to grab on to something that makes you whole.
quotes.author: Reese Hoffa

quotes.text: I was born to a single mom and raised by her and my grandparents.
quotes.author: Anthony Foxx

quotes.text: At first I could not believe what I was reading. I got up from my seat and walked away, talking to myself that I may have found my mom.
quotes.author: Reese Hoffa

quotes.text: Our songs touch people, and take them back to a time when there was no threat of terrorism, when you didn't have to lock your doors and when Mom and Dad took care of everything.
quotes.author: George Grove

quotes.text: Whether it's a 16-year old girl, or a mom, or a guy, or anybody, as long as they come up and they're excited to meet me 'cause they've had some sort of relationship with something I've created, it's the coolest thing ever. It never gets old. It's awesome.
quotes.author: Andy Grammer

quotes.text: My mom is in the navy and my dad works for the army, but I never called them 'sir' or 'ma'am' or anything like that, and we never really moved around a lot because both my parents were stationed in D.C.
quotes.author: Ian Harding

quotes.text: When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life now that I am old I know that it is.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: A little thought and a little kindness are often worth more than a great deal of money.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: Money has never made man happy, nor will it, there is nothing in its nature to produce happiness. The more of it one has the more one wants.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The lack of money is the root of all evil.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: For I can raise no money by vile means.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: He that is of the opinion money will do everything may well be suspected of doing everything for money.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: If women didn't exist, all the money in the world would have no meaning.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.text: All I ask is the chance to prove that money can't make me happy.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.text: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: It's a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: So you think that money is the root of all evil. Have you ever asked what is the root of all money?
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: There are people who have money and people who are rich.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.text: Many people take no care of their money till they come nearly to the end of it, and others do just the same with their time.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.text: After a certain point, money is meaningless. It ceases to be the goal. The game is what counts.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.text: I'd like to live as a poor man with lots of money.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: It is not the creation of wealth that is wrong, but the love of money for its own sake.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.text: Money is the barometer of a society's virtue.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.text: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.text: We go to school to learn to work hard for money. I write books and create products that teach people how to have money work hard for them.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.text: We've got to put a lot of money into changing behavior.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: A wise man should have money in his head, but not in his heart.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: Money is better than poverty, if only for financial reasons.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: I've got all the money I'll ever need, if I die by four o'clock.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: A woman's best protection is a little money of her own.
quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.text: A good reputation is more valuable than money.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.text: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: If saving money is wrong, I don't want to be right!
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.text: Money is a strange business. People who haven't got it aim it strongly. People who have are full of troubles.
quotes.author: Ayrton Senna

quotes.text: Liking money like I like it, is nothing less than mysticism. Money is a glory.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.text: It doesn't matter about money having it, not having it. Or having clothes, or not having them. You're still left alone with yourself in the end.
quotes.author: Billy Idol

quotes.text: A man is usually more careful of his money than of his principles.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.text: Profit is sweet, even if it comes from deception.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.text: Money: power at its most liquid.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.text: If you can count your money, you don't have a billion dollars.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.text: Money differs from an automobile or mistress in being equally important to those who have it and those who do not.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.text: It is a waste of money to help those who show no desire to help themselves.
quotes.author: Taylor Caldwell

quotes.text: A billion here, a billion there, and pretty soon you're talking about real money.
quotes.author: Everett Dirksen

quotes.text: All riches have their origin in mind. Wealth is in ideas - not money.
quotes.author: Robert Collier
