quotes.text: I've made all my money on my own without my family and I work very hard.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.text: Banks have a new image. Now you have 'a friend,' your friendly banker. If the banks are so friendly, how come they chain down the pens?
quotes.author: Alan King

quotes.text: Money's a horrid thing to follow, but a charming thing to meet.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.text: A man with money is no match against a man on a mission.
quotes.author: Doyle Brunson

quotes.text: Money is our madness, our vast collective madness.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.text: Men make counterfeit money in many more cases, money makes counterfeit men.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.text: No complaint... is more common than that of a scarcity of money.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.text: Wealth flows from energy and ideas.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.text: I am fiercely loyal to those willing to put their money where my mouth is.
quotes.author: Paul Harvey

quotes.text: Many folks think they aren't good at earning money, when what they don't know is how to use it.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.text: There was a time when a fool and his money were soon parted, but now it happens to everybody.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.text: Money is always there but the pockets change it is not in the same pockets after a change, and that is all there is to say about money.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.text: You have to go broke three times to learn how to make a living.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.text: Everyone needs a certain amount of money. Beyond that, we pursue money because we know how to obtain it. We don't necessarily know how to obtain happiness.
quotes.author: Gregg Easterbrook

quotes.text: If I have enough money to eat I'm good.
quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

quotes.text: The importance of money flows from it being a link between the present and the future.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.text: If God has allowed me to earn so much money, it is because He knows I give it all away.
quotes.author: Edith Piaf

quotes.text: Anybody who thinks money will make you happy, hasn't got money.
quotes.author: David Geffen

quotes.text: Most men love money and security more, and creation and construction less, as they get older.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.text: It is more rewarding to watch money change the world than watch it accumulate.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.text: A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some.
quotes.author: Joe Moore

quotes.text: A fool and his money are soon parted.
quotes.author: Thomas Tusser

quotes.text: I am happy to make money. I want to make more money, make more music, eat Big Macs and drink Budweisers.
quotes.author: Kid Rock

quotes.text: Marrying into money was not a good thing for me.
quotes.author: Anna Nicole Smith

quotes.text: I'd rather lose my own money than someone else's.
quotes.author: Dean Kamen

quotes.text: If I can't get the girl, at least give me more money.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.text: Do what you love and the money will follow.
quotes.author: Marsha Sinetar

quotes.text: All my life I knew that there was all the money you could want out there. All you have to do is go after it.
quotes.author: Curtis Carlson

quotes.text: If the money we donate helps one child or can ease the pain of one parent, those funds are well spent.
quotes.author: Carl Karcher

quotes.text: An important lever for sustained action in tackling poverty and reducing hunger is money.
quotes.author: Gro Harlem Brundtland

quotes.text: It is money, money, money! Not ideas, not principles, but money that reigns supreme in American politics.
quotes.author: Robert Byrd

quotes.text: Isn't it a shame that future generations can't be here to see all the wonderful things we're doing with their money?
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.text: Ben Franklin may have discovered electricity- but it is the man who invented the meter who made the money.
quotes.author: Earl Warren

quotes.text: It was an honor and privilege to arrive to this country 16 years ago with almost no money in my pocket. A lot has happened since then.
quotes.author: Antonio Banderas

quotes.text: It's all about the money.
quotes.author: Joseph Jackson

quotes.text: What counts is what you do with your money, not where it came from.
quotes.author: Merton Miller

quotes.text: A fool and his money are lucky enough to get together in the first place.
quotes.author: Stanley Weiser

quotes.text: If money was my only motivation, I would organize myself differently.
quotes.author: Placido Domingo

quotes.text: I don't mind that I'm fat. You still get the same money.
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.text: It's easier to force feed people than it is to give 'em what they want. It makes more money.
quotes.author: Merle Haggard

quotes.text: My goal wasn't to make a ton of money. It was to build good computers.
quotes.author: Steve Wozniak

quotes.text: Civilized countries generally adopt gold or silver or both as money.
quotes.author: Alfred Marshall

quotes.text: Don't judge me. I made a lot of money.
quotes.author: Samantha Bee

quotes.text: If you make a living, if you earn your own money, you're free - however free one can be on this planet.
quotes.author: Theodore White

quotes.text: Money is a mechanism for control.
quotes.author: David Korten

quotes.text: All money means to me is a pride in accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.text: In suggesting gifts: Money is appropriate, and one size fits all.
quotes.author: William Randolph Hearst

quotes.text: Sudden money is going from zero to two hundred dollars a week. The rest doesn't count.
quotes.author: Neil Simon

quotes.text: I don't think business news is just for old white men with money.
quotes.author: Neil Cavuto

quotes.text: Fame, I have already. Now I need the money.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Steinitz

quotes.text: It is usually people in the money business, finance, and international trade that are really rich.
quotes.author: Robin Leach

quotes.text: I don't spend much money on clothes I never did.
quotes.author: Lauren Hutton

quotes.text: Sooner or later, we sell out for money.
quotes.author: Tony Randall

quotes.text: If American men are obsessed with money, American women are obsessed with weight. The men talk of gain, the women talk of loss, and I do not know which talk is the more boring.
quotes.author: Marya Mannes

quotes.text: I think that focusing on the money, on the business, is not enough.
quotes.author: Sergei Bubka

quotes.text: You know, a lot of people are just interested in, in building a company so they can make money and get out.
quotes.author: Arthur Rock

quotes.text: I think everything depends on money.
quotes.author: Alan Bean

quotes.text: Art for art's sake, money for God's sake.
quotes.author: Simon Raven

quotes.text: Business is other people's money.
quotes.author: Delphine de Girardin

quotes.text: A fool and his money get a lot of publicity.
quotes.author: Al Bernstein

quotes.text: Many good qualities are not sufficient to balance a single want - the want of money.
quotes.author: Johann Georg Zimmermann

quotes.text: It's a terribly hard job to spend a billion dollars and get your money's worth.
quotes.author: George M. Humphrey

quotes.text: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
quotes.author: Lana Turner

quotes.text: A nation that continues year after year to spend more money on military defense than on programs of social uplift is approaching spiritual doom.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.
quotes.author: Margaret Walker

quotes.text: The American Republic will endure until the day Congress discovers that it can bribe the public with the public's money.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.text: Let us more and more insist on raising funds of love, of kindness, of understanding, of peace. Money will come if we seek first the Kingdom of God - the rest will be given.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Let us not be satisfied with just giving money. Money is not enough, money can be got, but they need your hearts to love them. So, spread your love everywhere you go.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: I try to give to the poor people for love what the rich could get for money. No, I wouldn't touch a leper for a thousand pounds yet I willingly cure him for the love of God.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: We have the best government that money can buy.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I can make more generals, but horses cost money.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: Money isn't the most important thing in life, but it's reasonably close to oxygen on the 'gotta have it' scale.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Too many people spend money they haven't earned to buy things they don't want to impress people they don't like.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: I've never been able to understand why a Republican contributor is a 'fat cat' and a Democratic contributor of the same amount of money is a 'public-spirited philanthropist'.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.text: Never spend your money before you have earned it.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: If money help a man to do good to others, it is of some value but if not, it is simply a mass of evil, and the sooner it is got rid of, the better.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.text: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: America... just a nation of two hundred million used car salesmen with all the money we need to buy guns and no qualms about killing anybody else in the world who tries to make us uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable.
quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.text: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Money, not morality, is the principle commerce of civilized nations.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: A fool and his money are soon elected.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: I don't want to make money, I just want to be wonderful.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: The rich are always going to say that, you know, just give us more money and we'll go out and spend more and then it will all trickle down to the rest of you. But that has not worked the last 10 years, and I hope the American public is catching on.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: If money is your hope for independence you will never have it. The only real security that a man will have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience, and ability.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: There is only one class in the community that thinks more about money than the rich, and that is the poor. The poor can think of nothing else.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Giving money and power to government is like giving whiskey and car keys to teenage boys.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: Most people work just hard enough not to get fired and get paid just enough money not to quit.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: Government always finds a need for whatever money it gets.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: I spent three days a week for 10 years educating myself in the public library, and it's better than college. People should educate themselves - you can get a complete education for no money. At the end of 10 years, I had read every book in the library and I'd written a thousand stories.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: If you don't have integrity, you have nothing. You can't buy it. You can have all the money in the world, but if you are not a moral and ethical person, you really have nothing.
quotes.author: Henry Kravis

quotes.text: There are three faithful friends - an old wife, an old dog, and ready money.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Time is money.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: I think the person who takes a job in order to live - that is to say, for the money - has turned himself into a slave.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Money can't buy love, but it improves your bargaining position.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.text: Do not hire a man who does your work for money, but him who does it for love of it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: A man is usually more careful of his money than he is of his principles.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Money and success don't change people they merely amplify what is already there.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: If you would know the value of money, go and try to borrow some.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: It is not the employer who pays the wages. Employers only handle the money. It is the customer who pays the wages.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The TV business is uglier than most things. It is normally perceived as some kind of cruel and shallow money trench through the heart of the journalism industry, a long plastic hallway where thieves and pimps run free and good men die like dogs, for no good reason.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.text: An actress is not a machine, but they treat you like a machine. A money machine.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: Remember that credit is money.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Politics has become so expensive that it takes a lot of money even to be defeated.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: The use of money is all the advantage there is in having it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Money often costs too much.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Money won't make you happy... but everybody wants to find out for themselves.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: In general, the art of government consists of taking as much money as possible from one class of citizens to give to another.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.
quotes.author: Michael LeBoeuf

quotes.text: In any investment, you expect to have fun and make money.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: We have an obligation and a responsibility to be investing in our students and our schools. We must make sure that people who have the grades, the desire and the will, but not the money, can still get the best education possible.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Money won't buy happiness, but it will pay the salaries of a large research staff to study the problem.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.text: Friendship and money: oil and water.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.text: Ultimately, if you can say that I'm a bad owner and we're winning championships, I can live with that. But if we're not making the playoffs and we're spending and losing money, then I have to look in the mirror and say maybe I'm not taking the necessary steps to doing what it takes to run an organization.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: When I chased after money, I never had enough. When I got my life on purpose and focused on giving of myself and everything that arrived into my life, then I was prosperous.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: I've always felt toward the slightest scene, even if all I had to do in a scene was just to come in and say, 'Hi,' that the people ought to get their money's worth and that this is an obligation of mine, to give them the best you can get from me.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: When the federal government spends more each year than it collects in tax revenues, it has three choices: It can raise taxes, print money, or borrow money. While these actions may benefit politicians, all three options are bad for average Americans.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.text: Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Run for your life from any man who tells you that money is evil. That sentence is the leper's bell of an approaching looter.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.text: God wants us to prosper financially, to have plenty of money, to fulfill the destiny He has laid out for us.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: I try to treat all the money I'm making like it's the last time I'm going to make it.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.text: Money is not required to buy one necessity of the soul.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Don't matter how much money you got, there's only two kinds of people: there's saved people and there's lost people.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: Because parents have power over children. They feel they have to do what their parents say. But the love of money is the root of all evil. And this is a sweet child. And to see him turn like this, this isn't him. This is not him.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.text: Successful people make money. It's not that people who make money become successful, but that successful people attract money. They bring success to what they do.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: Instead of giving money to found colleges to promote learning, why don't they pass a constitutional amendment prohibiting anybody from learning anything? If it works as good as the Prohibition one did, why, in five years we would have the smartest race of people on earth.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Good nature is worth more than knowledge, more than money, more than honor, to the persons who possess it.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: To have done anything just for money is to have been truly idle.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: It's hard to tell with these Internet startups if they're really interested in building companies or if they're just interested in the money. I can tell you, though: If they don't really want to build a company, they won't luck into it. That's because it's so hard that if you don't have a passion, you'll give up.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Of the billionaires I have known, money just brings out the basic traits in them. If they were jerks before they had money, they are simply jerks with a billion dollars.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: Lack of money is the root of all evil.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Modern poets talk against business, poor things, but all of us write for money. Beginners are subjected to trial by market.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: It is a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: When a man says money can do anything, that settles it: he hasn't got any.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: We are the only real aristocracy in the world: the aristocracy of money.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Don't bring your need to the marketplace, bring your skill. If you don't feel well, tell your doctor, but not the marketplace. If you need money, go to the bank, but not the marketplace.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: If I win and get the money, then the Oakland Police department is going to buy a boys' home, me a house, my family a house, and a Stop Police Brutality Center.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.text: I never attempt to make money on the stock market. I buy on the assumption that they could close the market the next day and not reopen it for five years.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: To give real service you must add something which cannot be bought or measured with money, and that is sincerity and integrity.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.text: Money is usually attracted, not pursued.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: I actually thought that it would be a little confusing during the same period of your life to be in one meeting when you're trying to make money, and then go to another meeting where you're giving it away. I mean is it gonna erode your ability, you know, to make money? Are you gonna somehow get confused about what you're trying to do?
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Innovation has nothing to do with how many R amp& D dollars you have. When Apple came up with the Mac, IBM was spending at least 100 times more on R &amp D. It's not about money. It's about the people you have, how you're led, and how much you get it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Pretty much, Apple and Dell are the only ones in this industry making money. They make it by being Wal-Mart. We make it by innovation.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: This will never be a civilized country until we spend more money for books than we do for chewing gum.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: You know, my main reaction to this money thing is that it's humorous, all the attention to it, because it's hardly the most insightful or valuable thing that's happened to me.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: What is a normal childhood? We weren't rich, we were pretty middle-class. My dad survived from job to job with him taking care of so many relatives, he couldn't save any money.
quotes.author: Charlie Sheen

quotes.text: We need earmark reform, and when I'm President, I will go line by line to make sure that we are not spending money unwisely.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: My restaurants are never opened on Thanksgiving I want my staff to spend time with their family if they can. My feeling is, if I can't figure out how to make money the rest of the year so that my workers can enjoy the holidays, then I don't deserve to be an owner.
quotes.author: Michael Symon

quotes.text: We have the right as individuals to give away as much of our own money as we please in charity but as members of Congress we have no right to appropriate a dollar of the public money.
quotes.author: Davy Crockett

quotes.text: I love to go to Washington - if only to be near my money.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.text: Maturity: Be able to stick with a job until it is finished. Be able to bear an injustice without having to get even. Be able to carry money without spending it. Do your duty without being supervised.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.text: Advertising is the art of convincing people to spend money they don't have for something they don't need.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Money doesn't talk, it swears.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: With our technology, with objects, literally three people in a garage can blow away what 200 people at Microsoft can do. Literally can blow it away. Corporate America has a need that is so huge and can save them so much money, or make them so much money, or cost them so much money if they miss it, that they are going to fuel the object revolution.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: This film cost $31 million. With that kind of money I could have invaded some country.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.text: You use your money to buy privacy because during most of your life you aren't allowed to be normal.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.text: If you make any money, the government shoves you in the creek once a year with it in your pockets, and all that don't get wet you can keep.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: The reason we have poverty is that we have no imagination. There are a great many people accumulating what they think is vast wealth, but it's only money... they don't know how to enjoy it, because they have no imagination.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: No one in this world has ever lost money by underestimating the intelligence of the great masses of the plain people. Nor has anyone ever lost public office thereby.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: The circulation of confidence is better than the circulation of money.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.text: I spent my whole life in the private sector, 25 years in the private sector. I understand that when government takes more money out of the hands of people, it makes it more difficult for them to buy things. If they can't buy things, the economy doesn't grow. If the economy doesn't grow, we don't put Americans to work.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: Disneyland is a work of love. We didn't go into Disneyland just with the idea of making money.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Let advertisers spend the same amount of money improving their product that they do on advertising and they wouldn't have to advertise it.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: The highest use of capital is not to make more money, but to make money do more for the betterment of life.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Money without brains is always dangerous.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Of course, to have money is just great because you can do what you think is important to you. I always was a rich person because money's not related to happiness.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: Business, that's easily defined - it's other people's money.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: No one would remember the Good Samaritan if he'd only had good intentions he had money as well.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.text: I'm sick of giving creeps money off my soul.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: Attitude is more important than the past, than education, than money, than circumstances, than what people do or say. It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: Time and money spent in helping men to do more for themselves is far better than mere giving.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Money is not the only answer, but it makes a difference.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: I'd say it's been my biggest problem all my life... it's money. It takes a lot of money to make these dreams come true.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Prospering just doesn't have to do with money.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: I mean, I do think at a certain point you've made enough money.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: If advertisers spent the same amount of money on improving their products as they do on advertising then they wouldn't have to advertise them.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: The Internet didn't get invented on its own. Government research created the Internet so that all the companies could make money off the Internet. The point is, is that when we succeed, we succeed because of our individual initiative, but also because we do things together.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Money and women are the most sought after and the least known about of any two things we have.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: I think it's too bad that everybody's decided to turn on drugs, I don't think drugs are the problem. Crime is the problem. Cops are the problem. Money's the problem. But drugs are just drugs.
quotes.author: Jerry Garcia

quotes.text: Speculation is only a word covering the making of money out of the manipulation of prices, instead of supplying goods and services.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: President Obama's view of a free economy is to send your money to his friends. My vision for a free enterprise economy is to return entrepreneurship and genius and creativity to the American people!
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: You reach a point where you don't work for money.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Money doesn't make you happy. I now have $50 million but I was just as happy when I had $48 million.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: A system of capitalism presumes sound money, not fiat money manipulated by a central bank. Capitalism cherishes voluntary contracts and interest rates that are determined by savings, not credit creation by a central bank.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.text: Money demands that you sell, not your weakness to men's stupidity, but your talent to their reason.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: When it is a question of money, everybody is of the same religion.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Money is like an arm or leg - use it or lose it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: I know that campaigns can seem small, and even silly. Trivial things become big distractions. Serious issues become sound bites. And the truth gets buried under an avalanche of money and advertising. If you're sick of hearing me approve this message, believe me - so am I.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: You can choose a future where more Americans have the chance to gain the skills they need to compete, no matter how old they are or how much money they have. Education was the gateway to opportunity for me. It was the gateway for Michelle. And now more than ever, it is the gateway to a middle-class life.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: I've never preached one sermon on money, on just finances. I want to stay away from it.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: In liberal logic, if life is unfair then the answer is to turn more tax money over to politicians, to spend in ways that will increase their chances of getting reelected.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.text: I don't believe we are supposed to go through life defeated and not having enough money to pay our bills or send our kids to college.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Money cannot buy peace of mind. It cannot heal ruptured relationships, or build meaning into a life that has none.
quotes.author: Richard M. DeVos

quotes.text: There are necessary evils. Money is an important thing in terms of representing freedom in our world. And now I have a daughter to think about. It's really the first time I've thought about the future and what it could be.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.text: I don't mind saying, you know, that I don't take a salary from the church, and God has blessed me with more money than I could imagine from my books.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: You may never get to that perfect world that you're waiting for where everything's going to be perfect and you got that much money and your house paid off.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: I'm tired of hearing about money, money, money, money, money. I just want to play the game, drink Pepsi, wear Reebok.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quotes.text: Now workers should have the right to join unions. But unions should not be forced upon workers. And unions should not have the power to take money our of their members' paychecks to buy the support of politicians that are favored by the union bosses.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: Talk is by far the most accessible of pleasures. It costs nothing in money, it is all profit, it completes our education, founds and fosters our friendships, and can be enjoyed at any age and in almost any state of health.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: If a person gets his attitude toward money straight, it will help straighten out almost every other area in his life.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.text: I don't blame the players today for the money. I blame the owners. They started it. They wanna give it to 'em? More power to 'em.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.text: It's morally wrong to allow a sucker to keep his money.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: It's amazing how people will give when you don't ask. Many of them send money because they believe in the message.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Money and corruption are ruining the land, crooked politicians betray the working man, pocketing the profits and treating us like sheep, and we're tired of hearing promises that we know they'll never keep.
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.text: One does not need buildings, money, power, or status to practice the Art of Peace. Heaven is right where you are standing, and that is the place to train.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.text: The price we have to pay for money is sometimes liberty.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: We can be thankful to a friend for a few acres, or a little money and yet for the freedom and command of the whole earth, and for the great benefits of our being, our life, health, and reason, we look upon ourselves as under no obligation.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.text: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: The chief value of money lies in the fact that one lives in a world in which it is overestimated.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: I've seen the ticket, and I still can't believe it. When I see the money, I hope I don't hit the floor.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.text: What have I got? No looks, no money, no education. Just talent.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quotes.text: Money is human happiness in the abstract he, then, who is no longer capable of enjoying human happiness in the concrete devotes himself utterly to money.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: If our soldiers are not overburdened with money, it is not because they have a distaste for riches if their lives are not unduly long, it is not because they are disinclined to longevity.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: I went to the bank and asked to borrow a cup of money. They said, 'What for?' I said, 'I'm going to buy some sugar.'
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: As one digs deeper into the national character of the Americans, one sees that they have sought the value of everything in this world only in the answer to this single question: how much money will it bring in?
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.text: I can inspire people on how to use money, how to get economically powerful.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: A real gentleman, even if he loses everything he owns, must show no emotion. Money must be so far beneath a gentleman that it is hardly worth troubling about.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.text: I don't think the money people in Hollywood have ever thought I was normal, but I am dedicated to my work and that's what counts.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.text: If all the rich and all of the church people should send their children to the public schools they would feel bound to concentrate their money on improving these schools until they met the highest ideals.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.text: Well private money can take risks in a way that government money often isn't willing to.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: I did my time for the rape. I paid my money to Las Vegas. I paid my dues.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: I know why they don't like me because they want the money I have.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: Our money is bait money, and bait money is not to be used.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: There was one thing my daddy wouldn't tolerate in any shape, form or fashion, and that was being unkind or rude to somebody. That was just very important to my folks. And as it turns out, that was a legacy that he left me that money can't buy, is how to be able to treat people.
quotes.author: Paula Deen

quotes.text: Motherhood is a great honor and privilege, yet it is also synonymous with servanthood. Every day women are called upon to selflessly meet the needs of their families. Whether they are awake at night nursing a baby, spending their time and money on less-than-grateful teenagers, or preparing meals, moms continuously put others before themselves.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.text: Labour was the first price, the original purchase - money that was paid for all things. It was not by gold or by silver, but by labour, that all wealth of the world was originally purchased.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.text: Gambling with cards or dice or stocks is all one thing. It's getting money without giving an equivalent for it.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: One might think that the money value of an invention constitutes its reward to the man who loves his work. But... I continue to find my greatest pleasure, and so my reward, in the work that precedes what the world calls success.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: I went into the business for the money, and the art grew out of it. If people are disillusioned by that remark, I can't help it. It's the truth.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.text: The writer must earn money in order to be able to live and to write, but he must by no means live and write for the purpose of making money.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.text: Why is there so much month left at the end of the money?
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.text: I'd have stopped writing years ago if it were for the money.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: There is no class so pitiably wretched as that which possesses money and nothing else.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.text: You are your greatest asset. Put your time, effort and money into training, grooming, and encouraging your greatest asset.
quotes.author: Tom Hopkins

quotes.text: The problem with socialism is that you eventually run out of other peoples' money.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.text: Capital is money, capital is commodities. By virtue of it being value, it has acquired the occult ability to add value to itself. It brings forth living offspring, or, at the least, lays golden eggs.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.text: I think one of the most pervasive evils in this world is greed and acquiring money for money's sake. Once you have six houses and a plane, it's just about a number. It's never been anything I understood.
quotes.author: Kevin Bacon

quotes.text: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.
quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

quotes.text: Now, people when I say that look at me and say, 'What are you talking about, Joe? You're telling me we have to go spend money to keep from going bankrupt?'. The answer is yes, that's what I'm telling you.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.text: It is a fact that around the world the elites of every country are making money.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: Economy does not lie in sparing money, but in spending it wisely.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.text: When I graduated from high school, it was during the Depression and we had no money.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: The big difference between sex for money and sex for free is that sex for money usually costs a lot less.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.text: There's so little money in my bank account, my scenic checks show a ghetto.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.text: I spent a lot of money on booze, birds and fast cars. The rest I just squandered.
quotes.author: George Best

quotes.text: There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.text: America believes in education: the average professor earns more money in a year than a professional athlete earns in a whole week.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.text: A woman must have money and a room of her own if she is to write fiction.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: If a nation values anything more than freedom, it will lose its freedom, and the irony of it is that if it is comfort or money that it values more, it will lose that too.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.text: You don't appreciate a lot of stuff in school until you get older. Little things like being spanked every day by a middle-aged woman: Stuff you pay good money for in later life.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.text: I have a problem with too much money. I can't reinvest it fast enough, and because I reinvest it, more money comes in. Yes, the rich do get richer.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.text: Flattery is a kind of bad money, to which our vanity gives us currency.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.text: I do not suppose I shall be remembered for anything. But I don't think about my work in those terms. It is just as vulgar to work for the sake of posterity as to work for the sake of money.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.text: People who identify themselves as conservatives donate money to charity more often than people who identify themselves as liberals. They donate more money and a higher percentage of their incomes.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.text: We can't go to people who have lost their job at GM and say, 'Oh, by the way, we are going to pay money to build a road here or inoculate children there,' unless we can demonstrate that it is in America's interest. I happen to think it is.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: You know, people make a lot of money talking about me, don't they?
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: The sinews of war are infinite money.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: Money is like manure, of very little use except it be spread.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Success is having to worry about every damn thing in the world, except money.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.text: I have ways of making money that you know nothing of.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: Because people have no thoughts to deal in, they deal cards, and try and win one another's money. Idiots!
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: Getting money is not all a man's business: to cultivate kindness is a valuable part of the business of life.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.text: Property may be destroyed and money may lose its purchasing power but, character, health, knowledge and good judgement will always be in demand under all conditions.
quotes.author: Roger Babson

quotes.text: Love him or hate him, Trump is a man who is certain about what he wants and sets out to get it, no holds barred. Women find his power almost as much of a turn-on as his money.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: Criminals are never very amusing. It's because they're failures. Those who make real money aren't counted as criminals. This is a class distinction, not an ethical problem.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.text: The passion for money is never fickle.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.text: To understand someone, find out how he spends his money.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.text: Poverty is multidimensional. It extends beyond money incomes to education, health care, political participation and advancement of one's own culture and social organisation.
quotes.author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quotes.text: If you can actually count your money, then you're not a rich man.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.text: What we really want to do is what we are really meant to do. When we do what we are meant to do, money comes to us, doors open for us, we feel useful, and the work we do feels like play to us.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.text: I'm proud to pay taxes in the United States the only thing is, I could be just as proud for half the money.
quotes.author: Arthur Godfrey

quotes.text: Those whose life is long still strive for gain, and for all mortals all things take second place to money.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.text: I don't talk about money.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.text: I've always thought anyone can make money. Making a life worth living, that's the real test.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.text: It's very important that every movie I do makes money because I want the people that had the faith in me to get their money back.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.text: We need transparency in government spending. We need to put each government expenditure online so every Floridian can see where their tax money is being spent.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.text: Time is like money, the less we have of it to spare the further we make it go.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: I've had an exciting time I married for love and got a little money along with it.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.text: George wrote Taxman, and I played guitar on it. He wrote it in anger at finding out what the taxman did. He had never known before then what could happen to your money.
quotes.author: Paul McCartney

quotes.text: All money is a matter of belief.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.text: I'm looking for backing for an unauthorized auto-biography that I am writing. Hopefully, this will sell in such huge numbers that I will be able to sue myself for an extraordinary amount of money and finance the film version in which I will play everybody.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.text: A man who cannot be enticed by money or intimidated by the threat of jail or death has two of the strongest weapons that anyone has to offer.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.text: Taxation is just a sophisticated way of demanding money with menaces.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: If you are worried about job security and do not have an adequate emergency fund (ideally eight months' worth of living expenses stashed away in a federally insured bank or credit union), you need to focus more on saving money than paying down the balance on your credit cards.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.text: No, not rich. I am a poor man with money, which is not the same thing.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.text: What's the use of happiness? It can't buy you money.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: If one man in the country could take all the money, what was the use of passing any bills about it?
quotes.author: Davy Crockett

quotes.text: You lose your individuality a huge amount when you have no money, and I certainly had that experience.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.text: I know of nothing more despicable and pathetic than a man who devotes all the hours of the waking day to the making of money for money's sake.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: Neither soldiers nor money can defend a king but only friends won by good deeds, merit, and honesty.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.text: As long as you have a system that is based on the rational that if you are making money you are thereby making a contribution to society, these financial rogue practices will continue.
quotes.author: David Korten

quotes.text: A majority, perhaps as many as 75 percent, of abortion clinics are in areas with high minority populations. Abortion apologists will say this is because they want to serve the poor. You don't serve the poor, however, by taking their money to terminate their children.
quotes.author: Alveda King

quotes.text: If we think we have ours and don't owe any time or money or effort to help those left behind, then we are a part of the problem rather than the solution to the fraying social fabric that threatens all Americans.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.text: Knowledge is like money: the more he gets, the more he craves.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: I haven't got as much money as some folks, but I've got as much impudence as any of them, and that's the next thing to money.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: It ain't often that a man's reputation outlasts his money.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: Money will buy a pretty good dog, but it won't buy the wag of his tail.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: Don't cling to fame. You're just borrowing it. It's like money. You're going to die, and somebody else is going to get it.
quotes.author: Sonny Bono

quotes.text: You shouldn't have to have money to have a luxury fragrance.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: A group or an artist shouldn't get his money until his boss gets his.
quotes.author: Bobby Darin

quotes.text: What money is better bestowed than that of a schoolboy's tip? How the kindness is recalled by the recipient in after days! It blesses him that gives and him that takes.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.text: Capitalism is using its money we socialists throw it away.
quotes.author: Fidel Castro

quotes.text: Remember that government doesn't earn one single dollar it spends. In order for you to get money from the government, that money must first be taken from somebody else.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.text: Opposites may attract, but I wouldn't put my money on a relationship of financial opposites.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.text: I can't afford to die I'd lose too much money.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.text: You can be young without money but you can't be old without it.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.text: American men, as a group, seem to be interested in only two things, money and breasts. It seems a very narrow outlook.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.text: I'm fulfilled in what I do. I never thought that a lot of money or fine clothes - the finer things of life - would make you happy. My concept of happiness is to be filled in a spiritual sense.
quotes.author: Coretta Scott King

quotes.text: It is a sad fact about our culture that a poet can earn much more money writing or talking about his art than he can by practicing it.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.text: I've always said money may buy you a fine dog, but only love can make it wag its tail.
quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

quotes.text: A man must love a thing very much if he not only practices it without any hope of fame and money, but even... without any hope of doing it well.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.text: A moderate addiction to money may not always be hurtful but when taken in excess it is nearly always bad for the health.
quotes.author: Clarence Day

quotes.text: Here's how I think of my money - as soldiers - I send them out to war everyday. I want them to take prisoners and come home, so there's more of them.
quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.text: I know why most people never get rich. They put the money ahead of the job. If you just think of the job, the money will automatically follow. This never fails.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.text: Well, the chairman of Federal Reserve just made his move to rescue Barack Obama. We're gonna have QE3. We're gonna print some more money.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.text: Why are people unemployed? Because there is no work. Why is there no work? Because people are not buying products and services. Why are people not buying products and services? Because they have no money. Why do people have no money? Because they are unemployed.
quotes.author: Craig Bruce

quotes.text: I don't want to make money I want to make a difference.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: Look, we know we screwed up when we were in the majority. We fell in love with power. We spent way too much money - especially on earmarks. There was too much corruption when we ran this place. We were guilty. And that's why we lost.
quotes.author: Eric Cantor

quotes.text: To keep the record straight, it wasn't always John and Yoko. We've all accused one another of various business things we tend to be pretty paranoid by now, as you can imagine. There's a lot of money involved.
quotes.author: Paul McCartney

quotes.text: People will always choose more money over more sex.
quotes.author: Doug Coupland

quotes.text: Almost the only persons who may be said to comprehend even approximately the significance, principles, and purposes of Socialism are the chief leaders of the extreme wings of the Socialistic forces, and perhaps a few of the money kings themselves.
quotes.author: Benjamin Tucker

quotes.text: Put not your trust in money, but put your money in trust.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.text: If you don't want my God here, you don't want me here either. God has been too good to me to go and try to sell out to get some money.
quotes.author: Tyler Perry

quotes.text: As they say around the Texas Legislature, if you can't drink their whiskey, screw their women, take their money, and vote against 'em anyway, you don't belong in office.
quotes.author: Molly Ivins

quotes.text: Nowadays nothing but money counts: a fortune brings honors, friendships the poor man everywhere lies low.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: Money is like manure. You have to spread it around or it smells.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.text: I'm not really religious but very spiritual. I give money to this company that manufactures hearing aids on a regular basis. More people should really hear me sing. I have a gift from God.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.text: Anyone who wants to sell you overnight success or wealth is not interested in your success they are interested in your money.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.text: Look, I'm very much in favor of tax cuts, but not with borrowed money. And the problem that we've gotten into in recent years is spending programs with borrowed money, tax cuts with borrowed money, and at the end of the day that proves disastrous. And my view is I don't think we can play subtle policy here.
quotes.author: Alan Greenspan

quotes.text: Until we totally change the way we elect our leaders, until we remove private money from public campaigns, lying will be the de facto method of governance in this country.
quotes.author: Peter Schuyler

quotes.text: But there are too many people that make so much money at the cost of lives of other humans and for no reason but to make the money.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.text: Thinking in its lower grades, is comparable to paper money, and in its higher forms it is a kind of poetry.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.text: Unfaithfulness in the keeping of an appointment is an act of clear dishonesty. You may as well borrow a person's money as his time.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.text: There's no money in poetry, but then there's no poetry in money, either.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.text: When I was waiting tables, washing dishes, or mowing lawns for money, I never thought of myself as stuck in some station in life. I was on my own path, my own journey, an American journey where I could think for myself, decide for myself, define happiness for myself.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.text: I decided to pursue music, so I dropped out of school and I told my parents I didn't want any money from them. I got three jobs and I just hit the ground running.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: A lot of people in the media, and some everyday people, really aren't in search of the truth. They're in search of something worse than that. Money, yeah. I think the media's the kind of a thing where the truth doesn't win, because it's no fun. The truth's no fun.
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.text: If someone decides to be a musician now, it means because there is no hope of money at the end of it, it means they really want to be a musician. And if someone is writing now, there is no hope for money at the end of it.
quotes.author: Doug Coupland

quotes.text: I think money is due for some sort of collapse. People are going to realize that money has a half-life, like radioactive elements.
quotes.author: Doug Coupland

quotes.text: I am not a pig farmer. The pigs had a great time, but I didn't make any money.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.text: Clearly this is a tough economic time, and a lot of families are hurting. So when we talk to parents, we talk about small changes for kids and things that don't cost extra money. Like adding water and eliminating sugary drinks and sodas. That's going to save money right there. Or adding a few more vegetables.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: The idea that a congressman would be tainted by accepting money from private industry or private sources is essentially a socialist argument.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.text: If time is money, it seems moral to save time, above all one's own, and such parsimony is excused by consideration for others. One is straight-forward.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.text: Congress, the press, and the bureaucracy too often focus on how much money or effort is spent, rather than whether the money or effort actually achieves the announced goal.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.text: Presidential leadership needn't always cost money. Look for low- and no-cost options. They can be surprisingly effective.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.text: All I wanted to do was write - at the time, poems, and prose, too. I guess my ambition was simply to make money however I could to keep myself going in some modest way, and I didn't need much, I was unmarried at the time, no children.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.text: We at Chrysler borrow money the old-fashioned way. We pay it back.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.text: No man's credit is as good as his money.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.text: Victory is everything. You can spend the money but you can never spend the memories.
quotes.author: Ken Venturi

quotes.text: Of course, I do everything for money.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.text: It was Public Art, defined as art that is purchased by experts who are not spending their own personal money.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: Money is the seed of money, and the first guinea is sometimes more difficult to acquire than the second million.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.text: We do not have a money problem in America. We have a values and priorities problem.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.text: What I've learned is that you really don't need to be a celebrity or have money or have the paparazzi following you around to be famous.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: Some artists are working to buy the mansion or whatever the element of fame must bear, but I spend all my money on my show.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: I don't care about money.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: The forties, seventies, and the nineties, when money was scarce, were great periods, when the art world retracted but it was also reborn.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: Money is something that can be measured art is not. It's all subjective.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: Art usually only makes the news in America when the subject is money.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: Not to say people shouldn't get rich from art. I adore the alchemy wherein artists who cast a complex spell make rich people give them their money. (Just writing it makes me cackle.) But too many artists have been making money without magic.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: One argument goes that recessions are good for female artists because when money flies out the window, women are allowed in the house. The other claims that when money ebbs, so do prospects for women.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: In the seventies, a group of American artists seized the means not of production but of reproduction. They tore apart visual culture at a time of no money, no market, and no one paying attention except other artists. Vietnam and Watergate had happened everything in America was being questioned.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: The last time money left the art world, intrepid types maxed out their credit cards and opened galleries, and a few of them have become the best in the world.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: Much good art got made while money ruled I like a lot of it, and hardship and poverty aren't virtues. The good news is that, since almost no one will be selling art, artists - especially emerging ones - won't have to think about turning out a consistent style or creating a brand. They'll be able to experiment as much as they want.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: When money and hype recede from the art world, one thing I won't miss will be what curator Francesco Bonami calls the 'Eventocracy.' All this flashy 'art-fair art' and those highly produced space-eating spectacles and installations wow you for a minute until you move on to the next adrenaline event.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: 'Untitled' is a time machine that can transport you to 1992, an edgy moment when the art world was crumbling, money was scarce, and artists like Tiravanija were in the nascent stages of combining Happenings, performance art, John Cage, Joseph Beuys, and the do-it-yourself ethos of punk. Meanwhile, a new art world was coming into being.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: Now people look at 'The Scream' or Van Gogh's 'Irises' or a Picasso and see its new content: money. Auction houses inherently equate capital with value.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: Art is for anyone. It just isn't for everyone. Still, over the past decade, its audience has hugely grown, and that's irked those outside the art world, who get irritated at things like incomprehensibility or money.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: I love art dealers. In some ways, they're my favorite people in the art world. Really. I love that they put their money where their taste is, create their own aesthetic universes, support artists, employ people, and do all of this while letting us see art for free. Many are visionaries.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: When museums are built these days, architects, directors, and trustees seem most concerned about social space: places to have parties, eat dinner, wine-and-dine donors. Sure, these are important these days - museums have to bring in money - but they gobble up space and push the art itself far away from the entrance.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.text: The people of this country, not special interest big money, should be the source of all political power.
quotes.author: Paul Wellstone

quotes.text: Many people are in the dark when it comes to money, and I'm going to turn on the lights.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.text: Take free money. No matter how in debt you are, if your employer offers a matching contribution on a 401(k) or other retirement vehicle, you must sign up and contribute enough to get the maximum company match each year. Think of it as a bonus.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.text: Growing up in a particular neighborhood, growing up in a working-class family, not having much money, all of those things fire you and can give you an edge, can give you an anger.
quotes.author: Gary Oldman

quotes.text: I think it would be cool if you were writing a ransom note on your computer, if the paper clip popped up and said, 'Looks like you're writing a ransom note. Need help? You should use more forceful language, you'll get more money.'
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: My Vegas act is how I make my money.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.text: No woman marries for money they are all clever enough, before marrying a millionaire, to fall in love with him first.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.text: But all the money in the world cannot make you happy either, so there has to be a balance.
quotes.author: Heidi Klum

quotes.text: Making a movie requires 20 to 500 people to make and a lot of money and the stakes are a lot higher.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.text: Music has always been my back door to life. It is important for people to find something that excites them. I like the concept that if you do what excites you, you will be rewarded generously, whatever form reward takes, which is not necessarily money.
quotes.author: Brandon Boyd

quotes.text: I definitely spend the most money on shoes, partly because vintage footwear can be a little funky - in a bad way. I like to keep things pretty simple up top and then go weird with the shoes.
quotes.author: Chloe Sevigny

quotes.text: If there is no hell, a good many preachers are obtaining money under false pretenses.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.text: Money is neither my god nor my devil. It is a form of energy that tends to make us more of who we already are, whether it's greedy or loving.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.text: In a very weak economy, when you say 'cut government spending,' what you mean is you're laying off school teachers and you're de-funding various programs that put money into the economy. This means you have more unemployed people that then draw unemployment benefits and don't pay taxes.
quotes.author: Fareed Zakaria

quotes.text: We need to reclaim our American system of limited government, low taxes, reasonable regulations, and sound money, which has blessed us with unprecedented prosperity. And it has done more to help the poor than any other economic system ever designed.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.text: That's the real secret to job creation - not borrowing and spending more money in Washington.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.text: We need to stop spending money we don't have.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.text: What did the taxpayers get out of the Obama stimulus? More debt. That money wasn't just spent and wasted - it was borrowed, spent, and wasted.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.text: A runner must run with dreams in his heart, not money in his pocket.
quotes.author: Emil Zatopek

quotes.text: I'm free of stress and worries now because if I don't like something I'm doing, I just find the fun in it instead of being miserable. Let me have fun with the people I work with, let me have fun making money - when I grew up so poor, ya know?
quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.text: This is our commitment to users and the people who use our service, is that Facebook's a free service. It's free now. It will always be free. We make money through having advertisements and things like that.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.text: Is it not odd that the only generous person I ever knew, who had money to be generous with, should be a stockbroker.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.text: A development deal is where they're giving you recording time and money to record, but not promising that they'll put an album out.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: I'm tired of love I'm still more tired of rhyme but money gives me pleasure all the time.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.text: Money is the root of all evil, and yet it is such a useful root that we cannot get on without it any more than we can without potatoes.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.text: Wal-Mart doesn't really care about your faith. Wal-Mart cares if you have money to spend, and it is going to be as generic as possible in exploiting the holiday season for every buck it can make.
quotes.author: Richard Roeper

quotes.text: Nowadays love is a matter of chance, matrimony a matter of money and divorce a matter of course.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.text: Life is a game. Money is how we keep score.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.text: Jon Stewart is exactly the same guy he's always been, only with money. He knows that the moment he really believes he's important, the funny goes away and he becomes Bill O'Reilly, except shorter and Jewish.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.text: And of course I didn't make any money from stand up for years, so I had temp jobs. That was the way I made money.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: They still have some money, and they have needs to supply. They must begin immediately to pool their earnings and organize industries to participate in supplying social and economic demands.
quotes.author: Carter G. Woodson

quotes.text: There are two kinds of power you have to fight. The first is the money, and that's just our system. The other is the people close around you, knowing when to accept their criticism, knowing when to say no.
quotes.author: Martin Scorsese

quotes.text: Work isn't to make money you work to justify life.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.text: If we pollute the air, water and soil that keep us alive and well, and destroy the biodiversity that allows natural systems to function, no amount of money will save us.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.text: I pity the French Cinema because it has no money. I pity the American Cinema because it has no ideas.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Godard

quotes.text: If you got the money honey I got the time and when you run out of money honey I run out of time.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.text: When you hire that first person, then you're a boss. You've got performance reviews. You've got complaints about not making enough money. You've got people who are just going to sell your story to the tabloids.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.text: The only security men can have for their political liberty, consists in keeping their money in their own pockets.
quotes.author: Lysander Spooner

quotes.text: It can be liberating to get fired because you realize the world doesn't end. There's other ways to make money, better jobs.
quotes.author: Ron Livingston

quotes.text: Money couldn't buy friends, but you got a better class of enemy.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.text: I don't really care about money. I find money boring and accounting boring, so I'm probably not going to ever make a lot of money.
quotes.author: Juliana Hatfield

quotes.text: The music business is motivated by money. Music is motivated by energy and feelings.
quotes.author: Erykah Badu

quotes.text: The flood of money that gushes into politics today is a pollution of democracy.
quotes.author: Theodore White

quotes.text: Spare no expense to save money on this one.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.text: Here I am paying big money to you writers and what for? All you do is change the words.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.text: The key to making money is to stay invested.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.text: A fool and her money are soon courted.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.text: France is a place where the money falls apart in your hands but you can't tear the toilet paper.
quotes.author: Billy Wilder

quotes.text: Great dad. Yeah, he would ask me for money on birthdays and, you know, inappropriate times. And I just wrote him off like, 'You're not a father.' I just learned you cannot emotionally invest in people who are not attainable.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.text: Divorce is one of the most financially traumatic things you can go through. Money spent on getting mad or getting even is money wasted.
quotes.author: Richard Wagner

quotes.text: And, we have no such thing as a budget anymore. Our manager freaks when we show him the bill. We're lavish to the bone, but all our money goes back into the product.
quotes.author: Freddie Mercury

quotes.text: Labor was the first price, the original purchase - money that was paid for all things.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.text: My other family is Fleetwood Mac. I don't need the money, but there's an emotional need for me to go on the road again. There's a love there we're a band of brothers.
quotes.author: Stevie Nicks

quotes.text: Countries have lost their culture because what they wanted was money. Money became the running theme in every country and culture was sacrificed.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: My generation will actually be the first generation that is tamer than the one that came before it, and it will probably be poorer less fun and less money.
quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

quotes.text: Money and fame made me believe I was entitled. I was wrong and foolish.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.text: I felt that I had worked hard my entire life and deserved to enjoy all the temptations around me. I felt I was entitled, and thanks to money and fame, I didn't have to go far to find them.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.text: One thing that people keep on saying to me is that the wealth and the fame must have made up for missing out on my childhood. But the idea of money - putting a price on your childhood - is ridiculous. You will never get those years back and you can't put a price on them.
quotes.author: Tom Felton

quotes.text: I bought a lot of rubbish things that kids buy: skateboards and clothes and typical teenage stuff. And, as soon as I could, I wasted a lot of money on cars - BMW's mostly - for myself and my family.
quotes.author: Tom Felton

quotes.text: We are going as fast as we can as soon as we can. We're in a race against time, until we run out of money.
quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

quotes.text: The only point in making money is, you can tell some big shot where to go.
quotes.author: Humphrey Bogart

quotes.text: I am a liberated woman. And I do believe if a woman does equal work she should be paid equal money. But personally I am feminine and I do like male authority to lean on.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.text: I never left France for Hollywood nor stashed my money in Switzerland.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.text: As I have said for many years throughout this land, we're borrowing money from China to buy oil from the Persian Gulf to burn it in ways that destroy the future of human civilization. Every bit of that has to change.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.text: I had more clothes than I had closets, more cars than garage space, but no money.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quotes.text: Money is such an amazing teacher: What you choose to do with your money shows whether you are truly powerful or powerless.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.text: Having money is rather like being a blond. It is more fun but not vital.
quotes.author: Mary Quant

quotes.text: People assume I'm out there having this great life, but money doesn't erase the pain. When you're young you barrel through life, making choices without thinking of repercussions. A few years down the line, you wake up in a certain place and wonder how the hell you got there.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.text: Money is in some respects life's fire: it is a very excellent servant, but a terrible master.
quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

quotes.text: It's our money, and we're free to spend it any way we please.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.text: I don't know what to do with it. I'm very fortunate to have it, and it gives you room to maneuver. But the main thing about having money is it means you don't have to worry about it. And that for me is a lovely thing. It's not for fast cars and hookers.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.text: I don't work very much, and I just sit here waiting for a script that I can't refuse - and I'm not talking about money.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.text: I decided I ought to pick a project that would not be controversial, that would not really cost the government a lot of money.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.text: I had some money, I made the best paintings ever. I was completely reclusive, worked a lot, took a lot of drugs. I was awful to people.
quotes.author: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quotes.text: Only the elites despise earning money.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.text: If you put all your strength and faith and vigor into a job and try to do the best you can, the money will come.
quotes.author: Lawrence Welk

quotes.text: I've got my eye on a few things to spend my money on. I've got my own bank card but I am really good with money. I don't spend too much at all.
quotes.author: Justin Bieber

quotes.text: You have to spend a lot to make a lot. It's not like I'm sitting on top of a pile of money.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.text: As kids we didn't complain about being poor we talked about how rich we were going to be and made moves to get the lifestyle we aspired to by any means we could. And as soon as we had a little money, we were eager to show it.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.text: While money doesn't buy love, it puts you in a great bargaining position.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.text: When I wake up in the morning, I feel like a billionaire without paying taxes.
quotes.author: Ernie Banks

quotes.text: I wake up early in the morning and walk for an hour. If I have something to write, I prefer to write in the morning until midday, and in the afternoon, I eat.
quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quotes.text: I was a government employee in the morning and a writer in the evening.
quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quotes.text: I kind of woke up one morning and was like, 'Oh I see what's happening, I get everything'. I woke up and was like, 'I get it, I'm a product.'
quotes.author: Taylor Momsen

quotes.text: We were doing it under the most extraordinary circumstances, but the first out of the tent in the morning would be David Lean. He said to me on the very first day of shooting, Pete, this is the beginning of a great adventure.
quotes.author: Peter O'Toole

quotes.text: Most songs have meager beginnings. You wake up in the morning, you throw on your suspenders, and you subvocalize and just think. They seem to form like calcium. I can't think of a story right off the bat that was that interesting. I write things on the back of my hand, usually, and sing into a tape recorder.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.text: Hitchhiking was such a pure form of existence. You'd wake up in the morning, and you'd have no idea what your day was going to be. And that's something I've never been able to shake. I loved that.
quotes.author: John Hawkes

quotes.text: I had the closest thing I have ever had to an out-of-body experience lying in bed one morning. I turned on the 'Today' programme and item four on the news was: 'The shadow chancellor has ruled himself out of the leadership.' I lay there thinking that's interesting, then I realised it was me.
quotes.author: George Osborne
