quotes.text: I half knew what to expect when I saw the cricket ground in the morning. It was when I started to talk to people working out there, I began to find what I was looking for.
quotes.author: Ian Botham

quotes.text: I wake up laughing. Yes, I wake up in the morning and there I am just laughing my head off.
quotes.author: Bruce Willis

quotes.text: I love such mirth as does not make friends ashamed to look upon one another next morning.
quotes.author: Izaak Walton

quotes.text: I am really passionate about my career and my music and I am so lucky to be able to do what I do for a job, so for all the early morning starts and long days, I could never trade it all in.
quotes.author: Rachel Stevens

quotes.text: London is completely unpredictable when it comes to weather. You'll start a scene, and it's a beautiful morning. You get there at 6 in the morning, set up, you start the scene, start shooting. Three hours later, it is pitch black and rainy.
quotes.author: David Schwimmer

quotes.text: I derive no pleasure from prosecuting a man, even though I know he's guilty do you think I could sleep at night or look at myself in the mirror in the morning if I hounded an innocent man?
quotes.author: Jim Garrison

quotes.text: I was the type of guy that used to get up in the morning and go out and just out run everybody on the field without stretching or warming up or anything.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.text: Of all the songs I've recorded, 'Amarillo By Morning' always sticks out in my mind.
quotes.author: George Strait

quotes.text: I don't mind traveling that much when I can go somewhere and stay there for a while, but touring is different. You rarely see anything. You get there early in the morning and you're resting all day, and you go in and do a sound check, and you do the show, and then bam you're gone.
quotes.author: George Strait

quotes.text: The repose of sleep refreshes only the body. It rarely sets the soul at rest. The repose of the night does not belong to us. It is not the possession of our being. Sleep opens within us an inn for phantoms. In the morning we must sweep out the shadows.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.text: Too much coffee. Too much coffee and Gatorade. It's a hell of a mix. If you're ever tired in the morning, just try that mix, and tell me what you think.
quotes.author: Kevin Garnett

quotes.text: My principal motivation is supporting my family, which is not a bad reason for getting up in the morning. That's always been my motivation - to take care of the people who rely on me.
quotes.author: Tony Parsons

quotes.text: I have to say that when you tour the world, obviously, the jetlags and different hours and ways of living and traveling, a lot of hours in the plane, and you wake up in the morning and you're not quite sure where you are, and it is very tiring.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.text: If we were to wake up some morning and find that everyone was the same race, creed and color, we would find some other causes for prejudice by noon.
quotes.author: George Aiken

quotes.text: I eat as much as the next girl, but I work my butt of in the gym every morning! The key is moderation. I splurge on the weekend. A big bowl of pasta and a delicious slice of cake for dessert are my favorites.
quotes.author: Giuliana Rancic

quotes.text: In live action movies, you just hope that everything works. Because the actor may had a bad morning and doesn't play good, or accidents happen continuously. Many things contradict what you are trying to say. But in cartoons, nothing contradict what you want to say.
quotes.author: John Hench

quotes.text: I've never been a TV junkie. I remember watching Letterman way back when he had a morning show.
quotes.author: Todd Barry

quotes.text: If you're changing the world, you're working on important things. You're excited to get up in the morning.
quotes.author: Larry Page

quotes.text: My wife gets all the money I make. I just get an apple and clean clothes every morning.
quotes.author: Ray Romano

quotes.text: Wherever my story takes me, however dark and difficult the theme, there is always some hope and redemption, not because readers like happy endings, but because I am an optimist at heart. I know the sun will rise in the morning, that there is a light at the end of every tunnel.
quotes.author: Michael Morpurgo

quotes.text: What I couldn't help noticing was that I learned more about the novel in a morning by trying to write a page of one than I'd learned in seven years or so of trying to write criticism.
quotes.author: Philip Pullman

quotes.text: I was so obsessed by this problem that I was thinking about it all the time - when I woke up in the morning, when I went to sleep at night - and that went on for eight years.
quotes.author: Andrew Wiles

quotes.text: There's also a sense of freedom. I was so obsessed by this problem that I was thinking about if all the time - when I woke up in the morning, when I went to sleep at night, and that went on for eight years.
quotes.author: Andrew Wiles

quotes.text: Prince used to call me up 3am in the morning and invite me to hear some of his new songs.
quotes.author: Sheena Easton

quotes.text: The one ironclad rule is that I have to try. I have to walk into my writing room and pick up my pen every weekday morning.
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.text: To drive an F1 car you have to be a little mad. On the morning of a race there's a mix of excitement and fear. If it's a wet track, then it's worse as you're not in control most of the time, which is the thing all drivers fear the most.
quotes.author: Jenson Button

quotes.text: A lot of people think Formula One isn't a sport because everyone drives a car when they go to work in the morning. But we're pulling up to six G on a corner or during breaking, which is almost like being a fighter pilot. So we have to do a lot of work on our neck muscles.
quotes.author: Jenson Button

quotes.text: How many women have the courage to start properly with a cold, cold bath early in the morning? I jump in, throw the water, cold as ice, and after the first plunge I am happy.
quotes.author: Anna Held

quotes.text: I am not a morning person.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.text: I couldn't wait for the sun to come up the next morning so that I could get out on the course again.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.text: Whereas I used to get depressed or neurotic or dwell on things, I see my son's bright eyes and smile in the morning, and suddenly, I don't feel like I'm depressed anymore. There's nothing to be depressed about when you've got that.
quotes.author: Corey Feldman

quotes.text: Most of the top actors and actresses may be working in ten or twelve films at the same time, so they will give one director two hours and maybe shoot in Bombay in the morning and Madras in the evening. It happens.
quotes.author: Satyajit Ray

quotes.text: The question is the morning after. What sort of Iraq do we wake up to after the bombing? What happens in the region? What impact could it have? These are questions leaders I have spoken to have posed.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.text: I never really drank coffee in college, but now I'm on my feet all day and out all night and can't believe it hasn't always been in my life. When morning comes I crave it.
quotes.author: Gail Simmons

quotes.text: The thing with me is, if I wake up one morning and I'm not happy working as an actress, I'll stop. It's not something I have to do. It's not a vocation.
quotes.author: Samantha Morton

quotes.text: Those golden minutes before you are completely awake, when your mind is just drifting, you have no censorship you are ready to develop any kind of idea. That's when I come up with the best and worst ideas. That is the privilege of being a writer - that you can stay in bed for an hour in the morning and it's work time.
quotes.author: Jo Nesbo

quotes.text: The episodes all blend together for me, so I don't remember. I can't even remember what I had for breakfast this morning. I always feel I must be such a disappointment to them.
quotes.author: Sarah Michelle Gellar

quotes.text: I still love doing what I do, and I'm really lucky to get up in the morning and want to go to work.
quotes.author: Heston Blumenthal

quotes.text: It seems to me madness to wake up in the morning and do something other than paint, considering that one may not wake up the following morning.
quotes.author: Frank Auerbach

quotes.text: Now, on nights that I can't sleep, I play video games alone until the morning.
quotes.author: Namie Amuro

quotes.text: In West Virginia, the most vulnerable people we have are people who get up every morning and go to work.
quotes.author: Joe Manchin

quotes.text: She got the magazine on a Wednesday morning, and on Thursday announced our marriage was over.
quotes.author: David Gest

quotes.text: I don't go to Mass every day. But I go to church every day. Just sitting there, thinking - it's a great way to start the morning, you know? You feel so good coming out, and your approach to everything is suddenly really clear.
quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg

quotes.text: But to the slave mother New Year's day comes laden with peculiar sorrows. She sits on her cold cabin floor, watching the children who may all be torn from her the next morning and often does she wish that she and they might die before the day dawns.
quotes.author: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quotes.text: On the last morning of Virginia's bloodiest year since the Civil War, I built a fire and sat facing a window of darkness where at sunrise I knew I would find the sea.
quotes.author: Patricia Cornwell

quotes.text: I spent every night until four in the morning on my dissertation, until I came to the point when I could not write another word, not even the next letter. I went to bed. Eight o'clock the next morning I was up writing again.
quotes.author: Abraham Pais

quotes.text: You know, the market was down yesterday... my first thought when I heard-just on a personal basis, when I heard there had been this attack and I saw the futures this morning, which were really in the tank, I thought, Time to buy.
quotes.author: Brit Hume

quotes.text: I have a hotline to the tabloids. When I get up in the morning, I call the Star, and the last thing at night, I call them. I want them to have the inside track.
quotes.author: Kirstie Alley

quotes.text: Normal people don't just wake up in the morning and say I think it'd be a good idea to run for president of the United States.
quotes.author: Jon Huntsman, Jr.

quotes.text: The attorney general would call at 5 o'clock in the evening and say: 'Tomorrow morning we are going to try to integrate the University of Mississippi. Get us a memo on what we're likely to do, and what we can do if the governor sends the National Guard there.'
quotes.author: Harold H. Greene

quotes.text: I am a morning writer I am writing at eight-thirty in longhand and I keep at it until twelve-thirty, when I go for a swim. Then I come back, have lunch, and read in the afternoon until I take my walk for the next day's writing.
quotes.author: Carlos Fuentes

quotes.text: Both my mum and dad were great readers, and we would go every Saturday morning to the library, and my sister and I had a library card when we could pass off something as a signature, and all of us would come with an armful of books.
quotes.author: Geraldine Brooks

quotes.text: If I'm playing in the morning, I'll get some carbs early: porridge with chopped banana. If I'm playing in the afternoon, I'll start with less carbs and have some eggs and fruit for breakfast, then a light lunch about 90 minutes before I play, so I don't feel sluggish or full.
quotes.author: Rory McIlroy

quotes.text: Remember my first tenet in getting dressed is how you feel in the morning. So if you're not being true blue to that, it usually shows.
quotes.author: Pharrell Williams

quotes.text: Yes, I still love 'South Park,' but I also love morning TV now.
quotes.author: Mo Rocca

quotes.text: We hear the stories every day now: the father who puts on a suit every morning and leaves the house so his daughter doesn't know he lost his job, the recent college grad facing up to the painful reality that the only door that's open to her after four years of study and a pile of debt is her parents'. These are the faces of the Obama economy.
quotes.author: Mitch McConnell

quotes.text: I was shocked by the amount of Welsh people in L.A. We'd go to this British pub to watch the 'Six Nations' early in the morning and I remember the first time I walked in it was just a sea of red.
quotes.author: Matthew Rhys

quotes.text: I'm obsessed with radio. It's a good start to Sunday morning.
quotes.author: R. L. Stine

quotes.text: A real New Yorker likes the sound of a garbage truck in the morning.
quotes.author: R. L. Stine

quotes.text: I am up at 3:30, reading the op-ed pages and getting ready to be on the air by 6 A.M. on the set of 'Morning Joe,' and after three hours of TV and two hours on the radio, it is only 12 noon.
quotes.author: Mika Brzezinski

quotes.text: I have mugs of hot water every morning because the studio is cold, and also because it makes my throat sound clearer.
quotes.author: Mika Brzezinski

quotes.text: My salary situation at 'Morning Joe' wasn't right. I made five attempts to fix it, then realized I'd made the same mistake every time: I apologised for asking.
quotes.author: Mika Brzezinski

quotes.text: On 'Morning Joe' I can say what I think, be my sometimes unorthodox self, have fun, yet be serious as well.
quotes.author: Mika Brzezinski

quotes.text: You'd have to think that you're at least decent, or you couldn't get up every morning and do it. I think if I live long enough, I might be pretty good.
quotes.author: Martin Mull

quotes.text: I wake up every morning in a cold sweat, regardless of how well things went the day before. And put that I said that in a somewhat but not completely tongue-in-cheek way.
quotes.author: Harvey Pekar

quotes.text: When a man has been consistently battering his wife, he shouldn't expect a bouquet of roses from her the morning after he promises to stop.
quotes.author: Joe Slovo

quotes.text: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: George Horace Lorimer

quotes.text: I had an amazing childhood, lots of love. But my dad worked his tail off, getting up at 4 in the morning and going off at 5, 6 o'clock, yet he always had time to spend with his kids and his wife.
quotes.author: Criss Angel

quotes.text: I have to say when we talk about the treatment of these prisoners that I would guess that these prisoners wake up every morning thanking Allah that Saddam Hussein is not in charge of these prisons.
quotes.author: James Inhofe

quotes.text: How can a doctor judge a woman's sanity by merely bidding her good morning and refusing to hear her pleas for release? Even the sick ones know it is useless to say anything, for the answer will be that it is their imagination.
quotes.author: Nellie Bly

quotes.text: Even as a kid, I never liked breakfast. I just don't like to eat then. I like to get up and work. I think sticking a whole bunch of carbohydrates in your stomach in the morning is probably the worst way to begin the day.
quotes.author: Candace Bushnell

quotes.text: The worst part about pregnancy would definitely have to be my nausea. I don't know why it's just called morning sickness because morning sickness never just happened in the morning for me and it's not happening just in the morning for my sister.
quotes.author: Tia Mowry

quotes.text: I'm set to have my best year ever: I'm hiring some acts and there will be a show in the morning, in the afternoon and in the evening. I'm going to use my theater to its fullest potential.
quotes.author: Mickey Gilley

quotes.text: It's not easy waking up every single morning knowing what you're going to put your body through and having to do it. We don't have days off.
quotes.author: Bryan Clay

quotes.text: I've found myself at one in the morning just sitting at my desk spending an hour returning emails from the day until like two in the morning. It's ridiculous, I should be sleeping, or dreaming, or reading a novel.
quotes.author: Brit Marling

quotes.text: The boy who expects every morning to open into a new world finds that today is like yesterday, but he believes tomorrow will be different.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.text: My life had become a catastrophe. I had no idea how to turn it around. My band had broken up. I had almost lost my family. My whole life had devolved into a disaster. I believe that the police officer who stopped me at three a.m. that morning saved my life.
quotes.author: Trey Anastasio

quotes.text: The greatest job I ever had was working on my family farm. Each morning my father would come into my bedroom around 4:30 am and command me to get up and work the fields. I would spend the next two hours before school slopping pigs and cropping tobacco.
quotes.author: Armstrong Williams

quotes.text: It only worked for a little while the morning after I agreed to go with Universal, an article came out in the Hollywood trade papers, and the secret was out.
quotes.author: Laura Hillenbrand

quotes.text: Every time I get up in the morning, melodies occur to me and I start trying to shape lyrics to melodies.
quotes.author: Andrew Bird

quotes.text: Never get married in the morning - you never know who you might meet that night.
quotes.author: Paul Hornung

quotes.text: I never thought in a million years I'd be that healthy girl who wakes up every morning to exercise. After being called 'cherubic and chubby,' I'm rocking a bikini!
quotes.author: Kelly Osbourne

quotes.text: You were up at 5 o'clock in the morning, and then you'd ride in a caravan, because we didn't have big movie trucks or trailers that is the hardware of a movie camp.
quotes.author: Marguerite Moreau

quotes.text: I don't have to get up in the morning and go beat up my body like I used to. I don't have to be out there in August in 108 degree weather down in Texas.
quotes.author: Emmitt Smith

quotes.text: Waking up with a bad head in the morning is difficult sometimes.
quotes.author: Caroline Corr

quotes.text: There's some things you just have to live with. Like twelve cars camping outside your house, and when you wake up in the morning, they're going to follow you wherever you go. It helps that I live in Valencia. It eliminates some. But they're still here.
quotes.author: Taylor Lautner

quotes.text: You show up in Paris, and on the drive from the airport to the hotel you're like, 'This is so cool! I want to see something! I want to go to the Eiffel Tower!' And then you leave the next morning. You think, Oh, I didn't get to do anything. I tell people: I've been just about everywhere, but I've seen nothing.
quotes.author: Taylor Lautner

quotes.text: As one gets older, it happens that in the morning one fails to remember the airplane trip to be taken in a few hours or the lecture scheduled for the afternoon.
quotes.author: Rudolf Arnheim

quotes.text: I'm a mom - I'm lucky if I get to shower in the morning. Luckily, nail polish stays on my toes. I've been so bad on the upkeep, though.
quotes.author: Idina Menzel

quotes.text: A city with one newspaper, or with a morning and an evening paper under one ownership, is like a man with one eye, and often the eye is glass.
quotes.author: A. J. Liebling

quotes.text: Probably millions of Americans got up this morning with a cup of coffee, a cigarette and a donut. No wonder they are sick and fouled up.
quotes.author: Jack LaLanne

quotes.text: Yeah, I'm not really a morning person.
quotes.author: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

quotes.text: Let me tell you, sisters, seeing dried egg on a plate in the morning is a lot dirtier than anything I've had to deal with in politics.
quotes.author: Ann Richards

quotes.text: Sydney in general is eclectic. You can be on that brilliant blue ocean walk in the morning and then within 20 minutes you can be in a completely vast suburban sprawl or an Italian or Asian suburb, and it's that mix of people, it's that melting pot of people that give it its vital personality.
quotes.author: Baz Luhrmann

quotes.text: It seems a long time since the morning mail could be called correspondence.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.text: I tend to start at 9 o'clock in the morning and write until 3. Those are my best hours. They fit the other rhythms of the world. So I write for six hours, pretty much without any breaks.
quotes.author: Justin Cronin

quotes.text: I get up, go and get a coffee, and go do the crossword - I'm loyal to one particular paper, the 'Guardian' - and that's my idea of a perfect morning.
quotes.author: Laura Marling

quotes.text: After the first day of practice, there's not one guy who's playing at 100 percent or who feels great. Sometimes, getting up in the morning and brushing your teeth is the hardest part of the day - it just hurts.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.text: Throughout my 20s I spent a lot of time just playing and not really working, but fortunately for me I continued to get just enough work, and have a reason to wake up in the morning. I really empathize with some of my peers who had success in the early years then it dries up, and so there's no reason to get up in the morning.
quotes.author: Jason Bateman

quotes.text: I try to shave at night so my skin has a chance to settle by the early morning call-time.
quotes.author: Patrick Wilson

quotes.text: It was morning through the high window I saw the pure, bright blue of the sky as it hovered cheerfully over the long roofs of the neighboring houses. It too seemed full of joy, as if it had special plans, and had put on its finest clothes for the occasion.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.text: I wake up every morning and I surprise myself. I wake up to a new me.
quotes.author: Gina Carano

quotes.text: I literally have meetings at eight o'clock in the morning, and I finish at nine o'clock at night. It sounds pathetic, but I don't even have time to go shopping.
quotes.author: Stella McCartney

quotes.text: I am focused on what needs to be done for the people of Israel. Period. I do not pity myself and I do not pat myself on the shoulder. I get up in the morning full of energy to fulfill my mission.
quotes.author: Ehud Olmert

quotes.text: I had three children while doing a show, as demanding as 'Good Morning America,' so this is - you know, it's almost like I'm less daunted about motherhood, and parenting at this point in time. And I think I'm just much more fit and healthy than I was 20-years-ago.
quotes.author: Joan Lunden

quotes.text: I'd skip school regularly to see movies - even in the morning, in the small Parisian theaters that opened early.
quotes.author: Francois Truffaut

quotes.text: The thing I care about is my weight - I'm as fanatical about it as a member of Girls Aloud. I weigh myself every morning. I know exactly what I want to be - 82kg - and I try to stick to it.
quotes.author: Tony Parsons

quotes.text: I was a very undisciplined person but acting was something that actually motivated me to get up in the morning. I hadn't experienced that before, but it was something that really excited me. I think I could be quite self-conscious and it gave me a release.
quotes.author: Rufus Sewell

quotes.text: What is life, when wanting love? Night without a morning love's the cloudless summer sun, nature gay adorning.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.text: I don't dream songs. I'm more apt to write dreams down and then to be able to interpret them into a song. I also tend to get up and write prose in the morning from which will come songs.
quotes.author: Judy Collins

quotes.text: The crew are the faces you see every morning and last at night before you go home. I spend more time with those people than I do with my friends and family, so they're forever a part of you and who you become as an actor so I hope I see them again.
quotes.author: Claudia Black

quotes.text: And I have to say, what motivates me every day and I know my Democratic colleagues is to remember that every day 14,000 people get up in the morning with insurance that go to bed at night without it and most of them because they lost their job.
quotes.author: Debbie Stabenow

quotes.text: Nobody has time to keep trying on a load of things in the morning like a teenager.
quotes.author: Claudia Schiffer

quotes.text: Sometimes in the morning, when it's a good surf, I go out there, and I don't feel like it's a bad world.
quotes.author: Kary Mullis

quotes.text: You know, the men go to tea houses with the expectation that they will have a nice quiet evening and not read about it the next morning in the newspaper.
quotes.author: Arthur Golden

quotes.text: It's very important to write things down instantly, or you can lose the way you were thinking out a line. I have a rule that if I wake up at 3 in the morning and think of something, I write it down. I can't wait until morning - it'll be gone.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.text: I'd always been a news junkie, always read lots of newspapers and watched the Sunday morning news shows on TV and felt strongly about issues of power, control, sexuality and race.
quotes.author: Barbara Kruger

quotes.text: I think it's good that I had some experience of the real world before I became successful. You know, having to get up in the morning and going to work in construction.
quotes.author: Tom Jones

quotes.text: Chelsea Morning is a great Joni Mitchell song and I guess I'm partial to her lyrics because they show me a slightly different perspective on life.
quotes.author: Neil Diamond

quotes.text: If I'm working on a film, I'll do sit-ups for before I shoot. Like, 100 in the morning or something.
quotes.author: James Franco

quotes.text: Four hours of prosthetics every morning, the jowls and the nose, and it was very hot so they're having to attend to it all day, and you're still petrified of so many things, such as, can I speak properly? Hitchcock never quite lost those East End vowels, even though he had the softened California consonants.
quotes.author: Toby Jones

quotes.text: When I wake up on a Monday morning and I realise I don't have to go and work at the civil service, I really think I've won.
quotes.author: Paul Merton

quotes.text: Somehow, I've been blessed to be able to have the young spirit inside - not feel like every year I get a year older. I feel like every year I get a year younger. I don't wake up in the morning with aches and pains.
quotes.author: Rickey Henderson

quotes.text: I open with a clock striking, to beget an awful attention in the audience - it also marks the time, which is four o clock in the morning, and saves a description of the rising sun, and a great deal about gilding the eastern hemisphere.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.text: I was lucky enough to grow up in a home where I woke up Christmas morning and had toys. I know that's not the case with all people and I don't think kids should go without experiencing that sort of joy.
quotes.author: Lucy Hale

quotes.text: That's the biggest part of doing comics: You have to create stuff that makes you want to get out of bed every morning and get to work.
quotes.author: Daniel Clowes

quotes.text: I trust, that your readers will not construe my words to mean, that I would not have gone to a 3 o'clock in the morning session, for the sake of defeating the Nebraska bill.
quotes.author: Gerrit Smith

quotes.text: When you were a volunteer for the Bush-Cheney campaign, you came in the morning you had a supervisor who gave you a list of calls to make and a time to do it in.
quotes.author: Ed Gillespie

quotes.text: It's such a luxury to be able to be happy about going to work in the morning.
quotes.author: Joe Pantoliano

quotes.text: I don't believe in writing at night because it comes too easily. When I read it in the morning it's not good. I need daylight to begin. Between nine and ten o'clock I have a long breakfast with reading and music.
quotes.author: Gunter Grass

quotes.text: In the last year my wife has noticed me struggling to get downstairs on a Sunday morning. I've two young children and football has been so good to me over the years I don't want to spoil it.
quotes.author: Graeme Le Saux

quotes.text: I don't know why you call it morning sickness, because I was sick all day and night!
quotes.author: Soleil Moon Frye

quotes.text: What I don't like is breakfast in the morning. I have a double-espresso cappuccino, but no food.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Puck

quotes.text: It is always with excitement that I wake up in the morning wondering what my intuition will toss up to me, like gifts from the sea. I work with it and rely on it. It's my partner.
quotes.author: Jonas Salk

quotes.text: I never want to make a film. I don't wake up in the morning going, 'Ooh, I'd really love to be on set making a film today'. I'm aware that other contemporary film directors perceive film-making as what they do, as what they have to do. But I would hope that I am more catholic in my tastes.
quotes.author: Stephen Daldry

quotes.text: I am, in fact, Superman. Every morning I wake up and go into a telephone booth and change my costume, and then go to work.
quotes.author: Stephen Daldry

quotes.text: I was up late last night yapping about the elections on CNN and up early this morning doing the same thing in my daughter's kindergarten class.
quotes.author: Tucker Carlson

quotes.text: In my day, at 12 years old, which was 38 years ago, we worked out in summer months for two and a half hours. Today someone in that age group might work out for four hours, two hours in the morning and two at night.
quotes.author: Mark Spitz

quotes.text: I was getting to bed about 10 P.M. so wound up and not getting to sleep by 11, and because I was putting the prosthetics on for five hours, I had to be up at 3 in the morning.
quotes.author: Gerard Butler

quotes.text: We don't watch the film anymore because we've seen it so many times, so we'll introduce it, walk out and we'll come back in right about when I wake up in the morning and walk over to the shop and everything's changed.
quotes.author: Simon Pegg

quotes.text: O sweet, delusive Noon, Which the morning climbs to find, O moment sped too soon, And morning left behind.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quotes.text: As soon as I began, it seemed impossible to write fast enough - I wrote faster than I would write a letter - two thousand to three thousand words in a morning, and I cannot help it.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quotes.text: I had to get up run in the morning for 2 hours, go to the gym and also get good opponents as sparring partners because I'm a big believer in that how you train is how you will fight at least when it came to me that's how it worked.
quotes.author: Alexis Arguello

quotes.text: The result was that, if it happened to clear off after a cloudy evening, I frequently arose from my bed at any hour of the night or morning and walked two miles to the observatory to make some observation included in the programme.
quotes.author: Simon Newcomb

quotes.text: I do Yoga. I'd like to say I do it every morning, but I don't, I just don't have the time.
quotes.author: Radha Mitchell

quotes.text: So it's the kind of business where you can't wait to get up in the morning and read the papers, or listen to what's on the news, and you know, how the world's going to change.
quotes.author: Sanford I. Weill

quotes.text: The muse holds no appointments. You can never call on it. I don't understand people who get up at 9 o'clock in the morning, put on the coffee and sit down to write.
quotes.author: Glen Hansard

quotes.text: You say something stupid and the next morning you're in the headlines.
quotes.author: Barry Manilow

quotes.text: My ideal is to wake up in the morning and run around the meadow naked.
quotes.author: Daryl Hannah

quotes.text: Mom and Dad would stay in bed on Sunday morning, but the kids would have to go to church.
quotes.author: Lynn Johnston

quotes.text: I think I'm a fun flatmate. I'm always cheerful. I go on tour with my band so it's 12 people on one bus and I feel like I'm the one who's happy in the morning. I'm not a chaotic person, but I might slack off on doing the dishes from time to time.
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.text: I don't want to be in my car all day. I love getting up in the morning in Venice and walking my dogs down to the cafe to get my tea, and then perhaps going to a bookstore and sitting and reading, then walking to the beach.
quotes.author: Jessica Chastain

quotes.text: What I do is not some magical, mystical thing. I simply get up in the morning, get to work on time, say my lines, and do the best I can.
quotes.author: Parker Stevenson

quotes.text: Now I know that that is just the phenomena of eating this way. Most all of my letters say I hit a plateau and then one morning I woke up and the melt had happened.
quotes.author: Suzanne Somers

quotes.text: I'll always remember when I bumped into Good Morning America's Robin Roberts on a flight to my mother's funeral in 1994, and how kind she was during that difficult time.
quotes.author: Gayle King

quotes.text: When I found out I was going to be on CBS every morning, my first phone call was to Jenny Craig. Ten days later, I'd lost nine pounds. Now I even take the plan's popcorn with me to the movies.
quotes.author: Gayle King

quotes.text: There are 435 members of Congress. There's one 'Morning Joe' show. Hopefully, we can keep hammering the argument that you can disagree with other people and have debates but remain civil.
quotes.author: Joe Scarborough

quotes.text: I could announce one morning that the world was going to blow up in three hours and people would be calling in about my hair!
quotes.author: Katie Couric

quotes.text: But, you know, they don't enjoy the dinner hour together. It's just not as much of a ritual at night and it's interesting. I think the ritual is taking place perhaps more in the morning.
quotes.author: Katie Couric

quotes.text: But of course when people watch morning television, Terry, it's a very different animal. You know, they're running around, they're getting their kids ready for school, they're probably doing eight million things, they're brushing their teeth.
quotes.author: Katie Couric

quotes.text: All three networks have always had a morning show but now cable of course is taking some of that audience away and a variety of other things, probably the Internet as well.
quotes.author: Katie Couric

quotes.text: Well, when I was a kid and I watched 'Speed Racer,' I used to always watch it in the morning with my cereal. And when I ate the cereal, I would pour soda into the cereal because we never really had milk for some reason, I don't know.
quotes.author: Emile Hirsch

quotes.text: You know what I like to do on a Sunday morning? Clean my house. I really enjoy it it's my ritual. I require tidiness, actually. I have to have everything spotless before I can relax.
quotes.author: Jonathan Rhys Meyers

quotes.text: There would be nights when I would wake up and couldn't get back to sleep. So I would go downstairs and write. The staff had a pool going on how many pages of typing I would bring in here in the morning.
quotes.author: Harold H. Greene

quotes.text: There is both a skill factor and an effort factor in dream recall. People can develop dream recall skills, such as lying still in the morning and writing down whatever comes to mind.
quotes.author: Henry Reed

quotes.text: The four of us couldn't have made a record with the time left over when we were shooting the show. We were on stage from 7.30 in the morning 'til 7 at night. Later on, when there was a break from filming, and we were sick of doing it the old way.
quotes.author: Peter Tork

quotes.text: You think that religion is a thing that is there to help you and to see you through life, and then you wake up one morning and find the entire Irish situation, the civil war that's based on religion.
quotes.author: Midge Ure

quotes.text: Markets rebounded quickly from morning jitters after the London Thursday terrorist bombing.
quotes.author: Cliff Stearns

quotes.text: I just remember Stella Tenant and me dancing in Donatella Versace's bathtub until like four in the morning. It was one of those 'pinch me' moments.
quotes.author: Carolyn Murphy

quotes.text: I turned on VH1 this morning just to get a little warm-up before I came over here, and I think it's just terrific. There's so much great stuff: diverse and wonderful music, good performances, great looking girls, great videos, the whole thing.
quotes.author: Debbie Harry

quotes.text: When I read the pilot 'for Married with Children', it just reminded me of my Uncle Joe... just a self-deprecating kind of guy. He'd come home from work, and the wife would maybe say 'I ran over the dog this morning in the driveway'. And he would say 'Fine, what's for dinner?
quotes.author: Ed O'Neill

quotes.text: When I get up in the morning I brush my teeth and go about my business, and if I am going anywhere interesting I take my camera along.
quotes.author: Elliott Erwitt

quotes.text: I love to read. I love to stretch. In the morning, I get up, and if I'm not in a hurry, I will lie on the floor on a rug, look through some books and magazines, and maybe listen to music and try to do stretching exercises to tune up.
quotes.author: Jackson Browne

quotes.text: I wake up every morning and I feel like I'm juggling glass balls. I live in Los Angeles, my business is run out of London, and most evenings I'm cuddled up in front of Skype, in my dressing gown, speaking with my studio in London. I travel a lot, my team travel a lot, but I wouldn't have it any other way.
quotes.author: Victoria Beckham

quotes.text: I made it a morning show. We have the coffee cup, we have the morning papers. It's got that feel to it, that's what I wanted.
quotes.author: Regis Philbin

quotes.text: I've done the best I can with the morning show. I made it a morning show. We have the coffee cup, you have the morning papers, you know, it's got that feel to it, that's what I wanted.
quotes.author: Regis Philbin

quotes.text: It means a lot in my business and its a wonderful feeling to be recognized for what you have done over a lifetime, but I didn't go crazy. I still eat my cereal in the morning, have a sandwich in the afternoon, go to bed at night. You know, nothing really different.
quotes.author: Regis Philbin

quotes.text: I wake up every morning singing 'The Star-Spangled Banner.'
quotes.author: Terry McAuliffe

quotes.text: I'm French, so I'm quite lazy about exercising, and I smoke. But I do love going for a run in the morning with my dog. That's all.
quotes.author: Eva Green

quotes.text: I am so excited this year getting to play the 85th Anniversary Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade. Everyone knows on Thanksgiving morning to get up, turn on the TV and watch the parade, so to be an actual participant is going to be fun and I'm looking forward to it. I am gonna have to put on my deer hunting gear, though, to stay warm!
quotes.author: Rodney Atkins

quotes.text: We know that a man can read Goethe or Rilke in the evening, that he can play Bach and Schubert, and go to his day's work at Auschwitz in the morning.
quotes.author: George Steiner

quotes.text: It was important on The Shipping News to have my house far enough away from each location so I had this time in the morning to think about my shots and still remain open to surprises once I got to the set.
quotes.author: Lasse Hallstrom

quotes.text: I didn't wake up one morning and not be in the Replacements. We're all that forever, and I've just grown older. I mean, I haven't lost anything. I've gained a few things.
quotes.author: Paul Westerberg

quotes.text: I was up watching Meet Joe Black at four AM. I was hoping Brad Pitt would die, and he was still alive at seven forty in the morning! I actually felt sorry for once, for critics.
quotes.author: Rose McGowan

quotes.text: Sometimes it's so weird just to do an interview. This morning I was back in my parents' house, with my brother, and we went for a jog together, then had breakfast as a family. And a couple of hours later I'm wearing high heels and a dress and makeup, and talking about my job.
quotes.author: Carey Mulligan

quotes.text: We live under a government of men and morning newspapers.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.text: Some days I would be there at ten in the morning and wouldn't leave till ten at night, and the others would waltz in for a couple of hours and then leave, because I was doing that painting thing. And they were happy to see that being done.
quotes.author: Lindsey Buckingham

quotes.text: It wasn't always easy getting up at 5 o'clock in the morning to go to the rink. Sometimes I wanted to just go back to sleep.
quotes.author: Nancy Kerrigan

quotes.text: Work is a prayer, and I start off every morning dedicating it to our Creator.
quotes.author: Joe Murray

quotes.text: We had news this morning of another successful atomic bomb being dropped on Nagasaki. These two heavy blows have fallen in quick succession upon the Japanese and there will be quite a little space before we intend to drop another.
quotes.author: Henry L. Stimson

quotes.text: I started writing morning pages just to keep my hand in, you know, just because I was a writer and I didn't know what else to do but write. And then one day as I was writing, a character came sort of strolling in and I realized, Oh my God, I don't have to be just a screenwriter. I can write novels.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.text: I don't have an iPod. I mean, I have a couple. Doesn't everyone? But I don't use it. I need to because I go to the gym now, and I'm tired of listening to morning radio. I want some music! I do have a video iPod, but I don't use it either.
quotes.author: Ricky Schroder

quotes.text: I started playing poker in 2003 during my pregnancy, to distract myself from my awful morning sickness. For months all I did was cry and play Texas Hold'em.
quotes.author: Cheryl Hines

quotes.text: I squeeze oranges every morning to make juice.
quotes.author: Utada Hikaru

quotes.text: So when bands work with me and it's 10 o'clock, usually you'd have to be getting out of the studio, we could go on until 2 in the morning cause it's my place!
quotes.author: Billy Sherwood

quotes.text: Internet marketing entrepreneurs have truly opened my eyes to just how important a quick turnaround time can be. Often times, an interview they conduct with me today is online by the next morning. The interviewee is then able to start making money less than 24 hours after the initial interview.
quotes.author: Marc Ostrofsky

quotes.text: One's age should be tranquil, as childhood should be playful. Hard work at either extremity of life seems out of place. At midday the sun may burn, and men labor under it but the morning and evening should be alike calm and cheerful.
quotes.author: Thomas Arnold

quotes.text: You feel a little older in the morning. By noon I feel about 55.
quotes.author: Bob Dole

quotes.text: When I wrote the song, I had the sea near Bombay in mind. We stayed at a hotel by the sea, and the fishermen come up at five in the morning and they were all chanting. And we went on the beach and we got chased by a mad dog - big as a donkey.
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.text: Well physically preparing for the role, definitely and then continuing to stay physically fit throughout filming, getting up, 4.00 4.30 in the morning.
quotes.author: Brandon Routh

quotes.text: I got into shape because I took kick-boxing lessons every day to prepare for a fight scene with Taylor Lautner. I really wanted to lie down and eat Chinese food, but I kick-boxed every morning and ran. If someone was filming you with your kit off, you'd do the same thing.
quotes.author: Jason Isaacs

quotes.text: He would use amphetamines to stay awake because he would have late night maneuvers that would go way into the early morning hours and he was given pills to stay up for the long hours.
quotes.author: Priscilla Presley

quotes.text: Because my parents, growing up, they worked hard. Everyone in my family woke up early in the morning. I used to see my mother and my father go off to work, and come back and, no matter what, they had time for the kids.
quotes.author: Herschel Walker

quotes.text: In the morning, I reach for the sports page.
quotes.author: Lisa Guerrero

quotes.text: On my morning run, I listen to sports talk radio.
quotes.author: Lisa Guerrero

quotes.text: I can't record in the morning because I sound like Barry White.
quotes.author: Toni Braxton

quotes.text: Bagel in the morning is the ultimate breakfast for me they're just good.
quotes.author: Lee DeWyze

quotes.text: I can write all the way through the morning, when my mind is clear, and there are no distractions.
quotes.author: Karen Thompson Walker

quotes.text: I was half asleep lying there writing this lyric in my head at about 3:30 in the morning. I woke Steve up with this idea and then we went into the living room where there was a little upright piano and finished the song. I wonder where that piano is now?
quotes.author: Jim Capaldi

quotes.text: Men and women were declared equal one morning and everybody could divorce each other by postcard.
quotes.author: Kate Millett

quotes.text: I had a friend whose family had dinner together. The mother would tuck you in at night and make breakfast in the morning. They even had a spare bike for a friend. It just seemed so amazing to me.
quotes.author: Moon Unit Zappa

quotes.text: Over the last four years, I've made a habit of coming into my office in the morning and just getting to work.
quotes.author: Seth Green

quotes.text: Your enjoyment of the world is never right, till every morning you awake in Heaven: see yourself in your Father's palace and look upon the skies, the earth, and the air as celestial joys: having such a reverend esteem of all, as if you were among the angels.
quotes.author: Thomas Traherne

quotes.text: Just this morning, out of a large memory for songs, and having been obsessed by them since childhood, suddenly, at the age of 84, I thought of a song I hadn't thought of in over 50 years. It came into my head unbidden.
quotes.author: Tom Glazer

quotes.text: My poor vision gives me a soft-focus morning. For the first half hour, I kind of wander through my house, and everything is a blur. I put my contacts in when I'm ready to deal with the world.
quotes.author: Carrie Ann Inaba

quotes.text: We all deal with issues of time. The first thing you do in the morning is look at the clock to see what time it is.
quotes.author: Jeremy Piven

quotes.text: I got up one Christmas morning and we didn't have nothing to eat. We didn't have an apple, we didn't have an orange, we didn't have a cake, we didn't have nothing.
quotes.author: Muddy Waters

quotes.text: And now the momentous day, a day to be forever remembered in the annals of the country, arrived. Early in the morning on the 1st of July the conflict began.
quotes.author: Edward Everett

quotes.text: Holiday? Is like, what? I'm a hyperactive girl, so it may be boring for me to be on the beach doing nothing. I just need to find a place for three weeks and work but sleep in the morning, maybe write a little bit, have a glass of red wine. That's my perfect holiday.
quotes.author: Melanie Laurent

quotes.text: I certainly don't sit around in the morning making pancakes listening to Whitehouse or anything.
quotes.author: Thurston Moore

quotes.text: Among the New Hollanders whom we were thus engaged with, there was one who by his appearance and carriage, as well in the morning as this afternoon, seemed to be the chief of them, and a kind of prince or captain among them.
quotes.author: William Dampier

quotes.text: We have this morning dropped anchor, just off Williamstown.
quotes.author: William John Wills

quotes.text: It's interesting to wake up at 3 in the morning by someone saying they're a reporter and they want to know how you feel. I felt fine, but I said, 'Well, why do you ask?'
quotes.author: Saul Perlmutter

quotes.text: The first one, obviously, was walking into my office at eight o'clock in the morning on Wednesday, and being told there was a telephone call saying that there was an incident at Three Mile Island, and that it had shut down and that beyond that we didn't know.
quotes.author: William Scranton

quotes.text: Another very strong image from the first day was giving my initial press conference in the morning - going down and finding out that everything I had said, the essence of what I had said, was wrong.
quotes.author: William Scranton

quotes.text: What I had said in the morning was that this is what we know has happened, but there has been no significant off-site release. Only to find out moments later that, in fact, there had been an off-site release. I still haven't gotten over that.

quotes.text: My mom was a big 'Smurfs' fan, so she would force me to watch every Saturday morning. I had no choice in the matter. I would jump downstairs on Saturday morning, 'Hurray, cartoons!' and she would say, 'Smurfs! That's what you're watching.'
quotes.author: Jayma Mays

quotes.text: When you awaken some morning and hear that somebody or other has been discovered, you can put it down as a fact that he discovered himself years ago - since that time he has been toiling, working, and striving to make himself worthy of general discovery.

quotes.text: I have asked myself once or twice lately what was my natural bent. I have no doubt at all: It is to look at each day for the evil of that day and have a go at it, and that is why I have never failed to have an acute interest in each morning's letters.

quotes.text: It's really cool to see glowsticks at the show, to see dance music culture infiltrating and becoming one with the metal community.

quotes.text: It seems like a lot of music today is so churned out and simple.
quotes.author: Jonathan Davis

quotes.text: Singing is just a feeling set to music.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.text: The calm mind allows one to connect with the inner self, the Soul, the very source of our being. That's where the music lives. That's where my music comes from.
quotes.author: Clarence Clemons

quotes.text: At home I'm just a guy who has interests that extend far beyond music.
quotes.author: Layne Staley

quotes.text: I wanted to take up music, so my father bought me a blunt instrument. He told me to knock myself out.
quotes.author: Jay London

quotes.text: Music is the language of the heart, and conservatives always screw it up.
quotes.author: Glenn Beck

quotes.text: Music is about communication... it isn't just something that maybe physically sounds good or orally sounds interesting it's something far, far deeper than that.
quotes.author: Evelyn Glennie

quotes.text: My husband is a composer, so he plays piano all the time and I sit there and clap telling my unborn child, 'Hear me clap, hear the music.' I know music, in general, is supposed to be good for babies to hear.
quotes.author: Danica McKellar

quotes.text: Music has always been my protection against the world, from a very young age. I feel safe inside of a jam.
quotes.author: Trey Anastasio

quotes.text: People think our music's very aggressive or angry or whatever, and it's just the opposite, really... I like laughing. And I like being really calm before a show, and smiley.
quotes.author: Serj Tankian

quotes.text: I find Indian music very funky. I mean it's very soulful, with their own kind of blues. But it's the only other school on the planet that develops improvisation to the high degree that you find in jazz music. So we have a lot of common ground.
quotes.author: John McLaughlin

quotes.text: Making an album should be an honest experience. It shouldn't be about trying to gauge where popular music is today it should be about artistic expression and putting down what you want to put down.
quotes.author: Scott Weiland

quotes.text: I think ABBA have a pure joy to their music and that's what makes them extraordinary.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.text: Great classic music that I've been turned on to has not only inspired and influenced me, but it has had an effect on my songwriting.
quotes.author: Scott Weiland

quotes.text: The great moments of rock 'n' roll were never off in some corner of the music world, in a self-constructed ghetto.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.text: Rock music is niche.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.text: If you pour some music on whatever's wrong, it'll sure help out.
quotes.author: Levon Helm

quotes.text: In our music, in our everyday life, there are so many negative things. Why not have something positive and stamp it with blackness?
quotes.author: Jamie Foxx

quotes.text: Music was your real passion, this thing you held dear even above family. It was this relationship that never betrayed you. Once it became your job - this thing that was highly visible, this thing that became about commerce - that's when you were holding onto music like it was a palm tree in a hurricane.
quotes.author: Eddie Vedder

quotes.text: Pop music is aspirin and the blues are vitamins.
quotes.author: Peter Tork

quotes.text: Music, at its essence, is what gives us memories. And the longer a song has existed in our lives, the more memories we have of it.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.text: Those who decide to use leisure as a means of mental development, who love good music, good books, good pictures, good plays, good company, good conversation - what are they? They are the happiest people in the world.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.text: A lot of music you might listen to is pretty vapid, it doesn't always deal with our deeper issues. These are the things I'm interested in now, particularly at my age.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.text: I love to make music and stay grounded.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.text: I only want to make music because I have a passion for it.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.text: I always think I'm the Tom Cruise of music - a lot of success and fans, but no critics, darling.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.text: Music is a part of my life all the time - on the plane, before matches, driving out to the court.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.text: The basis of our partnership strategy and our partnership approach: We build the social technology. They provide the music.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.text: Music is an agreeable harmony for the honor of God and the permissible delights of the soul.
quotes.author: Johann Sebastian Bach

quotes.text: The music of Hendrix wakes people up to their possibilities. It's more than just dreaming about being a guitar hero.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.text: I don't like to be labeled, to be anything. I've made the mistake before myself of labeling my music, but it's counter-productive.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.text: I have so many opinions about everything it just comes out during my music. It's a battle for me. I try not to be preachy. That's a real danger.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.text: My music isn't anything but me. It has jazz in it, and rock'n'roll, and it has an urgency to it.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.text: The '60s was one of the first times the power of music was used by a generation to bind them together.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.text: The thing about my music is, there really is no point.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.text: Commitments are one of the worst things to have in the music business. They're very annoying.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.text: Music is part of us, and either ennobles or degrades our behavior.
quotes.author: Boethius

quotes.text: Live music is better.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.text: All that stuff about heavy metal and hard rock, I don't subscribe to any of that. It's all just music. I mean, the heavy metal from the '70s sounds nothing like the stuff from the '80s, and that sounds nothing like the stuff from the '90s. Who's to say what is and isn't a certain type of music?
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.text: It is jazz music that called me to be a musician and I have always sang the songs that moved me the most. Singers, like Frank Sinatra and myself, we interpret the songs that we like. Not unlike a Shakespearean actor that goes back to the greatest words ever written, we go back to the greatest songs.
quotes.author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quotes.text: I used to go to Bourbon Street when I was a kid and there would be club after club after club of people who were around when the music started. I mean these are legendary, maybe not so well known, but legendary musicians.
quotes.author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quotes.text: I've spent hours and hours doing research into Appalachian folk music. My grandfather was a fiddler. There is something very immediate, very simple and emotional, about that music.
quotes.author: Renee Fleming

quotes.text: I don't play pyrotechnic scales. I play about frustration, patience, anger. Music is an extension of my soul.
quotes.author: Dick Dale

quotes.text: Music my rampart, and my only one.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.text: Though everything else may appear shallow and repulsive, even the smallest task in music is so absorbing, and carries us so far away from town, country, earth, and all worldly things, that it is truly a blessed gift of God.
quotes.author: Felix Mendelssohn

quotes.text: I write the vocals last, because I wanted to invent the music first and push the music to the level that I had to compete against it.
quotes.author: Axl Rose

quotes.text: Alas! all music jars when the soul's out of tune.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.text: They teach you there's a boundary line to music. But, man, there's no boundary line to art.
quotes.author: Charlie Parker

quotes.text: Soul music is timeless.
quotes.author: Alicia Keys

quotes.text: When I was a young musician, the only option available to pursue secondary education in music was to attend a classical conservatory.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.text: When I look at great works of art or listen to inspired music, I sense intimate portraits of the specific times in which they were created.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.text: We are living in a time when American popular music is finally being recognized as one of our most successful exports. The demand is huge.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.text: Most people are satisfied with the junk food being sold as music.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.text: I'm probably writing music now for the same reason as I started writing songs when I was 14 - to meet women.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.text: I can't think of one person I've ever met who didn't like some type of music.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.text: Don't make music for some vast, unseen audience or market or ratings share or even for something as tangible as money. Though it's crucial to make a living, that shouldn't be your inspiration. Do it for yourself.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.text: There's a constantly applicable nature to soul music, whereas sometimes pop music can be a periodical.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.text: I don't need my phone to play me music. I need it to be a phone and an e-mail thing.
quotes.author: David Duchovny

quotes.text: It was stumbling on to really the bible of the blues, you know, and a very powerful drug to be introduced to us and I absorbed it totally, and it changed my complete outlook on music.
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.text: I've been composing music all my life and if I'd been clever enough at school I would like to have gone to music college.
quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

quotes.text: I think everything Joni Mitchell did for music was big.
quotes.author: Maynard James Keenan

quotes.text: Adam does most of the work when it comes to videos and he basically does the same as I do with the lyrics. The videos are his visual interpretations of our music.
quotes.author: Maynard James Keenan

quotes.text: Reading is more of a left-brain process, and listening to music is a right-brain function.
quotes.author: Maynard James Keenan

quotes.text: People always accuse me of being motivational in a way, like it was a bad thing, but that's just how I was raised. My mom raised me in a positive environment, with lots of love in my heart, and that reflects in my music.
quotes.author: Lenny Kravitz

quotes.text: I feel this music has nurtured me as I've been immersing myself in it. I've felt supported by it.
quotes.author: Sting

quotes.text: I hate most of what constitutes rock music, which is basically middle-aged crap.
quotes.author: Sting

quotes.text: Yoga is almost like music in a way there's no end to it.
quotes.author: Sting

quotes.text: There's something missing in the music industry today... and it's music. Songs you hear don't last, it's just product fed to you by the industry.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.text: I like when guests come over early and we chop veggies and talk and play music.
quotes.author: John Stamos

quotes.text: I can play punk rock, and I love playing punk rock, but I was into every other style of music before I played punk rock.
quotes.author: Travis Barker

quotes.text: Beyond a certain point, the music isn't mine anymore. It's yours.
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.text: Music was always the distraction, so it was the obvious choice to pursue. My dad always said to find a job I love to do, that way it wouldn't feel like a job. So I did that.
quotes.author: Jason Mraz

quotes.text: When people hear good music, it makes them homesick for something they never had, and never will have.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.text: A movie goes from several stages, from idea to script. As you continue shooting, you will make some adjustments. You're constantly adjusting. It's like a piece of music. You're constantly trying to make it better.
quotes.author: Robert Rodriguez

quotes.text: Good music is good music, and everything else can go to hell.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.text: Country music is important to me, and I love it, but it's not my whole life.
quotes.author: George Strait

quotes.text: What I took back, because of my exposure to the Jewish music of the 30s and the 40s in my upbringing with my father, was that kind of theatrical songwriting. It was always a part of my character. This desire to make people laugh.
quotes.author: Pete Townshend

quotes.text: So I wanted to sing inspirational music, and that's exactly how I approached it - only the words have been changed to declare my relationship with God.
quotes.author: Smokey Robinson

quotes.text: Man's heart away from nature becomes hard.
quotes.author: Standing Bear

quotes.text: Those things that nature denied to human sight, she revealed to the eyes of the soul.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: Man was nature's mistake she neglected to finish him and she has never ceased paying for her mistake.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.text: If I have been of service, if I have glimpsed more of the nature and essence of ultimate good, if I am inspired to reach wider horizons of thought and action, if I am at peace with myself, it has been a successful day.
quotes.author: Alex Noble

quotes.text: Nature scarcely ever gives us the very best for that we must have recourse to art.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.text: The fairest thing in nature, a flower, still has its roots in earth and manure.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.text: Nature is one great big wood-chipper. Sooner or later, everything shoots out the other end in a spray of blood, bones and hair.
quotes.author: Doug Coupland

quotes.text: My aim in painting has always been the most exact transcription possible of my most intimate impression of nature.
quotes.author: Edward Hopper

quotes.text: Painting will have to deal more fully and less obliquely with life and nature's phenomena before it can again become great.
quotes.author: Edward Hopper

quotes.text: There will be, I think, an attempt to grasp again the surprise and accidents of nature and a more intimate and sympathetic study of its moods, together with a renewed wonder and humility on the part of such as are still capable of these basic reactions.
quotes.author: Edward Hopper

quotes.text: There is pleasure in the pathless woods, there is rapture in the lonely shore, there is society where none intrudes, by the deep sea, and music in its roar I love not Man the less, but Nature more.
quotes.author: George Byron

quotes.text: Where there are large powers with little ambition... nature may be said to have fallen short of her purposes.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: The possibilities that are suggested in quantum physics tell us that everything that we're looking at may not be in fact there, so the underlying nature of being is weird.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.text: Beauty is our weapon against nature by it we make objects, giving them limit, symmetry, proportion. Beauty halts and freezes the melting flux of nature.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: I'm aware of the mystery around us, so I write about coincidences, premonitions, emotions, dreams, the power of nature, magic.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.text: There's an easygoing nature that comes with a perspective of things that aren't as important as we make them sometimes.
quotes.author: Marguerite Moreau

quotes.text: Nature, when she invented, manufactured, and patented her authors, contrived to make critics out of the chips that were left.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.text: The right of nature... is the liberty each man hath to use his own power, as he will himself, for the preservation of his own nature that is to say, of his own life.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.text: Good breeding is the result of good sense, some good nature, and a little self-denial for the sake of others.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.text: Nature is the mother and the habitat of man, even if sometimes a stepmother and an unfriendly home.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.text: Those who look for the laws of Nature as a support for their new works collaborate with the creator.
quotes.author: Antonio Gaudi

quotes.text: If the sight of the blue skies fills you with joy, if the simplest things of nature have a message that you understand, rejoice, for your soul is alive.
quotes.author: Eleanora Duse

quotes.text: In athletics there's always been a willingness to cheat if it looks like you're not cheating. I think that's just a quirk of human nature.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.text: Camping is nature's way of promoting the motel business.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: The principle that human nature, in its psychological aspects, is nothing more than a product of history and given social relations removes all barriers to coercion and manipulation by the powerful.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.text: I'm definitely a Polaroid camera girl. For me, what I'm really excited about is bringing back the artistry and the nature of Polaroid.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.text: Support by United States rulers is rather in the nature of the support that the rope gives to a hanged man.
quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.text: It is not to be expected that human nature will change in a day.
quotes.author: Frank B. Kellogg

quotes.text: The elusive nature of love... it can be such a fleeting thing. You see it there and it's just fluttering and it's gone.
quotes.author: Mick Jagger

quotes.text: In this business you have to develop a thick skin, but I'm always going to feel everything. It's my nature.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: Romance and novel paint beauty in colors more charming than nature, and describe a happiness that humans never taste. How deceptive and destructive are those pictures of consummate bliss!
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.text: The real cure for our environmental problems is to understand that our job is to salvage Mother Nature. We are facing a formidable enemy in this field. It is the hunters... and to convince them to leave their guns on the wall is going to be very difficult.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.text: Pure drawing is an abstraction. Drawing and colour are not distinct, everything in nature is coloured.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.text: Doubtless there are things in nature which have not yet been seen. If an artist discovers them, he opens the way for his successors.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.text: We must not be content to memorize the beautiful formulas of our illustrious predecessors. Let us go out and study beautiful nature.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.text: I lack the magnificent richness of color that animates nature.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.text: There are unknown forces in nature when we give ourselves wholly to her, without reserve, she lends them to us she shows us these forms, which our watching eyes do not see, which our intelligence does not understand or suspect.
quotes.author: Auguste Rodin

quotes.text: The duty of man is the same in respect to his own nature as in respect to the nature of all other things, namely not to follow it but to amend it.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.text: Beauty is the first present nature gives to women and the first it takes away.
quotes.author: Fay Weldon

quotes.text: I'm experimental by nature... always exploring my creativity.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.text: Life is the power that's greater than I can ever comprehend. The way life runs through everything, even the tiniest elements of nature - that makes me humble.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.text: It is unfair to blame man too fiercely for being pugnacious he learned the habit from Nature.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.text: The willow is my favorite tree. I grew up near one. It's the most flexible tree in nature and nothing can break it - no wind, no elements, it can bend and withstand anything.
quotes.author: Pink

quotes.text: Stupidity is something unshakable nothing attacks it without breaking itself against it it is of the nature of granite, hard and resistant.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.text: I have resolved on an enterprise that has no precedent and will have no imitator. I want to set before my fellow human beings a man in every way true to nature and that man will be myself.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.text: Nature... is nothing but the inner voice of self-interest.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: Tears are nature's lotion for the eyes. The eyes see better for being washed by them.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.text: Nature is a good name for an effect whose cause is God.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.text: Thus happiness depends, as nature shows, less on exterior things than most suppose.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.text: Only nature knows how to justly proportion to the fault the punishment it deserves.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.text: Nature is perfect.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.text: Out with stereotypes, feminism proclaims. But stereotypes are the west's stunning sexual personae, the vehicles of art's assault against nature. The moment there is imagination, there is myth.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: All, all is theft, all is unceasing and rigorous competition in nature the desire to make off with the substance of others is the foremost - the most legitimate - passion nature has bred into us and, without doubt, the most agreeable one.
quotes.author: Marquis de Sade

quotes.text: We are learning, too, that the love of beauty is one of Nature's greatest healers.
quotes.author: Ellsworth Huntington

quotes.text: Truth makes on the ocean of nature no one track of light every eye, looking on, finds its own.
quotes.author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.text: America is still mostly xenophobic and racist. That's the nature of America, I think.
quotes.author: Jerry Garcia

quotes.text: Great art picks up where nature ends.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.text: Married love between man and woman is bigger than oaths guarded by right of nature.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.text: Another thing I like to do is sit back and take in nature. To look at the birds, listen to their singing, go hiking, camping and jogging and running, walking along the beach, playing games and sometimes being alone with the great outdoors. It's very special to me.
quotes.author: Larry Wilcox

quotes.text: When I'm off the road, my husband and I recharge our batteries. It's a day of deep rest and connection with the spiritual, and that can be anything - going for a walk in nature, being in silence, burning incense.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.text: Everyone who understands the nature of God rightly necessarily knows that God is to be believed and hoped in, that he is to be loved and called upon, and to be heard in all things.
quotes.author: William Ames

quotes.text: Reality must take precedence over public relations, for nature cannot be fooled.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.text: As in nature, as in art, so in grace it is rough treatment that gives souls, as well as stones, their luster.
quotes.author: Thomas Guthrie

quotes.text: The wit makes fun of other persons the satirist makes fun of the world the humorist makes fun of himself, but in so doing, he identifies himself with people - that is, people everywhere, not for the purpose of taking them apart, but simply revealing their true nature.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.text: Zoos are becoming facsimiles - or perhaps caricatures - of how animals once were in their natural habitat. If the right policies toward nature were pursued, we would need no zoos at all.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.text: Caught up in life, you see it badly. You suffer from it or enjoy it too much. The artist, in my opinion, is a monstrosity, something outside of nature.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.text: But I'm a hot-blooded Italian by nature. Whatever the situation you present, I'm going to make something out of it.
quotes.author: Maynard James Keenan

quotes.text: It's human nature to gripe, but I'm going ahead and doing the best I can.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.text: I mean, if a person acts irresponsibly in his own life, he will pay the consequences. And it's not so much divine retribution as it's built into the law of nature.
quotes.author: Pat Robertson

quotes.text: We must return to nature and nature's god.
quotes.author: Luther Burbank

quotes.text: No man has received from nature the right to command his fellow human beings.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.text: I am following Nature without being able to grasp her, I perhaps owe having become a painter to flowers.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.text: Ayurveda is a sister philosophy to yoga. It is the science of life or longevity and it teaches about the power and the cycles of nature, as well as the elements.
quotes.author: Christy Turlington

quotes.text: If one could conclude as to the nature of the Creator from a study of his creation it would appear that God has a special fondness for stars and beetles.
quotes.author: John B. S. Haldane

quotes.text: If a person is homosexual by nature - that is, if one's sexuality is as intrinsic a part of one's identity as gender or skin color - then society can no more deny a gay person access to the secular rights and religious sacraments because of his homosexuality than it can reinstate Jim Crow.
quotes.author: Jon Meacham

quotes.text: Modern bodybuilding is ritual, religion, sport, art, and science, awash in Western chemistry and mathematics. Defying nature, it surpasses it.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.text: No author ever drew a character consistent to human nature, but he was forced to ascribe to it many inconsistencies.
quotes.author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.text: The glory of gardening: hands in the dirt, head in the sun, heart with nature. To nurture a garden is to feed not just on the body, but the soul.
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.text: Our nature is the mind. And the mind is our nature.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.text: Nature has never read the Declaration of Independence. It continues to make us unequal.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.text: Nothing is given to man on earth - struggle is built into the nature of life, and conflict is possible - the hero is the man who lets no obstacle prevent him from pursuing the values he has chosen.
quotes.author: Andrew Bernstein

quotes.text: It seems to be a law of nature that no man, unless he has some obvious physical deformity, ever is loth to sit for his portrait.
quotes.author: Max Beerbohm

quotes.text: Resentment seems to have been given us by nature for a defense, and for a defense only! It is the safeguard of justice and the security of innocence.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.text: It is a sign of a dull nature to occupy oneself deeply in matters that concern the body for instance, to be over much occupied about exercise, about eating and drinking, about easing oneself, about sexual intercourse.
quotes.author: David Bailey

quotes.text: Italians know about human nature - they understand human nature perhaps better than anyone else does. They know that people are weak and greedy and lazy and dishonest and they just try to make the best of it to work around it.
quotes.author: Donna Leon

quotes.text: A book is a fragile creature, it suffers the wear of time, it fears rodents, the elements and clumsy hands. so the librarian protects the books not only against mankind but also against nature and devotes his life to this war with the forces of oblivion.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.text: The addiction to sports, therefore, in a peculiar degree marks an arrested development in man's moral nature.
quotes.author: Thorstein Veblen

quotes.text: Who would dare assign to art the sterile function of imitating nature?
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: Nature is a temple in which living columns sometimes emit confused words. Man approaches it through forests of symbols, which observe him with familiar glances.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: To the artist there is never anything ugly in nature.
quotes.author: Auguste Rodin

quotes.text: To any artist, worthy of the name, all in nature is beautiful, because his eyes, fearlessly accepting all exterior truth, read there, as in an open book, all the inner truth.
quotes.author: Auguste Rodin

quotes.text: Those who seek to satisfy the mind of man by hampering it with ceremonies and music and affecting charity and devotion have lost their original nature.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.text: We trifle when we assign limits to our desires, since nature hath set none.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.text: If the sight of the blue skies fills you with joy, if a blade of grass springing up in the fields has power to move you, if the simple things of nature have a message that you understand, rejoice, for your soul is alive.
quotes.author: Eleonora Duse
