Who wants to waste the wood building an ark for singletons?
quotes.author: Sloane Crosley

quotes.text: I hope to find the roles that are age appropriate but not yearning to be younger, or parenting ad nauseam.
quotes.author: Debra Winger

quotes.text: Parenting, as an unpaid occupation outside the world of public power, entails lower status, less power, and less control of resources than paid work.
quotes.author: Nancy Chodorow

quotes.text: Parenting is an impossible job at any age.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.text: We must return optimism to our parenting. To focus on the joys, not the hassles the love, not the disappointments the common sense, not the complexities.
quotes.author: Fred G. Gosman

quotes.text: In truth, I am a single mother. But I don't feel alone at all in parenting my daughter. Krishna has a whole other side of her family who loves her, too. And so Krishna is parented by me, but also by her grandmother and aunts and cousins and uncles and friends.
quotes.author: Padma Lakshmi

quotes.text: Relationships are complicated no matter what style of parenting you choose.
quotes.author: Mayim Bialik

quotes.text: Attachment parenting is not a passive parenting style.
quotes.author: Mayim Bialik

quotes.text: I've become sort of an accidental advocate for attachment parenting, which is a style of parenting that... basically, the way mammals parent and the way people have parented for pretty much all of human history except the last 200 years or so.
quotes.author: Mayim Bialik

quotes.text: I have a neuroscience background - that's what my doctorate is in - and I was trained to study hormones of attachment, so I definitely feel my parenting is informed by that.
quotes.author: Mayim Bialik

quotes.text: I came to parenting the way most of us do - knowing nothing and trying to learn everything.
quotes.author: Mayim Bialik

quotes.text: I realize that of all people, I am no expert on parenting or marriage.
quotes.author: Mika Brzezinski

quotes.text: Abortion is defended today as a means of ensuring the equality and independence of women, and as a solution to the problems of single parenting, child abuse, and the feminization of poverty.
quotes.author: Robert Casey

quotes.text: So, you know, parenting is a very intimate and amazing experience and one of the best experiences of my life.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.text: I had three children while doing a show, as demanding as 'Good Morning America,' so this is - you know, it's almost like I'm less daunted about motherhood, and parenting at this point in time. And I think I'm just much more fit and healthy than I was 20-years-ago.
quotes.author: Joan Lunden

quotes.text: For decades, parents were told by so-called parenting 'experts' that offspring would be best raised on the belief each is special and entitled to all life has to offer.
quotes.author: Bob Barr

quotes.text: Parenting is not for sissies. You have to sacrifice and grow up.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.text: If there is any truth to my parenting the dreamwork movement, it comes from the power of the press.
quotes.author: Henry Reed

quotes.text: I grew up with no money. My kids will grow up with a lot of money and so it's really important to me, and it will always be a part of my parenting, to keep them conscientious and connected socially to other people.
quotes.author: Ryan Phillippe

quotes.text: I take parenting incredibly seriously. I want to be there for my kids and help them navigate the world, and develop skills, emotional intelligence, to enjoy life, and I'm lucky to be able to do that and have two healthy, normal boys.
quotes.author: Joan Cusack

quotes.text: The number of stressors has multiplied exponentially: traffic, money, success, work/life balance, the economy, the environment, parenting, family conflict, relationships, disease. As the nature of human life has become far more complicated, our ancient stress response hasn't been able to keep up.
quotes.author: Andrew Bernstein

quotes.text: I'm torn about late parenting. I believe people should spend their twenties living and having fun and not having any regrets later. I also think people in their thirties generally make better parents but so many of my friends are having trouble - myself included - as fathers get older.
quotes.author: Eric McCormack

quotes.text: My kids love it. I thought I was the coolest dad in the world when I got to be in a Bond film, but 'Harry Potter', too? Well, I think I qualify for a medal for exceptional parenting or something, don't you?
quotes.author: Robbie Coltraine

quotes.text: Parents are key when it comes to keeping kids off drugs. Good parenting is the best anti-drug we have.
quotes.author: Mel Carnahan

quotes.text: I'm a parent, especially when you've had the intense parenting the way I had. It's all in the bank. It's all in the great experience bank. Those are your secrets. That's the stuff that makes your work rich, that's what you dip into.
quotes.author: Hector Elizondo

quotes.text: For me, Twitter works best as a way of taking pictures of being stuck in traffic on the Brooklyn Bridge. If people really want to read really funny quips about life, parenting, and pop culture, then by all means read Michael Ian Black's tweets.
quotes.author: Michael Showalter

quotes.text: In response to our fast-food culture, a 'slow food' movement appeared. Out of hurried parenthood, a move toward slow parenting could be growing. With vital government supports for state-of-the-art public child care and paid parental leave, maybe we would be ready to try slow love and marriage.
quotes.author: Arlie Russell Hochschild

quotes.text: I'm hosting weekend retreats all over America. It is like a 24-hour slumber party for moms. We laugh, eat, play games, get massages, win prizes, talk about parenting and even cry a bit.
quotes.author: Lisa Whelchel

quotes.text: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness. It is far better take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Never cut a tree down in the wintertime. Never make a negative decision in the low time. Never make your most important decisions when you are in your worst moods. Wait. Be patient. The storm will pass. The spring will come.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.text: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: We could never learn to be brave and patient, if there were only joy in the world.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: How poor are they that have not patience! What wound did ever heal but by degrees?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Our real blessings often appear to us in the shape of pains, losses and disappointments but let us have patience and we soon shall see them in their proper figures.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.text: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.text: For anything worth having one must pay the price and the price is always work, patience, love, self-sacrifice - no paper currency, no promises to pay, but the gold of real service.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.text: Abused patience turns to fury.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.text: How many a man has thrown up his hands at a time when a little more effort, a little more patience would have achieved success.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.text: Have patience with all things, But, first of all with yourself.
quotes.author: Saint Francis de Sales

quotes.text: A man who is a master of patience is master of everything else.
quotes.author: George Savile

quotes.text: The test of good manners is to be patient with the bad ones.
quotes.author: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quotes.text: I am patient with stupidity but not with those who are proud of it.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.text: It is easier to find men who will volunteer to die, than to find those who are willing to endure pain with patience.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.text: Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.text: Our patience will achieve more than our force.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.text: Genius is eternal patience.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.text: Good character is not formed in a week or a month. It is created little by little, day by day. Protracted and patient effort is needed to develop good character.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: I'm extraordinarily patient provided I get my own way in the end.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.text: Endurance is patience concentrated.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.text: Patience is necessary, and one cannot reap immediately where one has sown.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.text: The key to everything is patience. You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not by smashing it.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.text: Patience, n. A minor form of dispair, disguised as a virtue.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: I am not a perfect servant. I am a public servant doing my best against the odds. As I develop and serve, be patient. God is not finished with me yet.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.text: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: Patience has its limits. Take it too far, and it's cowardice.
quotes.author: George Jackson

quotes.text: Humility is attentive patience.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.text: Who ever is out of patience is out of possession of their soul.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Heaven grant us patience with a man in love.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.text: As for goals, I don't set myself those anymore. I'm not one of these 'I must have achieved this and that by next year' kind of writers. I take things as they come and find that patience and persistence tend to win out in the end.
quotes.author: Paul Kane

quotes.text: All commend patience, but none can endure to suffer.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.text: Patience and Diligence, like faith, remove mountains.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.text: Patience is the art of hoping.
quotes.author: Luc de Clapiers

quotes.text: There is something good in all seeming failures. You are not to see that now. Time will reveal it. Be patient.
quotes.author: Sivananda

quotes.text: The practice of patience toward one another, the overlooking of one another's defects, and the bearing of one another's burdens is the most elementary condition of all human and social activity in the family, in the professions, and in society.
quotes.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quotes.text: Lack of pep is often mistaken for patience.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.text: Patience is the support of weakness impatience the ruin of strength.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.text: Patience is the best remedy for every trouble.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.text: If I have done the public any service, it is due to my patient thought.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.text: All men commend patience, although few are willing to practice it.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.text: If you would know strength and patience, welcome the company of trees.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.text: Fortune knocks but once, but misfortune has much more patience.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.text: Bear patiently with a rival.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: Beware the fury of a patient man.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.text: Let him that hath no power of patience retire within himself, though even there he will have to put up with himself.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.text: Patience is the most necessary quality for business, many a man would rather you heard his story than grant his request.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.text: God gives me the children's ministry heart and patience. This is what He wants. It's awesome. I don't know where He's gonna take it - but God is building this thing.
quotes.author: Willie Aames

quotes.text: Hope is patience with the lamp lit.
quotes.author: Tertullian

quotes.text: There is no road too long to the man who advances deliberately and without undue haste there are no honors too distant to the man who prepares himself for them with patience.
quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyere

quotes.text: A healthy male adult bore consumes each year one and a half times his own weight in other people's patience.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.text: He who rides the sea of the Nile must have sails woven of patience.
quotes.author: William Golding

quotes.text: Patience, that blending of moral courage with physical timidity.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.text: Good ideas are not adopted automatically. They must be driven into practice with courageous patience.
quotes.author: Hyman Rickover

quotes.text: Everyone ought to bear patiently the results of his own conduct.
quotes.author: Phaedrus

quotes.text: You must first have a lot of patience to learn to have patience.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Lec

quotes.text: Never a tear bedims the eye that time and patience will not dry.
quotes.author: Bret Harte

quotes.text: Patience, the beggar's virtue, shall find no harbor here.
quotes.author: Philip Massinger

quotes.text: A wise man is superior to any insults which can be put upon him, and the best reply to unseemly behavior is patience and moderation.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: The keys to patience are acceptance and faith. Accept things as they are, and look realistically at the world around you. Have faith in yourself and in the direction you have chosen.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: If patience is worth anything, it must endure to the end of time. And a living faith will last in the midst of the blackest storm.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

quotes.text: The marvel of all history is the patience with which men and women submit to burdens unnecessarily laid upon them by their governments.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: He that can have patience can have what he will.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: No, I will be the pattern of all patience I will say nothing.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Have courage for the great sorrows of life and patience for the small ones and when you have laboriously accomplished your daily task, go to sleep in peace.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Beware of him that is slow to anger for when it is long coming, it is the stronger when it comes, and the longer kept. Abused patience turns to fury.
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.text: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.text: It is strange that the years teach us patience that the shorter our time, the greater our capacity for waiting.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.text: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: I learned patience, perseverance, and dedication. Now I really know myself, and I know my voice. It's a voice of pain and victory.
quotes.author: Anthony Hamilton

quotes.text: I do not have much patience with a thing of beauty that must be explained to be understood. If it does need additional interpretation by someone other than the creator, then I question whether it has fulfilled its purpose.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.text: Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.text: Alcohol gives you infinite patience for stupidity.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quotes.text: And I love that even in the toughest moments, when we're all sweating it - when we're worried that the bill won't pass, and it seems like all is lost - Barack never lets himself get distracted by the chatter and the noise. Just like his grandmother, he just keeps getting up and moving forward... with patience and wisdom, and courage and grace.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: Faith is not simply a patience that passively suffers until the storm is past. Rather, it is a spirit that bears things - with resignations, yes, but above all, with blazing, serene hope.
quotes.author: Corazon Aquino

quotes.text: Meekness: Uncommon patience in planning a revenge that is worth while.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: The days of our lives, for all of us, are numbered. We know that. And yes, there are certainly times when we aren't able to muster as much strength and patience as we would like. It's called being human.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.text: I do not believe that sheer suffering teaches. If suffering alone taught, all the world would be wise, since everyone suffers. To suffering must be added mourning, understanding, patience, love, openness and the willingness to remain vulnerable.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.text: When traveling with someone, take large does of patience and tolerance with your morning coffee.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.text: Patience is the ability to idle your motor when you feel like stripping your gears.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.text: We have no patience with other people's vanity because it is offensive to our own.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.text: There are three secrets to managing. The first secret is have patience. The second is be patient. And the third most important secret is patience.
quotes.author: Chuck Tanner

quotes.text: To bear with patience wrongs done to oneself is a mark of perfection, but to bear with patience wrongs done to someone else is a mark of imperfection and even of actual sin.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.text: A garden is a grand teacher. It teaches patience and careful watchfulness it teaches industry and thrift above all it teaches entire trust.
quotes.author: Gertrude Jekyll

quotes.text: Endurance is the crowning quality, And patience all the passion of great hearts.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.text: It takes patience to appreciate domestic bliss volatile spirits prefer unhappiness.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.text: Knowing trees, I understand the meaning of patience. Knowing grass, I can appreciate persistence.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.text: Everything that slows us down and forces patience, everything that sets us back into the slow circles of nature, is a help. Gardening is an instrument of grace.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.text: Patience and tenacity are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.text: I grow plants for many reasons: to please my eye or to please my soul, to challenge the elements or to challenge my patience, for novelty or for nostalgia, but mostly for the joy in seeing them grow.
quotes.author: David Hobson

quotes.text: The Scriptures contain many stories of people who waited years or even decades before the Lord's promises came to pass. What modern believers can learn from the patience of biblical saints like Abraham, Joseph, David, and Paul is that waiting upon the Lord has eternal rewards.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.text: Clearly older women and especially older women who have led an active life or elder women who successfully maneuver through their own family life have so much to teach us about sharing, patience, and wisdom.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.text: I'd like to be more patient! I just want everything now. I've tried to meditate, but it's really hard for me to stay still. I'd like to try to force myself to do it, because everybody says how wonderful meditation is for you, but I can't shut my mind up. So patience and learning is the key.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.text: I have not the smarts or patience for political office.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: Affliction is the wholesome soil of virtue, where patience, honor, sweet humility, and calm fortitude, take root and strongly flourish.
quotes.author: David Mallet

quotes.text: I think you can judge from somebody's actions a kind of a stability and sense of purpose perhaps created by strong religious roots. I mean, there's a certain patience, a certain discipline, I think, that religion helps you achieve.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.text: As anyone who has ever been around a cat for any length of time well knows, cats have enormous patience with the limitations of the human kind.
quotes.author: Cleveland Amory

quotes.text: Patience is the art of concealing your impatience.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.text: Patience has its limits, take it too far and it's cowardice.
quotes.author: Holbrook Jackson

quotes.text: With love and patience, nothing is impossible.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.text: When I was 20, I thought I was 30 - but I was so far from it. When you're young, you want everything to happen now. As you mature, you can look back and see all the great things you achieved with time and patience.
quotes.author: Elisha Cuthbert

quotes.text: You can learn many things from children. How much patience you have, for instance.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.text: Teach us, O Lord, the disciplines of patience, for to wait is often harder than to work.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.text: I have declared that patience is never more than patient. I too have declared, that I who am not patient am patient.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.text: It is impossible to practice parliamentary politics without having patience, decency, politeness and courtesy.
quotes.author: Khaleda Zia

quotes.text: I have all the patience in the world about Sirens. For me it's not a Grateful Dead project, it's a Me project.
quotes.author: Jerry Garcia

quotes.text: The principle part of faith is patience.
quotes.author: George MacDonald

quotes.text: Hopelessness has surprised me with patience.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.text: Find patience in the breath of life.
quotes.author: Ryunosuke Satoro

quotes.text: The greatest power is often simple patience.
quotes.author: E. Joseph Cossman

quotes.text: How can a society that exists on instant mashed potatoes, packaged cake mixes, frozen dinners, and instant cameras teach patience to its young?
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.text: Gardeners are good at nurturing, and they have a great quality of patience, they're tender. They have to be persistent.
quotes.author: Ralph Fiennes

quotes.text: The first requirement of politics is not intellect or stamina but patience. Politics is a very long run game and the tortoise will usually beat the hare.
quotes.author: John Major

quotes.text: I think patience is a skill and I wish I had it.
quotes.author: David Duchovny

quotes.text: Patience can't be acquired overnight. It is just like building up a muscle. Every day you need to work on it.
quotes.author: Eknath Easwaran

quotes.text: There is no harm in patience, and no profit in lamentation. Death is easier to bear (than) that which precedes it, and more severe than that which comes after it. Remember the death of the Apostle of God, and your sorrow will be lessened.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr

quotes.text: There is no substitute for hard work, 23 or 24 hours a day. And there is no substitute for patience and acceptance.
quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

quotes.text: I can imagine few things more trying to the patience than the long wasted days of waiting.
quotes.author: Robert Falcon Scott

quotes.text: I'm terrible with patience.
quotes.author: Katherine Heigl

quotes.text: If I could have one prayer answered, I would pray for patience. I move so fast sometimes. I try to slow down.
quotes.author: Debra Winger

quotes.text: A final word: I am not knowledgeable about the internet. I do not have a computer. I guess that at 74 years of age, I don't have the patience to learn.
quotes.author: David Wilkerson

quotes.text: It's a war of attrition. If you have patience and a modicum of faith in yourself your chances are not too bad.
quotes.author: Julie Bowen

quotes.text: A show that no one thought had a chance has just finished its fifth year: Charmed. I think it's tougher for the younger networks, so I think they have a little more patience for the sake of the show. But who knows?
quotes.author: Aaron Spelling

quotes.text: I don't play pyrotechnic scales. I play about frustration, patience, anger. Music is an extension of my soul.
quotes.author: Dick Dale

quotes.text: Only those who have patience to do simple things perfectly ever acquire the skill to do difficult things easily.
quotes.author: James J. Corbett

quotes.text: There are very little things in this life I cannot afford and patience is one of them.
quotes.author: Larry Hagman

quotes.text: Luck is a component that a lot of people in the arts sometimes fail to recognise: that you can have talent, perseverance, patience, but without luck you will not have a successful career.
quotes.author: Bryan Cranston

quotes.text: A statesman wants courage and a statesman wants vision but believe me, after six months' experience, he wants first, second, third and all the time - patience.
quotes.author: Stanley Baldwin

quotes.text: My mum told me to have patience. It's about realising that when things aren't going the way you want them to, or you don't have inspiration, it will come.
quotes.author: Vanessa Paradis

quotes.text: It has taken a great deal of energy, which has not been so difficult to summon as the necessary patience to wait, simply wait much of the time - until my instincts assured me that I had assembled my materials in proper order for a final welding into their natural form.
quotes.author: Hart Crane

quotes.text: So when I do Chinese cooking, I mix everything together, then the kids have to eat their vegetables. They won't have the patience to pick them out.
quotes.author: Martin Yan

quotes.text: I believe there's too little patience and context to many of the investigations I read or see on television.
quotes.author: Bob Woodward

quotes.text: Artists know that diligence counts as much, if not more, as inspiration in art, as in politics, patience counts as much as revolution.
quotes.author: Tony Kushner

quotes.text: Temperamentally I'm not a natural producer, because I don't have the patience.
quotes.author: Damian Lewis

quotes.text: You have to respect your parents. They are giving you an at-bat. If you're an entrepreneur and go into the family business, you want to grow fast. Patience is important. But respect the other party... My dad and I pulled it off because we really respect each other.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.text: Deliberately seek opportunities for kindness, sympathy, and patience.
quotes.author: Evelyn Underhill

quotes.text: Everyone is given one gift, a reason for being, and it's our obligation to do something with it. Obviously, it's a challenge - but if you're not taking the bull by the horns, I have no patience for you. You're just taking up space.
quotes.author: Melissa Rosenberg

quotes.text: We are telling the American people to have patience, courage, resolve and determination.
quotes.author: Muammar al-Gaddafi

quotes.text: I think I have more patience now than I did in the past.
quotes.author: T. Boone Pickens

quotes.text: Because I'm the author of my screenplays I know what I'm looking for. It's true that I can be stubborn in demanding that I get what I want, but it's also a question of working with patience and love.
quotes.author: Michael Haneke

quotes.text: Patience was not my strong point.
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.text: Thank God my parents had an abundance of patience.
quotes.author: Lexa Doig

quotes.text: One problem with age is that patience begins to ebb.
quotes.author: Carl Hiaasen

quotes.text: My biggest weakness is patience, wanting to see things happen too quickly or get changes in place right away. Not having the patience to let things develop.
quotes.author: Paul Gleason

quotes.text: I haven't been given many things, but I've been given ample, limitless patience.
quotes.author: Lincoln Diaz-Balart

quotes.text: When you read about a car crash in which two or three youngsters are killed, do you pause to dwell on the amount of love and treasure and patience parents poured into bodies no longer suitable for open caskets?
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.text: Patience was not something that came naturally to me, but in cooking it is the quintessential skill.
quotes.author: Gail Simmons

quotes.text: Patience is the secret to good food.
quotes.author: Gail Simmons

quotes.text: You know, I lose patience really easily I'd rather shop in the grocery store than in the department store. I can pick an apple like nobody's business.
quotes.author: Gail Simmons

quotes.text: Republican patience with how unionism deals with the political institutions, and with key issues like equality and human rights, will be tested because, obviously, there will be a battle a day on these matters. So lets face up to all of this with our eyes wide open.
quotes.author: Gerry Adams

quotes.text: You have to find the peace and patience within yourself to be a model and an example to others and not judge.
quotes.author: Judith Light

quotes.text: God's way of answering the Christian's prayer for more patience, experience, hope and love often is to put him into the furnace of affliction.
quotes.author: Richard Cecil

quotes.text: No, you're not allowed to be bossy when you're married. You have to learn compromise, and compassion and patience.
quotes.author: Star Jones

quotes.text: People ask me a lot about the values I got from playing for the Cubs for so many years. The value I got out of it was patience. A lot of people these days are not very patient.
quotes.author: Ernie Banks

quotes.text: I've worked so hard to eliminate the inner geek from my life. I suddenly realize I have no patience for those people who still have their geeks showing. Now I see why being 'normal' has been so important to me.
quotes.author: Kenny Loggins

quotes.text: Honestly, I didn't have the patience for biology or history in an academic sense, but I always liked the kind of big questions.
quotes.author: Andrew Bird

quotes.text: In this day and age, you need a lot of patience if you are in the movie business.
quotes.author: Brett Ratner

quotes.text: When I was in the first grade I was afraid of the teacher and had a miserable time in the reading circle, a difficulty that was overcome by the loving patience of my second grade teacher. Even though I could read, I refused to do so.
quotes.author: Beverly Cleary

quotes.text: Give your dog or cat respect, patience, understanding and love. And if you just change to one vegetarian day a week, that's a wonderful step that will save animal lives. It means you have chosen something kind instead of something cruel.
quotes.author: Ingrid Newkirk

quotes.text: In movies, there are some things the French do that Americans are increasingly incapable of doing. One is honoring the complexities of youth. It's a quiet, difficult undertaking, requiring subtlety in a filmmaker and perception and patience from us.
quotes.author: Wesley Morris

quotes.text: I have no patience at all.
quotes.author: Alan Sugar

quotes.text: Writing is good, thinking is better. Cleverness is good, patience is better.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.text: The strong manly ones in life are those who understand the meaning of the word patience.
quotes.author: Tokugawa Ieyasu

quotes.text: And we ask the American people to play an important part of our layered defense. We ask for cooperation, patience and a commitment to vigilance in the face of a determined enemy.
quotes.author: Janet Napolitano

quotes.text: When I said a few weeks ago that our people would eat cooking oil and olives if necessary, I didn't mean that there really would be only oil and olives. What I meant was that our people have the necessary patience to endure the current difficult situation. Palestinians would rather do without certain food items than their national rights.
quotes.author: Ismail Haniyeh

quotes.text: I don't have a lot of patience for boring arthouse movies.
quotes.author: Zoe Kazan

quotes.text: We had great faith that with patience, understanding, and education, that my family and I could be helpful in changing their minds and attitudes around.
quotes.author: Ryan White

quotes.text: Secretary of War Stanton used to get out of patience with Lincoln because he was all the time pardoning men who ought to be shot.
quotes.author: Elihu Root

quotes.text: My advice to someone to follow in my footsteps is to have patience. I've been doing this for twelve years.
quotes.author: Christina Milian

quotes.text: Now it is evident that a little insight into the customs of every people is necessary to insure a kindly communication this, joined with patience and kindness, will seldom fail with the natives of the interior.
quotes.author: Charles Sturt

quotes.text: Sad Patience, too near neighbour to despair.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.text: Work hard. And have patience. Because no matter who you are, you're going to get hurt in your career and you have to be patient to get through the injuries.
quotes.author: Randy Johnson

quotes.text: Is the patience of the American people that long suffering? Is there no outrage left in the country?
quotes.author: Andrew Greeley

quotes.text: I've said my patience is not infinite.
quotes.author: Darrell Issa

quotes.text: True enough, nature has endowed me with a fair measure of patience and composure, yet I should be lying if I told you that, having seen the reporter off on his way to make his deadline, I fell peacefully asleep.
quotes.author: Leon Jouhaux

quotes.text: My impression is that most women public service workers have a long fuse. Precisely because they care so deeply about services, more than anyone, they still want to find a sensible and fair negotiated agreement. But their patience has run out.
quotes.author: Frances O'Grady

quotes.text: While it is true that Frank had a great sense of humor, he was also very serious about composing music. In reality there are only a handful of skilled players who can play his most complex pieces. It takes a lot of patience to learn and requires a fantastic memory.
quotes.author: Dweezil Zappa

quotes.text: I think God's really blessed me with patience. I'm good with a lot of things going on at once.
quotes.author: Niki Taylor

quotes.text: Patience is passion tamed.
quotes.author: Lyman Abbott

quotes.text: I'm not really easy to live with! There needs to be unlimited patience and unconditional love. Men I've known before loved my independent spirit and were proud of my success, to the point that they'd become jealous of the time I devote to my career.
quotes.author: Milla Jovovich

quotes.text: I have a huge respect for writers and realise that this is not an area that I find easy. I doubt that I would have the patience in front of a blank sheet of paper to become a writer.
quotes.author: Jenny Agutter

quotes.text: My relationship with the Philharmonia Orchestra brought me many times to London and I will always reflect positively on that early period of development with them - their patience, their warmth, their dedication.
quotes.author: Gustavo Dudamel

quotes.text: Everything is out there if you know how to find it, and have the patience. I don't and haven't, but that's my problem.
quotes.author: Tom Holt

quotes.text: Reading a novel in which all characters illustrate patience, hard work, chastity, and delayed gratification could be a pretty dull experience.
quotes.author: Thomas Perry

quotes.text: I pray they will carry on in spite of that dreadful monster prejudice, and with patience, courage, fortitude and perseverance achieve success for themselves.
quotes.author: Major Taylor

quotes.text: Americans have less and less patience for the intrusive and divisive moral scolds who thrived in the bubbles of the Clinton and Bush years.
quotes.author: Frank Rich

quotes.text: I've always been a person with patience, and I don't like to force things.
quotes.author: Harry Shum, Jr.

quotes.text: It seems likely that many of the young who don't wait for others to call them artists, but simply announce that they are, don't have the patience to make art.
quotes.author: Pauline Kael

quotes.text: Tolerance, compromise, understanding, acceptance, patience - I want those all to be very sharp tools in my shed.
quotes.author: Cee Lo Green

quotes.text: Patience means restraining one's inclinations.
quotes.author: Tokugawa Ieyasu

quotes.text: The patience of the American public with dilatory diplomatic delays will be very limited.
quotes.author: Tom Lantos

quotes.text: I wish I was a shredder that could play everything, but I don't have the patience.
quotes.author: Dave Navarro

quotes.text: There's not a lot of room anymore for what I call 'made-up' drama. The drama comes from real places now - marriage takes work and focus, the kid stuff takes patience and commitment. And if you don't grow as people and as a couple, within all of that, then you've got some real drama.
quotes.author: Jeremy Sisto

quotes.text: Patience makes a women beautiful in middle age.
quotes.author: Elliot Paul

quotes.text: I think the Iraqi people have shown extraordinary patience and courage in the last few months. They have really put a political system on the way to success, to a real democracy here.
quotes.author: Paul Bremer

quotes.text: The very important thing you should have is patience.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.text: Speaking from my experience as a person involved for a long time in building the European Union, it is important to have patience and efforts to build a community of nations.
quotes.author: Giorgio Napolitano

quotes.text: My wife is the most awesome person in the universe. She's made this experience much less miserable for me, with her compassion, patience and understanding.
quotes.author: Wil Wheaton

quotes.text: Patience has never been my strong suit.
quotes.author: Michael Chiklis

quotes.text: Constant repetition of tongue-twisters was like lifting weights for me, but patience and persistence have paid off.
quotes.author: Nicholas Brendon

quotes.text: Your patience would fail you if I should continue to relate all the disrespectful speeches and treatment which your servants have been obliged to listen to and patiently to bear.
quotes.author: Peter Stuyvesant

quotes.text: To understand a difficult topic like Iraq takes patience and care. Unfortunately, you rarely hear a patient, careful or thoughtful discussion of intelligence these days.
quotes.author: George Tenet

quotes.text: I've learned the importance of loving what you do. I have also learned more patience due to the nature of the music business.
quotes.author: Randy Travis

quotes.text: I haven't got a lot of patience.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Katzenberg

quotes.text: It's amazing. My kids have grown me in ways I never knew possible. The patience I've received and the love I get from them is just amazing.
quotes.author: Candace Cameron Bure

quotes.text: Anyhow, a philosophical turn of thought now was not amiss, else one's patience would have given out almost at the harbour entrance. The term of her probation was eight days.
quotes.author: Joshua Slocum

quotes.text: Patience is sorrow's salve.
quotes.author: Charles Churchill

quotes.text: You know, writing is really difficult, and it takes a real patience and a skill. I don't know if I have that. I admire it in others, so much, and I envy it.
quotes.author: Adam Scott

quotes.text: Beauty, unlike the rest of the gifts handed out at birth, does not require dedication, patience and hard work to pay off. But it's also the only gift that does not keep on giving.
quotes.author: Paulina Porizkova

quotes.text: My three Ps: passion, patience, perseverance. You have to do this if you've got to be a filmmaker.
quotes.author: Robert Wise

quotes.text: Sometimes they are a matter of luck the photographer could not expect or hope for them. Sometimes they are a matter of patience, waiting for an effect to be repeated that he has seen and lost or for one that he anticipates.
quotes.author: Bill Brandt

quotes.text: I think there's not much patience for organized labour, period, public or private sector.
quotes.author: Kathleen Wynne

quotes.text: That's why I never became a director. I never had patience with people.
quotes.author: Ray Harryhausen

quotes.text: Patience is the best medicine.
quotes.author: John Florio

quotes.text: And so, at the age of thirty, I had successively disgraced myself with three fine institutions, each of which had made me free of its full and rich resources, had trained me with skill and patience, and had shown me nothing but forbearance and charity when I failed in trust.
quotes.author: Simon Raven

quotes.text: He preacheth patience that never knew pain.
quotes.author: H. G. Bohn

quotes.text: The only thing of weight that can be said against modern honor is that it is directly opposite to religion. The one bids you bear injuries with patience, the other tells you if you don't resent them, you are not fit to live.
quotes.author: Bernard de Mandeville

quotes.text: I will exercise patience and will provide all facts to the general public.
quotes.author: Yingluck Shinawatra

quotes.text: As I pass it, I feel as if I saw a dear old mother, sweet in her weakness, trembling at the approach of her dissolution, but not appealing to me against the inevitable, rather endeavouring to reassure me by her patience, and pointing to a hopeful future.
quotes.author: Thomas Edward Brown

quotes.text: This is the story of what a Woman's patience can endure, and what a Man's resolution can achieve.
quotes.author: Wilkie Collins

quotes.text: Soon I knew the craft of experimental physics was beyond me - it was the sublime quality of patience - patience in accumulating data, patience with recalcitrant equipment - which I sadly lacked.
quotes.author: Abdus Salam

quotes.text: As a young boy, I read 'Cheaper by the Dozen' and immediately became neurotic about my use of time. It taxed me severely, but only for the next 50 years. But I think it also allowed me to discipline myself to sit in the chair and be a writer, where one of the most needed qualities is patience.
quotes.author: Ridley Pearson

quotes.text: Difficult years lie ahead, patience is required.
quotes.author: Yiannis Stournaras

quotes.text: If you have confidence you have patience. Confidence, that is everything.
quotes.author: Ilie Nastase

quotes.text: So it's been a slow process and it's taken some patience. That's why patients are called patients I think - patience is required.
quotes.author: Bowie Kuhn

quotes.text: I've done an awful lot of stuff that's a monument to public patience.
quotes.author: Tyrone Power

quotes.text: If we ever forget that we are One Nation Under God, then we will be a nation gone under.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: Nationalism is an infantile disease. It is the measles of mankind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Let every nation know, whether it wishes us well or ill, that we shall pay any price, bear any burden, meet any hardship, support any friend, oppose any foe to assure the survival and the success of liberty.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Patriot: the person who can holler the loudest without knowing what he is hollering about.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I look forward to a great future for America - a future in which our country will match its military strength with our moral restraint, its wealth with our wisdom, its power with our purpose.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Patriotism is the virtue of the vicious.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: You're not supposed to be so blind with patriotism that you can't face reality. Wrong is wrong, no matter who says it.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: Patriotism is your conviction that this country is superior to all others because you were born in it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: It is lamentable, that to be a good patriot one must become the enemy of the rest of mankind.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: We, the People, recognize that we have responsibilities as well as rights that our destinies are bound together that a freedom which only asks what's in it for me, a freedom without a commitment to others, a freedom without love or charity or duty or patriotism, is unworthy of our founding ideals, and those who died in their defense.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: True patriotism hates injustice in its own land more than anywhere else.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.text: One of the great attractions of patriotism - it fulfills our worst wishes. In the person of our nation we are able, vicariously, to bully and cheat. Bully and cheat, what's more, with a feeling that we are profoundly virtuous.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: Each nation feels superior to other nations. That breeds patriotism - and wars.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: Can anything be stupider than that a man has the right to kill me because he lives on the other side of a river and his ruler has a quarrel with mine, though I have not quarrelled with him?
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: The highest patriotism is not a blind acceptance of official policy, but a love of one's country deep enough to call her to a higher plain.
quotes.author: George McGovern

quotes.text: Patriotism is easy to understand in America. It means looking out for yourself by looking out for your country.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.text: Our government has kept us in a perpetual state of fear - kept us in a continuous stampede of patriotic fervor - with the cry of grave national emergency.
quotes.author: Douglas MacArthur

quotes.text: Patriotism is the willingness to kill and be killed for trivial reasons.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.text: Patriotism is usually stronger than class hatred, and always stronger than internationalism.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: Patriotism is the last refuge of the scoundrel.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.text: Dissent is the highest form of patriotism.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.text: No matter that patriotism is too often the refuge of scoundrels. Dissent, rebellion, and all-around hell-raising remain the true duty of patriots.

quotes.text: Patriotism is when love of your own people comes first nationalism, when hate for people other than your own comes first.

quotes.text: A real patriot is the fellow who gets a parking ticket and rejoices that the system works.

quotes.text: The greater the state, the more wrong and cruel its patriotism, and the greater is the sum of suffering upon which its power is founded.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: I have no country to fight for my country is the earth, and I am a citizen of the world.
quotes.author: Eugene V. Debs

quotes.text: A nation is a society united by a delusion about its ancestry and by common hatred of its neighbours.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.text: Patriotism is often an arbitrary veneration of real estate above principles.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.text: 137 years later, Memorial Day remains one of America's most cherished patriotic observances. The spirit of this day has not changed - it remains a day to honor those who died defending our freedom and democracy.

quotes.text: Patriotism is a kind of religion it is the egg from which wars are hatched.
quotes.author: Guy de Maupassant

quotes.text: I am not an Athenian or a Greek, but a citizen of the world.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.text: To me, it seems a dreadful indignity to have a soul controlled by geography.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.text: We'll try to cooperate fully with the IRS, because, as citizens, we feel a strong patriotic duty not to go to jail.

quotes.text: Liberals become indignant when you question their patriotism, but simultaneously work overtime to give terrorists a cushion for the next attack and laugh at dumb Americans who love their country and hate the enemy.

quotes.text: I realize that patriotism is not enough. I must have no hatred or bitterness towards anyone.

quotes.text: I do think the patriotic thing to do is to critique my country. How else do you make a country better but by pointing out its flaws?

quotes.text: It is the patriotic duty of every man to lie for his country.

quotes.text: The tree of liberty needs to be watered from time to time with the blood of patriots and tyrants.

quotes.text: Patriotism is an instant reaction that fades away when the war starts.

quotes.text: The patriot blood of my father was warm in my veins.

quotes.text: The heights of popularity and patriotism are still the beaten road to power and tyranny.

quotes.text: Unless our conception of patriotism is progressive, it cannot hope to embody the real affection and the real interest of the nation.

quotes.text: It was patriotism, not communism, that inspired me.
quotes.author: Ho Chi Minh

quotes.text: It is not easy to see how the more extreme forms of nationalism can long survive when men have seen the Earth in its true perspective as a single small globe against the stars.

quotes.text: Intellectually I know that America is no better than any other country emotionally I know she is better than every other country.

quotes.text: They are patriotic in time of war because it is to their interest to be so, but in time of peace they follow power and the dollar wherever they may lead.

quotes.text: Patriotism is voluntary. It is a feeling of loyalty and allegiance that is the result of knowledge and belief. A patriot shows their their patriotism through their actions, by their choice.

quotes.text: I'm an advocate of the great Dr. Johnson, the English man of letters who said that patriotism was the last refuge of the scoundrel.

quotes.text: The love of one's country is a splendid thing. But why should love stop at the border?

quotes.text: I distinguish, between nationalism and patriotism.

quotes.text: The very idea of true patriotism is lost, and the term has been prostituted to the very worst of purposes. A patriot, sir! Why, patriots spring up like mushrooms!

quotes.text: I saw courage both in the Vietnam War and in the struggle to stop it. I learned that patriotism includes protest, not just military service.

quotes.text: Nationalism is a silly cock crowing on his own dunghill.

quotes.text: Patriotism must be founded on great principals and supported by great virtue.

quotes.text: Next to the love of God, the love of country is the best preventive of crime.

quotes.text: Patriotism is supporting your country all the time, and your government when it deserves it.

quotes.text: Heroism on command, senseless violence, and all the loathsome nonsense that goes by the name of patriotism - how passionately I hate them!

quotes.text: Guard against the impostures of pretended patriotism.

quotes.text: You'll never have a quiet world till you knock the patriotism out of the human race.

quotes.text: Patriotism. Combustible rubbish ready to the torch of any one ambitious to illuminate his name.

quotes.text: A man's country is not a certain area of land, of mountains, rivers, and woods, but it is a principle and patriotism is loyalty to that principle.

quotes.text: Americans admire a people who can scratch a desert and produce a garden. The Israelis have shown qualities that Americans identify with: guts, patriotism, idealism, a passion for freedom. I have seen it. I know. I believe that.

quotes.text: Patriotism, when it wants to make itself felt in the domain of learning, is a dirty fellow who should be thrown out of doors.

quotes.text: Love and business and family and religion and art and patriotism are nothing but shadows of words when a man's starving!

quotes.text: Look, I think Hispanic community - the values that resonate in our community are fundamentally conservative. They are faith, family and patriotism.

quotes.text: One, if you attack my integrity, I will defend myself. If you attack my patriotism, I will defend myself. If you come after my family, I will counter-attack viciously, I will destroy you.

quotes.text: During times of war, hatred becomes quite respectable even though it has to masquerade often under the guise of patriotism.

quotes.text: Patriotism is an ephemeral motive that scarcely ever outlasts the particular threat to society that aroused it.

quotes.text: Patriotism is best exemplified through auto-critique. When you're willing to stand up within the group and say, 'It is wrong for Black people to be anti-Semitic,' or 'It is wrong for America to discriminate against persons of African descent and made them slaves and based its wealth upon free labor,' it's crucial to say that.

quotes.text: Patriotism is best exemplified through auto-critique.

quotes.text: I believe patriotism comes from the heart. Patriotism is voluntary. It is a feeling of loyalty and allegiance that is the result of knowledge and belief.

quotes.text: Patriotism is an indispensable weapon in the defense of civilization against barbarism.

quotes.text: Our platform calls for a balanced deficit reduction plan where the wealthy pay their fair share. And when your country is in a costly war, with our soldiers sacrificing abroad and our nation facing a debt crisis at home, being asked to pay your fair share isn't class warfare - it's patriotism.

quotes.text: When your country is in a costly war, with our soldiers sacrificing abroad and our nation facing a debt crisis at home, being asked to pay your fair share isn't class warfare - it's patriotism.

quotes.text: Patriotism is the religion of hell.

quotes.text: Imagine all the people living life in peace. You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us, and the world will be as one.

quotes.text: Peace begins with a smile.

quotes.text: Those who make peaceful revolution impossible will make violent revolution inevitable.

quotes.text: He that would live in peace and at ease must not speak all he knows or all he sees.

quotes.text: A people free to choose will always choose peace.

quotes.text: Peace is a journey of a thousand miles and it must be taken one step at a time.

quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Nonviolence is the first article of my faith. It is also the last article of my creed.

quotes.text: Peace is its own reward.

quotes.text: It is an unfortunate fact that we can secure peace only by preparing for war.

quotes.text: I think that people want peace so much that one of these days government had better get out of their way and let them have it.

quotes.text: Let there be work, bread, water and salt for all.

quotes.text: We make war that we may live in peace.

quotes.text: I dream of an Africa which is in peace with itself.

quotes.text: Every goal, every action, every thought, every feeling one experiences, whether it be consciously or unconsciously known, is an attempt to increase one's level of peace of mind.

quotes.text: Peace is not only better than war, but infinitely more arduous.
